[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba nya bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa gsum pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra 
[\[1b.2\]]ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na drug sde dag rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed/_rkor 'jud par byed/_rnang sgal spyur bar byed/_spyur du 'jud par byed/_yur ba 'dren par byed/_'dren 
[\[1b.3\]]du 'jud par byed nas/_gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed/_rkor 'jud par byed/_rnang sgal spyur bar byed/_spyur 
[\[1b.4\]]du 'jud par byed/_yur ba 'dren par byed/_'dren du 'jud par byed de/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed/_rkor 'jud par byed/_rnang sgal spyur 
[\[1b.5\]]bar byed/_spyur du 'jud par byed/_yur ba 'dren par byed/_'dren du 'jud par byed na/_shes ldan dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag la 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bye brag ni ci yod/_bsam pa ni ci yod/_tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod/_su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[2a.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen 
[\[2a.3\]]bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed/_rkor 'jud par byed/_rnang sgal spyur bar byed/_spyur du 'jud par 
[\[2a.4\]]byed/_yur ba 'dren par byed/_'dren du 'jud par byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung 
[\[2a.5\]]bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[2a.6\]]bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang rang gi lag gis sa rko 'am/_rkor 'jud na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag nas lag pas so/_/sa zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis te/_rang bzhin can dang /_rang bzhin can ma yin pa'o/_/rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni char chu zhod na zla ba gsum gyis sa 'thas 
[\[2b.2\]]par gyur pa'o/_/char chu ma zhod na zla ba drug gis sa 'thas par gyur pa'o/_/rang bzhin can ma yin pa ni de las gzhan pa'o/_/rko'am zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/rkor 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro 
[\[2b.3\]]dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes 
[\[2b.4\]]gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong sa rko na rang bzhin can rko na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rang bzhin can ma yin pa rko na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong sa zhag 'gogs na sra ba 'gogs pa na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_grugs pa 'gogs na nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[2b.5\]]ro/_/dge slong sa la phur pa 'debs na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_sa las phur pa 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong sa la ri mo 'dren na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shod dgod pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong sa dang 'byar ba'i lci ba 'gogs na nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[2b.6\]]la/_lci ba 'ba' zhig 'gogs pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ngogs rtib par byed na sra ba rtib par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_grugs pa rtib par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'dam skyod par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'dam dang 'brel ba'i 
[\[2b.7\]]phru ba dang /_bum pa dang /_ril ba 'degs par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rtsig pa 'jig par byed na sra ba 'jig par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_grugs pa 'jig par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rtsig pa'i skyong nul 'gogs par byed na sra ba 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]'gogs par byed na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_grugs pa 'gogs par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rtsig pa la phur pa 'debs na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_rtsig pa las phur pa 'byin na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rtsig pa dang 'byar ba'i lci ba 'gogs 
[\[3a.2\]]par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rtsig pa la ri mo 'dren par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/shod dgod pa'i bsam pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong rtsig pa las tshwa rgo 'brul bar byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rdo ba can gyis rko bar byed na/_gal te sa ches 
[\[3a.3\]]mang la rdo ba ches chung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal te rdo ba ches mang la sa ches nyung na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rdo ba 'ba' zhig skyod par byed pa la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong bye ma can gyi sa rko bar byed na/_gal te sa ches mang la bye ma ches nyung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[3a.4\]]te bye ma ches mang la sa ches nyung na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bye ma 'ba' zhig rko ba la ni ltung ba med do/_/dge slong lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam sa la 'dzugs pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs 
[\[3a.5\]]pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/sa rko ba'i ltung byed de bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' 
[\[3a.6\]]ra ba na bzhugs so/_/shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bcom 
[\[3a.7\]]ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na/_lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan ma drangs kyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas shAkya ming chen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[3b.2\]]bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[3b.3\]]bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas shAkya ming chen stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge 
[\[3b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya ming chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas shAkya ming chen gyis 
[\[3b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des bsnyung ba'i rung ba'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug cing /_bsnyung ba'i sman yang 'jog tu bcug_/bde ba'i sman dus 
[\[3b.6\]]su rung ba dang /_thun tshod du rung ba dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dang /_rtsa ba'i sman dang /_sdong bu'i sman dang /_lo ma'i sman dang /_me tog gi sman dang /_'bras bu'i sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/zhun mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu 
[\[3b.7\]]bcug_/'bru mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/ba dag dang /_ma he mo dag dang /_ra bzhon dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/yo byad thams cad kyang 'jog tu bcug_/sman pa dang snyun g.yog dag kyang 'jog tu bcug ste/_dge slong dag la yang yo byad 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]thams cad kyis bstabs so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di lta bu rnyed kyis thabs shig bya'o zhes de dag gis sman pa la dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo cag la nad ci yod pa je ltos shig_/sman pas bsams pa/_
[\[4a.2\]]'di dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas za 'dod kyis 'di dag dang mthun par smra bar bya'o snyam nas des de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag ni shul gyis dub pa dag lags pas je skur snum bag gsol la de'i 'og tu bska ba gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[4a.3\]]dga' bo nye dga' 'di ni sman pa chen po nad dang /_nad kyi gzhi dang /_khams la mkhas pa rgyal po la mkho ba yin te/_gal te bdag cag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de ltar bya bar brtsams na myur du zin par 'gyur gyis je dang por gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad 
[\[4a.4\]]g.yog bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g.yog bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g.yog bya'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g.yog byed pa na ci tsam na 
[\[4a.5\]]zla ba gcig 'das so/_/de'i 'og tu gzhan gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g.yog byed pa na zla ba gnyis pa 'das so/_/de'i 'og tu yang gzhan gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g.yog byed pa na zla ba gsum pa 'das so/_/zla 
[\[4a.6\]]ba bzhi pa la thams cad 'dus te bza' bar brtsams nas zla ba bzhi 'das pa dang shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs pa dang nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]phyag tshang la phrin spring ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]deng kho bo la khu sha dang /_khu ba dang /_sha tshod dag gyis shig ces 
[\[4a.7\]]spring ngo /_/phyag tshang gis smras pa/_'phags pa dgung zla bzhi 'das te shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs na/_khyed kyi bya ba da dung yang ma rdzogs sam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa shAkya ming chen kha shin tu chen pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan 'dren na/_gal te spyan drang ba 'di lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang du rung na ni nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyan 'dren par spro'o/_/des 
[\[4b.2\]]smras pa/_khyed cag zla ba bzhir sha dang khu ba sha stag zos par gyur kyang 'on kyang khyed cag smod par byed na/_gnas brtan gnas brtan gang dag gis zla ba bzhir a ru ra 'brum gcig kyang ma gsol ba de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir 
[\[4b.3\]]dge slong dag ha cang slong bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis ha cang bslang bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong 
[\[4b.4\]]dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong zhig 'dug ste/_de'i bsti gnas de me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de'i bsti gnas de dang ha cang mi ring ba na rdzing chen po zhig 
[\[4b.5\]]yod pa de na klu gzhon nu zhig 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe drang srong de skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu de rdzing chen po de nas byung nas lus kyis drang srong de'i lus la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe drang srong de langs par gyur pa 
[\[4b.6\]]de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu des drang srong de'i lus la lus kyis bkrol nas dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub 'khor dang /_phreng ba rgyu sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_byug pas brgyan par gyur te thal mo sbyar nas mdun du 'dug ste/_drang srong de la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed do/_/
[\[4b.7\]]drang srong de klu gzhon nu de'i lus kyi reg pas skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas des drang srong de la smras pa/_kye 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]drang srong khyod kyi bsti gnas 'di me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa yin na khyod ci'i phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur/_des smras pa/_de de bzhin 
[\[5a.2\]]te/_kho bo'i bsti gnas 'di me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di na nyes dmigs kyang yod do/_/'di na nyes dmigs ci yod/_/des smras pa/_rdzing chen po 'di na klu gzhon nu zhig 'dug ste/_gang gi 
[\[5a.3\]]tshe kho bo skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu de rdzing chen po de nas byung nas lus kyis kho bo'i lus la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe kho bo langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na des kho bo'i lus la lus kyis bkrol nas dpung rgyan dang /_rna 
[\[5a.4\]]cha gdub 'khor dang /_phreng ba rgyu sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /_byug pas brgyan par gyur te/_thal mo sbyar nas mdun du 'dug ste kho bo la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed de/_de'i lus kyi reg pas kho bo skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba 
[\[5a.5\]]dang /_lus ma thob par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_khyod klu gzhon nu de phyin cad 'ong bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_'dod do/_/des smras pa/_gang gi tshe klu gzhon nu de khyod la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed pa de'i tshe na de'i mgo la nor bu 'dug pa de 
[\[5a.6\]]slongs shig dang klu rnams ni ser sna can yin pas mi ster bas phyin cad 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu de de bzhin du rdzing chen po de nas byung nas lus kyis drang srong de'i lus la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka 
[\[5a.7\]]chen po byas te 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe drang srong de langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu des drang srong de'i lus la lus kyis bkrol nas dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub 'khor dang /_phreng ba rgyu sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang byug pas brgyan par gyur te thal mo sbyar nas mdun du 'dug ste drang srong de 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed pa na drang srong des de la smras pa/_klu gzhon nu khyod kyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu gang yin pa de kho bo la byin cig_/des smras pa/_pha ma dag la dri bar bya'o/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_de ltar gyis shig_/klu gzhon nu des pha ma gnyis la dris 
[\[5b.2\]]pa/_yab yum gnyis drang srong bdag gi nor bu slong na de la stsal bar bgyi'am/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_nor bu 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis zas dang /_skom dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_rgyan dag rnyed pa yin gyis ma sbyin cig_/de nas klu gzhon nu de rdzing de 
[\[5b.3\]]nas byung ste drang srong de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang drang srong des de la smras pa/_klu gzhon nu khyod kyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu gang yin pa de kho bo la byin cig_/de nas klu gzhon nu des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_bza' dang btung dang de bzhin bgo ba dag_/nor bu 'di yi 
[\[5b.4\]]mthu las 'grub 'gyur bas/_/de phyir khyod la nor bu 'di mi sbyin/_/ha cang slong bas zhe sdang gnas su gyur/_/ha cang slong bas bdag la sdigs byed pa/_/ral gri rno dang 'bru mar bdar ba bzhin/_/gal te khyod gnas phyin chad bdag 'ong na/_/bdag gi klad par rdo bas snun 
[\[5b.5\]]gyis shig_/ces smras te mi snang ba'i lam na 'dug go/_/dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang ha cang bslangs pa na mi snang ba'i lam na 'khod na mi dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta bas na dge slong gis ha cang bslang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[5b.6\]]dge slong dag gzhan yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong zhig 'dug ste/_de'i bsti gnas de me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/de na bya mang po dag gnas pa de 
[\[5b.7\]]dag der sgra 'byin te/_bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong des bya mang po dag gi sgra des sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob bo/_/de nas drang srong gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na drang srong de'i bsti gnas su phyin nas des drang srong de la smras pa/_kye drang srong khyod 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]kyi bsti gnas 'di ni me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa bzang ba yin na khyod kyis 'dir sems rtse gcig pa nyid thob bam/_des smras pa/_de de bzhin te/_kho bo'i bsti gnas 'di me tog phun sum tshogs 
[\[6a.2\]]pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_nyen kor phun sum tshogs pa bzang ba yin na 'on kyang 'di na nyes dmigs kyang yod do/_/des smras pa/_'di na nyes dmigs ci yod/_des smras pa/_'di na bya mang po dag gnas pa de dag 'dir sgra 'byin par byed de/_bsam gtan dag gi 
[\[6a.3\]]tsher ma ni sgra yin pas bdag gis bya mang po dag gi sgra des sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob bo/_/des smras pa/_khyod bya de dag phyin cad 'dir mi 'ong bar 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_'dod do/_/des smras pa/_tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo rtswa'i me sgron sbor la shing ljon pa dag gi drung du 
[\[6a.4\]]song ste 'di skad ces/_sgo nga dag bza'o/_/phru gu dag bza'o zhes smros shig dang phyin chad 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des de ltar bya bar brtsams pa dang /_bya de dag gis bsams pa/_drang srong 'di smyos par gyur tam ci snyam nas/_bya de dag gis phru gu dag 'dab ma skyes par 
[\[6a.5\]]gyur pa dang de dag dong ste/_phyin chad mi 'ong zhing ji tsam na mthar gyis thams cad mi snang ba'i lam na 'khod do/_/dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang ha cang bslangs pa na mi snang ba'i lam na 'khod na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de lta 
[\[6a.6\]]bas na dge slong gis ha cang bslang bar mi bya'o/_/ha cang slong na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[6a.7\]]ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir byas nas de las lhag par bdag gir byed pa bden nam/_btsun 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du 
[\[6b.2\]]mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[6b.3\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i 
[\[6b.4\]]gnas su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas rgyal po'i khab ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs 
[\[6b.5\]]gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[6b.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs te/_bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na/_lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad 
[\[6b.7\]]kyis spyan ma drangs kyis bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang 
[\[7a.2\]]dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag 
[\[7a.3\]]par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong 
[\[7a.4\]]gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung 
[\[7a.5\]]bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des bsnyung ba'i rung 
[\[7a.6\]]ba'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug cing bsnyung ba'i sman yang 'jog tu bcug_/bde ba'i sman dus su rung ba dang /_thun tshod du rung ba dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_'tsho'i bar du bcang ba dang /_rtsa ba'i sman dang /_sdong bu'i sman dang /_lo ma'i sman dang /_me tog gi sman dang /_'bras bu'i 
[\[7a.7\]]sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/zhun mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/'bru mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/ba dag dang /_ma he mo dag dang /_ra bzhon dag kyang 'jog tu bcug_/yo byad thams cad kyang 'jog tu bcug_/
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]sman pa dang /_snyun g.yog dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i sring mo'i khyos bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/
[\[7b.2\]]thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_shAkya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs te/_bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan 
[\[7b.3\]]du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na/_lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan ma drangs kyis bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[7b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag 
[\[7b.5\]]par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi 
[\[7b.6\]]gsung ngo /_/de nas bram ze de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[7b.7\]]dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_bram ze de'i dang por ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos spyan drangs so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_'phags pa pi lin da'i bu bdag gi nye du yin pas de 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]spyan drangs na gnang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas/_de tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu bram 
[\[8a.2\]]ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin 
[\[8a.3\]]du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas bram ze de stan las langs te tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pas 
[\[8a.4\]]dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[8a.5\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gi mag pa bdag ga la ba der mchis nas de bdag la 'phags pas dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /_bsod 
[\[8a.6\]]snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang zhes mchi na/_de la mchid kyis 'tshal lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na so sor mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te/_dge slong gis so sor mgron du bos 
[\[8a.7\]]pa bdag gir bya'o/_/dge slong gzhan dag phyis lhags pa de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag rgyal pos mgron du ma bos kyis bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya'o snyam du rig nas de dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na 'dug pas de dag bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa 'di dag bsod snyoms la zhugs/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha 'di dag slad kyis mchis pas 'di dag gi glo ba la 
[\[8b.2\]]dge slong gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig lhags pa de dag rgyal pos mgron du bos kyis/_bdag cag phyis lhags pa dag rgyal pos mgron du ma bos so snyam du rig nas bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de lta bas na 'phags pa dag yang dang yang mgron du 
[\[8b.3\]]bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na yang dang yang mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te/_dge slong gis yang dang yang mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis 
[\[8b.4\]]bsams pa/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang ba yin la/_bdag cag ni bya ba nyung ba dang /_byed pa nyung ba yin gyis bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya'o snyam du rig nas de dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[8b.5\]]bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na 'dug pas/_de dag bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa 'di dag bsod snyoms la zhugs/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa 
[\[8b.6\]]dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_de lta bas na 'phags pa dag dus kyis mgron du bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dus kyis mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te/_dge slong 
[\[8b.7\]]gis dus kyis mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs nas phyi de nyin par dge slong rab tu mang po dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po steng 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na 'dug pas de dag bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas/_des blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa 'di dag bsod snyoms la zhugs/_de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_rgyal pos 
[\[9a.2\]]smras pa/_de lta bas na 'phags pa dag rtag tu mgron du bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rtag tu mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te/_dge slong gis rtag tu mgron du 
[\[9a.3\]]bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[9a.4\]]bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag 
[\[9a.5\]]gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba 
[\[9a.6\]]ni chos 'di pas so/_/zla ba bzhir zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhi tshun chad du'o/_/mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni bstabs pa'o/_/bdag gir bya'o zhes bya ba ni khas blang bar bya ba'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni 
[\[9a.7\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/so sor mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong so sor tha dad par mgron du bos pa'o/_/yang dang yang mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong yang dang yang mgron du bos pa'o/_/dus kyis mgron du bos 
[\[9b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong nan gyis mgron du bos pa'o/_/rtag tu mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong gtan du mgron du bos pa'o/_/ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni bzhag ste'o/_/de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/
[\[9b.3\]]de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa las lhag par bdag gir byed na/_thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ngan pa la mgron du bos pa na bsod pa slong na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_za ba la ltung byed du 
[\[9b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis bsod pa la mgron du bos pa na ngan pa slong na de slong ba la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_za ba la yang nyes byas nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na bud med kyi yul zas khyer te 'ong na dge slong gis sring mo chog go/_/mi 'dod do zhes brjod 
[\[9b.5\]]par bya ste/_gal te bud med kyi yul na re 'phags pa ci zhig bzhed ces zer na bstabs pa brjod par bya ste/_gang 'dod pa de bslang bar bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/mgron du gnyer ba las ring 
[\[9b.6\]]du 'dug pa'i ltung byed de bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'cha' bar mdzad pa de'i tshe na gnyi 
[\[9b.7\]]ga'i dge 'dun sdud par mdzad pas 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong bca' ba mdzad pa yin na 'di la gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bsdu ba ma mdzad pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong zhig dge slong ma rnams kyi nang du thong la 'di skad ces/_sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/
[\[10a.2\]]de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par 
[\[10a.3\]]bya'o zhes bsgo shig ces gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la bsgo ba/_tshe dang ldan pa lam pa khyod bzhud la dge slong ma rnams la 
[\[10a.4\]]sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang 
[\[10a.5\]]yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa lam pas btsun pa kun dga' bo bka' bzhin 
[\[10a.6\]]'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ga la ba der song ba dang /_ji tsam na drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa lam pa khyod gar 'gro/_tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsams pa/_'di dag gis kyang ma thos 
[\[10a.7\]]pa 'dras 'di dag la yang brjod par bya'o snyam nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed kyis kyang bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de 
[\[10b.2\]]dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa/_khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes de dag gis byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi 
[\[10b.3\]]gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dag gis khur bslang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa lam pa de nas song ste 'gro ba na dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis mthong nas de dag gis de la smras pa/_btsun pa lam pa gar bzhud/_des smras pa/_sring mo dag shes par gyis shig_/bcom 
[\[10b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa 
[\[10b.5\]]dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed kyis kyang bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag dge slong ma mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[10b.6\]]ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dag gis khur bslang ste dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa lam pas 
[\[10b.7\]]bsams pa/_bdag la gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag la brjod pas ci bya/_da ni song la skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ma gtogs pa gzhan 'ga' la yang brjod par mi bya'o snyam nas de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI ga la ba der song ste phyin nas skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]chen mo gau ta mI la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gau ta mI shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thun mong 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par 
[\[11a.2\]]bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad kyis khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/skye dgu'i 
[\[11a.3\]]bdag mo chen mos smras pa/_btsun pa lam pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos 
[\[11a.4\]]pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad pa gang lags pa de bdag mgo dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis kyang nod do/_/btsun pa lam pa 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[11a.5\]]bgyi na rgyal rigs kyi phyugs cung dag gam/_bram ze'i phyugs cung dag gam/_rje'u rigs kyi phyugs cung dag gam/_dmangs rigs kyi phyugs cung legs par khrus bgyis pa/_byug pas legs par byugs pa/_skra dang sen mo legs par bcos pa/_rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba 
[\[11a.6\]]dag gis ud pa la'i phreng ba'am/_tsam pa ka'i phreng ba'am/_bar shi ka'i phreng ba'am/_a ti mug ta ka'i phreng ba 'ga' zhig stsal bar gyur na de yid dga' bas sug pa gnyis kyis blangs te yan lag gi dam pa mgo la gdags par bgyi ba de bzhin du/_btsun pa lam pa bcom 
[\[11a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad de/_dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o/_/de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do/_/so sor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dang yang mgron du bos pa dang /_dus 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]kyis mgron du bos pa dang /_rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te/_de la de ni dus yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad pa gang lags pa de yang bdag mgo dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis kyang nod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa lam pas bsgo ste phyir 'ongs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[11b.2\]]dga' bos de mthong nas dris pa/_tshe dang ldan pa lam pa khyod kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsgo'am/_des smras pa/_bsgo ste/_'di ltar byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba dag gis khur bslang ngo /_/sus/_drug sde dag gis so/_/ci'i 
[\[11b.3\]]phyir/_des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na de dag la 'di skad ces bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa 
[\[11b.4\]]rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas 
[\[11b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma 
[\[11b.6\]]bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na de dag la 'di skad ces/_bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa 
[\[11b.7\]]dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon 
[\[12a.2\]]bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod 
[\[12a.3\]]kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na de dag la 'di skad ces/_bdag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob 
[\[12a.4\]]bo zhes zer na ltung byed do/_/dge slong kun shes par 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_
[\[12a.5\]]gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o zhes bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bslab pa gang yin pa de la'o/_/de dag la zhes bya ba ni dge slong de dag la'o/_/'di skad ces 
[\[12a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams so/_/'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams so/_/ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du zhes bya ba ni ma 
[\[12a.7\]]mo mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams la'o/_/byis pa zhes bya ba la/_byis pa zhes bya ba ni nyes par bsam pa sems pa dang /_nyes par smra ba rjod pa dang /_nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa'o/_/rmongs pa zhes bya ba la/_rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde 'dzin pa ma yin pa 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o/_/mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la/_mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la mi gsal ba dang /_'dul ba la mi gsal ba dang /_ma mo la mi gsal ba'o/_/mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba la/_mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba 
[\[12b.2\]]ni mdo sde la mi mkhas pa dang /_'dul ba la mi mkhas pa dang /_ma mo la mi mkhas pa'o/_/khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 
[\[12b.3\]]'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/dge slong kun shes par 'dod 
[\[12b.4\]]pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste/_de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji 
[\[12b.5\]]tsam cung zad dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/zhes bsgo ba na de dag la 'di skad ces/_bdag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la 'dri'i bar du byis pa/_rmongs pa/_mi gsal ba/_mi 
[\[12b.6\]]mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na thams cad ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/byis pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/rmongs pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi 
[\[12b.7\]]gsal ba khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo zhes zer na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa kho nar byis pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_mi gsal ba dang /_mi mkhas pa yin na ltung ba 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spang ba'i ltung byed de bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[13a.2\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni kau shAm+bIr song ste snying las chung ngur 'dug_/'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so 
[\[13a.3\]]gnyis ni dus la bab/_dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag 
[\[13a.4\]]yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho btsams te/_ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la/_ji ltar nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'di'i 
[\[13a.5\]]phu bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin gyis tshur sheg_/je gros bya'o zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te sgo bcad nas gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' skar khung na nyan cing des de dag bsdigs te/_kye ma bcu bdun sde dag ci'i gros byed/_kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa kha 
[\[13a.6\]]cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_kha cig ni snying las chung ngu kho nar 'dug_/kha cig ni dus la bab pas da 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o snyam du sems sam ci/_khyed kyis da kho bo cag zil gyis mnan te 'khod snyam mam/_kho bo cag gis kyang khyed la mtshams chen 
[\[13a.7\]]po gcad par bya'o/_/khyed kyis/_glang po'i thag pa nyi ma dang /_/rlung gis yongs su bskams gyur cing /_/glang po'i gnya' nas lhung gyur kyang /_/lug ni lnga brgyas drang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba ma thos sam zhes bsdigs pa dang /_de dag gis bsams pa/_'dis bdag cag gros 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]byed pa 'phrigs kyis gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes de dag me khang du zhugs te gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' yang der 'jab cing 'ongs te nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag steng khang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' bar khang du 'dug ste nyan cing 
[\[13b.2\]]des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag bar khang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' 'og khang du 'dug ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag gnas khang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' khyams su 'dug ste nyan cing des 
[\[13b.3\]]der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag khyams su 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' gnas khang du 'dug ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag sgo khang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' bang rim du 'dug ste nyan cing des 
[\[13b.4\]]der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag bang rim du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' sgo khang du 'dug ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag 'chag sar 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' span spun dag gi nang du 'dug ste nyan cing des 
[\[13b.5\]]der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag span spun dag gi nang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' 'chag sar 'dug ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag dgon par 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' tshang tshing dag gi nang du 'dug 
[\[13b.6\]]ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag tshang tshing dag gi nang du 'khod de gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' dgon par 'dug ste nyan cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs so/_/de dag lam nas 'dong zhing gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /_nye dga' phyi bzhin song ste nyan 
[\[13b.7\]]cing des der yang de bzhin du bsdigs nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus kyis 'di la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis de la smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' bdag cag la bzod par mdzod cig_/nye 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bzod par bya'o/_/de dag gis de la dris pa/_khyod kyis kho bo cag gros byed pa ji ltar shes/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gang gi tshe khyed cag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos skar khung nas mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag me 
[\[14a.2\]]khang du zhugs te gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos bzhabs te mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag steng khang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos bar khang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag bar khang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos 'og khang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed 
[\[14a.3\]]cag gnas khang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos khyams su 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag khyams su 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos gnas khang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag sgo khang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos bang rim du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/
[\[14a.4\]]gang gi tshe khyed cag bang rim du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos sgo khang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag 'chag sar 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos span spun dag gi nang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag span spun dag gi nang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos 
[\[14a.5\]]'chag sar 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag dgon par 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos tshang tshing dag gi nang du 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag tshang tshing dag gi nang du 'khod de gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos dgon par 'dug ste mnyan to/_/gang gi tshe khyed cag lam nas 
[\[14a.6\]]'dong zhing gros byed pa de'i tshe na kho bos phyi bzhin song ste mnyan to/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod nyan rnas 'dug tu rung ngam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_gal te kho bo khyed cag gros byed pa'i tshe nyan rnas 'dug par ma gyur du zin na khyed cag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas par gyur to/_/
[\[14a.7\]]dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur/_mtshang 'dru bar gyur/_mi mthun par gyur/_rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te/_de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]te cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu 
[\[14b.2\]]ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod dge slong rnams 'thab par 
[\[14b.3\]]gyur/_mtshang 'dru bar gyur/_mi mthun par gyur/_rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs 
[\[14b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge 
[\[14b.5\]]slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[14b.6\]]bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams 'thab par gyur/_mtshang 'dru bar gyur/_mi mthun par gyur/_rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te cang mi smra bar nyan 
[\[14b.7\]]rnas 'dug na ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong rnams zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams so/_/'thab par gyur/_mtshang 'dru bar gyur/_mi mthun par gyur/_rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rnam par gnas pa la'o/_/dge slong 'di dag ji skad zer ba de bdag gis mnyan te de lta de ltar rjes su tha snyad gdags par bya'o snyam pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i bsam pas gnyen pos de lta de ltar pha rol gnan par bya'o snyam 
[\[15a.2\]]pa'o/_/de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o/_/cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug na zhes bya ba ni cang mi smra bar rna gtod pas 'dug na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag 
[\[15a.3\]]tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong dag steng khang na 
[\[15a.4\]]gros byed cing dge slong yang 'dzeg na dge slong des rting sgra'am/_se gol gyi sgra'am/_mgul bsal ba'i sgra bya'o/_/rting sgra'am/_se gol gyi sgra'am/_mgul bsal ba'i sgra mi byed na ji srid du sgra thos shing don ma go'i bar du dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_sgra'i don go na ltung 
[\[15a.5\]]byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag bar khang dang /_'og khang dang /_gnas khang dang /_khyams dang /_sgo khang dang /_bang rim dang /_'chag sa dang /_dgon pa dang /_lam nas 'gro zhing gros byed la/_dge slong yang phyi bzhin 'gro na dge slong des rting sgra'am/_se gol gyi sgra'am/_
[\[15a.6\]]mgul bsal ba'i sgra bya'o/_/rting sgra'am/_se gol gyi sgra'am/_mgul bsal ba'i sgra mi byed na ji srid du sgra thos la don ma go'i bar du dge slong la nyes byas su 'gyur la/_sgra'i don go na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nang dang bcas pa ma yin pa dang /_gya tshom du 'jug pa dang /_mnyan nas 
[\[15a.7\]]nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/nyan rna las gyur pa'i ltung byed de bdun bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]rtsa bzhi pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni kau shAm+bIr song ste 
[\[15b.2\]]snying las chung ngur 'dug_/'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so gnyis ni dus la bab/_dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gdug cing pha rol gnon pa dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /_'dul ba 'dzin pa dang /_ma mo 'dzin 
[\[15b.3\]]par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis tho btsams te/_ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis tho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la/_ji ltar nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]tho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyis 
[\[15b.4\]]de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di'i phu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin pas bdag cag gis 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_gcig smra ba na gnyis kyis mnyan par mi bya bar tshogs smra na tshogs ni 
[\[15b.5\]]rgyal po dang 'dra bas gal te de cung zad smra bar gyur na de'i tshe gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes de dag gis gnas mal bshams nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na/_gleng ba 
[\[15b.6\]]po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag gi lto dral te rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni don 
[\[15b.7\]]'das pa yin na rma sos pa glengs te ci bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni 'das pa'i don kho na la brten te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad do/_/dga' bos phyir bzlog par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_gang gcig 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]phyir zlog par byed pa de yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o/_/dga' bos bsams pa/_'di dag gi byed stangs las na bdag la yang gnas nas 'byin pa'i las byed par 'gyur na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de dgun gyi dus la bab pas la ba zhig 
[\[16a.2\]]gyon te des la ba de rtsig drung du bslang ste bzhag nas cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dod pa smros shig ces de dag gis gya tshom du nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa na ngu zhing phu 
[\[16a.3\]]bo'i gan du song ba dang /_dga' bos smras pa/_nye dga' ci'i phyir ngu /_lhung bzed nag po can dag gis bdag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so/_/dga' bos smras pa/_gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang /_grong khyer 
[\[16a.4\]]dang /_khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig_/'on kyang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dag la grong dang /_grong khyer med dam ci/_sdod la phyis bzod pa gsol cig_/'di ltar de dag gis mi mthun pa kho nar las byas so/_/su zhig der ma 'ongs/_dga' bos 
[\[16a.5\]]smras pa/_kho bo'o/_/bdag gis de na rgan pa'i mtha' logs na slob dpon gyi sgra thos so/_/dga' bos smras pa/_gang gi tshe de dag na re gang gcig phyir zlog par byed pa de yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes zer ba de'i tshe na kho bos bsams pa/_'di dag gi byed stangs 
[\[16a.6\]]las na bdag la yang gnas nas 'byin pa'i las byed par 'gyur na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_kho bo dgun gyi dus la bab pas la ba zhig gyon te kho bos la ba de rtsig drung du bslang ste bzhag nas cang mi smra bar stan las langs te song ngo /_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i 
[\[16a.7\]]phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin 
[\[16b.2\]]te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu dga' bo la rmas pa/_dga' bo khyod dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[16b.3\]]dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[16b.4\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi 
[\[16b.5\]]chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa de dag gis yun ring du 
[\[16b.6\]]'dug par mi nus pa na dge slong nad g.yog dag gis kyang nad pa dag gi bya ba nyams par byed/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[16b.7\]]de lta bas na dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas ji tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te de 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang /_bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la ma smras so snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste ji srid du dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig nas de der song ba dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyod 
[\[17a.2\]]ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon/_des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gi_/gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[17a.3\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa 
[\[17a.4\]]dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[17a.5\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu 
[\[17a.6\]]dga' bo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang /_gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba 
[\[17a.7\]]dang bzhi'i las byung ba na'o/_/cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das te 'gro zhing ngo /_/dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i 
[\[17b.2\]]chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa byung ba na cang mi smra bar stan las langs te 'gro zhing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na ji 
[\[17b.3\]]srid thos pa'i nyen kor las ma 'das kyi bar du nyes byas su 'gyur la/_thos pa'i nyen kor las 'das na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/mi smra bar 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun bcu rtsa 
[\[17b.4\]]bdun pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na glang chen lhas kyi bdag po'i bu nag pa dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste/_'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni 
[\[17b.5\]]ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir dpong sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gcig pus dge 'dun zlog par byed/_gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing /_rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed/_
[\[17b.6\]]gus par mi byed/_rje sa mi byed cing phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du sems nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste/_'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir dpong 
[\[17b.7\]]sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gcig pus dge 'dun zlog par byed/_gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing /_rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed/_gus par mi byed/_rje sa mi byed cing phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du sems zhes smod 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa 
[\[18a.2\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang chen lhas kyi bdag po'i bu nag pa la rmas pa/_dge slong khyod dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'di lta ste/_'di 
[\[18a.3\]]ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pa'i bstan pa'o zhes rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir dpong sa'i khang par 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na gcig pus dge 'dun zlog par byed/_gcig pus dge 'dun mi mthun par byed cing rtsod pa bzung ste rtsod cing 'dug la 
[\[18a.4\]]gtam gyi mjug sdod par mi byed/_gus par mi byed/_rje sa mi byed cing /_phyir smra bar bya'o snyam du sems pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa 
[\[18a.5\]]ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi 
[\[18a.6\]]bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gus par mi byed na ltung byed do/_/gus par mi byed na zhes bya ba ni gnyis ka la gus par mi byed na ste/_dge 'dun la dang /_gang 
[\[18a.7\]]zag la'o/_/de la dge 'dun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pa'o/_/gang zag ni mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dag go/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong 
[\[18b.2\]]dge 'dun gyis 'dug shig ces bsgo ba na mi 'dug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma 'dug shig ces bsgo ba na 'dug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/song shig ces bsgo ba na mi 'gro na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma 'gro shig ces bsgo ba na 'gro na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gnas mal long shig ces bsgo 
[\[18b.3\]]ba na mi len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gnas mal ma len cig ces bsgo ba na len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang long shig ces bsgo ba na mi len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang ma len cig ces bsgo ba na len na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/smros shig ces bsgo ba na mi smra 
[\[18b.4\]]na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/ma smra shig ces bsgo ba na smra na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/chos dang ldan par shad kyis sbyang ba sbyin par byed na ltung ba med do/_/dge 'dun gyi tha snyad pas bsgo ba la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/dge slong mkhan pos 'dug shig ces bsgo ba na mi 'dug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[18b.5\]]ma 'dug shig ces bsgo ba na 'dug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/song shig ces bsgo ba na mi 'gro na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ma 'gro shig ces bsgo ba na 'gro na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gnas mal long shig ces bsgo ba na mi len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gnas mal ma len cig ces bsgo 
[\[18b.6\]]ba na len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang long shig ces bsgo ba na mi len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/gtsug lag khang ma len cig ces bsgo ba na len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/smros shig ces bsgo ba na mi smra na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ma smra shig ces bsgo ba na smra na nyes byas 
[\[18b.7\]]su 'gyur ro/_/chos dang ldan par shad kyis sbyang ba sbyin par byed na ltung ba med do/_/slob dpon rnams kyis bsgo ba la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/ma gus pa'i tshul gyi ltung byed de bdun bcu 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la khyim bdag rtogs ldan zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung 
[\[19a.2\]]ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de la bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_
[\[19a.3\]]mdzes pa zhig btsas nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to/_/khyim bdag des bsams pa/_bdag gis bu mo 'di gzugs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin/_bzo'i phyir yang mi sbyin gyi bdag dang rigs dang /_nor gyis 'dra ba'am/_lhag pa gang yin pa la bdag gis bu mo 'di sbyin no 
[\[19a.4\]]snyam mo/_/des mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa de bdag dang rigs dang /_nor gyis mnyam 
[\[19a.5\]]zhing nor gyi rnam pas ches lhag pa yin no zhes thos nas des bu mo de mnyan yod du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu la byin no/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis kyang dpal gyi 'byor pas bu'i chung mar blangs so/_/khyim bdag rtogs ldan yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[19a.6\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur nas de la gang gi nyin mo sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim bdag rtogs ldan la gnod pa brgya dag byung bar gyur to/_/mngal na gnas pa de ji lta ji ltar skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar khyim bdag rtogs 
[\[19a.7\]]ldan la yang dang yang du rgya cher gnod pa brgya dag byung bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyis bsams pa/_bdag skyed mos tshal du song ste 'dug go snyam nas/_des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gal te kho bo la gnod pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur na sbron cig_/
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ji ste ma byung na ma sbron cig ces bsgo nas de skyed mos tshal du song ste 'dug go/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de gang gi nyi ma la byung ba de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim bdag rtogs ldan la gnod pa stong dag byung bar gyur to/_/de nas mi zhig rings pa rings par 
[\[19b.2\]]khyim bdag rtogs ldan ga la ba der song ba dang /_khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyis mi de thag ring po kho na nas rings pa rings par 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag la gnod pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur gor ma chag snyam nas des mi de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje ci'i phyir 'di ltar 
[\[19b.3\]]rings pa rings par 'ong /_mi des smras pa/_khyod kyi sras bltam gyis dgyes pa skyed cig_/rtogs ldan gyis smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje kho bo'i bus gnod pa brgya phrag mang po bskyed mod kyi 'on kyang bu 'ongs pa legs so/_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas khye'u 'di'i ming cir 
[\[19b.4\]]gdags snyam nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_khye'u 'di la phas 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pas khye'u 'di'i ming legs 'ongs zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming legs 'ongs zhes bya bar btags so/_/legs 'ongs ji lta ji ltar skyes par gyur pa de lta de ltar khyim bdag 
[\[19b.5\]]rtogs ldan gyi khyim na nor dang /_'bru dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dag yongs su zad par gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag rtogs ldan yang dus la bab cing de'i chung ma yang dus la bab/_de'i khyim 
[\[19b.6\]]yang mes tshig_/bang mdzod kyi rnam pa dang /_zhing gi rnam pa dang /_nor gyi rnam pa dang /_'bru'i rnam pa thams cad kyang mes tshig go/_/grong pa'i mi gang dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du dong ba dag kyang de na kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che zhig par gyur/_kha cig ni zong zong ma yin par 
[\[19b.7\]]gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/nye du dag kyang kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]'tsho ba dag kyang kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo gcig pu zhig legs 'ongs kyi bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug pa des legs 'ongs khye'u'i grwar yi ge dang yig 'bru 
[\[20a.2\]]slob tu phul lo/_/rgan mo des bsams pa/_khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi khyim nor du ma dang ldan pa yongs su zad cing mthar thug par gyur na gang gi bsod nams med pas de ltar gyur pa ci bdag gi'am 'on te legs 'ongs kyi bsod nams med pas de ltar gyur pa blta'o snyam nas ji tsam 
[\[20a.3\]]na des legs 'ongs kyi ming gis phru rtog btsugs pa dang de chud zos par gyur cing /_bdag gi ming gis phru rtog btsugs pa dang de tshos par gyur nas des bsams pa/_'di ni sems can skal chad cig yin pas 'di'i le lan gyis khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi khyim nor du ma dang ldan pa tshul ma 
[\[20a.4\]]yin pas chud zos par gyur pas bdag kyang 'di'i le lan gyis tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gor ma chag na 'di la ji ltar bya snyam nas des bsams pa/_'bros so snyam nas rgan mo des kyang de na gces pa cung zad ci yod pa de 
[\[20a.5\]]dag khyer te bros so/_/khyim stong pa der khyi dag zhugs nas zas zos te 'thab par brtsams pa dang /_mi g.yon can zhig phyogs de nas 'gro ba des khyim de nas khyi dag 'thab pa'i sgra thos nas des bsams pa/_khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi khyim stong par gyur tam ci na 'di ltar 'di na 
[\[20a.6\]]khyi dag 'thab cing 'khod/_bdag gis ji blta'o snyam nas de der zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na khyi rkun phal po che dag 'thab cing 'dug gi mi ni 'ga' yang med de stong par mthong nas des de nas lhag rol gyi lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa de dag khyer te song ngo /_/de'i 'og tu legs 'ongs 
[\[20a.7\]]zan bza'o snyam nas khye'u'i grwa nas 'ongs te de der zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na stong par mthong nas des ma ma ma ma zhes bos na 'ga' yang lan 'debs pa med nas de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na nye du'i khyim zhig yod pa der zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na der yang khyim mi dag 'thab mo byung 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bar gyur to/_/gang gi tshe de dag 'thab mo zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe na gcig la gcig smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag gis sngan chad khyod mthong na snying du sdug na deng bdag gis khyod mthong na khyod bsad do snyam du sems so/_/gzhan dag kyang gcig la gcig de skad zer nas de dag 
[\[20b.2\]]gis bsams pa/_'dir gzhan 'ga' zhig ma 'ongs sam blta'o snyam nas de dag gis bltas na ji tsam na legs 'ongs der 'ongs pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni legs 'ongs ma yin gyi nyes 'ongs yin te/_'di'i le lan gyis bdag cag 'thab mo 
[\[20b.3\]]byung bar gyur to zhes de dag gis bskrad de de gzhan du song ba dang /_der yang de dag de bzhin du gyur nas de dag gis kyang de skad smras te de bskrad de btang ngo /_/de mu lto ba dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na mu lto ba de dag kyang lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir 
[\[20b.4\]]lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon chad gang du zhugs pa der lag pa gang ba dang /_sprang phor gang bar gyur te phyir 'ong na/_deng bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[20b.5\]]bdag cag gi nang du sems can skal chad 'ga' zhig zhugs pas des na bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags so/_/yang de dag gis smras pa/_brtag par byas bdag cag kha gnyis su bcad de 'jug par bya'o zhes de dag gis kha gnyis su bcad de 
[\[20b.6\]]zhugs pa dang /_gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so/_/de dag gis kyang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /_gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par 
[\[20b.7\]]gyur te lhags so/_/de dag gis kyang yang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /_yang de ltar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang yang dang yang du kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /_de lta de ltar gyur nas ji tsam na legs 'ongs dang mu lto ba gzhan cig dang gnyis lhan cig zhugs pa 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]yang so sor bye ba dang legs 'ongs ni lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te 'ongs la gzhan thams cad lag pa gang ba dang /_sprang phor gang bar gyur te 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/_sems can skal chad 'di bdag cag gi nang du zhugs pas des na 
[\[21a.2\]]bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu brdegs te bskrad do/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi chung po grogs khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de zong thogs te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir phyin nas khyim 
[\[21a.3\]]bdag des legs 'ongs lag na sprang phor thogs te/_srang du song ba mthong nas des bzhin gzugs las de ngo shes nas des de la smras pa/_bu khyod khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu ma yin nam/_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_khyod kyi pha ma gnyis gar 
[\[21a.4\]]song /_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_dus la bab bo/_/des smras pa/_de'i khyim dang /_bang mdzod kyi rnam pa dang /_zhing gi rnam pa dang /_nor gyi rnam pa dang /_'bru'i rnam pa dag ga re/_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_thams cad mes tshig go/_/des smras pa/_grong pa'i 
[\[21a.5\]]mi gang dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du dong ba dag gar dong /_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che zhig par gyur/_kha cig ni zong zong ma yin par gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du 'khod de 
[\[21a.6\]]tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/des smras pa/_nye du dag gar dong /_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/des smras pa/_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dag gar dong /_
[\[21a.7\]]legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/khyim bdag des de thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug nas des smras pa/_bu kho bo dang lhan cig mnyan yod du 'dong ngo /_/legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pha bdag der song na cir 'gyur/_des smras pa/_bu de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de'i bus khyod kyi sring mo chung mar blangs pas khyod der song na sring mo de khyod la mkho ba stobs par 'gyur ro/_/legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_pha 'gro'o/_/khyim bdag des legs 
[\[21b.2\]]'ongs la kAR+ShA pa Na gnyis byin te smras pa/_bu kho bo zong sgyur gyi bar du khyod re zhig 'di gnyis za zhing sdod cig_/legs 'ongs kyis kAR+ShA pa Na de gnyis gos kyi grwar phur te bzhag pa dang /_des las kyi rnam par smin pas de gnyis kyang brjed par gyur to/_/khyim bdag des zong
