[\[21b.3\]]bsgyur te rin blangs nas legs 'ongs khrid de 'phags pa dang /_legs 'ongs kyang de dang lhan cig 'phags so/_/ji tsam na don mthun de dag 'thab par brtsams shing glang dag kyang 'thab par brtsams nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag sngan cad gcig gis 
[\[21b.4\]]gcig mthong na snying du sdug na deng bdag cag gcig gis gcig mthong na 'thab par brtsams shing glang dag kyang gcig gis gcig mthong na 'thab par rtsom pa las na/_ma la 'dir nyes 'ongs de ma 'ongs sam zhes bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na de dag gis legs 'ongs der 'ongs pa 
[\[21b.5\]]mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni legs 'ongs ma yin gyi nyes 'ongs yin te/_'di'i le lan gyis bdag cag 'thab par brtsams shing /_glang dag kyang 'thab par rtsom mo zhes de dag gis de bskrad par brtsams pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_shes 
[\[21b.6\]]ldan dag 'di ni kho bo'i chung po grogs kyi bu yin gyis 'di ma bskrad cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ni don mthun la dbang ba yin mod kyi/_bdag cag 'di dang lhan cig 'gro mi phod de/_gal te 'di 'gro na bdag cag mi 'gro'o/_/khyim bdag des legs 'ongs 
[\[21b.7\]]la smras pa/_bu khyod phyi bzhin 'brang zhing shog shig dang /_kho bos khyod kyi phyir zan gzhag par bya'o/_/legs 'ongs phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ba na khyim bdag des kyang de'i don du zan 'jog par byed cing kha cig ni sa gzhi la sas g.yogs te 'jog par byed/_kha cig ni shing 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]ljon pa'i yal ga dag la lo ma dag gis g.yogs te 'jog par byed do/_/de'i zan gang dag sa gzhi la sas g.yogs te bzhag pa de dag ni wa dag gis zos/_gang dag shing ljon pa'i yal ga dag la lo ma dag gis g.yogs te bzhag pa de dag ni bya dag dang 
[\[22a.2\]]spre'u dag gis zos nas legs 'ongs kyis cung zad ni thob/_phal cher mi thob nas de shin tu nyam nga bas 'tsho zhing 'gro'o/_/srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob par bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te/_de ni gnas 
[\[22a.3\]]med pas legs 'ongs mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas/_mnyan yod kyi phyi rol khron pa'i kha na ngal so zhing 'dug go/_/legs 'ongs kyi sring mo khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mna' ma byed pa de'i bu mo mngag gzhug ma chu bum thogs te khron pa de'i drung du chu chur song ba dang /_
[\[22a.4\]]des legs 'ongs bzhin gzugs las ngo shes nas des de la smras pa/_jo co khyod chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs ma lags sam/_sring mo yin no/_/jo co khyod kyi yab yum gnyis gar bzhud/_dus la bab bo/_/de'i khyim dang /_bang mdzod 
[\[22a.5\]]kyi rnam pa dang /_zhing gi rnam pa dang /_nor gyi rnam pa dang /_'bru'i rnam pa dag gar mchis/_thams cad mes tshig go/_/grong pa'i mi gang dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du mchis pa dag gar mchis/_kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por gru bo che zhig par gyur/_kha cig ni zong zong ma 
[\[22a.6\]]yin par gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur/_kha cig ni de nyid du 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/nye du dag gar mchis/_kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las 
[\[22a.7\]]byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dag gar mchis/_kha cig ni dus la bab/_kha cig ni bros/_kha cig ni de nyid na 'khod de tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/bu mo des de thos nas de mchi mas brnangs te 'dug nas des legs 'ongs la smras pa/_jo bo bdag gis khyod kyi lcam mo la sbran gyi bar 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]du re zhig 'di nyid na gzhes shig ces smras te bu mo de song nas jo mo la smras pa/_jo mo khyod kyi dral po byon no/_/des smras pa/_zong ji lta bus byon/_bu mos smras pa/_jo mo khar ba dang /_ral rul dang /_sprang phor gyis byon no/_/des bu mo de'i lag tu gos dag dang /_kAR+ShA pa Na dag bskur nas smras pa/_
[\[22b.2\]]jo co la 'di skad ces snga ma 'di tsam je gsol zhing mnobs shig dang slad kyis gal te dbon po dag dang /_dbon mo dag dang mjal bar gyur na de dag kAR+ShA pa Na ji snyed cig 'bul bar 'gyur bas khyod nye du dag gis glo bas bas par mi 'gyur ro zhes gyis shig_/bu mo de der song ste 
[\[22b.3\]]legs 'ongs la gos dag dang /_kAR+ShA pa Na dag phul nas smras pa/_jo co lcam gyi mchid nas snga ma 'di tsam je gsol zhing mnobs shig dang slad kyis gal te dbon po dag dang /_dbon mo dag dang mjal bar gyur na/_de dag kAR+ShA pa Na ji snyed cig 'bul bar 'gyur bas khyod nye du dag 
[\[22b.4\]]gis glo bas bas par mi 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o zhes smras te song ngo /_/legs 'ongs kyis bsams pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni nye du'i 'khor rgya che ba yin la/_bdag kyang sngon nye du'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas da der song na de dag bdag la gtam 'dri bas ring du thogs 
[\[22b.5\]]par 'gyur zhing des bdag ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur gyis je g.yar sus bza' zhing 'grangs nas der song ste/_nye du'i tshogs dag la bde bar so sor kun dga' bar bya'o snyam nas de chang pa'i khyim du song ste/_des ji tsam gyis ra ro bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyi chang sar pa 'thungs nas de 
[\[22b.6\]]ra ro ste skyed mos tshal du song nas nyal lo/_/mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i mi dag skyed mos tshal nyug par byed cing /_de dag gis gal te mi gnyid log pa mthong na de rkang pas sgul bar byed cing gal te sad na ni de la 'di skad ces/_kye nang rje khyod kyis mnyan yod na 
[\[22b.7\]]skyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i mi dag skyed mos tshal nyug par byed cing de dag mi gnyid log pa 'joms par byed do zhes ma thos sam/_longs la song shig ces zer ro/_/gal te ma sad na ni bcom ste 'dong bar byed pas skyed mos tshal 'joms pa'i mi de dag der lhags te legs 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'ongs nyal ba mthong nas de dag gis de rkang pas bsgul na ma sad nas ji tsam na de dag gis de bcom ste dong ngo /_/ji tsam na legs 'ongs sad pa dang bdag nyid bcom par mthong nas des ral rul de dag nyid gyon te 'dug go/_/de'i sring mos bsams pa/_ci'i phyir 
[\[23a.2\]]bdag gi ming po de yun ring du thogs snyam nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma mngags te ltar btang ba dang de der song ste bltas na ji tsam na bcom par mthong nas/_bu mo de song ste jo mo la smras pa/_jo mo jo co bcom ste sngon gyi cha lugs nyid kyis bzhugs so/_/sring mos bsams pa/_
[\[23a.3\]]de ni sems can skal chad cig yin pas de'i le lan gyis khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi khyim nor du ma dang ldan pa tshul ma yin pas chud zos par gyur pas da gal te bdag gis de 'dir bcug par gyur na bdag gi gyos po'i khyim yang de'i le lan gyis tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal 
[\[23a.4\]]bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de yal bar bor ro/_/legs 'ongs kyis kyang las kyi sgrib pas de brjed nas de mu lto ba dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na mu lto ba de dag kyang lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te 
[\[23a.5\]]phyir lhags nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag sngon cad gar zhugs pa der lag pa gang ba dang /_sprang phor gang bar gyur te phyir 'ong na deng bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag 
[\[23a.6\]]cag gi nang du sems can skal chad 'ga' zhig zhugs pas des na bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags so/_/yang de dag gis smras pa/_brtag par byas bdag cag kha gnyis su bcad de 'jug par bya'o zhes de dag gis kha gnyis su bcad 
[\[23a.7\]]de zhugs pa dang /_gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so/_/de dag gis kyang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /_gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]par gyur te lhags so/_/de dag gis kyang yang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang yang de ltar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang yang dang yang du kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /_de lta de ltar gyur nas ji tsam na legs 'ongs dang mu lto ba gzhan cig dang gnyis lhan cig zhugs pa 
[\[23b.2\]]yang so sor bye ba dang /_legs 'ongs ni lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te 'ongs la/_gzhan thams cad lag pa gang ba dang /_sprang phor gang bar gyur te 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/_sems can skal chad 'di bdag cag gi nang du zhugs pas des na bdag cag 
[\[23b.3\]]lag pa stong pa dang /_sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu brdegs te sprang phor gyis de'i klad pa bcom nas nyes 'ongs khyod phar song shig ces smras te bskrad do/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[23b.4\]]'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag ji srid du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du mu lto ba 'ga' yang 'jug tu ma gzhug shig_/de dag la phyis sbyin 
[\[23b.5\]]par bya'o/_/de na mu lto bas 'jug par brtsams pa na sgo bas de dag phyir bzlog pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_kye nang rje kho bo cag gi ming gis khyim bdag bzang byin gyi ming mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya bar grags pa yin na ci'i phyir khyod kho bo cag phyir zlog par byed/_yang de 
[\[23b.6\]]dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gi nang du yang nyes 'ongs de zhugs par ma gyur tam ltos shig ces de dag gis bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na de dag gis legs 'ongs der zhugs pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_nyes 'ongs de 'di yin no zhes de dag gis legs 
[\[23b.7\]]'ongs shin tu brdegs te sprang phor gyis de'i klad pa bcom nas de dag gis lag pa dang /_rkang pa dag nas bzung ste khrid nas phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du bzhag ste nyes 'ongs khyod 'dir 'dug shig ces smras pa dang /_legs 'ongs phyag dar gyi phung po de'i steng na ngu zhing 'dug go/_/
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas sa ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang /_
[\[24a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng na klad pa zhom nas khrag 'dzag cing ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ltar srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can yang gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur pas srid 
[\[24a.3\]]pa dag gis ngoms par bya zhing srid pa'i yo byad dag gis kyang ngoms par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim 
[\[24a.4\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas 
[\[24a.5\]]bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs 
[\[24a.6\]]lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma gzhag pa brjed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' 
[\[24a.7\]]ba'i chos nyid can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma gzhag pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs blang bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog shig ces bka' stsal pa/_brjed pa dran nas des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir ngu /_btsun pa bdag gis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi 
[\[24b.2\]]lhag ma gzhag pa bskyud de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bcag go/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis nga'i bka' bcag pa ma yin gyis 'di ltar legs 'ongs nyid kyi las kyi sgrib pas khyod kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma gzhag pa brjed par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo khyod song la 
[\[24b.3\]]legs 'ongs bos shig_/de song ste legs 'ongs legs 'ongs zhes bos pa dang /_du ma dag gis ang zhes lan btab cing de dag gis bsams pa/_deng bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas gang la dgongs snyam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyir log ste 
[\[24b.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis legs 'ongs legs 'ongs zhes bos na/_du ma dag gis ang zhes lan btab na gang mchi bar bgyi/_kun dga' bo song la 'di skad ces/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu/_legs 'ongs gang yin pa de tshur 
[\[24b.5\]]shog ces bos shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ste de skad bos pa dang /_legs 'ongs kyis bdag gi ming dran nas des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_legs 'ongs sgra 'di bskyud gyur na/_/ga las 'dir ni mchis par gyur/_/nges par ma legs zad gyur 
[\[24b.6\]]cing /_/legs par byung bar gyur yang dag_/gang dag khyod la skyabs mchis pa/_/de dag mgon ni kun mkhyen lags/_/gang dag khyod kyi gsung dga' dang /_/'phags pa de dag legs 'ongs lags/_/bdag ni skal dang bral ba ste/_/rtsa lag kun gyis spangs 
[\[24b.7\]]gyur cing /_/brtse gnas drag po'i gnas thob pa/_/mya ngan zug rngus gzir ba lags/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de khrid de zhugs nas gsol pa/_btsun pa legs 'ongs de 'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu khyod bcom ldan 'das 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs za'am/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi pham phabs stsal ba dang /_ji tsam na des nyung ngur mthong nas des bsams pa/_bdag la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas brgya 
[\[25a.2\]]lam na dgongs su zin kyang lhung bzed kyi pham phabs chung ngu zhig bzhag go snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_bu legs 'ongs gal te khyod ri rab tsam gyi kham dag dang /_rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyi ltos za bar byed na 
[\[25a.3\]]yang ji srid du khyod tshim par ma gyur pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zos pa dang /_de tshim par gyur nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta bar brtsams pa dang /_
[\[25a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu legs 'ongs tshim mam/_bcom ldan 'das tshim mo/_/kham tha ma long shig dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/des de blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di su lags/_
[\[25a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o na bdag gi chung po grogs kyi bu lags so/_/khyim bdag de yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad 
[\[25a.6\]]nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang /_srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin rjes su 'brang zhing song nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa 
[\[25a.7\]]dang /_legs 'ongs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i las sbyang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la bka' stsal pa/_legs 'ongs 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]khyod la kAR+ShA pa Na dag yod dam/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu gos kyi grar ltos shig_/des bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na kAR+ShA pa Na gnyis yod pa mthong nas des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[25b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_bu song la kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa'i gan nas ut+pa la sngon po dag khyer te shog shig_/des bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa ga la ba der song ba dang /_rgyal bu dum 
[\[25b.3\]]pas de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_nyes 'ongs 'di ga shed nas 'dir 'ongs pas bdag la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des smras pa/_nyes 'ongs kun dga'i ra bar ma 'jug shig_/
[\[25b.4\]]legs 'ongs kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_bdag ni ut+pal mi sgrub ste/_/pad ma bdag la dgos pa med/_/kho bo kun mkhyen grags ldan pa/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i pho nya yin/_/dum pas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gal te thub pa zhi bdag nyid/_/lha mi rnams 
[\[25b.5\]]kyi mchod gnas kyi/_/mchod pa'i gnas kyis ches mchod pa'i/_/pho nya lags na tshur gshegs spyon/_/dum pas smras pa/_khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin nam/_legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_kho bo sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no/_/don ci'i phyir 'ongs/_ut+pal dag gi 
[\[25b.6\]]phyir 'ongs so/_/song la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed khyer te song shig_/legs 'ongs kyis ut+pal sngon po dag gi khur khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs 'ongs dge slong rnams la brims shig_/legs 
[\[25b.7\]]'ongs kyis dge slong rnams la ut+pal sngon po dag brim par brtsam pa dang /_dge slong dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dri zhim po thams cad ni mig la phan zhing 'di'i las sbyang bar yang byas long shig_/dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]me tog de dag blangs so/_/legs 'ongs kyi sngon zad par sngon po'i skye mched bskyed pas de rgan pa'i mtha' logs na 'dug pas dge slong rnams kyi lag na ut+pal sngon po dag thogs pa de dag mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang zad par sngon po'i skye mched mngon du gyur 
[\[26a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs 'ongs khyod ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rab tu phyung /_rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gdams ngag stsal to/_/
[\[26a.3\]]de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben par bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_
[\[26a.4\]]tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum 
[\[26a.5\]]pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par 
[\[26a.6\]]rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis dgra 
[\[26a.7\]]bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_dpa' bo de nyid gzigs pa yis/_/thabs kyi zhags pas bdag bcings te/_/glang chen rgas pa 'dam phyung ltar/_/thugs rjes sdug 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]bsngal 'dam nas phyung /_/bdag ni sngan cad legs 'ongs gyur/_/de yi 'og tu nyes 'ongs lags/_/da ni thub dbang khyod gsung gis/_/gsal bar legs 'ongs nyid du gyur/_/kun mkhyen lcags 'dra bdag gis ni/_/khyod kyi gsung mchog thos gyur nas/_/da ni gser 
[\[26b.2\]]dang 'dra ba yi/_/zag pa med pa'i lus kyang thob/_/rin chen la sogs 'thob pa dang /_/mtho ris thar pa 'tshal ba yis/_/rtag tu phan pa bzhed pa yi/_/dge bshes bsten par bgyi ba bzang //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga pa/_
[\[26b.3\]]gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag_/dge sbyong gau ta ma na re nga'i bstan pa ni kun du mdzes pa yin no zhes zer na 'di ltar nyes 'ongs la sogs pa mu lto ba dag kyang rab tu 
[\[26b.4\]]'byin par byed na/_de'i bstan pa ji ltar kun du mdzes pa yin zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyan thos chen po ri rab lta bu la skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag smas pa skyed par byed pas 'di'i 
[\[26b.5\]]yon tan bsgrag par bya na gang du bya/_gang du skyes shing gang du rdib pa de nyid du bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ngan spong gi bu dag tu 
[\[26b.6\]]ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces sgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 
[\[26b.7\]]dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'das dul ba/_'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba/_'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba/_'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa/_'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba/_'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa/_'khor dgra 
[\[27a.2\]]bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba/_'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa/_'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_
[\[27a.3\]]seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar 
[\[27a.4\]]nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[27a.5\]]yongs su bskor ba/_mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_
[\[27a.6\]]yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs 
[\[27a.7\]]ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]chu gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis sku brgyan pa/_nyi ma 
[\[27b.2\]]stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_rta thul dang /_bzang ldan 
[\[27b.3\]]dang /_rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_grags pa dang /_gang po dang /_dri med dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te ngan spong gi bu dag tu chu 
[\[27b.4\]]srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis bcom ldan 
[\[27b.5\]]'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon nas/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs su/_byings nas byings su 'dus 
[\[27b.6\]]shing lhags te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri 
[\[27b.7\]]pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/_
[\[28a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis 
[\[28a.3\]]pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[28a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing chu ra bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[28a.5\]]'das la spyan 'dren gyis/_btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/_lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong 
[\[28a.6\]]gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/
[\[28a.7\]]de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs/_lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[28b.2\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/_/'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /_gnod sbyin gdug pa sog ma med dang /_'brog gnas 
[\[28b.3\]]la sogs pa de dang de dag kyang btul na/_btsun pa klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di yun ring po nas bdag cag khon ma mchis pa rnams la khon du 'dzin/_mi 'gran pa rnams la 'gran tshol/_mi 'khu ba rnams la 'khu bar bgyid cing lo thog 'khrungs so 'tshal ma rung bar 
[\[28b.4\]]bgyid na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs brtse ba'i slad du klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di gdul du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin 
[\[28b.5\]]byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du 
[\[28b.6\]]mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang ga la ba 
[\[28b.7\]]der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]'dul bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces bsgo la dge 'dun la tshul shing brims shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul 
[\[29a.2\]]bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces bsgo ste dge 'dun la tshul shing brim par brtsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing ma bzhes nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du 
[\[29a.3\]]bsams na/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed par rig nas de dag gis kyang tshul shing ma blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma 
[\[29a.4\]]bzhes snyam du bsams na/_bdag gi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed par rig nas ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas/_des stan phyed las 'phags te glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyang nas tshul shing blangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[29a.5\]]'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong gnas brtan gang gis tshul shing blangs/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis blangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong 
[\[29a.6\]]legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces/_de ni klu gdug pa yin gyis khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o zhes gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la smras pa/_
[\[29a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni klu gdug pa yin gyis khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o zhes byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo ston pa'i bka' mnyan pas bka' 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bzhin 'tshal/_gzhan du na klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa lta bu sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/_dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur kyang de dag gis bdag gi spu'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yo bar mi nus na 
[\[29b.2\]]lus kyi dbang po 'gag par lta ga la nus te/_'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag kun du bsten cing goms par byas/_lan mang du byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham 
[\[29b.3\]]thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms brgyus nas klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ba dang /_klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs 
[\[29b.4\]]thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/_dge sbyong 'dis bdag shi bar gtam thos sam/_ci na bdag gi gnas su 'ong /_re zhig 'di ni glo bur ba yin gyis 'ong du chug shig snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis chu 
[\[29b.5\]]tshags dang lhung bzed mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_snam sbyar sprugs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus shing lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis zas kyi bya 
[\[29b.6\]]ba byas nas bsams pa/_klu gdug pa ni 'khrug par ma byas na dul ba'i gnas su mi rung bas 'di ni klu gdug pa yin pas 'khrug par bya'o snyam nas des lhung bzed bkrus te lhung bzed kyi khrud ma'i chu de de'i rdzing der blugs pa dang /_klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa de 'khrugs 
[\[29b.7\]]nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis dge sbyong 'di 'ong ba dang za ba yang yal bar bor na bdag la brnyas te bdag gi gnas su khrud ma'i chu ldugs par byed pas dge sbyong 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba zhig yin no snyam nas/_de khros te steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]'brug sgra chen po phyung ste/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi steng du rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs dbab par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams 
[\[30a.2\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas mtshon cha de dag lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag tu gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo/_/klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas me mdag gi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[30a.3\]]pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas me mdag de dag lha'i me tog man da ra ka ni dag tu gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo/_/klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas phyag dar gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs 
[\[30a.4\]]byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas phyag dar de dag lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dag dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dag dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag tu gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo/_/klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas khro 
[\[30a.5\]]ba'i mthus du ba gtul ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus du ba gtul to/_/klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas khro ba'i mthus me sbar ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de na klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i khro 
[\[30a.6\]]ba'i mthu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus snang ba chen po byung bar gyur nas/_chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul bar mdzad pa yin no/_/
[\[30a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_dge slong legs 'ongs 'di mchog yin no/_/gang gi tshe klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa mtshon 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe na des 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kun du me mngon par sprul nas/_klu a mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa'i drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ba ma gtogs par thams cad kun du 
[\[30b.2\]]'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun du rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur par mthong nas de tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa legs 'ongs ci'i slad du bdag la tho 'tsham par mdzad/_rga 
[\[30b.3\]]ba'i chos can kho bo khyod la tho 'tsham pa ma yin gyi/_khyod kho bo la tho 'tsham ste/_gal te kho bos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur du zin na khyod kyis deng kho bo ming las lhag ma ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa legs 'ongs bdag 
[\[30b.4\]]gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag long shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa lhung bzed du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[30b.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa de 
[\[30b.6\]]'di lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod re zhig sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas/_da ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing /_drag shul can lag pa dmar ba/_snun pa dang rab tu snun pa la zhugs pa/_gzhan gyi srog 
[\[30b.7\]]'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas/_khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod tshur shog la nga'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag long la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig_/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab 
[\[31a.2\]]pa'i gzhi dag len cing /_deng slan cad nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol to/_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bya mo lab mang po thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin 
[\[31a.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[31a.4\]]klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa ma btul te dge slong legs 'ongs kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul to/_/btsun pa legs 'ongs gang gis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtogs 
[\[31a.5\]]ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs kyis so/_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag gi phu nu bo'i bu yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag gi tsha bo yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag gi zhang po yin no/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag gi chung 
[\[31a.6\]]po grogs kyi bu yin no zhes de dag gis de la bya mo lab mang po phul lo/_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 
[\[31a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas btsun pa legs 'ongs las brten te dgung bdun du bdag cag gi mchod pa'i dbang du bgyis pa'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[31b.2\]]phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi chung po grogs bram ze sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig 'dug pa de klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa'i 'jigs pas bros te mnyan yod du song ba de ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[31b.3\]]rgyal gyis glang po che'i chang pa'i blar bskos te bzhag go/_/de bya ba zhig gi phyir chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir phyin pa dang /_des ji ltar khyim bdag rtogs ldan gyi bu btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba 
[\[31b.4\]]der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la bram ze des 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs 
[\[31b.5\]]tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bram ze chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis kho bo las brten nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhag bdun du mchod pa'i dbang du byas pa'i gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis mi 'tshal lo/_/bram zes smras pa/_
[\[31b.6\]]gal te khyod kyis da mi gnang na/_gang gi tshe khyod mnyan yod du byon par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis dang po kho nar bdag gi bsod snyoms gsol pa mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de langs te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa 
[\[31b.7\]]gsod kyi rir ci dgyes par bzhugs nas/_mnyan yod ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/khyim bdag 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang mnyan yod nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[32a.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par 
[\[32a.3\]]mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' 
[\[32a.4\]]bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang 
[\[32a.5\]]bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[32a.6\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/bram ze sbrul khas sdigs pa des bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs zhes thos so/_/
[\[32a.7\]]thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab 
[\[32b.2\]]tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o/_/de nas bram ze de stan las langs te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod 
[\[32b.3\]]gsol bar ci gnang /_bram ze bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bram ze de bdag gi gan du mchis te bdag sang sdum pa gzhan du 'tshal ma la g.yar 'dren na mchid kyis 'tshal 
[\[32b.4\]]lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngar mgron du bos pas bdag gir bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis cang mi smra bar dang du blangs par rig nas/_tshe dang 
[\[32b.5\]]ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byed du bcug nas/_nang par sngar langs 
[\[32b.6\]]te gdan bshams shing chu ra bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol/_
[\[32b.7\]]lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]bzhugs so/_/bram ze des kyang tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi kha zas bsod pa sta gon byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyang snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas/_bram ze de'i bkad sa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan 
[\[33a.2\]]bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs bde bar 'dug par rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_btsun pa legs 'ongs kyis kha zas bsod pa zos pas 'ju 
[\[33a.3\]]bar mi nus so snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa legs 'ongs sang nan gsol lam/_des smras pa/_'thung ngo /_/bram ze des glang po che'i chang gi nang du mdzub mo bcug ste skom gyi nang du krog krog dkrugs te/_tshe dang 
[\[33a.4\]]ldan pa legs 'ongs la phul lo/_/dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis de 'thungs te/_yon bshad pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de mnyan yod kyi srang re ldes g.yogs pa las 
[\[33a.5\]]thal nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis lus la phog pa dang /_ra ro nas de chang gis myos pa'i shugs kyis sa la sgyel to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis der lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu zhig sprul 
[\[33a.6\]]pa mdzad de bkab bo/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba 
[\[33a.7\]]dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam 
[\[33b.2\]]grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas yon bshad pa mdzad de/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyogs der byon to/_/de nas 
[\[33b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de btul nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni gang gis klu a mra'i chu ngogs pa btul ba'i dge slong legs 'ongs zhes bya ba de yin na/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge slong legs 'ongs 
[\[33b.4\]]'dis da ltar sbrul phrug kyang thul bar nus sam/_btsun pa rngo mi thog go/_/dge slong dag de ltar na nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba las 'byung bas dge slong dag nga la ston pa'o zhes zer ba dag gis myos par 'gyur ba tha na rtswa'i rtse mos kyang btung 
[\[33b.5\]]bar mi bya zhing blud par yang mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_legs 'ongs ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das ma bsams so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma bsams so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[33b.6\]]'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 
[\[33b.7\]]'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba 'thung na ltung byed do/_/'bru'i 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]chang zhes bya ba ni chan gyi btung ba dang /_phye'i btung ba dang /_phabs kyi btung ba'o/_/bcos pa'i chang zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i btung ba dang /_sdong bu'i btung ba dang /_'dab ma'i btung ba dang /_me tog gi btung ba dang /_'bras bu'i btung ba'o/_/de gnyi ga bsres pa 
[\[34a.2\]]ni 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang zhes bya ba'o/_/de 'thung na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung 
[\[34a.3\]]bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_myos par 
[\[34a.4\]]'gyur ba'i dri dang ldan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i myang ba dang ldan pa 'thung na/_'thungs nas myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_'thungs nas myos par mi 'gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog 
[\[34a.5\]]dang ldan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i dri dang ldan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i ro dang ldan pa 'thung na/_'thungs nas myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_'thungs nas myos par mi 'gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[34a.6\]]myos par 'gyur ba'i dri dang ldan pa 'thung na/_'thungs nas myos par 'gyur na ltung byed du 'gyur la/_'thungs nas myos par mi 'gyur na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/myos par 'gyur ba'i kha dog 'ba' zhig ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa 'thung ba la ni ltung ba med de de yang tshwa nyid du gyur 
[\[34a.7\]]pa'o/_/dge slong 'bru'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/bcos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 'bru'i chang gi nu rtsi 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong sbang ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]dge slong tshigs ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong phabs kyi chang bu za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba dag za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/bskol ba 'thung ba dang /_kha'i nad yod pa la sman pa'i lung gis khur bar srel ba dang /_
[\[34b.2\]]lus dag skud pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang 
[\[34b.3\]]ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/_nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing /_nyes 'ongs zhes bgyi ba'i ming du gyur/_las ci bgyis na 
[\[34b.4\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu legs 'ongs nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen 
[\[34b.5\]]yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas legs 'ongs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni 
[\[34b.6\]]phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la 
[\[34b.7\]]rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 
[\[35a.2\]]'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas na ba zhig ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/_des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag rab tu byung ba 
[\[35a.3\]]'di skrod cig_/de dag las 'ga' yang rang sangs rgyas de skrod par spro ba med nas/_khyim bdag des spyos te stan las langs nas rang nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste bskrad nas smras pa/_nyes 'ongs mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shig ces phul ba dang /_de 
[\[35a.4\]]phyag dar gyi phung po'i nang du sgyel to/_/rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/_khyim bdag nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smas pa dang /_nyams par gyur na mi rung gis 'di la lag nas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas/_des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam 
[\[35a.5\]]mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas khyim bdag de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin 
[\[35a.6\]]du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa/_yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/_mar gshegs su gsol/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/_rang sangs rgyas de khyim bdag 
[\[35a.7\]]de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so/_/khyim bdag des de la mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur bar mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye zhing /_'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de 
[\[35b.2\]]lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni legs 'ongs 'di yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni da ltar phyug la nor mang ba/_
[\[35b.3\]]longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/gnod pa byas pa dang nyes 'ongs zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mu lto ba nyid kyis 'phyan par gyur cing 
[\[35b.4\]]nyes 'ongs zhes bya bar gyur te/_da ltar gyi bar du yang mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing /_nyes 'ongs zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur bar 'di bas ches khyad 
[\[35b.5\]]par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /_thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra 
[\[35b.6\]]bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing /_'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom 
[\[35b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/_de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis te/_gang du smon lam btab ce na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[36a.2\]]ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu phyung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[36a.3\]]gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/_de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[36a.4\]]gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[36a.5\]]gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[36a.6\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra 
[\[36a.7\]]bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /_ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]thub pa/_shAkya'i seng ge_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yang dang yang du me'i khams la 
[\[36b.2\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin 
[\[36b.3\]]pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed de bdun bcu 
[\[36b.4\]]rtsa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bar sdom la/_zhi ba ral pa nor bu dang /_/sman pa dge 'dun lto dang skas/_/za dang nyes gyur gtum mo dang /_/gzhon nu lhung bzed stobs rnams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[36b.5\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des mnyan yod pa'i bu mo zhig bag mar blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de la bu mo zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to/_/
[\[36b.6\]]bram ze de la re zhig mnyan yod du bya ba zhig byung nas des shing rta bcas te 'phags pa dang /_bu mo des mthong nas des smras pa/_yab gar bzhud/_bram zes smras pa/_bu mo mnyan yod du'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab bdag kyang mchi'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_bu mo khyod 
[\[36b.7\]]da mchog thob pa yin pas khyod kyi lag pa 'am rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na/_bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis khyod 'di nyid na 'dug shig_/bu mo des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_bram ze mos smras pa/_bu mo ci'i phyir ngu /_bu mos smras pa/_yab 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]mnyan yod du bzhud na/_bdag der khrid par mi bzhed do/_/bram ze mos smras pa/_rje'i sras bu mo yang khrid cig dang nye du dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/bram zes smras pa/_bu mo da mchog thob par 'gyur bas 'di'i lag pa'am/_rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis 
[\[37a.2\]]reg par gyur na bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis 'di nyid du zhog shig_/bram ze mos smras pa/_rje'i sras dang thabs cig mchis na legs par sbas pa dang /_legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze des bu mo de shing rtar bcug ste 'phags pa dang /_bu mo de 
[\[37a.3\]]ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas pha la dris pa/_yab 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba lags/_'di su'i rdzing bu lags/_'di su'i lha khang lags/_'di su'i skyed mos tshal lags/_'di su'i khron pa lags/_'di su'i gtsug lag khang lags/_bram zes smras pa/_
[\[37a.4\]]bu mo 'di ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi bsti gnas yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab ltar mchi'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_bu mo bsti gnas 'di na rigs sna tshogs dang /_rus sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag 'khod pas khyod kyi lag pa'am rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis 
[\[37a.5\]]reg par gyur na bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyis/_tshur shog 'dong ngo zhes de 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na grong bar de nyid nas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pa dag mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du byung ba de dag gis bram ze de mthong 
[\[37a.6\]]nas de dag gis smras pa/_snam zungs byon pa legs so/_/byon pa legs so/_/khyod yun ring mo ring mo zhig gis gar bzhud/_bram zes smras pa/_kho bo khyod cag nyid ltar 'ongs na khyod cag gar 'dong /_rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang ltar mchi'o/_/sru cag tsha mo 
[\[37a.7\]]'di yang khrid de deng la/_'di la yang gtsug lag khang ston cig_/bu mo de yang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/drug sde dag gi kun du spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya/_rgol ba 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]dag kyang tshar gcad par bya/_rang gi grags pa yang bsgrags par bya'o snyam pas drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te/_rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[37b.2\]]gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/drug sde dag gis grong khyer chen po drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste/_rigs las sam/_rus las sam/_rgyud las sam/_ming las sam/_gzugs las sam/_bzo las sam/_'tsho ba las mi shes pa'am/_ma mthong 
[\[37b.3\]]ba'am/_ma thos pa'am/_ma rig pa'am/_rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/che ge mo'i ma/_che ge mo'i chung ma/_
[\[37b.4\]]che ge mo'i mna' ma/_che ge mo'i bu mo/_che ge mo'i sring mo 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba ltar rgyu bar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa brgyad ni gang zag gi tshangs 
[\[37b.5\]]par spyad pa'i dus ma lags so zhes legs par gsungs na/_bdag cag ni 'di lta ste/_khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so/_/'char kas smras pa/_sring mo dag khyed kyis 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad ces/_dug can la sogs rgyal po yis/_/
[\[37b.6\]]bya ba dag ni ma byas par/_/de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams/_/zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin/_/bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni/_/yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/_/'jig rten dgra bo 'chi bdag de/_/'ong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes smras pa ma thos sam/_de dag gis smras 
[\[37b.7\]]pa/_btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'char kas smras pa/_sring mo dag gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas legs so legs so/_/sring mo dag de ni mjal gyis 'di ltar ltad mo ji ltar blta ba dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[38a.2\]]sring mo dag khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed/_btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag kun dga'i ra bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang blta bar 'tshal lo/_/sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis/_mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dad pas/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 
[\[38a.3\]]'dor na/_/'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni/_/stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/_/zhes gsungs pas de yang legs so/_/sring mo dag khyed kyis gang khyed cag la gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal tam/_'phags pa ci bdag cag sgron 
[\[38a.4\]]ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs gzhan du 'tshol lam/_btsun pa 'char ka spangs te dge slong gzhan ga la tshol/_khyod pas gzhan khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyis khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te 'di 
[\[38a.5\]]dag gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur/_gal te bstan par mi bya na ni tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[38a.6\]]gzhug par bya/_gdul bar bya/_gzung bar bya/_rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas/_de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar byas/_rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o snyam du rig nas des me tog dang /_bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs 
[\[38a.7\]]te pog phor lag tu blangs nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te/_sring mo dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang ste/_gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]nyams par gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang nyam nga ba dang mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_gang ni 
[\[38b.2\]]ngan song gi 'dam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 
[\[38b.3\]]'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug cing 'di ltar/_
[\[38b.4\]]chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/
[\[38b.5\]]rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/_/bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba 'jug pa bcom ldan 
[\[38b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam 'cha' ba/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa 
[\[38b.7\]]gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'di'i zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /_'dren pa med pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa med pa na de'i dang por ye shes 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]kyi mig sman gyi thur mas gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang /_rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang /_yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyod pa rnams dang /_snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[39a.2\]]thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skye 
[\[39a.3\]]bo mang po'i don dang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i yin gyis/_'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 
[\[39a.4\]]'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong du gcig gis ma chog pa spangs te rab tu byung ba/_dbyig bye ba phrag drug bcu dang ldan pa/_gser gyi nas bang chung brgyad bcu bdog pa/_bran gyi grong 
[\[39a.5\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bdog pa/_sbyor ba'i grong bcu drug bdog pa/_ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te/_mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang dag 
[\[39a.6\]]bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na brten pa gang yin pa/_gang mthong na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/_gang gis bu [{]mangs [,]mang [}]
[\[39a.7\]]kyi mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te/_'di lta ste/_dge slong 'od srung 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]chen po'o zhes gsungs shing bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa/_gang lo brgyad gnyis su dbang po'i brda 
[\[39b.2\]]sprod pa bklags pa/_rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab chen po rnams dang /_spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams 
[\[39b.3\]]cad gang gi cha bcu drug par bzhag cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/_/'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang /_/shA ri'i bu yi shes rab kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi chog go/_/gal te lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di/_/shA ri'i bu 
[\[39b.4\]]dang mnyam gyur pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi/_/bcu drug char yang mi chog go/_/zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mdun 
[\[39b.5\]]na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bsgul/_kun du bsgul/_kun du rab tu bsgul ba gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom 
[\[39b.6\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis gshegs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /_mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni 
[\[39b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i gtsug lag khang ste/_mi skal ba bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras gang gi ming yang dag par bsgrags pas/_tshong pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhon pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste/_yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen 
[\[40a.2\]]bkur ba gang yin pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring na nye bar spyod pa/_ston pas yang dag par bsngags pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par bkur ba gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras las rab tu byung 
[\[40a.3\]]ba bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang /_thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom 
[\[40a.4\]]ldan 'das kyi gcung po sru'i sras las rab tu byung ba gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol 
[\[40a.5\]]cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sgra can zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sras las rab tu byung ba/_gal te rab tu ma byung na mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang yin pa gang rab tu byung na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa yang 
[\[40a.6\]]dag par rgyun chad pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang /_bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig_/'di ni tshe dang ldan 
[\[40a.7\]]pa dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo /_/'di ni nye dga'i'o/_/'di ni 'dun pa'i'o/_/'di ni 'gro mgyogs kyi'o/_/'di ni nab so'i'o/_/'di ni kho bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo /_/ci 'di yang lta bar byed dam/_'phags pa ci bdag cag gis gtsug lag khang thams cad 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]bltas nas/_gdod 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang blta bar mi bgyi'am/_bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang 'di da shin tu blta bar bgyi'o/_/sring mo dag de bzhin gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de 'dod chags spyad pa yin pas 
[\[40b.2\]]de'i gtsug lag khang nas sa gzhi mon sran gre'u'i phye mas bskus pa dang /_rtsig pa bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang /_mal stan be'u phrug gi snying po can bshams pa dang /_bum pa btung bas bkang ba bcu snod dang bcas pa bzhag pa dang /_skon pa'i nang na bca' ba sna tshogs 
[\[40b.3\]]kyis gang ba dag yod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po rang gi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa rnams la smras pa/_sring mo dag ci je khye'u sus bya'am/_'on te btung ba 'thung /_'phags pa ci chu klung zlog phyogs su 'bab bam/_
[\[40b.4\]]bdag cag gis 'phags pa la gsol bar bgyi ba gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdag cag la stsol tam/_'di ltar bdag cag la gang dkon pa de stsol cig_/sring mo dag khyed cag la ci zhig dkon/_'phags pa chos mnyan pa'o/_/sring mo dag bcom ldan 
[\[40b.5\]]'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/_drug po de dag gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang /_mi nyid dang /_
[\[40b.6\]]dbus pa'i gnas su skye ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /_dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o zhes legs par gsungs pas de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa skyes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/_legs so legs so/_/sring mo dag 'khod cig 
[\[40b.7\]]dang kho bos khyed la chos bstan par bya'o/_/de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang /_des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa drug pa/_bu 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]mo de yang ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas ri mo lta zhing gzhan du song ngo /_/de dag gis kyang chos mnyan nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang nas byung ngo /_/bu mo des gzhan dag byung ba ma tshor nas sgo khang de nyid na ri mo 
[\[41a.2\]]lta zhing 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag bskyal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_des bu mo de sgo khang na 'dug pa mthong nas des de la smras pa/_bu mo khyod ma song ngam/_des 'dzum phyung ba dang 'char kas de la 'o byas te yan lag dang nying 
[\[41a.3\]]lag dag mnams/_kun du mnams so/_/bu mo de ngu zhing phyir byung nas pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/_yab bdag dge sbyong 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_gal te da cung zad smrar ni bdag gcig pu yin la/_'di dag 
[\[41a.4\]]ni mang bas bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/_gang du grogs rnyed par gyur pa na ra mda' ba bzlog par bya'o snyam mo/_/rgyal byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bar na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze zhig 
[\[41a.5\]]bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug cing 'dug nas/_bram ze des de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag dge sbyong 'char kas kho bo'i bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas kyis/_khyed cag kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis grogs 
[\[41a.6\]]gyis shig_/bram ze dag ni yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de dag dbyug pa dag thogs te der dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa de de dag gis bzung zhing bkri bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis de bsgul bar yang ma nus so/_/
[\[41a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i stobs dbri bar mdzad pa dang /_de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phar drangs tshur drangs te khrid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]bde ba byung ba la mi dgongs sam snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di la gdams pa'i tha ma ni 'di yin pas khrid kyang bla'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na 
[\[41b.2\]]gnyid log cing 'dug pa se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gya tshom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o zhes go bar mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs 
[\[41b.3\]]pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gya tshom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o zhes go bar mdzad do/_/bram ze de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi 
[\[41b.4\]]sgor khrid do/_/de nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong 'char ka bzung ste rgyal po'i sgor khrid de 'ongs so zhes sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po 'byin to/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir 
[\[41b.5\]]gtogs pa na gnyid log pa skye bo phal po che'i sgra des sad nas/_des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'di dag sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po 'byin par byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha btsun pa 'char ka dang /_bram ze'i bu mo 
[\[41b.6\]]zhig dang /_bram ze zhig dang /_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam rgyal po'i pho brang gi chab sgo na blag cor mchi zhing mchis so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di las dgongs nas bdag la rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gya tshom 
[\[41b.7\]]du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to snyam du rig go/_/mnyan yod na chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe rtsod pa chen po byung ba de'i tshe na rnga bo che rdung zhing dung sgril ma yang 'bud par byed pas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rnga bo che yang rdungs shig_/dung sgril ma yang bus shig_/de dag gis rnga bo che brdungs shing dung sgril ma bus pa dang /_rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze de dang btsun pa 'char ka nang du thong shig_/de gnyis 
[\[42a.2\]]nang du 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal pos bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze khyed ci zer/_lha dge sbyong 'char kas bdag gi bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka bram ze 'di de skad mchi na khyod ci gsung /_lha bdag gis de la sdig 
[\[42a.3\]]pa'i las ma bgyis so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ji ltar dpyad par bya/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid spobs pa can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags pas lha nyid kyi zhal mchu 'di dgum du gsol/_
