[\[42a.4\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar shes par bya/_mig gi rnam par shes pas ni gzugs dag mthong mod/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ni bu mo brtag mod/_bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du thong la rtog tu chug shig_/de dag gis bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[42a.5\]]gyi nang du btang ba dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas bu mo de pang bar bsnyal te smras pa/_bu mo bden par smros shig_/gal te khyod btsun pa 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas na yang de ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin pas/_khyod kyi khyim thab kyi thab rir 
[\[42a.6\]]'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'on te khyod phyugs cung ma smras pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin na ni dge slong la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur na sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bu mo des smras pa/_jo mo bdag des gzhon nu ma dang bral bar ma bgyis te/_'di ltar 
[\[42a.7\]]des 'o bgyis shing yan lag dang nying lag dag mnams/_kun du mnams so/_/btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis don de tsam zhig la rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun du dkrugs so/_/ci pha dag kyang bu mo dag la 'o byed cing yan lag dang nying lag dag la 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]nam/_kun du mi nam mam/_de nas bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bu mo de brtags na ji tsam na phyugs chung ma nyams par gyur nas/_de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bu mo 'di phyugs chung ma nyams so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la gang 
[\[42b.2\]]yus/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha btsun pa 'char ka yus so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la bram ze 'di rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig_/bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de 
[\[42b.3\]]dag kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag chod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_lha de gal te bdag las brten te sems can de snyed cig chab stsal bar gyur na/_don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[42b.4\]]dag 'o na deng la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thong la/_bram ze 'di ni rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig_/bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_lha gal te bdag las brten te tha na grog ma 
[\[42b.5\]]phra mo 'ga' zhig la gnod par gyur na yang /_don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung ba kho na lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dod chags dang ma bral na yang so sor rtog pa'i stobs 
[\[42b.6\]]la ltos/_gal te bram ze dag gis btsun pa 'char ka thub par gyur na ni rdo gcig gis kyang bsad par 'gyur ro/_/shes ldan dag deng la thams cad khye shig_/de dag bkye nas gyes/_rnga brdungs shing yol bas bcad pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag so sor 
[\[42b.7\]]gyes so/_/rgyal po dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gsum 'dug pa na/_rgyal pos btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa/_phreng ldan ma/_btsun pa 'char kas ji lta bu'i phun phun byas pas rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun du dkrugs pa la ltos/_btsun 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]mo phreng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod pas slad kyis rab tu byung ba dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog dang /_dge tshul ma skul byed dang /_dge tshul ma tsi ri ka dang /_gzhan yang mang po gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[43a.2\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis na/_khyod kyis ni rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi nang du mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu bgyis par gyur kyang /_da dung skyo ba mi mnga' 'am/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_phreng ldan ma/_da phyin chad 'khor bar 
[\[43a.3\]]'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun du spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de stan las langs te song ngo /_/de ngo tsha bas bcom ldan 'das dang phrad par ma nus nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces 
[\[43a.4\]]smras so/_/mkhan po ji ltar bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun du spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag la chos bstan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ltung ba lhag ma med pa byung bar ma gyur tam snyam na/_ji tsam na des lhag 
[\[43a.5\]]ma yod par mthong nas/_des de bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'chags su bcug_/bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sdom du bcug nas/_des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la gyis la bag yod pas sgrubs shig ces gdams 
[\[43a.6\]]ngag byin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung 
[\[43a.7\]]bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[43b.2\]]par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[43b.3\]]thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das ni bdag la phan pa mdzad pa/_bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag la legs par mdzad pa ste/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po 
[\[43b.4\]]dag sel bar mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po dag sgrub par mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sgrub 
[\[43b.5\]]par mdzad pa lags na/_bdag gis ci zhig byas na des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang /_nye bar byas pa dang /_rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas/_des yang bsams pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma 
[\[43b.6\]]dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas/_bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[43b.7\]]des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod dam snyam na/_des ji tsam na med par mthong ngo /_/su la ltos snyam na bdag nyid la ltos par mthong nas legs kyis bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]su rdzogs par bya'o snyam mo/_/gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/_zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /_
[\[44a.2\]]bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bo bram ze yin no/_/des smras pa/_bram ze ni thor tshugs can yin gyi khyod ni dge sbyong mgo reg yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 
[\[44a.3\]]smras pa/_'di ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing /_kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin na khyod zhi ba 'di la mngon par dad dam/_des smras pa/_mngon par dad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kwa'i zhi ba smros shig_/ji ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing kho bo'i ston pa 
[\[44a.4\]]yang bram ze'i mchog yin nam/_zhi bas smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/_khyod ni bram ze lags shing khyod kyi ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog lags so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_bdag gis yun ring po nas zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas na/_'dis lan 
[\[44a.5\]]'ga' rmi lam du yang ma bstan na/_btsun pa 'char kas smras na tshig smra bar byed pas/_kye ma btsun pa 'char ka ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba yin no snyam nas des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/_khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka de'i 
[\[44a.6\]]slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de nyid du 'dug ste/_zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam 
[\[44a.7\]]pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha 
[\[44b.2\]]rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las 
[\[44b.3\]]ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas 
[\[44b.4\]]bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[44b.5\]]dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_/deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[44b.6\]]na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos 
[\[44b.7\]]so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim dang po gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/_zhi ba la 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /_bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/_/tshe 
[\[45a.2\]]dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bo bram ze yin no/_/des smras pa/_mgo reg 'di lta bu bram ze ga la yin/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bram ze ji lta bu yin/_des smras pa/_bram ze ni ral pa can yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ral pa can du sprul pa 
[\[45a.3\]]dang /_ji tsam na bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas/_des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/_khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas 
[\[45a.4\]]pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan 
[\[45a.5\]]de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char 
[\[45a.6\]]ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag 
[\[45a.7\]]gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun 
[\[45b.2\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa 'char ka bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge 
[\[45b.3\]]bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo 
[\[45b.4\]]byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod 
[\[45b.5\]]du bram ze'i khyim gnyis pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze ser sna can zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma nor bu la dga' nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram 
[\[45b.6\]]ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs su byas te de'i khyim du song nas/_nor bu su nyo nor bu su nyo zhes byas pa dang /_bram ze mo des thos nas des smras pa/_nor bu dag rin ji tsam du 'tshong /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 
[\[45b.7\]]smras pa/_nor bu 'di dag rin che mod kyi/_'on kyang rin chung ngu'i phyir sbyin no zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi cha lugs kyis 'dug pa dang /_bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]du 'dir byon/_khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du 
[\[46a.2\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas/_stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes 
[\[46a.3\]]kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la 
[\[46a.4\]]phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma 
[\[46a.5\]]bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni 
[\[46a.6\]]bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa 
[\[46a.7\]]bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 
[\[46b.2\]]'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim gsum pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul 
[\[46b.3\]]ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze nad pa zhig 'dug pa/_de sman pa dag gis sman kha ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bska ba dag gis yid byung nas/_des sgo ba la khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma btang shig ces bsgo nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams 
[\[46b.4\]]pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sman pa'i cha lugs su byas te/_bram ze de'i khyim sgor sman pa 'ongs so zhes byas te bsdad pa dang /_sgo bas smras pa/_kho bo la bram zes khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma btang shig ces 
[\[46b.5\]]bsgo ste/_kho bo de nyid kyi phyir bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_khyod song la bram ze la sman pa 'ongs te de na re sman yang mi sbyin/_bya dga' yang mi slong bar gsang sngags dag gis sos par bya'o zhes zer ro zhes byos shig_/sgo ba song ste bram ze de la de 
[\[46b.6\]]skad rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_nang du thong shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs nas/_des gsang sngags dag gis de sos par byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sman pa'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi cha lugs kyis 'dug pa dang /_
[\[46b.7\]]bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du 'dir byon/_khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas 
[\[47a.2\]]stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char 
[\[47a.3\]]ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma 
[\[47a.4\]]bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni 
[\[47a.5\]]rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni 
[\[47a.6\]]mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
[\[47a.7\]]du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bzhi pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[47b.2\]]'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_ser sna can mig phra ba/_bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/_yo byad kun du 'dzin pa zhig 
[\[47b.3\]]'dug pa de sgo drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gdul ba la ltos pas/_yang dang yang du der bsod snyoms la 
[\[47b.4\]]zhugs na/_des der lan 'ga' yang bsod snyoms ma thob nas/_de de nas phyir byung ba bram ze des mthong nas/_des smras pa/_kye dge sbyong khyod yang dang yang du der 'jug na rnyed pa cung zad yod dam/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i dad pa'i nor las bsams te smras 
[\[47b.5\]]pa/_bram ze khyod nyid la yang med na ci zhig sbyin par byed/_bram ze des spyos te smras pa/_dge sbyong khyod khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad la sbyin par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thabs yin no zhes smras te song ngo /_/de na bram ze'i khye'u dge slong gi rgyus shes 
[\[47b.6\]]pa zhig gis bram ze de la smras pa/_mkhan pos de dag gi thabs yin no zhes bgyi ba de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam/_des smras pa/_mi shes so/_/skol gyis dang du blang ngo zhes smras pa gang lags pa de'i don ni de dag gi thabs yin no zhes smras pa de lags so/_/des 
[\[47b.7\]]yang smras pa/_mkhan pos de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam/_des smras pa/_mi shes so/_/de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba ni/_rgyal rigs dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bcu dang bcas pa lags te/_de ltar na mkhan pos don gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs par gyur to/_/bram ze des smras pa/_kho bos bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/_ci na gang gi phyir/_dge 
[\[48a.2\]]sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/_des smras pa/_dge sbyong des deng mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan 'dren par bgyid do/_/bram zes smras pa/_ci'i phyir de de ltar byed/_des smras 
[\[48a.3\]]pa/_mkhan po gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na/_bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu gtang du gsol/_des bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu btang ba dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs pa na/_rgan pa'i 
[\[48a.4\]]mtha' logs su 'dug ste/_bram ze che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren no zhes/_bram ze de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs pa des thos so/_/bram 
[\[48a.5\]]ze'i khye'u des de thos nas phyir 'ongs te/_bram ze de la smras pa/_mkhan po de bzhin te/_btsun pa 'char kas mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan drangs kyis/_zhal zas sta gon bgyid 
[\[48a.6\]]du stsol cig_/des smras pa/_kho bos bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ci na/_gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/_de dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du za bar 'gyur grang /_ji tsam de nang par langs pa 
[\[48a.7\]]dang /_dge slong chu'i gtsang sbyor dag bram ze de'i khyim du lhags te smras pa/_bram ze chu gang du gzhag par bya/_bram ze des smras pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdum par ro/_/de bzhin du bshos kyi gtsang sbyor dag lhags te smras pa/_bram ze 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]zhal zas gang du brtag par bya/_bram ze des smras pa/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdum par ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi ngor mgron du bos pa des/_dus sngar 'gro bar bya zhing ma zin pa dag zin par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[48b.2\]]'char ka nang par sngar langs te 'phags pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar de mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka gar bzhud/_des smras pa/_bram ze zhig gis bdag las brten te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[48b.3\]]'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pas der 'gro'o/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_bram ze de ni ma dad pa lags kyis/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na mi rung gis bdag kyang mchi'o/_/de gnyis der 
[\[48b.4\]]dong ba dang /_ji tsam na bram ze de snying las chung ngur 'dug nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/_ci'i phyir snying las chung ngur 
[\[48b.5\]]'dug_/zhal zas sta gon byed na ci nyes/_bram ze des smras pa/_kho bos bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ci na/_dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/_khyod bdag gi khyim du zan zo zhig_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_bram 
[\[48b.6\]]ze ci kho bo la 'byor pa med snyam mam/_kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byed par yang spro mod 
[\[48b.7\]]kyi/_'on kyang kho bo khyod la phan gdags pa'i phyir smras/_khyed snying las chung ngur ma 'dug par zhal zas sta gon gyis shig_/'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dang /_kho bo dang /_gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rgya che dgu dag gis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas pa yin pas 
[\[49a.2\]]gal te khyod la brten nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na/_khyod la rgyal po gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur zhing /_khyod phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi dgos par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas 
[\[49a.3\]]kyang yod par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze de skrag ste bsams pa/_de ltar 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag gis zhal zas sta gon ma byas na da ji ltar bya/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_bram ze mnyan yod na gang nyo bas mi rnyed pa'i rdzas de lta bu med 
[\[49a.4\]]kyis/_kAR+ShA pa Na dag 'on cig dang kho bos zhal zas sta gon bya'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_khyim bdag kAR+ShA pa Na ji snyed dag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'byor par 'gyur/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_kAR+ShA pa Na lnga 
[\[49a.5\]]brgyas so/_/bram ze des khyim bdag la kAr+ShA pa Na lnga brgya phul nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de dag gi steng du kAr+ShA pa Na gzhan dag gis kyang bsnan te zhal zas sta gon byas so/_/bram ze des smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag la bstsang sder dag kyang mi 
[\[49a.6\]]bdog go/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_bram ze khyod bstsang sder dag gis ma 'tsher par snying las chung ngur 'dug shig dang /_de dag drang srong gi snod dang bcas te gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 
[\[49a.7\]]'dun gshegs te bzhugs nas/_dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed dag byi dor byas pa bram ze des mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_re zhig snod dag kyang bdag gis byi dor bya mi dgos so snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyis/_khyod kyis kyang brim pa mdzod la slad kyis bshos gsol cig_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gdan las 
[\[49b.2\]]bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka da khyod bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/de 'dug pa dang /_bram ze des zas brims te des zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i 
[\[49b.3\]]mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo 
[\[49b.4\]]nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la 
[\[49b.5\]]gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' 
[\[49b.6\]]bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[49b.7\]]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng 
[\[50a.2\]]slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe 
[\[50a.3\]]dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga pa gnyi ga nas btul 
[\[50a.4\]]cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin nas/_de de la shin tu lhag par chags pas khyim du 'ga' yang 'jug tu 
[\[50a.5\]]mi ster nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang /_ji tsam na bram ze de gcin gci zhing 'dug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mthong nas des smras pa/_dge sbyong ma 'jug par sdod cig_/
[\[50a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar bram ze'i gcin gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs te bram ze de'i chung ma de yang 'di ltar de'i lto na nang grol gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad phyi rol nas snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs 
[\[50a.7\]]nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir byung ba dang /_bram ze des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod kyis bdag gi mchis 'brang gzigs sam/_des smras pa/_mthong ngo /_/ci 'dra khyod kyis ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra'o/_/de zhugs te bltas na de ltar mi sdug par 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]mthong nas des de la smras pa/_bram ze mo khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka la cung zhig ma smras sam/_des smras pa/_cung zad kyang ma smras te/_'di ltar des bdag spyos te dmod mo bgyis kyis bzhud la de la bzod pa gsol cig_/de song ste smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[50b.2\]]'char ka bdag gi mchis 'brang la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bzod par bya'o/_/des de sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa dang /_bram ze de dad par gyur nas des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/_khyod nyid gdul 
[\[50b.3\]]ba'i don du'o/_/btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/_
[\[50b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_
[\[50b.5\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma 
[\[50b.6\]]bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma 
[\[50b.7\]]bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa 
[\[51a.2\]]lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas 
[\[51a.3\]]rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba 
[\[51a.4\]]ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim drug pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 
[\[51a.5\]]bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yin te/_bram ze de me tog dang /_yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol du byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams 
[\[51a.6\]]pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_de bram ze'i khyim du song ba dang /_de'i chung ma des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo khang du mthong nas/_de nang du zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang khyim gyi nang du zhugs so/_/de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /_
[\[51a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de'i phyi bzhin gnas khang du zhugs so/_/de gnas khang nas phyir byung ste skas las khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas kyang de'i phyi bzhin skas las khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams so/_/des skas phul ba dang /_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa la sgyel nas de 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_des bsams pa/_ma shi'am snyam nas de babs te bslang bar brtsams na 'gul bar yang ma nus so/_/bram ze 'ongs nas dris pa/_'di ci yin/_bram ze mos rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des 
[\[51b.2\]]smras pa/_khyod kyis 'di de ltar phul ba ni ma legs pa byas te/_'di ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/_'di dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob 
[\[51b.3\]]pas bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_'phags pa khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_mi rig pa dang /_
[\[51b.4\]]rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyis bzod par gsol zhes bzod pa gsol ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te smras pa/_bzod par bya'o/_/bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/_khyod nyid gdul ba'i don du'o/_/
[\[51b.5\]]btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang /_bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 
[\[51b.6\]]de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du 
[\[51b.7\]]byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni 
[\[52a.2\]]bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma 
[\[52a.3\]]mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 
[\[52a.4\]]'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na 
[\[52a.5\]]bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te/_
[\[52a.6\]]dang du ma blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bdun pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/_blta 
[\[52a.7\]]na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yin te/_bram ze de me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol du byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang /_bram ze mo de gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang /_lang tsho'i 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]rgyags pa dang /_rigs kyi rgyags pa dang /_dbang phyug gi rgyags pas rgyags nas tshig kyang mi ster ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i sngon gyi las zad pa las bsams nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing /_/sar pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]skyed mi byed/_/bag med 
[\[52b.2\]]brgyan pa mthong nas ni/_/mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu /_/zhes smras te song ngo /_/bram ze mo de 'dis bdag spyos so zhes gshe zhing des gos dri ma can gyon te khri zhigs pa'i steng du nyal te 'dug go/_/bram ze de 'ongs pa dang /_des de mthong nas smras pa/_bram ze mo 
[\[52b.3\]]'di ci nyes/_bram ze mos gshes te smras pa/_gal te khyod la gang sgo na 'greng ba'i mi gcig la yang bza' ba dang /_bgo ba sbyin pa'i 'byor pa med na khyod la khyim mi mo blangs pas ci bya/_dge sbyong 'char ka gang yin pa des kho mo spyos so/_/bram zes smras pa/_bzang mo de 
[\[52b.4\]]ni bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin gyis de la bzod par gyis shig_/bram ze mos smras pa/_gal te de gson na kho mo mi gson no/_/bram zes smras pa/_bzang mo de ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob 
[\[52b.5\]]dpon yin te/_de dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pas/_gal te bdag gis de la sdug bsngal cung zad bskyed par gyur na/_bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis bzod par 
[\[52b.6\]]gyis shig_/bram ze mos smras pa/_bram ze mang du smras te ci rung /_gal te de gson na kho mo mi gson no/_/'dod pa sten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas bram ze de ral gri mchan du bcug ste 'phags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po kho na 
[\[52b.7\]]nas de mthong na/_de sems ji lta bus 'ong snyam na/_ji tsam na gsod pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul nas der zhugs te 'dug go/_/bram ze des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka sgo phye shig_/tshe 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_khyod skyes bzang pos 'ongs par gyur na/_kho bos ci'i phyir sgo mi dbye/_ral gri bor cig_/bram zes bsams pa/_bgags te gsad do snyam nas des ral gri bor ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_sdig pa'i sems de 
[\[53a.2\]]yang bor cig_/bram ze des bsams pa/_'di ni bdag nyid chen po zhig ste/_bdag gi sems kyang shes so snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus nas de bzhin du 'dug go/_/bram ze des tshe dang 
[\[53a.3\]]ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta 
[\[53a.4\]]ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la 
[\[53a.5\]]gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_
[\[53a.6\]]rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang 
[\[53a.7\]]mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[53b.2\]]de nas bram ze des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gi sdum par byon tam/_son to/_/btsun pa 'char kas bdag gi bram ze mo la ji skad bka' stsal/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bos de la 'di skad ces/_sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing /_/sar pa cung zad 
[\[53b.3\]]skyed mi byed/_/bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/_/mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu /_/zhes smras so/_/btsun pa tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ci lags/_bram ze sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig tu dus ston byung nas/_de na khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang 
[\[53b.4\]]po dag rang gi rgyan dag gis brgyan te skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ba de dag grong sprang mo zhig gis mthong nas/_de bdag nyid rgud pa'i mya ngan byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas 
[\[53b.5\]]mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas zhig de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyogs der song ba dang /_de'i lus mdzes pa dang /_sems mdzes pa grong sprang mo des mthong nas des sprang zan cung 
[\[53b.6\]]zad cig rnyed pa dang /_des bsams pa/_bdag gis sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la mchod pa ma byas pas des na gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur gor ma chag gis/_gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag las bsod snyoms cung zad len par 'gyur na bdag gis 'di la dbul bar bya'o 
[\[53b.7\]]snyam mo/_/rang sangs rgyas des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed pa dang /_des de la phul lo/_/rang sangs rgyas de de la snying brtse bas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas/_des smon lam 'di skad ces bdag 
[\[54a.2\]]las 'di'i rnam par smin pas nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig ces btab bo/_/bram ze de'i tshe de'i dus na grong sprang mo gang yin pa de ni khyod kyi chung ma de yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar 'di lta bur skyes te kho bos de'i las 
[\[54a.3\]]kyi rnam par smin pa de zad pa las bsams nas 'di skad ces/_sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing /_/sar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/_/bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/_/mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu /_/zhes smras so/_/btsun pa 'char kas don gyis na bdag gi mchis 'brang la bskul 
[\[54a.4\]]ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas song ngo /_/bram ze mo de 
[\[54a.5\]]yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis bram ze 'char ka sod cig ces mngags pa ni ma legs pa byas te bram ze des btsun pa 'char ka bsad par ma gyur tam snyam mo/_/bram ze de 'ongs pa dang chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka ma bkrongs sam/_bram zes smras 
[\[54a.6\]]pa/_de ni bdag nyid chen po yin pas su zhig gis bkrongs par nus/_chung mas smras pa/_'o na khyod kyis de spyan ma drangs sam/_bram zes smras pa/_kho bos sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis zhal zas sta gon gyis shig_/bram ze mo des zhal zas grang cha 
[\[54a.7\]]gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi nyin mo sta gon byas/_drod bag gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyi de nyin par sta gon byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/_chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod 
[\[54b.2\]]pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing /_lag pa bsnyal lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 
[\[54b.3\]]bram ze mo de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze mo des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar 
[\[54b.4\]]chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[54b.5\]]lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_
[\[54b.6\]]ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs 
[\[54b.7\]]la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[55a.2\]]gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs 
[\[55a.3\]]so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim brgyad pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung 
[\[55a.4\]]ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_ser sna can mig phra ba/_bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/_yo byad kun du 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa des ri brags shig tu zhing blas kyi mtha' rmor bcug nas/_des bang ba dag rgyas btab ste chung ma la lto rgyags tsam byin nas ri brags der song ste 
[\[55a.5\]]rang gis zhal ta byas nas zhing blas kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jud do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_des bsod snyoms brgyus te/_bram ze de'i khyim du song nas des smras pa/_bram ze mo lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ngo /_/des 
[\[55a.6\]]de la 'bras chan phul ba dang /_phru ba de de bzhin du gang bar 'dug go/_/bram ze mos smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi khyim thab ser sna can/_mig phra ba/_bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/_yo byad kun du 'dzin pa lags kyis slan chad ma byon cig_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[55a.7\]]pa 'char kas smras pa/_thabs yin gyis sang kho bo bdag nyid dang gnyis 'ong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyi de nyin par bdag nyid dang gnyis der song ba dang /_des de la de bzhin du 'bras chan phul lo/_/de bzhin du bdag nyid dang drug bcu'i bar du nyin re lan re song ste bram 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ze'i khyim der bsod snyoms zos pa dang /_ngos kyi sdum tshes dag shes ldan dag ltos shig_/bram ze des lag pas bcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/_de dag bram ze mo des shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig za bar byed do zhes smod par byed/_
[\[55b.2\]]phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/bram ze'i khye'u zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brags der song ba dang /_bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/_des 
[\[55b.3\]]smras pa/_mnyan yod nas so/_/khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/_thos te/_mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim dang po lags so/_/mkhan po'i khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/_
[\[55b.4\]]shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug bcu nyin re lan re mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshal lo/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_'dis kho bo ser sna can la tho 'tsham par byed kyis gzhan la yang dri bar bya'o snyam nas/_de lam gar song ste bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bya ba 
[\[55b.5\]]'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brags der song ba dang /_bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/_des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/_des smras pa/_mnyan yod nas so/_/khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam 
[\[55b.6\]]thos sam/_thos te/_mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim dang po lags so/_/mkhan po'i khyim ni shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug bcu nyin re lan re mchis te/_bsod 
[\[55b.7\]]snyoms 'tshal lo/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_de dang 'di mthun pas de ltar gyur gyis bram ze mo des longs spyod dag zos par gyur na mi rung gis 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze de phyir 'ongs te bram ze mo de la smras pa/_bram ze mo ngan pa kho bos lag pas gzhal ba brgya 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/_khyod de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig za bar byed dam/_khyod kyis bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam ci na/_dge sbyong mgo reg de dag la sbyin par byed ces des de brdeg par brtsams pa 
[\[56a.2\]]dang /_des smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis kho mo la gtad pa'i bang ba dag kho mos rgya nyams par byas sam/_ci je so sor rtogs shig_/bram ze des bang ba dag so sor brtags pa dang /_ji tsam na de bzhin du rgya ma nyams par 'dug pa dag mthong nas/_des chung ma la smras pa/_
[\[56a.3\]]khyod kyis zas de snyed ga las rnyed/_des smras pa/_bdag gi phru ba 'dir 'bras chan dang /_sran tshod btsos na 'bras chan des dge slong drug bcu dang bdag kyang 'grangs par gyur to/_/bram ze des smras pa/_ci'i phyir de ltar gyur/_des smras pa/_bdag gis khyod kyi mngon sum du 
[\[56a.4\]]'gyur bar bya'o zhes des phyi de nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bdag nyid dang drug bcu der 'ongs pa la de bzhin du bsod snyoms phul nas des smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis mthong ngam/_bram ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas/_des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum 
[\[56a.5\]]par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bram ze ci 'di 'dra bas sam/_'on te zas yang dag pas mgron du 'bod/_bshos yang dag pas spyan 'dren to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs te song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[56a.6\]]bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bar dang du blangs par rig nas/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_bram 
[\[56a.7\]]ze'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/tshe dang 
[\[56b.2\]]ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du 
[\[56b.3\]]byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma 
[\[56b.4\]]bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni 
[\[56b.5\]]bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 
[\[56b.6\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[56b.7\]]slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs 
[\[57a.2\]]so/_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim dgu pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa bdun pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod 
[\[57a.3\]]na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de la bu zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/de'i chung ma de gtum pa/_brlang ba/_rtsub pa/_rgya ba/_gshe ba/_spyo ba 
[\[57a.4\]]zhig yin pas rtag tu ngos kyi sdum tshes dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed nas/_de'i ming gtum mo gtum mo zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung nas bram ze des bu la smras pa/_bu khyod kyi ma 'di gtum pas gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol 
[\[57a.5\]]byed pas/_bdag cag khri mon du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis/_re zhig dus ston thal gyi bar du ri brags gzhan du 'dong zhing 'khod la/_de'i 'og tu phyir 'ong bar byas/_khyod song la ma la dris shig_/bu des ma la smras pa/_
[\[57a.6\]]yum bdag bgyi ba chung zhig gi slad du ri brags ga ge mo zhig tu mchi'o/_/gtum mos smras pa/_gang du kho mo'i dang po'i gos song ba der song shig_/bram zes kyang smras pa/_kho bo yang 'gro'o/_/gtum mos smras pa/_gang nas yang phyir mi 'ong ba der song shig_/de gnyis 
[\[57a.7\]]dong ba dang /_gtum mos bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo khur slang tshugs shig dang /_je snog zan bya'o/_/des khur slang btsugs te khur ba dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gtum mo de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]de snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na gtum mo'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_de 'jug pa gtum mos mthong nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_
[\[57b.2\]]bu mo dge sbyong 'di skrod cig_/des bskrad pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ches dang por nang du zhugs shing bu mo mngag gzhug ma phyis zhugs so/_/de gtum mos yang mthong nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di ma bskrad dam/_des smras pa/_
[\[57b.3\]]bskrad do/_/'o na 'di ga las zhugs/_yang skrod la sgo chod cig_/des de bskrad de sgo bcad nas zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ches dang por zhugs so/_/de gtum mos yang mthong nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di bskrad de 
[\[57b.4\]]sgo ma bcad dam/_des smras pa/_bskrad de sgo bcad do/_/'o na 'di gang nas zhugs/_de nas gtum mos smras pa/_dge sbyong ci slong /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_khur ba'o/_/gtum mos smras pa/_khyod bu thu bor gyur te 'ongs na khyod la khur ba ci'i phyir mi sbyin/_
[\[57b.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bu thu bor sprul te 'ongs pa dang /_gtum mos smras pa/_gal te lag pa dang rkang pa dag ser por byas kyang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lag pa dang rkang pa dag ser por sprul pa dang /_gtum mos smras pa/_gal te mig 
[\[57b.6\]]gnyis khar phor lta bur lta na yang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mig gnyis khar phor lta bur sprul pa dang /_gtum mos smras pa/_gal te nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khra la la 'khrol zhing 'dug na yang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[57b.7\]]'char kas nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khra la la 'khrol zhing 'dug pa dang /_gtum mos smras pa/_gal te khyod phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas kyang khyod la khur ba mi sbyin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bdag nyid phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas par sprul te sa la sgyel ba 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dang /_bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/_jo mo khyod kyis gdung bar bgyid pa mang po dag bsgrubs pa de dag gi nang na 'di ni ches gdung bar bgyid pa lags te/_dge sbyong 'di ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i 
[\[58a.2\]]slob dpon lags pas/_bdag ni shin tu thag ring por mchis kyang bran mo nyid du bas kyi/_jo mos ni gser gyi chu bum gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du chab bcu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/_/gtum mo skrag ste bsams pa/_de ltar 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa/_bu mo dong rkos shig dang 
[\[58a.3\]]sba'o zhes/_des dong rkos te sba bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas des bsgul bar yang ma nus so/_/de nas gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang 
[\[58a.4\]]ma gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyis/_bdag la bzod pa mdzod cig dang khyod la khur ba gsol lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te cha lugs tha mal pa bstan pa dang /_gtum mos bsams pa/_'di la khur 
[\[58a.5\]]ba sbyin no zhes khas blangs na/_khur ba 'di dag ni ha cang che ches pas phangs kyis/_'di'i phyir khur ba chung ngu gzhan zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des khur ba chung ngu zhig sreg par brtsams pa dang /_khur ba des khur bslang thams cad yog par gyur nas/_gtum mos 
[\[58a.6\]]bsams pa/_bdag gis khur ba 'di mi sbyin par khur ba snga ma las gcig sbyin no snyam nas/_des khur ba gcig drang bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na khur ba thams cad 'ongs nas/_gtum mos smras pa/_ci 'phags pa khur ba thams cad bzhed dam/_tshe dang 
[\[58a.7\]]ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_'dod do/_/gtum mos smras pa/_bzhes su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_sring mo gal te yongs su btang na/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_deng sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis/_der dong la rang gi lag nas brims shig_/gtum mos smras pa/_'phags pa dag gtum mo zhes thams cad du rig pas/_bdag der 'jug tu ga la chud/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_sring mo kho bos khyod 
[\[58b.2\]]'jug tu gzhug go/_/de nas gtum mos khur ba de dag thogs te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_sgo bas smras pa/_gtum mo don ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs/_ma 'jug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bzhin 
[\[58b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'jug tu chug shig_/sgo bas gtum mo nang du btang ba dang /_des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po mthong nas/_khur ba de dag gtub par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_ma gtub par rangs par brims shig_/
[\[58b.4\]]gtum mos smras pa/_khyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_brims shig dang khyed par 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la khyed pa'i phyi na lhag kyang byung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/gtum mos sangs 
[\[58b.5\]]rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la khur bas khyed par brims te gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/gtum mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags 
[\[58b.6\]]kyis tshur gshegs/_bdag gi sdum par bzhud la khyod der gdugs tshod gsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtum mo'i khyim du song ba dang /_gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la zan byin nas gtum mo tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /_
[\[58b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar gtum mos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[59a.2\]]mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_
[\[59a.3\]]khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni 
[\[59a.4\]]bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun 
[\[59a.5\]]pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs 
[\[59a.6\]]su mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas gtum mos 
[\[59a.7\]]rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par byas/_chag chag legs par btab/_byug pas legs par byugs te me tog dag dgram par byas nas/_spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go/_/bram ze de yang dus ston thal nas phyir 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du bsdad nas/_des bu la 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]smras pa/_bu khyod song la khyod kyi ma khri mon gang du bcug cing 'dug pa ltos shig dang dbyung bar bya'o/_/bu de khyim du song ba dang gtum mos thag ring mo kho na nas bu mthong nas/_des smras pa/_bu 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so/_/tshur shog ngal sos shig_/khyod 
[\[59b.2\]]kyi pha de 'ongs sam/_bus smras pa/_mchis te/_skyed mos tshal na sdod cing mchis so/_/bu de zan zos nas pha'i gan du song ba dang /_phas dris pa/_bu khyim bde'am/_bus smras pa/_yab yum gyi spyod lam de lta bu ni sngon lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ste/_'di ltar spyod 
[\[59b.3\]]lam zhi bas mchis so/_/bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/_des smras pa/_rje'i sras byon pa legs so byon pa legs so/_/bzhugs su gsol/_de 'dug nas bsams pa/_bye brag 'di lta bu ni sngon ma byung ci las gyur 
[\[59b.4\]]snyam nas/_des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_'di ltar sngon dang mi 'dra bar/_/log pa nyid du khyod snang na/_/khyod ni smyo byed ldan gyur tam/_/'on te myos par gyur tam ci/_/gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_jo bo bdag ni smyos pa min/_/myos par gyur 
[\[59b.5\]]pa'ang ma lags te/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas bstan pa la/_/'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bgyis/_/rje'i sras bdag la 'phags pa 'char kas 'di ltar bdag slan chad 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun du spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa 
[\[59b.6\]]mdzad do/_/bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes te bsams pa/_bdag gis brdeg pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_smad pas dul bar ma nus pa gang yin pa de/_btsun pa 'char kas chos bstan pas btul bas/_gang gi phyir chos bstan pas 'di btul ba ni 'phags pa 'char 
[\[59b.7\]]kas bdag la phan pa mang du mdzad do/_/'phags pa 'char kas bdag la legs pa mang du mdzad kyis/_bdag song la 'phags pa 'char ka sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas/_de tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud par byed/_
[\[60a.2\]]yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang 
[\[60a.3\]]mi smra'o/_/de nas bram ze de stan las langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[60a.4\]]pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/de nas bram ze des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba 
[\[60a.5\]]dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'ang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze des tshe 
[\[60a.6\]]dang ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas/_bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_
[\[60a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing /_lag pa bsnyal lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_
[\[60b.2\]]btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag 
[\[60b.3\]]gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang 
[\[60b.4\]]thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho 
[\[60b.5\]]ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[60b.6\]]skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_
[\[60b.7\]]bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/bram 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ze des smras pa/_gal te btsun pa 'char kas dang du mi bzhes na/_bdag gis drang srong gi gdan bsham par bgyi yis/_btsun pa 'char ka gshegs te longs spyad par gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs 
[\[61a.2\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan 
[\[61a.3\]]yod du bram ze'i khyim bcu pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze gzhon nu dga' 'dun lnga brgya tsam chung ma dang bcas pa dag bca' ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_dri dang /_
[\[61a.4\]]phreng ba rgyu mang po thogs te/_rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_'di dag gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_de de dag gi gan du song ba dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka khyod bram ze mdun na 'don 
[\[61a.5\]]gyi bu yin na/_ci'i phyir shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag thams cad za ba dag gi nang du rab tu byung /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar/_de dag gi phreng ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni kun dong gi phreng bar gyur/_khur ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni ba lang gi ko bar gyur/_
[\[61a.6\]]sha gang dag yin pa de dag ni ba lang gi shar gyur/_btung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni chang du gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag la lhung bzed bstan te smras pa/_shes ldan dag ltos shig_/kho bo'i lhung bzed na kun dong dang /_
[\[61a.7\]]ba lang gi ko ba dang /_ba lang gi sha dang /_chang yod snyam mam/_ci khyed cag ni mgo la yang kun dong gi phreng ba thogs/_zas su yang ba lang gi ko ba dang /_ba lang gi sha za/_btung bar yang chang 'thung bas khyed cag thams cad za ba yin no/_/de dag gis 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]gcig la gcig bltas na ji tsam na bdag cag thams cad kyi mgo la kun dong gi phreng ba thogs pa dang /_khur ba thams cad ba lang gi ko bar gyur pa dang /_sha thams cad ba lang gi shar gyur pa dang /_btung ba thams cad chang du gyur par mthong nas/_de dag 
[\[61b.2\]]gis smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka khyod kyis bdag cag la dmod pa bor gyis/_bdag cag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_bzod par bya'o/_/de nas de dag snga ma kho bzhin du gyur pa dang /_de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas 
[\[61b.3\]]de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/_khyod cag nyid gdul ba'i don du 'ongs kyis/_'khod cig dang chos bstan par bya'o/_/de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag 
[\[61b.4\]]chung ma dang bcas pa'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/_bram ze de dag chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun 
[\[61b.5\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/_btsun pa 'char kas bdag cag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag 
[\[61b.6\]]cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa 
[\[61b.7\]]lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi'i nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun 
[\[62a.2\]]pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag cag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_
[\[62a.3\]]deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag cag gi bsod snyoms dang /_na bza' dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par 
[\[62a.4\]]ci gnang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu byung ba ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/_bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/_/bram ze de dag gis smras pa/_gal te btsun pa 
[\[62a.5\]]'char kas dang du mi bzhes na/_bdag cag gis drang srong gi gdan bsham par bgyis/_btsun pa 'char ka gshegs te longs spyad par gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de dag la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de 
[\[62a.6\]]dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga 
[\[62a.7\]]brgya lhag tsam gnyi ga nas btul zhing bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_dge slong 'char ka nag po 'di yin no/_/tshe 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gsang sngags dag gis mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas/_shing rta bcas te 'dren du 'jud par byed nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bram ze de gdul 
[\[62b.2\]]ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bram ze de gdul ba'i phyir 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na/_bram ze de gsang sngags dag gis mi ma yin pa dbang du byas nas/_shing rta bcas te 'dren du bcug nas mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du song ba na/_bram ze 
[\[62b.3\]]de shing rta las babs nas gcin gci bar brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di ltar bram ze de'i gcin rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gsang sngags kyi phur bu phyung ba dang /_mi ma yin pa de bros te song ngo /_/
[\[62b.4\]]ji tsam na/_bram ze de langs pa dang mi ma yin pa bros par mthong nas/_des smras pa/_sus kho bo'i mi ma yin pa'i phur bu phyung /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bos so/_/ci'i phyir khyod bram zer gyur nas mi ma yin pa spyod dam/_des smras pa/_
[\[62b.5\]]su zhig bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la lhung bzed bstan nas smras pa/_'di khyod kyi bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_'dis ci 'grub par 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_gang
