[\[62b.6\]]sems pa dang /_gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam na/_bram ze de gang sems pa dang /_gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad lhung bzed de las grub par gyur pa dang /_bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes te des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char 
[\[62b.7\]]ka ci'i slad du 'di ltar 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bos lhung bzed kyi rig pa shes so/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'char ka lhung bzed kyi rig pa de bdag la stsol cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rig 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]pa su la'ang sbyin mi bya/_/rig dang bcas te 'chi bar bya/_/rig pa rig dang gus pa dang /_/nor gyi phyir ni sbyin par bya/_/bram zes smras pa/_bdag khyod la gus par bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bo khyim pa las 
[\[63a.2\]]bsnyen bkur bdag gir mi byed kyi/_kho bo ni rab tu byung ba las bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed do/_/des smras pa/_bdag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_rab tu phyung shig ces des de rab tu phyung /_rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams 
[\[63a.3\]]ngag byin no/_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs 
[\[63a.4\]]te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/_yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa/_de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par 
[\[63a.5\]]spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[63a.6\]]tsan dan bzhag pa lta bur rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha 
[\[63a.7\]]rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gang gdul ba'i dus yin snyam na/_yul mi'i gyad gcig gis yul dag tu gyad rnams brdabs nas mnyan yod du 'ongs te/_mnyan 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]yod na sgo khar rkang pa brkyang ste 'dug cing /_de gang la la 'ong ba de la 'di skad ces/_yang na ni kho bo la stobs rgol cig_/yang na ni kho bo'i rlig bar du song shig ces zer ro/_/de na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'du ba dag las/_'ga' yang de la stobs kyang mi 
[\[63b.2\]]rgol/_de'i rlig bar du yang mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_gyad de gdul ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyogs der song ste smras pa/_'di su zhig yin/_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_gyad 'di'i 
[\[63b.3\]]mchid nas 'di skad ces/_yang na ni kho bo la stobs rgol cig_/yang na ni kho bo'i rlig bar du song shig ces mchi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la smras pa/_ci je kho bo dang lhan cig stobs bya'am/_'on te kho bos brdabs pa'i gyad gsum po gang dag 
[\[63b.4\]]yin pa de dag dang lhan cig stobs 'gyed/_des smras pa/_khyod kyis brdabs pa'i gyad gsum po gang dag yin pa de dag dang lhan cig stobs bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_kho bos 'dod chags kyi gyad brdabs/_zhe sdang gi gyad brdabs/_gti 
[\[63b.5\]]mug gi gyad brdabs kyis/_khyod de dag dang lhan cig stobs khye shig ces/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de btul nas des de rab tu phyung /_rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag byin no/_/de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_brtun pa 
[\[63b.6\]]dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas so/_/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa/_brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas/_yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim 
[\[63b.7\]]med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/_tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/_bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i 
[\[64a.2\]]sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya 
[\[64a.3\]]ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/gtum mo des bu'i chung ma blangs nas/_dus gzhan zhig na gtum mo yang dus la bab/_de'i khyim thab kyang dus la bab bo/_/gtum mo'i bu de kha ton gyi zhor la yul gzhan du song ngo /_/
[\[64a.4\]]gtum mo'i mna' ma de gos dang zas bzang zhing zhim pa la longs spyod spyod pas/_nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs par gyur nas/_des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo song la skyes pa lus brtan pa/_mkhrang ba/_dam pa 'ga' ci snang tshol cig dang de 
[\[64a.5\]]dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/_jo mo khyod kyi gyos po dang sgyug mo gnyis ni bden pa mthong ba lags na/_khyod drang srong gi khyim 'di lta bur byon na nyes par spyod pa de lta bu ji ltar bgyir rung /_drang srong gi khyim gyi mi snyan 
[\[64a.6\]]pa skyed par mdzad dam ci/_des smras pa/_kwa'i khyod la bsam pa des ci bya/_je song la khrid de shog shig_/gal te khrid de ma 'ongs na khyod la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o/_/bu mos bsams pa/_bu zan ma'i bu mo 'dis drang srong gi khyim btsog gis 
[\[64a.7\]]dgang bar chad de/_bdag la dka' ba med kyis dgug go snyam nas/_de srang du song ba dang /_des de na chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon lus brtan pa/_mkhrang ba dam pa zhig mthong nas/_des de la smras pa/_kye btsun po khyod kho mo'i jo mo dang lhan cig dga' 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]mgur spyod phod dam/_des smras pa/_phod do/_/des de khrid de jo mo dang sprad nas/_de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der dus dang dus su 'gro bas de mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa/_bud med kyi 
[\[64b.2\]]yul 'di ni 'dod chags spyod pa zhig yin no snyam nas/_des de la 'dod chags kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do/_/des bsams pa/_'phags pa 'char ka ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas des bdag 'phrigs kyis/_gal te de ma bsad na 
[\[64b.3\]]des bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing /_de bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_bdag gis de bsad do snyam nas/_des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon la smras pa/_'phags pa 'char ka ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas/_des bdag 
[\[64b.4\]]cag 'phrigs kyis/_gal te de ma bsad na bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing /_de bdag cag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/_khyod kyis de sod cig_/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_kho bo de mi gsod de/_de ni ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[64b.5\]]gsal rgyal gyi ni chung po grogs/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i ni slob dpon yin gyis/_kho bos de bsad par gyur na kho bo rgyal pos rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste/_bsregs pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_
[\[64b.6\]]gal te khyod de gsod na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gsod na khyod phyin chad kho mo'i khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o/_/'dod pa sten pa dag gis ni sdig pa'i chos mi bya ba ci yang med pas chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des smras pa/_gal te de gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa 
[\[64b.7\]]yin na kho bos ji ltar gsad par bya/_des smras pa/_thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o zhes des dus ma yin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gan du mngag pa btang ste/_btsun pa 'char ka bdag bro 'tshal bar gyur na khyod kyis bdag gzigs par ci gnang zhes spring ngo /_/dgra 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dus ma yin par zhugs te/_de la chos bstan pa byas nas de phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag khyod mthong na glo ba dga' 
[\[65a.2\]]bas yud tsam zhig bzhugs su gsol zhes/_des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ji srid kyis shin tu nam sros par gyur pa de srid du bzung nas/_chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yang ral gri shubs nas phyung ste sgo na sdod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir byung ba dang /_chom rkun pa'i 
[\[65a.3\]]dmag dpon snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mgo drung ba nas bcad de sa la bsgyel to/_/de 'phags pa gsod cing 'dug pa bud med rgan mo zhig gis mthong nas/_des smras pa/_gzu lums byed pa 'di su zhig yin/_
[\[65a.4\]]chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_su la yang ma zer cig_/kho bos khyod kyang 'di'i gnas skabs lta bur byas par gyur ta re/_de skrag nas 'phral du smra ma phod de/_bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rjes gcod pa 'ga' zhig phyis 'ong grang snyam nas/_de nyid na cang mi smra bar 
[\[65a.5\]]'dug go/_/snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go/_/de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta ba rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa/_'ga' zhig gis btsun pa 
[\[65a.6\]]'char ka'i 'dun pa blangs sam/_btsun pa 'char ka med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de bsad kyis/_chos gos dag long shig dang de'i lus la mchod pa bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[65a.7\]]'das 'phags pa dang ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo chod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od lta bu'i 'od btang ba mdzad pa dang /_des mnyan yod thams cad gser btso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur to/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_ci'i 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]phyir mnyan yod thams cad gser btso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur snyam nas/_des yang bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs par bzhed gor ma chag snyam nas/_de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mnyan yod kyi lde mig khyer te/_sgo phye ba dang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[65b.2\]]mnyan yod du gshegs so/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dus ma yin par mnyan yod du gshegs snyam na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_bzod par dka' ba yin pas 
[\[65b.3\]]des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ba dang /_
[\[65b.4\]]ji tsam na/_phyag dar gyi phung po'i phyogs der byon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de 'dir sbas kyis phyung shig_/de phyung ba dang de na gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la brten nas/_
[\[65b.5\]]'phags pa'i bden pa dag mthong ba de dag gis gsol pa/_'di bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal 
[\[65b.6\]]po gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/_'di bdag gi chung po grogs lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/btsun mo phreng ldan mas gsol pa/_'di bdag gi slob dpon 
[\[65b.7\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo /_/de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de sa dkar gyis dril phyi byed du bcug nas/_spos chus 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]'khrur bcug ste/_ras kha dog sna tshogs dag gis khyogs spyi la brgyan nas/_der bcug ste bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de'i phyi 
[\[66a.2\]]bzhin phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ste/_sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu bzhag nas/_btsun mo phreng ldan mas spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas/_phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te/_rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas 
[\[66a.3\]]lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng zhing /_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas/_rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[66a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[66a.5\]]pa/_dge slong dag nyes dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang /_dge slong dag dus ma yin par grong du 'jug pa las gyur pas/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas/_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya 
[\[66a.6\]]ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grong du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/
[\[66a.7\]]dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa dag gis yun ring du 'dug par mi nus pa nas/_dge slong nad g.yog dag gis kyang nad pa dag gi bya ba nyams par byed/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang chos gos 
[\[66b.2\]]bzhag nas/_ji tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te/_de lam gyi phyed du son pa dang /_bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la ma smras so snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste/_ji srid du dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed 
[\[66b.3\]]dang chos gos tshig nas des der song ba dang /_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du khyod 'phyis te byon/_des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gi_/gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer 
[\[66b.4\]]zhing /_dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la 
[\[66b.5\]]gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa 
[\[66b.6\]]yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grong du 'jug cing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di 
[\[66b.7\]]pa'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin pa gnyis su ste/_skya rengs ma shar ba dang phyed yol bar ro/_/grong du zhes bya ba ni gang na srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag yod par ro/_/'jug cing zhes bya ba ni 'gro 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]zhing ngo /_/dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_
[\[67a.2\]]ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 
[\[67a.3\]]'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dus ma yin pa la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas grong du 'jug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dus ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/dus la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas/_grong du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur 
[\[67a.4\]]ro/_/dus la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/btsun mo phreng ldan mas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/_lhas 
[\[67a.5\]]dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba stsal/_dge slong ma rnams la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba stsal cing /_'phags pa 'char ka lha'i ni chung po grogs lags/_bdag gi ni slob dpon lags te/_dge slong rab tu grags pa de lta bu yang btsan thong 
[\[67a.6\]]du bkum na dge slong rab tu ma grags pa gzhan dag la bka' mchid kyang su rmed par 'gyur/_lhas 'phags pa 'char ka de sus 'gums su stsal ba dang sus bkum pa bkas rma bar ci gnang /_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/_shes 
[\[67a.7\]]ldan dag deng la 'phags pa 'char ka de sus gsod du bcug pa dang /_sus bsad pa smros shig_/de dag de rmed cing phyogs der dong ba dang /_de dag gis de na bud med rgan mo de mthong zhing /_des ni de dag ma mthong ba na/_bud med rgan mo des byung rgyal du smras pa/_phyogs 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'dir khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de sbas pa ni de dang de dag gis bsad do/_/de dag gis de thos nas smras pa/_rgan mo ci zer/_rgan mo des smras pa/_cang mi zer ro/_/de dag gis de bzung ste bsdigs nas/_de sus bsad smros shig ces byas pa dang /_des 
[\[67b.2\]]smras pa/_bram ze'i bu mo 'dis gsod du bcug go/_/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dis bsad do/_/de dag gis kyang bsdigs te/_ci de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhes rmas pa dang /_des smras pa/_gzhan yang g.yon can lnga brgya yod do/_/rgyal po'i mi de dag 
[\[67b.3\]]gis bram ze'i bu mo de dang /_chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de dang /_g.yon can lnga brgya po de dag bzung ste rgyal po la phul nas smras pa/_lha 'phags pa 'char ka ni bram ze'i bu mo 'dis 'gums su stsal te/_chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dis bkum mo/_/g.yon 
[\[67b.4\]]can lnga brgya po 'di dag gi dmag dpon ni 'di lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la bram ze'i bu mo 'di rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig_/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di ni rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug la sregs shig_/g.yon can 
[\[67b.5\]]lnga brgya po 'di dag ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag chod cig_/de dag gis bram ze'i bu mo de ni rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la btags so/_/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de ni rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so/_/g.yon can lnga brgya po de dag ni lag pa dang rkang pa 
[\[67b.6\]]dag bcad do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas sdang ba ma mchis pa dang /_gnod pa ma bgyis 
[\[67b.7\]]bzhin du de gnyis kyis bkum par gyur cing /_de gnyis kyang bkum par gyur/_g.yon can lnga brgya po dag kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag bkum par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi 
[\[68a.2\]]rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par 
[\[68a.3\]]smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid byed du bcug 
[\[68a.4\]]pa'i tshe nyam nga ba dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na mu stegs can dag gis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas/_rgyal po tshangs byin gyis dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/_gang la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod pa de ni 'dug shig_/gang la med pa de ni song shig ces 
[\[68a.5\]]bsgo'o/_/de'i mdun na 'don de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jud pa de la bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po bdag cag la lo bcu gnyis kyi 'tshal ma ma mchis kyis bdag cag mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu dag 'khod cig dang kho 
[\[68a.6\]]bos khyed la mkho ba bstabs par bya'o/_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu ma dag gis grong khyer thams cad dkris par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de gzhi 'dis bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_tshe'i bar chad 'byung ba'am/_gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam du 'jigs pa 
[\[68a.7\]]skyes par gyur nas/_des rmi lam de mdun na 'don de la bzlas pa dang /_mdun na 'don des bsams pa/_lhas rmi lam bzang po zhig gzigs mod kyi/_'on kyang bram ze'i khye'u dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad du gyur na mi rung gis/_ngan par bsnyad par bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]des rgyal po la smras pa/_lhas rmi lam ngan pa zhig gzigs pas/_gzhi 'dis rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_sku tshe'i bar chad 'byung ba'am gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di la ci zhig bya/_des smras pa/_lha ba lang gi mchod sbyin stsal 
[\[68b.2\]]bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de ltar bya'o/_/des ba lang stong phrag du ma dag bsogs pa dang /_rgyal po phyir byung nas rgyal pos ba lang de dag mthong ba dang /_ba lang de dag gis ba lang gi 'u sgra chen po phyung ngo /_/rgyal pos de dag mthong zhing thos nas/_de snying 
[\[68b.3\]]rje skyes te mdun na 'don la smras pa/_'di dag thams cad gsad par bya'am/_mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di dag thams cad bsad par mi 'dod do snyam nas/_des smras pa/_lha thams cad dgum par mi bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe na rnga bran zhig rnga bran mo 
[\[68b.4\]]zhig la rgyab rgal byed nas mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/_lha rnga bran dang rnga bran mo 'di gnyis dgum par bgyi'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis kyang lag pa brkyang ste/_'di gnyis lags so zhes bstan nas/_de gnyis bshas pa na sems g.yos pa/_bdag cag 
[\[68b.5\]]gnyis sdang ba med pa dang /_gnod pa ma byas bzhin du bsad pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni mdun na 'don 'di dang /_bram ze'i bu lnga brgya po 'di dag gi le lan yin gyis/_bdag cag gnyis gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_bdag cag gnyis kyis mdun na 'don 'di sdang ba 
[\[68b.6\]]med pa dang /_gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du 'jud par gyur cig ces snyam du dam bcas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin gang yin pa de ni da ltar ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal 
[\[68b.7\]]po gsal rgyal yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo gang yin pa de ni da ltar btsun mo phreng ldan ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni da ltar dge slong 'char ka yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang dag yin 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]pa de dag ni da ltar g.yon can lnga brgya po dag yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rnga bran gang yin pa de ni da ltar chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rnga bran mo gang yin pa de ni da ltar bram ze'i bu mo yin te/_mdun na 'don de dang bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[69a.2\]]gis rnga bran dang rnga bran mo de gnyis sdang ba med pa dang /_gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod du bcug pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar yang chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di dang /_bram ze'i bu mo 'di gnyis kyis 'char ka dang /_g.yon can lnga brgya po dag sdang ba med pa dang /_
[\[69a.3\]]gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod du bcug go/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes/_las ci bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas/_nyon 
[\[69a.4\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/_las ci zhig bgyis na des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu 'char ka nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed 
[\[69a.5\]]pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas/_'char ka nyid kyis byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa 
[\[69a.6\]]dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag 
[\[69a.7\]]la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/_rang sangs 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam na ri brags shig na rngon pa zhig 'dug ste/_ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 
[\[69b.2\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya mang po dag drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /_nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong mang po dag 
[\[69b.3\]]'dzugs par byed do/_/de'i rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa yin no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas/_lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas/_de snga dro sham thabs 
[\[69b.4\]]bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/der bsod snyoms brgyus nas bsams pa/_lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyis/_ri brags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o snyam nas/_
[\[69b.5\]]de ri brags nas byung ste/_'di ni zhi ba'o 'di ni zhi ba'o zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas/_lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas 
[\[69b.6\]]kyi bya ba byas te lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas/_kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing drung zhig tu brten nas/_brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /_
[\[69b.7\]]de'i nyin mo mi'i dris [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma zin to/_/de nas rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te/_mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas des rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang /_rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]bdag gi rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang /_rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na/_gang gi phyir der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas/_des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang /_mi'i rjes mthong nas de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /_
[\[70a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bas 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas/_gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog bcad par ma byas na/_'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par 
[\[70a.3\]]byed kyis/_rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/_snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra bar rna drung du thug par bkang ste rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to/_/rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid 
[\[70a.4\]]chen po des bsams pa/_rngon pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smas pa dang nyams par gyur na mi rung gis/_da 'di la lag nas drang ba zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba 
[\[70a.5\]]dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas/_rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas 
[\[70a.6\]]smras pa/_yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/_mar gshegs su gsol/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/_rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir/_steng gi nam mkha' 
[\[70a.7\]]las shod du babs so/_/de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te/_rma lhan gyis glan nas smras pa/_'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol/_gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas glan par mdzad na/_de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]bsams pa/_bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas/_de'i phyir da ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/_cho 'phrul 
[\[70b.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas/_des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas/_phung po de 'o mas 
[\[70b.3\]]zhi bar byas te/_rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas/_lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag bsgreng zhing /_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_sil 
[\[70b.4\]]snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas/_rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_
[\[70b.5\]]bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rngon pa gang yin pa de ni 'char ka 'di yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i 
[\[70b.6\]]rnam par smin pas/_bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas/_las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u 'gram de nyid du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su skyes shing /_mtshon gyis dus la bab ste/_da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom pa thob kyang 
[\[70b.7\]]de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da ltar phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]'di dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas pa dang /_'dis ston pa mnyes par bgyis shing /_thugs byung bar ma bgyis pa dang /_'di dus la bab pa'i lus la ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor 
[\[71a.2\]]dang bcas pas/_lus kyi mchod pa bgyis pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur/_dge slong dag 'char ka nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas 
[\[71a.3\]]shing bsags pas/_'char ka nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i 
[\[71a.4\]]khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi 
[\[71a.5\]]za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i 
[\[71a.6\]]gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/gangs kyi sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas te/_de na rang sangs rgyas gcig cig na bar gyur nas gzhan dag gis de la smras pa/_khyod bzhud la 
[\[71a.7\]]sman pa la rmos te cho ga mdzod cig_/de ri brags gzhan zhig tu song nas mtshan mo rdza mkhan gyi ra ba zhig tu gnas par khas blangs pa dang /_de mtshan mo na bar gyur nas dus la bab bo/_/rdza mkhan des de mthong nas des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba 'di rdza so btang ba dang /_ma 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]btang ba dag gi nang du dus la bab pas 'jig rten ni gtsang sbra 'dod pa yin pas/_gal te skye bo dag gis tshor bar gyur na 'ga' yang snod nyo bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go/_/rang sangs rgyas gzhan dag 
[\[71b.2\]]gis bsams pa/_bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de gar song snyam nas bltas pa dang /_ji tsam na yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas de dag gis de nyid nas spos kyi shing dag steng gi nam mkha' las khyer te 'ongs nas rdza mkhan gyi ra bar babs pa dang /_
[\[71b.3\]]rdza mkhan gyis de dag mthong nas/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag gar gshegs/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa byed du'o/_/rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_'dis kyang khyod kyi yon tan gyi tshogs lta bu dag thob bam/_de dag 
[\[71b.4\]]gis smras pa/_thob bo/_/rdza mkhan gyis smras pa/_bdag gis 'di la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis pas/_da bkur sti bgyi ba'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol/_de song ste rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag gi ra bar rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 
[\[71b.5\]]grub pa zhig dus la bab kyis/_lhas de la bkur sti mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa phyir byung nas/_des rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de 
[\[71b.6\]]dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng zhing /_dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas so/_/rdza mkhan des 
[\[71b.7\]]rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_bdag 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdag dus la bab pa'i lus la yang ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchod pa mdzad par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge 
[\[72a.2\]]slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni da ltar dge slong 'char ka 'di yin te/_'dis de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas de dus la bab pa'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung por sbas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni da ltar 'di dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas so/_/'dis 
[\[72a.3\]]de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de la mchod pa byas te smon lam de skad btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni da ltar 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas te/_'di dus la bab pa'i lus la 
[\[72a.4\]]ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pas lus kyi mchod pa byas par gyur to/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim dad par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/_
[\[72a.5\]]de ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te/_gang du smon lam btab ce na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs 
[\[72a.6\]]su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs 
[\[72a.7\]]so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu phyung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gis 
[\[72b.2\]]tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[72b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la 
[\[72b.4\]]bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /_ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang 
[\[72b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_shAkya'i seng ge_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams pas/_smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas khyim dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog 
[\[72b.6\]]tu bstan to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge 
[\[72b.7\]]slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs te las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_sdom la/_zas bcas skya rengs da gdod dang /_/khab ral dang ni khri rkang dang /_/bdal dang gding ba g.yan pa dang /_/ras chen bde gshegs chos gos so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[73a.2\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de'i khyim du nye dga' dus dang dus su 'gro zhing des de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go/_/dus gzhan zhig na des de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i 
[\[73a.3\]]gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi cung zad bgyi'o/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig ci zhig byed/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs 
[\[73a.4\]]tshod gsol lo/_/khyim bdag khyod kyis sems rgya chen po bskyed kyis gdugs tshod gsol cig_/'phags pa khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drang ba'i rigs so/_/des dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[73a.5\]]nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag de la a rog gya zhes byas te song nas de gtsug lag khang du song ste/_des khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]khyim bdag de ma 
[\[73a.6\]]dad pa yin na khyod kyis ji ltar rjes su 'jug par byas/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nye dga' la de tsam yang mi gnas sam/_rjes su 'jug par byas pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la yang bzhag go/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_
[\[73a.7\]]legs par byas kyis 'dong la bza' bar bya'o/_/chos nyid kyis na gang gi ngor dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs pa de dus sngar 'gro ba yin pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dus sngar der song nas des khyim bdag de la smras pa/_khyim bdag kho bo khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag lta'i bar du khyod re zhig 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]zhal zas sta gon gyis shig_/kho bo ma 'ongs kyi bar du yang khyod kyis re zhig brim par mi bya'o zhes smras te song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la khyim bdag de rgyus mi shes pa yin pas des spyan 
[\[73b.2\]]'dren gtong bar mi byed kyis dus sngar sheg shig dang 'dong ngo zhes sgo zhig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang /_dge slong rnams chas te lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 
[\[73b.3\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te sgo drung na gzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la khyim bdag de la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[73b.4\]]slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na gzhes kyis ci bde gyis shig ces sgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nang du song ste/_khyim bdag de la khyim bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na gzhes 
[\[73b.5\]]kyis ci bde gyis shig_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis khyed cag gi ci bde ci lags ni ma 'tshal gyi/_'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan dag bshams kyis bzhugs su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[73b.6\]]khyim bdag de'i mchid nas bdag gis khyed cag gi ci bde ci lags ni ma 'tshal gyi/_'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan bshams kyis bzhugs su gsol zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te de skad zer na khyed cag kho na'i phyir stan dag bshams pas ci bde 
[\[73b.7\]]byas par brjod par bya ste/_'dug par bya zhing 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa dang ji tsam na gdugs tshod la bab tu nye bas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]la khyim bdag la gdugs tshod la bab tu nye bas zhal zas brims shig_/zas 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la bsgo ba dang /_des smras pa/_
[\[74a.2\]]'phags pa nye dga' mchis sam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_khyim bdag ma 'ongs so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag de'i 
[\[74a.3\]]mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchi nas bdag gis ma mchis so zhes bgyis pa dang /_de'i mchid nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig gzhes nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[74a.4\]]dga' bo song la khyim bdag la gdugs tshod la bab kyis zhal zas brims shig_/zas rul bar gyur pa 'dis khyod la ci bya zhes gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la bsgo ba dang /_des smras pa/_
[\[74a.5\]]'phags pa nye dga' mchis sam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_khyim bdag ma 'ongs so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag de'i 
[\[74a.6\]]mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis ma mchis so zhes bgyis pa dang /_de'i mchid nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag la nye dga' 'ongs par 
[\[74a.7\]]ma gyur na zan sbyin par mi byed dam zhes gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la de skad smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa mi gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi gsol lo zhes mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal te/_/bdag dbang thams cad bde ba yin/_/thun mong dag gis gnod byed de/_/'brel pa shin tu 'da' 
[\[74b.2\]]bar dka'/_/ji tsam na gdugs tshod kyi mtha' la bab pa na nye dga' 'ongs nas des smras pa/_khyim bdag mi 'brim par ci sdod/_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyi zhal nas kho bo ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig brim par mi bya'o zhes byung la da 'di skad ces gsung ngam/_nye dga' shags med nas cang 
[\[74b.3\]]mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des brim par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas dge slong kha cig gis ni zan thob nas zan bcad pa byas/_kha cig gis ni zan ma thob pa kho nar zan bcad pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so/_/
[\[74b.4\]]nye dga' ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i snying gis de nyid du 'dug go/_/de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta pa rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste/_dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo zhing smras pa/_btsun pa nye dga' ma mchis sam/_'ga' zhig gis de'i 'dun pa blangs sam/_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[74b.5\]]smras pa/_de ma 'ongs te sus kyang de'i 'dun pa yang ma blangs so/_/dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bdag cag snga dro zang zing gi ched la ches tho btsams la/_da ni chos kyi ched la tho 'tsham par byed do/_/dge slong don chung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zas dang bcas 
[\[74b.6\]]pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang /_phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la 
[\[74b.7\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod zas dang bcas pa'i khyim 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang /_phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes 
[\[75a.2\]]rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[75a.3\]]bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang /_phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de 
[\[75a.4\]]ltar bca' ba mdzad do//_//dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa dag gis yun ring du 'dug mi nus nas dge slong nad g.yog rnams kyis nad pa'i bya ba nyams par byed cing /_dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[75a.5\]]stsal pa/_khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas ji tsam na der me shor nas/_dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te/_de lam gyi phyed 
[\[75a.6\]]du son pa dang /_bdag gis khyim pa 'dug pa la ma bsgo'o snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste/_ji srid du khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang /_chos gos tshig nas de der song ba dang khyim bdag gis smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon/_
[\[75a.7\]]des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig gi_/gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes zer zhing dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham 
[\[75b.2\]]pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas 
[\[75b.3\]]pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu zhing khyim pa 'dug pa la mi sgo na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/zas dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni mgron du bos pa 
[\[75b.4\]]dang bcas pa'i'o/_/khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o/_/mgron du bos nas zhes bya ba ni bsod snyoms kyi phyir ro/_/snga dro zhes bya ba ni snga dro nyid de khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu na'o/_/phyi dro zhes bya ba ni phyi dro nyid de khyim gsum las lhag par rgyu na'o/_/khyim dag tu 
[\[75b.5\]]zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o/_/rgyu zhing zhes bya ba ni 'gro zhing ngo /_/khyim pa 'dug pa la mi sgo na zhes bya ba ni de na khyim pa gang 'dug pa la'o/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can 
[\[75b.6\]]dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/_dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung 
[\[75b.7\]]byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong ji tsam cung zad zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu zhing phyi dro yang khyim gsum las lhag par rgyu na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngor mgron du 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]bos pa ma yin na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/grong rgyu ba'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sgo gtan gyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i bar sdom la/_dga' bo 
[\[76a.2\]]nye dga' zhag bdun dang /_/bzang byin sdums byed tshul khrims dang /_/nag po tshigs bcad 'char ka dang /_/bcu dang bslab gzhi'i rim pa dang /_/grong khyer gnyis dang g.yul gzhi dang /_/lha mo khar phor 'phyang ba dang /_/sngo bsangs rgyal srid pog ka na/_/ma la khar ba byin pa dang /_/lham 
[\[76a.3\]]gyi dbang phyug mnyan yod dang /_/sngon gyi tshul dang nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/drang srong rnams dang gtsug lag khang /_/mgu byed dang ni gzungs byed dang /_/stong thub dang ni 'brog gnas dang /_/lag brgyud dang ni sngo bsangs can/_/mi gdung rnams su skyes pa dang /_/dpa' chen dang ni sgur mchog dang /_/
[\[76a.4\]]dpe med ma dang lcags mgar dang /_/sing ga la dang shar pa dang /_/snyan smra dang ni tshig pa dang /_/sgur dang thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_/bran mo dang ni bram ze mo/_/mgu byed dpal ldan gyur pa dang /_/shA ri'i bu ni zhugs pa dag_/sgo gtan yang dag bsdus pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[76a.5\]]mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dgon pa dang shing drung dang /_khyim gyis stong pa dang /_ri sul dang /_ri phug dang /_rtswa spyil dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_
[\[76a.6\]]dur khrod dang /_nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag tu bsam gtan gyis shig_/dge slong dag bag yod par bsgrubs la phyis 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig_/'di ni nga'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[76a.7\]]rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong rnams dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khyim gyis stong pa dang /_ri sul dang /_ri phug dang /_rtswa spyil dang /_bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags khrod dang /_ri drung dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs te/_kha cig ni ri 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed/_kha cig ni gser gyi ri bdun po dag la/_kha cig ni mtsho chen po ma dros pa na/_kha cig ni rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab pa na/_kha cig ni rnal 'byor pa'i skye bo dang rjes su mthun pa'i grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul dang yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[76b.2\]]gi phyogs de dang de dag na bsam gtan byed do/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i nang du nub/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu las mngon par 'phags te de la dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos re re la dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri yod de/_de dag la dpag 
[\[76b.3\]]tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yin te/_der klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis skyes nas de gnyis kyi lus kyis de lan gsum dkris te 'khod cing bskal par gnas pas 
[\[76b.4\]]'dzin pa/_'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dbyung bar mi nus pa yin no/_/de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi bsod nams kyi gnas 'di byung ngo snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo lan gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong ste/_des ri rab 
[\[76b.5\]]kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/de na dge slong gang dag ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed pa de dag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /_rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang lus ma thob par 
[\[76b.6\]]gyur nas de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/khyed cag ga las 'dir 'ongs/_
[\[76b.7\]]khyed cag dbyar gang du gnas par khas blangs/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag ri rab kyi bang rim nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/bdag cag ri rab kyi bang rim du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag ci'i 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]phyir skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /_rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang lus ma thob par gyur/_de dag gis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag ri rab kyi bang rim du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis skyes nas de gnyis kyi lus kyis de lan gsum dkris te 'khod cing bskal 
[\[77a.2\]]par gnas pa/_sa 'dzin pa/_'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dbyung bar mi nus pa yin no/_/de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gnyis kyi bsod nams kyi gnas 'di byung ngo snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo lan gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong 
[\[77a.3\]]ste/_des ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/bdag cag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing /_rid pa dang nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang lus ma thob par gyur to/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras 
[\[77a.4\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis de gnyis gdul bar mi nus sam/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag re zhig de gnyis bdag cag gis gdul ba ma yin no/_/'o na sus gdul ba yin/_nyan thos chen pos gdul ba yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[77a.5\]]'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_de gnyis gang gis gdul ba yin snyam na/_dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos gdul ba yin par gzigs shing mkhyen nas/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ri rab kyi bang rim 
[\[77a.6\]]na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na mnyan yod nas mi snang 
[\[77a.7\]]bar gyur cing /_ri rab kyi bang rim du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis gnyid log par gyur nas des se gol gyis sad par bya bar brtsams na de gnyis ma sad do/_/des de gnyis kyi steng du 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bcag par brtsams na de lta na yang de gnyis ma sad do/_/des de gnyis kyi ltor zhugs te sprin chen po bzhin du 'brug bsgrags par brtsams na de lta na yang de gnyis ma sad do/_/des klu chen po'i lus kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te 'dug pa 
[\[77b.2\]]dang /_de gnyis khur lci bas mnan pas sad de ji tsam na klu chen po zhig gis bdag cag gnyis mnan par mthong nas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste bdag cag gnyis gnas 'di nas nyams par gyur gyis bros te 'dong ngo snyam du rig nas skrag ste/_
[\[77b.3\]]bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'bros par brtsams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus nas/_de gnyis kyi mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis gar 'dong /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_
[\[77b.4\]]klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste/_bdag cag gnyis 'di nas nyams par gyur gyis 'bros su 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_tshur shog klu de ci 'dra ba blta'o/_/de gnyis de dang lhan cig phyir log pa dang /_ji tsam na mi snang nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pas bdag 
[\[77b.5\]]cag gnyis la ku re ma bgyis sam/_des smras pa/_de yin no 'o na bdag cag gnyis kyis nongs pa ci bgyis/_rga ba'i chos can khyed gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya 'ongs pa la ma bsams so/_/'phags pa khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags sam/_sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no/_/
[\[77b.6\]]'phags pa gal te khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags na bdag cag gnyis kyis ci bgyi ba stsal du gsol/_tshur shog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga kho nar 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa ma nongs te de bzhin bgyis bzhud do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos klu'i 
[\[77b.7\]]rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du bdag la bka' stsal pa'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' de gnyis ni 'di lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i 
[\[78a.2\]]dbang po khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas klu'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing khyed gnyis da ltar drag shul can/_lag pa khrag gis gos pa/_nyams pa dang /_rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrogs pa/_gzhan gyi srog bcad pas 'tsho bar byed de/_'di nas 
[\[78a.3\]]shi 'phos na khyed gnyis kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis kyis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis tshur shog nga'i 
[\[78a.4\]]drung du skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag long la ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig_/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag len 
[\[78a.5\]]cing ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol to/_/de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[78a.6\]]spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i nang du skyes/_las ci bgyis na des rin 
[\[78a.7\]]po che sna bzhi las bgyis pa'i gnas mngon par grub cing lha'i bdud rtsi'i zas dang sbrang rtsi'i chang gi btung ba dang /_re re la yang 'khor nyis stong lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur/_las ci bgyis na des na bskal par gnas pa sa 'dzin pa/_'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dbyung bar 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rngo mi thog par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di gnyis kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing /_bsags pas 'di gnyis kyis las byas shing /_
[\[78b.2\]]bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las 
[\[78b.3\]]dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/
[\[78b.4\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu gdul ba'i 
[\[78b.5\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na 
[\[78b.6\]]rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_phyi dgra dang nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang mu ge dang bral ba/_sA lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs 
[\[78b.7\]]pa byed du bcug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/rgyal po kr-i kIs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang 
[\[79a.2\]]rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste/_rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad 
[\[79a.3\]]bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo kun du 'gro ba ltar bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong ma dag tu rgyal po kr-i kI bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la shin tu dad pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[79a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kr-i kI'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams 
[\[79a.5\]]dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos na/_rgyal po kr-i kIs stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor 
[\[79a.6\]]rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag 
[\[79a.7\]]gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag 
[\[79b.2\]]bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i 
[\[79b.3\]]pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/zhes smras te stan las langs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum 
[\[79b.4\]]bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo /_/gang gi tshe rgyal po kr-i kIs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na de don gyi gnas su 'dug ste/_blon po dang grong khyer pa dang /_yul mi rnams la smras pa/_
[\[79b.5\]]kwa'i blon po dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_yul mi dag nyon cig_/ngas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong bas da ngas chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug mi nus kyis de'i phyir khyed kyis gzhon nu legs 
[\[79b.6\]]skyes rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por zhog shig_/nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skra dang /_kha spu dag bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de la blon po'i mchog dga' 
[\[79b.7\]]bo dang /_nye dga' zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod pa de gnyis kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lhas mtshan ma tsam 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang bdag cag gnyis kyis chos kyis lha'i rgyal srid bgyid du stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na byed 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]du chug shig_/de gnyis kyis ji srid pa de srid du chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de gnyis kyi nye du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba de dag de gnyis 
[\[80a.2\]]kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis chos kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig_/chos dang chos ma yin pas byed du ma gzhug shig_/sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/de gnyis kyis de dag las thos nas ji srid pa de srid du chos kyis rgyal srid 
[\[80a.3\]]byed du bcug nas yang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de dag yang de gnyis kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis chos kyis rgyal srid byed du chug shig_/chos dang chos ma yin pas byed du ma gzhug shig_/sems can dmyal 
[\[80a.4\]]ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag cag blon po dag ni rgyal srid bgyid du stsol ba gsang tshig mthun pas 'tsho ba lags pas gcig tu chos kyis rgyal srid bgyid du stsol ba'i rngo mi thog ste/_nges par kho nar khyad par 
[\[80a.5\]]can ma lags pa dag ni tshar bcad par bgyi zhing khyad par can dag ni yongs su bskyang bar bgyi 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gal te de lta na yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du chug la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi 
[\[80a.6\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul la/_dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin cig_/dge slong ma rnams la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba byin cig dang /_des khyod gnyis la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyis 
[\[80a.7\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag ma nongs kyis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes de gnyis kyis yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul zhing /_dge slong rnams la ni 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin/_dge slong ma rnams la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba byin no/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kr-i kI'i blon po'i mchog dga' bo dang /_nye dga' zhes bya ba de gnyis ni da ltar klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' 'di gnyis yin 
[\[80b.2\]]te/_de gnyis kyis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa gang yin pa des ni klu rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang 
[\[80b.3\]]bcas pa la phul ba gang yin pa des ni rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i gnas mngon par grub cing lha'i bdud rtsi'i zas dang /_sbrang rtsi'i chang gi btung ba dang /_re re la yang 'khor nyis stong lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur te/_dge slong rnams la gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin pa 
[\[80b.4\]]dang /_dge slong ma rnams la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spang ba byin pa gang yin pa des ni bskal par gnas pa/_sa 'dzin pa 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dbyung bar mi nus par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par 
[\[80b.5\]]smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams 
[\[80b.6\]]spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na de gnyis tshes brgyad 
[\[80b.7\]]dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /_tshes bco lnga la ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de gnyis gang gi tshe mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni gzhal med khang pa'i cha lugs kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing /_gang gi tshe nyin mo 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis nyin mo khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo /_/ji tsam na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang rgyal 
[\[81a.2\]]byed kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo /_/rgyal rigs ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yin pas rgyal po de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba de'i tshe na bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na 'ga' zhig bdag la mngon sum du ldang bar mi 'gyur ba med grang snyam nas mi dag pa'i mtha' 
[\[81a.3\]]can gtong bar byed pa yin pas de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bsdad de mi dag pa'i mtha' can zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed pa ltos shig_/mi dag pa'i mtha' can des lha bka' bzhin 
[\[81a.4\]]'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song 
[\[81a.5\]]ste phyin nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid de de gnyis lha'i yul na gnas pa dag lags gor ma bkum mo/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag de gnyis bdag gi 
[\[81a.6\]]yul na gnas pa yin pas de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na mngon du ldang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[81a.7\]]de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ci lags re zhig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bgyi'am/_'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_klu'i dbang po gnyis re zhig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bkur gyis shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dam pa'i chos la gus par mdzad de dgra bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /_/sangs rgyas gang 
[\[81b.2\]]dag ma byon dang /_/sangs rgyas mya ngan sel mdzad pa/_/da ltar mang po gang bzhugs dag_/thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni/_/gus par gnas gyur gnas 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gus par gnas mdzad de/_/de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/_/de phyir bdag la legs 'dod 
[\[81b.3\]]cing /_/bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pa/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byed na/_/'di la dam chos gus par bya/_/de gnyis kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la mngon du ldang bar ma byas pa dang /_rgyal po khros te bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di gnyis bdag gi yul 
[\[81b.4\]]na gnas pa dag yin na bdag la mngon du ldang bar mi byed do snyam nas de khro bas kun nas dkris bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di khro bas kun nas dkris so snyam nas bka' mchid 
[\[81b.5\]]gzhan dag mdzad par brtsams te chos ston par mi mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/_/bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_
[\[81b.6\]]rab tu dang sems med pa dang /_/zhe sdang can dang 'khrugs pa yis/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs bstan pa yi/_/dam chos kun shes bya mi nus/_/gang gis nyes rtsom btul byas shing /_/rab dang med pa'i sems bsal te/_/kun nas mnar sems 'di spong ba/_/des ni 
[\[81b.7\]]legs gsungs shes par 'gyur/_/rgyal po rgya cher de gnyis la khros te bsams pa/_'di gnyis la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa yang rgyun bkum mo snyam du rig nas sdod cig ces byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'tshal nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/gang gi tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na de gnyis kyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis ri rab kyi bang rim nas mnyan yod kyi bar gyi lam ji srid pa'i lam gyi ngos 
[\[82a.2\]]gnyis su rtsig pa dngar te 'khod par byed do/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyim bdag 'di gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di gnyis kyi mgo bo drungs nas chod la sa la sgyel 
[\[82a.3\]]bar gyis shig_/tshig de skad ces smras pa/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis kyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis thos so/_/thos nas kyang de dag 'khrugs nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi steng du rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang mda' bo che dang /_mtshon 
[\[82a.4\]]rtse gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar brtsams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[82a.5\]]gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las bka' mnyan nas/_byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de 
[\[82a.6\]]la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bye brag gis rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig la sogs pa'i mtshon de dag lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dag tu gyur te/_ko sa lar byung ba'i 
[\[82a.7\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi steng du 'bab par brtsams so/_/de lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dag gis gang bzhin du khyim du zhugs nas des btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang blon po dang khrom gyi ru sna dang /_grong 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]rdal gyi mi dang /_yul mi dang /_bram ze dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs tshun chad nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dag gis gang bzhin du khyim du zhugs pa 'di ci yin su yi mthu yin/_
[\[82b.2\]]de na gang dag snyan pa dang 'jam par smra ba la mkhas pa de dag gis smras pa/_lha gzhan su zhig gis 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur/_'di gzhan su zhig gi mthu lags/_'di ltar lha nyid chos kyis rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bas 'di lha nyid kyi mthu lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[82b.3\]]shes ldan dag de bden te/_da chos kyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug pas 'di gor ma chag par nga'i mthu yin no/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis smras pa/_bdag cag lha las gzhan pa'i skyes pa'i gan du mi mchi zhing bdag po las mi 'phyo bas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so/_/
[\[82b.4\]]gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag yab yum la gus shing sri zhu che bas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag chos kyis lha'i rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so/_/khrom gyi ru sna dag gis 
[\[82b.5\]]smras pa/_bdag cag lha'i bka' chos dang ldan par sgrub par bgyid pas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so/_/grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag lha la chos dang ldan par dpya 'bul bas 'di ni bdag cag gi mthu lags so/_/rgyal 
[\[82b.6\]]pos bsams pa/_'di dag so so nas bdag cag gi mthu'o/_/bdag gi mthu'o zhes zer na su'i mthu yin pa mi shes kyis/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_mkhyen pa dang shes bya la bla na med pa'i 
[\[82b.7\]]mnga' brnyes pa yin gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhur 'gro'o snyam du rig nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba de dag gis thu ba bkang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal
