[\[83a.2\]]po chen po de ni khyod kyi mthu yang ma yin/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yang ma yin/_gzhon nu rnams kyi yang ma yin/_blon po rnams kyi yang ma yin/_khrom gyi ru sna'i yang ma yin/_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams kyi yang ma yin/_bram ze rnams kyi yang ma yin te/_'di ltar 
[\[83a.3\]]de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen po'i mthu yin te/_gal te dge slong maud gal gyi bu chen pos khyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang bcas pa la ma bsams su zin na deng nyid du mnyan yod spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba zhig 
[\[83a.4\]]na/_de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu des khyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul mi dang bcas pa la bsams pa'i mthu yin gyis de la sems mngon par dad par gyis shig_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar dge 
[\[83a.5\]]slong maud gal gyi bu'i mthu lags shing bcom ldan 'das kyi yang ma lags nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gi yang ma lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_rgyal po chen po de ni nga'i mthu yang ma yin/_nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gi yang ma yin te/_'di ltar de ni dge slong maud gal 
[\[83a.6\]]gyi bu'i mthu yin no/_/gal te khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za na lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba 'di dag sa la bor zhig_/des de dag sa la bor ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_mda' bo che dang /_
[\[83a.7\]]mtshon rtse gcig la sogs pa'i mtshon sha stag tu gyur to/_/des de dag mthong nas nyam nga bar gyur te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]la rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyed pas de las 'di byung ngo /_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyed par lta ga la 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po ngas khyod la dran par bya'o/_/btsun 
[\[83b.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dran par mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nga'i mdun du khyim bdag gnyis shig chos nyan pa gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa de dran nam/_bcom ldan 'das de dran no/_/rgyal po chen po khyim bdag de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal 
[\[83b.3\]]po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis yin no/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de gnyis 'khrugs par ma gyur tam/_rgyal po chen po de gnyis ni 'khrugs par ma gyur te/_de gnyis kyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag 'khrugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis 
[\[83b.4\]]la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_rgyal po chen po bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de gnyis ni ri rab kyi bang rim na mchis la/_bdag ni 'di na mchis na bdag gis ji ltar de gnyis la bzod pa gsol bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[83b.5\]]po chen po de gnyis tshes brgyad dang /_tshes bcu bzhi dang /_tshes bco lnga la nga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'dir 'ong gis khyod kyang tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang /_tshes bco lnga la 'dir shog shig dang ngas khyod la de gnyis bstan par bya'i khyod kyis bzod pa gsol cig_/
[\[83b.6\]]des gsol pa/_btsun pa ci lags bdag gis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/_'di ltar mi ma rabs dag gi rkang pa la 
[\[83b.7\]]phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni mi gtso bo dag gis lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyis khyod kyis lag pa g.yas pa rkyong la klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces bzod pa gsol cig dang de gnyis bzod par 'gyur ro/_/des gsol pa/_btsun pa ma nongs 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]te de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs nas bdag nyid khyim bdag gi cha lugs su mngon par 
[\[84a.2\]]sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[84a.3\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la brda mdzad do/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste smras pa/_klu'i dbang po 
[\[84a.4\]]gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis la bzod pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[84a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la mchod pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bdag gi sdum par dgung bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[84a.6\]]ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas des blon po 
[\[84a.7\]]rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag ngas 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mchod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhag bdun du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la gdugs tshod sta gon gyis shig_/rgyal po rnams 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ni tshig gis 'grub pa yin la/_lha rnams ni sems kyis 'grub pa yin/_rnal 'byor pa rnams ni sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas blon po rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[84b.2\]]dang mnyan yod kyi bar gyi lam ji srid pa dag mchog tu mdzes par byas shing mnyan yod kyang rdo ba dang gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam par gnas par byas te/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab cing bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nye bar bzhag ste dar gyi chun po'i tshogs dpyangs 
[\[84b.3\]]shing rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ste me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ltar nyams dga' bar byas so/_/zhal zas kyang kha dog dang /_dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/_skyu rum sna tshogs dang bcas pa/_spyan gzigs sna tshogs 
[\[84b.4\]]kyis mdzes par byas pa bshams nas 'byor pa de lta bu 'dis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol to/_/de na mtshan mo khur ba 'tshod pa dag tu me shor nas des ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che 
[\[84b.5\]]yan lag mchog dang ldan pa mang po dag tshig par gyur to/_/de nas gdugs tshod zhag bdun thal nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan yod du dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug nas mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o/_/gang me sbar bar byed na de kAr 
[\[84b.6\]]ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas bcad par bya ba'am/_phyag sbal du bcug ste 'chi bar bya dgos so zhes bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe na mnyan yod na khyim bdag bzang byin zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor 
[\[84b.7\]]dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag bzang byin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 
[\[85a.2\]]'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[85a.3\]]dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag bzang byin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 
[\[85a.4\]]dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag bzang byin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag bzang byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 
[\[85a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag bzang byin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas te nang par sngar langs nas gdan dag bshams te chu ra bzhag nas/_
[\[85a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong gi 
[\[85a.7\]]tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag bzang byin gyi khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag bzang byin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs 
[\[85b.2\]]nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang rang 
[\[85b.3\]]bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar khyim bdag bzang byin chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag 
[\[85b.4\]]par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi 
[\[85b.5\]]pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris 
[\[85b.6\]]dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan 
[\[85b.7\]]song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa mdzad nas 
[\[86a.2\]]gshegs so/_/khyim bdag bzang byin chung ma dang bcas pas gang gi nyin mo bden pa mthong bar byas pa de'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/khyim bdag bzang byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gzhan du spyan 
[\[86a.3\]]drangs te bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag bzang byin chung ma dang bcas pa la gang thos nas de gnyis kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/gang gi nyin mo 
[\[86a.4\]]khyim bdag bzang byin chung ma dang bcas pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs pa de'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la bu btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_gsal ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/_mgo gdugs 
[\[86a.5\]]lta bu dang ldan pa lag pa ring ba/_'phral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'jar ba/_sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed 
[\[86a.6\]]do/_/nye du dag gis smras pa/_gang gi phyir khye'u 'di'i pha ma gnyis kyis nyi ma gang la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa'i nyi ma de la btsas pas de'i phyir khye'u'i ming rdzu 'phrul len ces bya'o zhes de'i ming rdzu 'phrul len ces 
[\[86a.7\]]bya bar btags so/_/khye'u rdzu 'phrul len pa ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do/_/de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo/_gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/_skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/_/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_grangs dang rtsis dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang /_
[\[86b.2\]]gzhug pa dang /_bzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing /_'byed pa dang klog pa dang /_mkhas pa dang spyod pa gsal ba dang /_brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste/_rin po che brtag pa dang /_gzhi brtag pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_shing brtag pa dang /_glang 
[\[86b.3\]]po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_bud med brtag pa dang /_skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to/_/de ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi drung du song ba dang /_de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa nas de 
[\[86b.4\]]la me tog gi phreng ba 'phangs so/_/'jig rten ni mdza' bshes dang /_dgra bo dang /_tha mal pa yin pas ji tsam na gzhan dag gis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/_lha gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len ni lha'i btsun mo'i 'khor don du gnyer ro/_/rgyal po 
[\[86b.5\]]dag ni mi rtog par byed pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag ngas khyim bdag bzang byin gyi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len yongs su btang ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis de ka ra bI ra'i me tog gi phreng bas mgul pa bcings te gos sngon po gyon pa'i mi dag bkri nas 
[\[86b.6\]]grong khyer gyi dbus nas phyir byung ste bsad sar phyin nas gsod du bcug go/_/mnyan yod kyi skye bo'i tshogs dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i mi dag gis rgyal po sdig can 'di ni ma brtags par byed pa ngan pa yin te/_des khyim bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul 
[\[86b.7\]]len khon med pa/_'gran mi tshol ba/_mi 'khu ba bsad do zhes brjod do/_/de bzhin du btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po rnams kyis kyang ngan pa des khyim bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len khon med pa/_'gran mi tshol ba/_mi 'khu ba 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]bsad pa ni legs pa ma byas so/_/shin tu ma byas so zhes brjod do/_/khyim bdag bzang byin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis bdog cing bdag dbang ba su la yang yongs su ma btang ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len la ltos pa yin na 
[\[87a.2\]]de ni sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas rgyal pos ma brtags par lnga pa nyid du bsgrubs pas da su'i phyir bcad par bya ste/_dman pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dag la yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam nas de kAr+ShA pa Na gcig cig zong gi rgyur bzhag nas 
[\[87a.3\]]nor gyi rnam pa gzhan thams cad dman pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dag la yongs su btang ngo /_/des kAr+ShA pa Na gcig po des zong nyos shing btsongs pas des kAr+ShA pa Na bzhi rnyed nas des kAr+ShA pa Na gcig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang 
[\[87a.4\]]spos kyi byug pas byugs so/_/gnyis pas ni g.yog 'khor gyi zan sbyar to/_/gsum pas ni dge 'dun gyi phyir dge slong la chos ston byin to/_/bzhi pa ni zong gi rgyur bzhag go/_/de'i khyim na longs spyod srabs pa'i phyir sbyin pa ngan pa dag kyang sbyin par byed/_mchog tu ngan 
[\[87a.5\]]pa dag kyang sbyin par byed pas de'i ming ngan pa bzang byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim 
[\[87a.6\]]bdag ngan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyi khyim na sbyin pa dag byin nam/_bsod nams byed dam/_btsun pa de bzhin te/_bdag gi sdum pa na sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cing bsod nams dag kyang bgyid na/_de dag ni ngan pa dag dang mchog 
[\[87a.7\]]tu ngan pa dag lags so/_/khyim bdag sbyin pa ngan pa'am/_bzang po sbyin yang rung ste/_de gnyi ga longs spyod kyi rnam par smin pa can yin no/_/khyim bdag sbyin pa ngan pa'am/_bzang po sbyin yang rung ste/_de yang dad pas ma yin/_gus pas ma yin/_rang gi lag 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]nas ma yin/_dus su ma yin/_gnod pa med pa ma yin/_gang gi tshe de'i rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na de'i sems khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur/_zas kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur/_gos kyi longs spyod rgya 
[\[87b.2\]]chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur/_gnas mal gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur/_bzhon pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur/_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rgya chen po dag la 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_khyim bdag sbyin 
[\[87b.3\]]pa de lta bu byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni de lta bur 'dod par bya'o/_/khyim bdag sbyin pa ngan pa'am/_bzang po sbyin yang rung ste/_de yang dad pas yin/_gus pas yin/_rang gi lag nas yin/_dus su yin/_gnod pa med pa yin na/_gang gi tshe de'i 
[\[87b.4\]]rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na de'i sems khyim gyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par 'gyur/_zas kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par 'gyur/_gos kyi longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par 'gyur/_gnas mal gyi longs spyod rgya chen 
[\[87b.5\]]po dag la 'jug par 'gyur/_bzhon pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po dag la 'jug par 'gyur/_gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rgya chen po dag la 'jug par 'gyur te/_khyim bdag sbyin pa de lta bu byin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni de lta bur 'dod par bya'o//_//
[\[87b.6\]]'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po drug bcu rtsa dgu pa/_khyim bdag sngon byung ba bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig byung bar gyur te/_des bram ze rnams la sbyin pa 'di lta bu 'di byin te glang po che gser gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyis mdzes 
[\[87b.7\]]par byas pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/rta gser gyis brgyan pa/_gser gyis mdzes par byas pa/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa brgyad 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/shing rta rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa dang /_seng ge'i pags pas g.yogs pa dang /_stag lpags kyis g.yogs pa dang /_gung 
[\[88a.2\]]lpags kyis g.yogs pa dang /_ar mo nig gis bkab pa/_rnam par rgyal byed yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/khang pa brtsegs pa rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya 
[\[88a.3\]]las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/khri rnam bzhi gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa/_shur bus blas pa/_stan sbyar ma 
[\[88a.4\]]bting ba/_stan nang tshangs can bting ba/_stan khra bo bting ba/_stan chen po bting ba/_stan bzang po bting ba/_su mtshan gyi gos kyi steng g.yogs bting ba/_steng nas bgo ba'i gos dang bcas pa/_gnyis su rgyab rten dmar po bzhag pa'i khri brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams 
[\[88a.5\]]la sbyin par byin no/_/gser gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/dngul gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/gser gyi snod dngul phyes gang ba brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/dngul gyi snod gser phyes 
[\[88a.6\]]gang ba brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/ras zung rnam bzhi ka shi ka'i ras phran dang /_zar ma'i ras phran dang /_du gu la'i ras phran dang /_ko tam pa'i ras phran zung brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/ba gser gyi rwa can rmig 
[\[88a.7\]]pa dngul las byas pa be'u mthun pa dang bcas pa khar ba'i ze ba can/_ras bcos bu phrugs kyis g.yogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/bu mo gser gyi dpung rgyan can mgul rgyan dang bcas pa/_rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]stong bram ze rnams la sbyin par byin no/_/zas dang skom dang bca' ba dang bza' ba dang bldag pa dang /_bzhib pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bram ze rnams la sbyin par de lta bu de byin no/_/khyim bdag bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa 
[\[88b.2\]]de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_
[\[88b.3\]]gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis so so'i skye bo 'dzam bu'i tshal du 'ongs pa gcig la zan bza' ba byin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta 
[\[88b.4\]]bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin 
[\[88b.5\]]pa de ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun 
[\[88b.6\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de 
[\[88b.7\]]lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_
[\[89a.2\]]gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong 
[\[89a.3\]]ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin 
[\[89a.4\]]pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan 
[\[89a.5\]]gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 
[\[89a.6\]]'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum 
[\[89a.7\]]du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de 
[\[89b.2\]]byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan 
[\[89b.3\]]gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa 
[\[89b.4\]]dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[89b.5\]]phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong 
[\[89b.6\]]ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang 
[\[89b.7\]]gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa gcig zan byin pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa 
[\[90a.2\]]dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[90a.3\]]phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba gang yin pa ni 
[\[90a.4\]]sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs 
[\[90a.5\]]pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba 
[\[90a.6\]]brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[90a.7\]]dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba dang /_gang gis kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun 
[\[90b.2\]]du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan 
[\[90b.3\]]byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 
[\[90b.4\]]phul ba dang /_gang gis kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu dag phul ba gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa de bas 
[\[90b.5\]]sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[90b.6\]]sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[90b.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba dang /_gang gis kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs 
[\[91a.2\]]can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu dag phul ba dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris dang mthun pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul ba dang /_sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab 
[\[91a.3\]]pa'i gzhi dag len pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang 
[\[91a.4\]]gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 
[\[91a.5\]]'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis 
[\[91a.6\]]dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba dang /_gang gis kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang khri'u dang /_
[\[91a.7\]]stan dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu dag phul ba dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris dang mthun pa'i mchod sbyin phul ba dang /_gang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag len pa dang /_gang gis sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad la byams pa'i sems bsgom pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/khyim bdag bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dus dpog gis 
[\[91b.2\]]bram ze rnams la sbyin pa de lta bu de byin pa dang /_gang gis phyi rol pa'i drang srong 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa brgya 
[\[91b.3\]]zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis lan gcig phyir 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa 
[\[91b.4\]]dang /_gang gis phyir mi 'ong ba brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis dgra bcom pa brgya zan byin pa dang /_gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba phul ba 
[\[91b.5\]]dang /_gang gis kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug pa dang /_gang gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang khri'u dang /_stan dang stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu dag phul ba dang /_gang gis gtsug 
[\[91b.6\]]lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris dang mthun pa'i mchod sbyin phul ba dang /_gang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag len pa dang /_gang gis sems can srog chags 'byung 
[\[91b.7\]]po thams cad la byams pa'i sems sgom pa dang /_gang 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_zad par rjes su lta/_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta/_'gog par rjes su lta/_spong bar rjes su lta zhing gnas pa gang yin pa ni sbyin pa 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]de bas sbyin pa 'di ches 'bras bu che'o/_/khyim bdag de lta bas na khyod kyis 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad la mi rtag par rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa dang zad par rjes su lta/_'dod chags dang bral bar rjes su lta/_'gog par rjes su lta/_spong bar 
[\[92a.2\]]rjes su lta zhing gnas par bya'o/_/zhes bslab par bya ste/_khyim bdag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rangs pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[92a.3\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi khyim na mtshan mo mar me sbar te sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog pa na rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba grong khyer nyul ba dag gis sgo gtan gyi bu gu nas de mthong nas/_de dag gis de la smras 
[\[92a.4\]]pa/_khyim bdag rgyal pos dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o/_/gang sbar bar byed pa de kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i chad pas bcad par bya ba'am/_phyag sbal du bcug ste 'chi bar bya'o zhes bka' btags na khyod kyis ci'i phyir 
[\[92a.5\]]mtshan mo me sbar/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ni me ma yin te mar me yin no/_/khyim bdag ci 'dis me'i bya ba byed mi nus sam/_yang na ni kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu phul cig_/yang na ni phyag sbal na 'dug shig_/shes ldan dag kho bo la kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i 'byor pa ga la 
[\[92a.6\]]yod/_phyag sbal du 'dug go/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi phyag sbal ni rim pa gsum yod de/_mi gtso bo gang dag yin pa de dag ni steng rim du 'jog par byed/_mi bar ma gang dag yin pa de dag ni bar du 'jog par byed/_mi ngan pa gang dag yin pa 
[\[92a.7\]]de dag ni gting du 'jog par byed pas de mi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir de dag gis steng rim du bzhag go/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi mtshan mo'i thun dang po la khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug_/des smras pa/_nye dbang dag kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go/_/ci'i phyir kAr+ShA pa Na drug 
[\[92b.2\]]bcu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug go/_/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig_/khyod kyi khyim mam/_chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang /_gser gyis dgang bar bya/_nye dbang dag khyed snying las chung ngur gyis shig 
[\[92b.3\]]dang /_bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o/_/de dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug pa na de dag gi lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhi 'bar 
[\[92b.4\]]ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag 'dra'o/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan mo'i thun dang po la phyag sbal na me'i phung po chen po bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig 
[\[92b.5\]]tu gyur cing sreg pa dag mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mtshan mo'i gung thun la khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin 
[\[92b.6\]]na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug_/des smras pa/_kau shi ka kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go/_/ci'i phyir/_kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir 
[\[92b.7\]]phyag sbal na 'dug go/_/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig_/khyod kyi khyim mam/_chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang /_gser gyis dgang bar bya/_kau shi ka khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o/_/de chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug pa na de'i lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu 
[\[93a.2\]]gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 'dra'o/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan mo'i gung thun la phyag sbal na me'i phung po 
[\[93a.3\]]chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa mthong 
[\[93a.4\]]ngo /_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal 
[\[93a.5\]]na 'dug_/des smras pa/_tshangs pa kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go/_/ci'i phyir/_kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir te/_kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug go/_/
[\[93a.6\]]khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig_/khyod kyi khyim mam/_chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang /_gser gyis dgang bar bya/_tshangs pa khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang /_bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[93a.7\]]te 'dod na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o/_/de chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug pa na de'i lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa bas kyang ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar 
[\[93b.2\]]ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa 'dra'o/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la phyag sbal na me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags 
[\[93b.3\]]pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa bas kyang ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa mthong 
[\[93b.4\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang phyag sbal srung ba'i mi mngag pas bkug ste smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje ngas dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o zhes bsgo na/_nga nyid kyi phyag sbal na mdang mtshan mo thog thag me'i phung po chen po sbar ba de ci'i phyir/_
[\[93b.5\]]des smras pa/_lha sus kyang mtshan mo phyag sbal du zhugs me sbar te/_lhas der ci zhig gzigs ma 'tshal to/_/rgyal pos zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag deng la ci bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa phyag sbal rtogs shig_/de dag dong ste phyag sbal brtags na thal ba yang 
[\[93b.6\]]mi snang nas/_de dag phyir log ste rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis phyag sbal brtags na thal ba yang mi gda'o/_/rgyal pos phyag sbal srung ba'i mi la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje de na mi gtso bo gang 'dug_/lha khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin mchis so/_/de bos shig_/
[\[93b.7\]]des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes de bos pa dang /_rgyal pos de la smras pa/_khyim bdag ngas dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste sus kyang mnyan yod du mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o zhes bsgo na khyod kyis ci'i phyir/_phyag sbal du mtshan thog thag me sbar/_des smras pa/_lha bdag 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]gis yud tsam yang zhugs ma bltam na mtshan thog thag lta ci smos/_khyim bdag nga nyid kyis mtshan mo'i thun dang po la me'i phung po chen po bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag dang /_mtshan mo'i gung 
[\[94a.2\]]thun la me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur 
[\[94a.3\]]cing sreg pa dang mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la me'i phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 
[\[94a.4\]]'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas kyang ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa mthong bzhin du khyod na re de skad ces bdag gis yud tsam yang me ma 
[\[94a.5\]]sbar na mtshan thog thag lta ci smos zhes zer na de ci yin/_lha de ni mad de/_bdag gis ni mtshan mo zhugs ma sbar mod kyi 'di ltar mdang mtshan mo'i thun dang po la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 
[\[94a.6\]]'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchis nas/_bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces nye dbang dag kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go zhes bgyis pa dang /_
[\[94a.7\]]de dag bdag la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mchis nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir te/_kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug go zhes bgyis na/_de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]tshig brjod cig khyod kyi khyim mam/_chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang /_gser gyis dgang bar bya zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces nye dbang dag snying las chung ngur gyis shig_/bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 
[\[94b.2\]]'dod na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang /_de dag chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag gi mdun du mchis pa na/_de dag gi lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs kyi phung po chen po bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_
[\[94b.3\]]me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag 'dra'o/_/de nas mtshan mo'i gung thun la lha'i dbang po brgya byin bdag ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas/_bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin na ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchis 
[\[94b.4\]]nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kau shi ka kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go zhes bgyis pa dang /_de bdag la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad 
[\[94b.5\]]ces kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug go zhes bgyis na/_de bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la tshig brjod cig dang /_khyod kyi khyim mam/_chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang gser gyis 
[\[94b.6\]]dgang bar bya zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kau shi ka khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang /_bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang /_de chos 
[\[94b.7\]]mnyan pa'i slad du bdag gi mdun du mchis pa na de'i lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs kyi phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag 'dra'o/_/de nas mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bdag ga la ba der mchis te/_phyin nas bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag 
[\[95a.2\]]khyod phyag sbal na 'dug pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin na/_ci'i phyir khyod phyag sbal na 'dug ces mchis nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces tshangs pa kho bo rang dbang gis phyag sbal na 'dug pa ma yin te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag gis phyag sbal du bcug go zhes 
[\[95a.3\]]bgyis pa dang /_de bdag la 'di skad ces ci'i phyir zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces kAr+ShA pa Na drug bcu'i phyir te kho bo la de dag gi 'byor pa med pas de'i phyir phyag sbal na 'dug go zhes bgyis na/_de bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod sems bskyed la 
[\[95a.4\]]tshig brjod cig_/khyod kyi khyim mam chu'i gnas gang dag dbyig dang /_gser gyis dgang bar bya zhes mchis nas/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces tshangs pa khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang /_bdag la rgyal po dad pas dad pa'i dbang du bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod 
[\[95a.5\]]na 'dug shig dang khyod la chos bstan par bya'o zhes bgyis pa dang /_de chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag gi mdun du mchis pa na de'i lus 'di 'dra ste/_'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs kyi phung po chen po snga ma bzhi 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig 
[\[95a.6\]]tu gyur cing sreg pa dag pas ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba/_rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa bas kyang ches 'phags pa dang /_ches gya nom pa'i zhugs kyi phung po chen po 'bar ba/_
[\[95a.7\]]rab tu 'bar ba/_kun du rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa dag 'dra'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta na ngas kyang khyod la dam pa sbyin gyis ci 'dod pa smros shig_/des smras pa/_lha gal te khyod bdag la thugs dad na bdag dgung la 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]zhugs mar gyi 'od la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod 'ba' zhig la gnang bar ma zad kyi 'di ltar khyod nyid la brten nas/_gzhan gang dag mtshan mo me mar gyi 'od la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par 'dod pa thams cad la 
[\[95b.2\]]yang gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin rgyal pos btang bas dga' mgu rab tu dga' ste rgyal po'i drung nas song nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/ko 
[\[95b.3\]]sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/rgyal rigs ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yin pas des rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgor bsdad de mi dag pa'i mtha' can zhig la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje song la bcom ldan 
[\[95b.4\]]'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed pa ltos shig_/mi dag pa'i mtha' can des lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur 
[\[95b.5\]]byed pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[95b.6\]]bsams pa/_khyim bdag de bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin pas des bdag mthong na mngon du ldang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas/_de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal thag ring po kho na nas 
[\[95b.7\]]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ci lags/_re zhig dam pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur bgyi'am/_'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag re zhig dam 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]pa'i chos la bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dam pa'i chos la gus par mdzad de dgra bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas gang 
[\[96a.2\]]dag 'das pa dang /_/sangs rgyas gang dag ma byon dang /_/sangs rgyas mya ngan sel mdzad pa/_/da ltar mang po gang bzhugs dag_/thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni/_/gus par gnas gyur gnas 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin gus par gnas mdzad de/_/de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/_/
[\[96a.3\]]de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing /_/bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byed na/_/'di la dam chos gus par bya/_/khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa dang /_rgyal po khros te bsams 
[\[96a.4\]]pa/_khyim bdag 'di bdag gi yul na gnas pa yin na bdag la mngon du ldang ba mi byed do snyam nas/_de khro bas kun nas dkris bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di khro bas kun nas 
[\[96a.5\]]dkris so snyam du mkhyen nas/_bka' mchid gzhan dag mdzad par brtsams te chos ston par mi mdzad pa dang /_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa chos bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[96a.6\]]kyis de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_rab tu dang sems med pa dang /_/zhe sdang can dang 'khrugs pa yis/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs bstan pa yi/_/dam chos kun shes bya mi nus/_/gang gis nyes rtsom btul byas shing /_/rab dang med pa'i sems bsal te/_/
[\[96a.7\]]kun nas mnar sems 'dir spong ba/_/des ni legs gsungs shes par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_khyim bdag 'di la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa yang rgyun bkum mo snyam nas/_de la rgya cher khro ba'i sems skyes te sdod cig ces byas nas/_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga 
[\[96b.2\]]nas phyir byung ba de'i tshe de la khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces bsgo shig_/de nas lha gang khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la mngon par dad pa des srog chags tre ma bu ka dang /_trai la ta ka mang po dag btang nas de dag gis rgyal po de kun nas bskor te zin pa na de nyam nga bas 
[\[96b.3\]]rang gi khyim du phyin cing der btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang khrom gyi ru sna dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dag kyang kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur/_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[96b.4\]]po skrag ste myur ba myur bar glang po che la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal 
[\[96b.5\]]rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa re zhig de'i tshe yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' gnyis/_'khrugs par gyur na da su zhig 'khrugs lags/_rgyal po chen po ji ltar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das bdag srog chags tre ma bu ka dang /_trai la ta ka dag gis 
[\[96b.6\]]kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur/_mchis 'brang gi 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_khrom gyi ru sna dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dag kyang kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur/_mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang kun nas bskor cing zin par gyur to/_/
[\[96b.7\]]rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin la rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags khyim bdag de 'khrugs par gyur tam/_rgyal po chen po de ni phyir mi 'ong ba yin pas 'khrugs pa skyed par mi byed de/_'di ltar lha gang de la mngon par 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]dad pa de 'khrugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de la bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags bdag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am/_rgyal po 
[\[97a.2\]]chen po rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/_'di ltar mi ma rabs dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni mi gtso bo dag gis lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyis/_khyod kyis lag pa g.yas pa rkyong la khyim bdag bzod par gyis shig ces bzod pa gsol cig 
[\[97a.3\]]dang des bzod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod pa dang rjes su yi rang ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[97a.4\]]spyan snga nas song ngo /_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag sdums byed dang /_tshul khrims tshong dpon zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod do/_/de na gtams pa srung ba rnams la ni sdums byed drang po yin/_gcig pus che bzhi 'byed pa rnams la ni tshul khrims tshong dpon drang po yin la/_de 
[\[97a.5\]]yang ngo tsha dang ldan pas bshang ba'i sar thag ring du 'gro ba yin no/_/mnyan yod na ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag 'khod pa de dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des btsal 
[\[97a.6\]]mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do/_/de dag las gcig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag sdums byed 'di gtams pa 'dzin pa yin pas 'di la brgal zhing brtag par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_
[\[97a.7\]]ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya ste/_'di ltar khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon 'di gcig pus che bzhi 'byed pa rnams la drang ba yin la/_de yang ngo tsha dang ldan pas bshang ba'i sar thag ring du 'gro bas de bzung ste bsdigs na des che bzhi 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis de'i 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]bya ra byas te/_de bshang ba'i sar song ba bzung nas bsdigs te smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod gson nam 'chi/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis ji ltar bsams pa'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta na kho bo cag khyim bdag sdums byed la nor brgya'am 
[\[97b.2\]]stong gis rgol zhing rtog gis khyod kyis che bzhi phye shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci yang dag pas sam/_yang dag pa ma yin pas/_khyim bdag yang dag pa ma yin pas so/_/shes ldan dag kho bo yang dag pa ma yin pas che bzhi mi 'byed de/_kho bos tshe gcig gi 
[\[97b.3\]]sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te re zhig che bzhi 'byed na de lta na legs/_gal te mi 'byed na kho bo cag gis khyod mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel bar bya'o/_/des tshigs 
[\[97b.4\]]su bcad pa smras pa/_kho bo chos la gnas na myur du shi yang bla/_/chos la rgyab kyis phyogs na gson par ma gyur cig_/chos la gnas pa sum bcu lha yi bde ba spyod/_/chos las nyams pa mi bzad 'jigs pa'i ngan song ltung /_/de nas ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can de dag 
[\[97b.5\]]gis khyim bdag de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag cag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig_/des smras pa sbyin no/_/ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te dong ngo /_/mnyan yod na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[97b.6\]]gsal rgyal gyi nu bo rgyal bu nag po zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/_dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba zhig 'dug pa de yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong 
[\[97b.7\]]la nye bar gnas pa'i gan du bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig 'ongs te/_rigs pas bskyed pa ma yin pas mgron du gnyer ba ni des de dang du ma blangs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin dang /_khyim bdag sdums byed dang /_khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]dpon dang /_rgyal bu nag po rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal 
[\[98a.2\]]po'i mthu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[98a.3\]]stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin ni 'di yin no/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas smras pa/_khyim bdag bzod pa mdzod cig_/khyim bdag gis smras pa lha bzod par 'tshal lo/_/de 
[\[98a.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba lags na bdag gis bdag gi yul na gnas pa'i 'bangs la bzod pa gsol ba gang lags pa de ngo mtshar mi che 
[\[98a.5\]]'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rje dpon gyis bzod pa gsol ba ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag la kAR+ShA pa Na gcig mchis pa des bdag 
[\[98a.6\]]gis zong mjal cing btsongs nas de las kAR+ShA pa Na bzhi grub cing de dag las gcig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang du spos kyi byug pas byugs/_gnyis pa ni dge 'dun gyi slad du dge slong mchod ston stsal/_gsum pas ni g.yog 'khor gyi 'tsho ba sbyar/_bzhi pa 
[\[98a.7\]]ni zong gi rin du bzhag ste/_btsun pa bdag ni nor ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa gang lags pa de ngo mtshar mi che'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag nor med pa'i sbyin pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag slad rol du mchis pa dang /_ston zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]g.yon can dag gis bzung nas bsdigs te/_de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag ci khyod gson nam 'chi zhes mchi nas bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces shes ldan dag 
[\[98b.2\]]khyed kyis ji ltar bsams pa'o zhes bgyis pa dang /_de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag gal te de lta na kho bo cag khyim bdag sdums byed la nor brgya'am/_stong gis rgol zhing rtog gis khyod kyis che bzhi phye shig ces mchi nas/_bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces shes 
[\[98b.3\]]ldan dag ci yang dag pas sam/_yang dag pa ma yin pas zhes bgyis na/_de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag yang dag pa ma yin pas so zhes mchi nas/_bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces shes ldan dag kho bo yang dag pa ma yin pas che bzhi mi 'byed de/_kho bos tshe gcig 
[\[98b.4\]]gi sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus so zhes bgyis pa dang /_de dag bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag gal te re zhig che bzhi 'byed na de lta na legs/_gal te mi 'byed na kho bo cag gis khyod mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel 
[\[98b.5\]]bar bya'o zhes mchi nas/_bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces/_kho bo chos la gnas na myur du shi yang bla/_/chos la rgyab kyis phyogs na gson par ma gyur cig_/chos la gnas pa sum bcu lha yi bde ba spyod/_/chos las nyams pa mi bzad 'jigs pa'i ngan song ltung /_/
[\[98b.6\]]zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bdag gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_bdag la 'di skad ces khyim bdag bdag cag la mi 'jigs pa stsol cig ces mchi nas/_bdag gis de dag la 'di skad ces sbyin no zhes bgyis te/_btsun pa bdag phongs par gyur pas kyang chos yongs su 
[\[98b.7\]]ma btang ste/_bdag gis phongs par gyur pa na chos spyad pa ngo mtshar mi che'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag phongs par gyur pa na chos spyad pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bu nag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag yan 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa'i gan du bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig mchis nas rigs pas bskyed pa ma lags pas mgron du gnyer ba na bdag gis de dang du ma blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag nor mang la 'dod pa dag las dben pa de ngo 
[\[99a.2\]]mtshar mi che'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzhon nu nor mang la 'dod pa dag las dben pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_rje dpon bzod gsol nor med sbyin pa dang /_/phongs par gyur pa 
[\[99a.3\]]chos spyod byed pa dang /_/nor mang 'dod pa dag las dben byed pa/_/bzhi po de dag shin tu bya dka' yin/_/de nas khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin dang /_khyim bdag sdums byed dang /_khyim bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon dang /_rgyal bu nag po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[99a.4\]]la chos mngon pa dang /_'dul ba mngon pa'i zhu ba zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gong nas gong du bka' lan stsal pa dang /_ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de dag gi gdong du lta zhing 'dug ste/_des yud tsam zhig chos dang ldan pa'i gtam mnyan 
[\[99a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_stan las langs nas song ste/_de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa/_phreng ldan ma deng khyim bdag ngan pa bzang byin dang /_khyim bdag sdums byed dang /_khyim 
[\[99a.6\]]bdag tshul khrims tshong dpon dang /_rgyal bu nag po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la chos mngon pa dang /_'dul ba mngon pa'i zhu ba zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag la gong nas gong du lan bka' stsal pa dang /_nga yang de dag gi gdong du lta zhing kha rog 
[\[99a.7\]]par 'dug 'dug nas langs te song ngo /_/phreng ldan mas smras pa/_lha khyod kyis kyang ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la ma zhus/_phreng ldan ma nga ni thos pa nyung ba yin la/_de dag ni thos pa mang ba yin pas ngas ci zhig zhur yod/_lha khyod kyang ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi bka' 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]klog par mi mdzad/_phreng ldan ma nga rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag la rtag tu brel bas ji ltar klog_/gal te khyod 'ga' zhig las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog na ngas mtshan mo khyod las bklag par bya'o/_/lha de ltar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos btsun mo rgyal rigs 
[\[99b.2\]]dbyar tshul ma la smras pa/_khyod su las klog_/des smras pa/_lha 'phags pa shA ri'i bu las so/_/btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa/_khyod su las klog_/des smras pa/_lha 'phags pa 'char ka las so/_/de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[99b.3\]]shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma 'phags pa las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par 'tshal na/_klog tu stsal bar 
[\[99b.4\]]gsol/_des smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom 
[\[99b.5\]]ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di skad ces rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma klog tu stsol cig ces mchi na/_bdag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[99b.6\]]shA ri'i bu klog tu chug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la lha klog tu stsal to zhes khas blangs so/_/rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char 
[\[99b.7\]]ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa phreng ldan ma 'phags pa las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]'tshal na klog tu stsal par gsol/_des smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' 
[\[100a.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di skad ces phreng ldan ma klog tu stsol cig ces mchi na/_bdag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[100a.3\]]'char ka klog tu chug shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la lha klog tu stsol to zhes khas blangs nas/_rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu pa/_
[\[100a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni dus shes pa dang /_dus rig pa yin pas de dus su song nas rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma klog tu 'jug gi dus ma yin par mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ni dus mi shes pa dang /_dus mi rig pa yin pas dus su yang song ste phreng ldan ma klog tu 'jug 
[\[100a.5\]]la/_dus ma yin par yang 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ri brags gzhan zhig tu bya ba cung zhig byung nas de mtshan mo nyid du langs te der 'phags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka glang po che'i sgra dang /_rta'i sgra dang /_dung gi 
[\[100a.6\]]sgras sad nas des bsams pa/_btsun mo phreng ldan ma la bzlas pa sbyin du 'gro'o snyam nas/_de rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor song ba dang sgo bas smras pa/_'phags pa dus ma lags par rgyal po'i pho brang du ma 'jug par re zhig gzhes la slad kyis zhugs shig_/de khros te 
[\[100a.7\]]smras pa/_bkren pa ji srid du gsus po che 'di gson pa de srid du kho bo 'dir dus su yang 'jug la/_dus ma yin par yang 'jug go/_/'di shi na 'dir gdol pa dag dang chom rkun pa dag 'jug par 'gyur zhing 'di mi gtsang ba'i ra ba dang /_btson ra dang wa lam can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]sgo ba skrag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs pa na btsun mo phreng ldan ma gnyid log cing 'dug nas des se gol gyi sgras de bslang ba dang /_des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug go/_/btsun mo phreng ldan ma btsun mo'i 'khor la 'os 
[\[100b.2\]]pa'i gos dag gyon pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dbang po rnams bsdus te 'dug pa dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas bsams pa/_ci'i phyir 'phags pa 'char ka dbang po rnams bsdus te 'dug snyam nas des yang bsams pa/_bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la 'os pa'i gos 
[\[100b.3\]]dag gyon pas de'i phyir 'phags pa 'char ka dbang po rnams bsdus te 'dug go snyam du rig nas/_de gnas khang du zhugs te gos stug po dag gyon nas phyir byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de la bzlas pa byin/_lung gzhan yang phog pa dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan mas 
[\[100b.4\]]smras pa/_'phags pa ci lags deng dge 'dun spyan drangs sam/_'on te bsod snyoms mdzad/_des smras pa/_bsod snyoms bgyid do/_/btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/_'phags pa gal te bsod snyoms mdzad na bdag las lhag par bsod pa 'bul ba su zhig mchis te/_
[\[100b.5\]]bdag nyid kyis 'bul lo zhes des bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste de de la phul lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de blangs te phyir byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang du 'jug pa dang phrad nas des smras pa/_don nyung ngu khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di lta bus 
[\[100b.6\]]zag pa zad par byas sam/_ci na khyod da gzod 'ong kho bos ni bzlas pa byin nas lung gzhan yang phog ste/_kho bos bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed gang ba 'di yang thob bo/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_de'i phyir khyod drug sde yin no/_/dge slong don 
[\[100b.7\]]nyung ngu dag gis thos nas ci'i phyir dge slong dag nam ma nangs/_skya rengs ma shar rin po che dag gam/_rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam/_sgo gtan gyi nyen kor las 'da' bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma 
[\[101a.2\]]bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa/_'char ka khyod nam ma nangs/_skya rengs ma shar/_rin po che dag gam/_
[\[101a.3\]]rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam/_sgo gtan gyi nyen kor las 'da' ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung 
[\[101a.4\]]ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba la nyes dmigs bcu po 'di dag yod pa'i phyir te/_bcu gang zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig 'dug 
[\[101a.5\]]cing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro la/_de nas btsun mos dge slong mthong nas 'dzum 'byin par byed na de la rgyal po 'di snyam du 'di ltar btsun mos dge slong mthong nas 'dzum 'byin par byed pa las na dge slong gis dben par sdig pa'i las 'ga' zhig bya bar sems 
[\[101a.6\]]par mi 'gyur ram snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal po btsun mo'i gan du song ba brjed dam/_sbrum pa btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs par gyur la/_dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro 
[\[101a.7\]]na/_de la rgyal po 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal po'i pho brang nas rin po che'am/_rin po cher smon pa stor bar 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]gyur la dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de la rgyal po 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal po'i pho brang nas gsang 
[\[101b.2\]]tshig phyi rol du 'phel bar gyur la dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de la rgyal po 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal 
[\[101b.3\]]po gzhon nu rnams la gsod par sems la/_dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs lnga 
[\[101b.4\]]pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gzhon nu rnams rgyal po gsod par sems shing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho 
[\[101b.5\]]brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs drug pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal pos blon po mthon po dag gnas dma' bar 'jog par byed cing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du/_dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma 
[\[101b.6\]]yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs bdun pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal pos blon po dma' ba dag gnas mthon por 'jog par byed cing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge 
[\[101b.7\]]slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs brgyad pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pa'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs go skon te ljongs dag tu 'gro ba dang ldog par byed cing dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems 
[\[102a.2\]]par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs dgu pa yin no/_/gzhan yang rgyal po ma phebs pa 'bebs par byed cing phebs pa gnas par byed la/_thob rgyal du bsgrags nas de'i 'og tu chad pa chen pos rjes su rton par byed cing /_dge slong yang rgyal po'i pho 
[\[102a.3\]]brang du 'gro na de na gang dag yid mi dga' ba de dag 'di snyam du dge slong rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'gro ba las na de'i las ma yin nam snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i nyes dmigs bcu pa yin no/_/dge slong dag de ltar na rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba ni glang 
[\[102a.4\]]po che'i gnod pa dang /_rta'i gnod pa dang /_shing rta'i gnod pa dang /_dpung bu chung gi gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba ni rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa/_dge sbyong gi tshul dang mi mthun pa yin no zhes rnam par smad pa 
[\[102a.5\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa 
[\[102a.6\]]snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang nam ma nangs skya rengs ma shar/_rin po che dag gam/_rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam sgo gtan gyi 
[\[102a.7\]]nyen kor las 'da' na ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]chen po rgyal po'i khab dang /_sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba gnyis yod de/_gang gi tshe rgyal po'i khab rgud pa de'i tshe na ni sgra sgrogs 'byor par 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe sgra sgrogs rgud pa de'i tshe na ni rgyal po'i khab 'byor par 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer chen po sgra sgrogs na rgyal po u tra ya na zhes bya bas 
[\[102b.2\]]rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang 'thab pa dang phyi dgra dang nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste chos dang 
[\[102b.3\]]ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/de na shing ljon pa dag kyang rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bu 'chags pa yin zhing /_lhas kyang dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs pas lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de la btsun mo zla 'od 
[\[102b.4\]]ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_bu rgyal tshab gtsug phud can zhes bya ba dang blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/_/grong khyer rgyal po'i khab na ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po 
[\[102b.5\]]bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang 'thab pa dang /_phyi dgra dang nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang 
[\[102b.6\]]dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/de na yang shing ljon pa dag kyang rtag tu me tog dang /_'bras bu 'chags shing lhas kyang dus dang /_dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs pas lo tog 
[\[102b.7\]]shin tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/de la btsun mo lus 'phags ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_bu rgyal tshab ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba dang /_blon po'i mchog ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul zhes bya ba yod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab nas tshong pa dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'phags nas de dag mthar gyis grong dang /_grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu tshong 'dus dag la rnam 
[\[103a.2\]]par lta ba na grong khyer chen po sgra sgrogs su phyin to/_/ji tsam na rgyal po u tra ya na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te don gyi gnas na 'dug pa na tshong pa de dag skyes thogs te rgyal po u tra ya na'i gan du song ba dang /_rgyal po u tra ya nas de dag la 'ongs pa legs so
