[\[103a.3\]]zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad nas gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod do/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas de dag mthong nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag yul 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'di lta bu dang /_shing ljon 
[\[103a.4\]]pa rtag tu me tog dang /_'bras bu 'chags pa 'di lta bu dang /_lhas dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/_tshong pa de dag gis smras pa/_lha mchis te/_shar 
[\[103a.5\]]gyi yul na grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces bgyi ba de na rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bgyi bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba bgyid du stsol ba de na yang shing ljon pa dag kyang rtag tu me tog dang /_'bras bu 'chags 
[\[103a.6\]]shing /_lhas kyang dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs pas lo tog shin tu phun sum tshogs pa lags so/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas thos nas de la rjes su chags pa skyes nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de'i yul na ci zhig dkon blon po rnams kyis smras 
[\[103a.7\]]pa/_lha ni rin po che'i mnga' bdag lags la/_rgyal po de ni gos kyi bdag po lags pas de la rin po che dag dkon no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na rin po che rtog pa dag bos shig ces rgyal pos rin po che dag brtags shing brtags shing sgrom bkang nas 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]tshong pa de dag gi lag tu skyes su bskur zhing phrin yig kyang /_shed mthun dgyes pa khyod bdag gis ma mthong ba'i grogs lags kyis/_gal te grong khyer sgra sgrogs su khyod la bgyi ba cung zad mchis na bdag la phrin yig skur cig dang thams cad bsgrub bo zhes bris te bskur ro/_/de nas 
[\[103b.2\]]tshong pa de dag gis skyes dang /_phrin yig dang zong rin khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas rin po che'i sgrom dang /_phrin yig de dag khyer te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du dong nas rkang pa 
[\[103b.3\]]gnyis la gtugs te/_sgrom dang phrin yig dag phul nas smras pa/_lha grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas rgyal po u tra ya na zhes bgyi ba des lha la skyes dang phrin yig 'di dag bskur ro/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig bklags te smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de'i yul na 
[\[103b.4\]]ci zhig dkon/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha ni gos kyi mnga' bdag lags la/_rgyal po de ni rin po che'i bdag po lags pas de la gos dag dkon no/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gos rin po che dag gis sgrom bkang ste skyes su bskur zhing /_phrin yig kyang shed 
[\[103b.5\]]mthun dgyes pa khyod kyis phrin yig spring pa des mjal te khyod kyang bdag gis ma mthong ba'i grogs lags kyis rgyal po'i khab tu khyod la yang bgyi ba cung zad mchis na bdag la phrin yig spring shig dang /_thams cad bsgrub bo zhes bris te blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_skyes dang phrin yig 
[\[103b.6\]]'di dag khyer la pho nya dag las skur cig_/blon po rnams kyis pho nya dag las bskur ba dang de dag gis skyes dang phrin yig de dag khyer te/_sgra sgrogs su 'phags nas mthar gyis sgra sgrogs su phyin to/_/de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos te gos kyi sgrom dang phrin yig de dag khyer 
[\[103b.7\]]nas rgyal po u tra ya na'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas sgrom dang phrin yig dag phul te smras pa/_lha rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha la skyes 'di dang phrin 'di bskur ro/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas phrin yig bklags te smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de'i chu zheng 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]ci 'dra/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha'i ci 'dra ba kho na lta bu'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de lta bu lags mod kyi 'on kyang rgyal po de rang gis mtshon 'debs pa/_nyen kor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams dang lhan cig rang gis g.yul 'gyed cing g.yul 
[\[104a.2\]]'gyed du stsol ba lags so/_/rgyal po u tra ya na la nor bu'i khrab yan lag lnga po dus tshigs su reg pa bde ba dang /_gcad dka' ba dang /_dbug dka' ba dang /_dug 'jil ba dang /_snang ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa zhig yod nas/_rgyal po u tra ya nas blon po rnams la smras 
[\[104a.3\]]pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de gal te rang gis mtshon 'debs pa/_nyen kor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed cing 'gyed du 'jud pa yin na de la nor bu'i khrab 'di bskur gyis pho nya dag sta gon gyis shig_/de dag gis pho nya dag sta gon byas nas/_rgyal po 
[\[104a.4\]]u tra ya nas rin po che'i khrab de dang phrin yig kyang 'di skad ces shed mthun dgyes pa khyod la bdag gis nor bu'i khrab 'di skyes su bskur te/_'di yang yon tan lnga po dus tshigs su reg pa bde ba dang /_gcad dka' ba dang /_dbug dka' ba dang /_dug 'jil ba dang /_snang 
[\[104a.5\]]ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa lags kyis khyod kyis 'di bdag dang rkyen pas rang nyid kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o zhes bris te bskur ro/_/pho nya rnams kyis skyes de dang phrin yig khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to/_/
[\[104a.6\]]de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas nor bu'i khrab de dang phrin yig khyer te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te nor bu'i khrab dang /_phrin yig phul nas smras pa/_lha rgyal po u tra ya nas lha la skyes 'di dang phrin yig 'di bskur 
[\[104a.7\]]ro/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig bklags te nor bu'i khrab de mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/_blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rin po che rtog pa dag bos shig_/de dag gis rin po che rtog pa dag bos nas rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag rin 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]po che 'di'i rin thang chod cig_/rin po che rtog pa dag gis nor bu'i khrab dang ldan pa'i rin po che re re nas brtag par brtsams na rin po che re re yang rin thang med par mthong nas/_de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'di la nor bu rin po che re re yang rin thang ma mchis pa lags so/_/
[\[104b.2\]]chos nyid kyis na rin po che gang gis rin thang gdab par mi nus pa de'i rin thang bye bar 'debs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rin po che dag bgrangs nas/_bdag gis de la skyes lan ci zhig bskur bar bya snyam du nyam nga bar gyur nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du 
[\[104b.3\]]chud cing 'dug nas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po u tra ya nas nga la skyes 'di lta bu bskur na ngas de la skyes lan ci zhig bskur bar bya/_ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul gyis smras pa/_lha khyod kyi yul du yang 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad 
[\[104b.4\]]par du 'phags pa'i rin po che byung ba 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags kyis/_khyod kyis kyang ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'drir stsol la skyes lan du bskur bar gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na bcom ldan 
[\[104b.5\]]'das la zhu'o zhes de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di 
[\[104b.6\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa grong khyer sgra sgrogs na rgyal po u tra ya na zhes bgyi ba bdag gis ma mthong ba'i grogs shig mchis pa des bdag la nor bu'i khrab yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhig skyes su bskur te/_de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis kyang ras 
[\[104b.7\]]la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir stsal te de la skyes lan du bskur bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gnang gis skur cig_/khyod kyi sems skyes pa bzang ste/_rgyal po u tra ya nas mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa skye bar 'gyur zhing 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]bden pa mthong bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/des yul thams cad na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa/_shes 
[\[105a.2\]]ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ras la bris shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha bri bar 'tshal lo/_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar brtsams pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta bas chog mi shes pa yin pas de dag gis bcom 
[\[105a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar ma nus nas de dag yi chad de rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar rngo ma thog ste/_gal te lhas bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na/_de 
[\[105a.4\]]lta na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar rngo thog go/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta bas chog mi shes pa yin pas 'di ltar de dag gis bcom 
[\[105a.5\]]ldan 'das kyi sku mthong ba na de dang de la blta bas ngoms par ma gyur nas/_de lta na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ri mo mkhan rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus kyi yi chad par ma 
[\[105a.6\]]byed par ras de 'on cig dang ngas grib ma gtang bar bya'o/_/rgyal pos ras phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis der grib ma btang ste ri mo mkhan rnams la bka' stsal pa/_shes ldan dag grib ma 'dir tshon sna tshogs kyis khong shig_/rgyal po la yang bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[105a.7\]]sku gzugs byas zin nas 'og tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs las bzlog pa dag bri bar bya'o/_/steng du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba dag 
[\[105b.2\]]bri bar bya'o/_/pho nya dag la yang phrin du sa phyogs go skabs yangs par bkur sti chen pos sku gzugs dbye bar bya ste/_gal te 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na/_'di ni 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[105b.3\]]gal te 'og tu bris pa 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na 'di ni khas len pa'o/_/'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi dag go/_/'di ni 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba dang ldog pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te steng du bris pa 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na 'di ni mngon par spro bar bya ba'o zhes brjod par bya'o zhes sgo zhig_/rgyal 
[\[105b.4\]]pos thams cad bris shing 'drir bcug nas dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos te legs par dril nas gser gyi dong bur bcug ste/_gser gyi dong bu yang dngul gyi dong bur bcug_/dngul gyi dong bu yang zangs kyi dong bur bcug_/zangs kyi dong bu yang dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gos dag gis 
[\[105b.5\]]dkris te/_glang po che'i rgyab tu bkal nas grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes pa chen pos grong khyer nas phyung ste/_rgyal po u tra ya na la phrin yig 'di skad ces shed mthun dgyes pa khyod la bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes 'di bskur gyis khyod 
[\[105b.6\]]kyis 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste sa phyogs go skabs yangs par mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po byas te dbye bar bya'o/_/des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po 'thob 
[\[105b.7\]]par 'gyur ro zhes bris te bskur ro/_/pho nya rnams la yang khyed kyis 'di dang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o zhes bsgo nas/_de dag gis sku gzugs dang phrin yig de khyer te sgra sgrogs su 'phags so/_/de dag mthar gyis sgra sgrogs kyi 'dab tu phyin nas de dag gis lam gar bsdad 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]de rgyal po u tra ya na la phrin yig bskur ro/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas phrin yig bklags nas khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te/_blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag des nga la phrin yig 'di skad spring ba la nyon cig_/des nga la skyes ji lta bu zhig 
[\[106a.2\]]bskur na de'i phyir ngas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du grong khyer mdzes pa dang /_lam mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o zhes zer/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa sta gon gyis shig dang da song la de'i yul 'khor 
[\[106a.3\]]gzhom par bya'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po de ni bdag nyid chen po zhig lags zhes gda' bas des lha'i zhal sngar skyes ngan ngon zhig bskur bar rngo mi thog pas je brtag par bgyis te/_gal te lha'i thugs mnyes na de lta na legs/_gal te ma 
[\[106a.4\]]mnyes na bdag cag gis de la dus 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de dag gis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad du lam mdzes pa byed du bcug ste/_grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyang rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam par gzhag nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab cing bdug 
[\[106a.5\]]spos dri zhim po'i snod dag dngar te dar gyi chun po'i phreng ba dpyangs shing /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan bsgreng ste/_me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing lha'i skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar byas nas rgyal po bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 
[\[106a.6\]]ldan pas bsu nas grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug tu bcug go/_/de nas srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang der 'dus par gyur/_nam mkha'i dkyil du yang lha 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur nas sa phyogs go skabs yangs par de dag gi nang du mchod pa chen po byas te sku gzugs 
[\[106a.7\]]de phye ba dang /_yul dbus nas tshong pa mang po zong thogs te grong khyer sgra sgrogs su lhags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs de mthong nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes thams cad kyis skad cig tu sgra phyung ngo /_/rgyal po u tra ya nas 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas spu'i khung bu thams cad zing zhes byed par gyur nas ya mtshan skyes te yun ring mo zhig tu mig tshugs su brtags nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha yul dbus na gangs kyi ri 
[\[106b.2\]]ngos dang nye ba chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste/_de bram ze ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal 
[\[106b.3\]]ba/_chos kyi rgyal po/_chos dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni 'di lta bur 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[106b.4\]]rin po che dang /_dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni bdun pa yin no/_/'di la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang ba yod par 'gyur ro/_/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sdo ba 
[\[106b.5\]]med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid 'tshe ba med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na 
[\[106b.6\]]ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_lha 'di ni de'i sku gzugs lags so/_/rgyal po rgya cher yid dga' nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag de ni shes kyis 
[\[106b.7\]]'di dri'o/_/'og tu bris pa 'di ci yin/_lha 'di ni khas len pa lags so/_/'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi dag lags so/_/'di ni 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba dang ldog pa dag lags so/_/shes ldan dag de yang shes kyis 'di dri'o/_/steng du bris pa 'di ci yin/_lha 'di ni 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]mngon par spro bar bgyi ba lags so/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs las bzlog pa yang bzlas pa yang bzlas nas legs par gzung ba byas te/_mtshan mo nam nangs pa'i tshe don 
[\[107a.2\]]thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad bag yangs su byas te 'dug nas skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /_lugs las bzlog pa la rnam par lta 
[\[107a.3\]]bar byed de/_'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched 
[\[107a.4\]]drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[107a.5\]]ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung la/_'di ma skyes pa'i phyir 'di mi skye ba ste/_'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du 
[\[107a.6\]]byed rnams 'gag_/'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 
[\[107a.7\]]'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes rnam par lta bar byed de/_des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa la rnam par lta 
[\[107b.2\]]ba na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyangs/_/gang 
[\[107b.3\]]la de 'dra'i gsos mnga' ba/_/sman pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/des shes nas dad pa dang ldan pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig 'di skad ces shed mthun dgyes pa khyod la brten nas bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[107b.4\]]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar byas/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 
[\[107b.5\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni mngon sum du byas te/_bdag dge slong mthong bar 'dod kyis khyod kyis dge slong 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so zhes bris te spring ngo /_/rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[107b.6\]]snying pos phrin yig de bklags nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di 
[\[107b.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyal po u tra ya nas bden pa dag mthong nas des bdag la phrin yig bskur te/_dge slong mthong bar 'tshal gyis dge slong 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so zhes mchi na/_de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_rgyal po u tra ya na 'khor dang bcas pa dang grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dge slong gang gis gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/_dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[108a.2\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bka' stsal pa/_kA t+yA ya na grong khyer sgra sgrogs na rgyal po u tra ya na 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom 
[\[108a.3\]]ldan 'das las mnyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i 
[\[108a.4\]]khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang grong khyer 
[\[108a.5\]]sgra sgrogs ga la ba der dong ngo /_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kyang rgyal po u tra ya na la phrin yig shed mthun dgyes pa khyod kyi phyir bdag gis dge slong ston pa dang 'dra ba 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang btang gis khyod kyis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam mdzes pa dang /_grong 
[\[108a.6\]]khyer mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du gzhug cing khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu lnga brgya yang sbyin par bya/_
[\[108a.7\]]bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug par bya ste/_des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bris te bskur ro/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas phrin yig bklags nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes te des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]mdzes par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /_skye bo 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsu nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrogs su 'jug tu bcug cing /_grong khyer gyi phyi rol du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya yang byed du bcug_/khri 
[\[108b.2\]]dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug_/bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du bcug ste/_sa phyogs go skabs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams 
[\[108b.3\]]pa nyid la 'dug go/_/srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ltad mo skyes pa na/_kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na der 'dus par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams 
[\[108b.4\]]dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis gang thos nas khyad par chen po rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa byas te/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[108b.5\]]bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni 
[\[108b.6\]]rang byang chub tu sems bskyed/_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs na khyim bdag rgyal dang /_
[\[108b.7\]]skar rgyal zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas khyim bdag rgyal dang /_skar 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rgyal gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po bdag cag gnyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i dge slong gi dngos po dang /_bdag cag 
[\[109a.2\]]gnyis kyis 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa 'thob bam/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de gnyis rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa byin nas de gnyis kyis spro ba dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba 
[\[109a.3\]]byas pas gong nas gong du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[109a.4\]]thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas 
[\[109a.5\]]te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag 
[\[109a.6\]]mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang 
[\[109a.7\]]po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de gnyis kyi nye du dag gis lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas mchod rten gnyis byed du bcug ste gcig ni rgyal gyi'o/_/cig shos ni skar rgyal gyi'o/_/rgyal po u tra ya na nyin re nyin re zhing tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[109b.2\]]kA t+yA ya na chen po'i drung du song nas chos mnyan te btsun mo'i 'khor la 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po chos dngar ba dngar ba ston par byed de/_sbrang bu sbrang rtsi 'byin pa bzhin no zhes rjod par byed do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa 
[\[109b.3\]]lags so/_/ji ltar gang gi slad du khyod chos gsan pas so/_/gal te de lta na khyed cag kyang ci'i phyir chos mi nyan/_lha bdag cag ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa lags pas ji ltar der mchis te chos mnyan par bgyi/_gal te 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'di nyid du mchis 
[\[109b.4\]]te chos ston par bgyid na de lta na bdag cag kyang chos nyan to/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la smras pa/_'phags pa btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal lo/_/des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po dge slong dag ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[109b.5\]]nang du zhugs shing chos mi ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa bkag go/_/'phags pa 'o na su zhig btsun mo'i 'khor la chos ston par bgyid/_rgyal po chen po dge slong ma'o/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 
[\[109b.6\]]la phrin yig 'di skad ces shed mthun dgyes pa bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal na de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so zhes bris te bskur ro/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig de bklags nas bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[109b.7\]]la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa rgyal po u tra ya nas 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]phrin yig spring ste btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal gyis de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so zhes mchi na de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_rgyal po u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi 
[\[110a.2\]]bud med dang grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i bud med rnams dge slong ma gang gis gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/_dge slong ma ri ma'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma ri ma la bka' stsal pa/_ri ma grong khyer sgra sgrogs na rgyal po 
[\[110a.3\]]u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang /_sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i bud med rnams la soms shig_/dge slong ma ri mas btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 
[\[110a.4\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma ri ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi 
[\[110a.5\]]bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang grong khyer sgra sgrogs ga la ba der song ngo /_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kyang rgyal po u tra ya na la phrin yig 'di skad ces 
[\[110a.6\]]shed mthun dgyes pa khyod kyi phyir bdag gis nyan thos ma chen mo ston pas bsngags pa 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang gtang gis khyod kyis kyang dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer mdzes par bya zhing bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste/_
[\[110a.7\]]grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya yang byed du gzhug par bya/_khri dang khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang sngas dang /_gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul bar bya/_bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug par bya ste/_des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po 'thob 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]par 'gyur ro zhes bris te bskur ro/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas phrin yig de bklags nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /_skye bo 'bum 
[\[110b.2\]]phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsu nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer du 'jug tu bcug cing /_grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya byed du bcug ste/_khri dang khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang la ba dang sngas dang gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug_/bsod snyoms lnga brgya 
[\[110b.3\]]yang sbyor du bcug go/_/dge slong ma ri ma nyin re zhing rgyal po u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i bud med rnams kyi nang du zhugs te chos ston par byed do/_/rgyal po u tra ya na ni pi bang mkhas pa yin la/_btsun mo zla 'od ni gar mkhas pa yin 
[\[110b.4\]]pas ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po u tra ya nas pi bang springs te btsun mo zla 'od gar byed do/_/des de gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas des de la mgo mjug tu brtags te bsams na zhag bdun 'das na 'di dus byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i lag nas pi 
[\[110b.5\]]bang shor te sa la lhung ba dang /_btsun mo zla 'od kyis smras pa/_lha bdag gis gar ma legs sam ci nongs/_zla 'od khyod kyis gar ma legs pa ma yin te/_'di ltar ngas khyod gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas nyi ma bdun pa la khyod dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[110b.6\]]btsun mo zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha gal te de lta na bdag gis lha la bsnyen bkur ni bgyis lags na/_gal te lhas gnang na bdag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_zla 'od dus yin gyis gnang ngo /_/gal te khyod rab tu 
[\[110b.7\]]byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed na ni de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/_/gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus byas te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na ni khyod lhar gyur pas nga la blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]des smras pa/_lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/_rgyal po u tra ya nas btsun mo zla 'od dge slong ma ri ma la gtad de smras pa/_'phags ma btsun mo zla 'od legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i 
[\[111a.2\]]dngos po 'tshal gyis de'i slad du 'phags mas 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang /_rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/dge slong ma ri mas smras pa/_de ltar bgyi'o zhes des de rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/_/dge slong ma ri mas bsams pas/_de la 
[\[111a.3\]]'chi ba'i 'du shes sgoms shig ces gdams ngag byin no/_/btsun mo zla 'od kyis 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par brtsams nas de nyi ma bdun pa la dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po 
[\[111a.4\]]ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/_gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes pa'o/_/lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyis bsams pa/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na/_mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /_gang du skyes snyam na rgyal chen bzhi 
[\[111a.5\]]pa'i nang du skyes pa dang /_las gang gis skyes snyam na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa nyid kyis skyes par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te/_gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 
[\[111a.6\]]dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od rna cha gdub 'khor g.yo 
[\[111a.7\]]zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi kha dog gi mthus 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par 
[\[111b.2\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes 
[\[111b.3\]]bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la 
[\[111b.4\]]phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis 
[\[111b.5\]]te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag 
[\[111b.6\]]go zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin 
[\[111b.7\]]tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]mthong ba rab dkon pa/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas gdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' 
[\[112a.2\]]la song /_/de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[112a.3\]]'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rgyal po u tra ya na la khas blangs pas da de blta ba'i dus yin no snyam nas/_de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od rgyal po u tra ya na ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na rgyal po u tra ya na 
[\[112a.4\]]gcig pu steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhir gtogs pa na nyal zhing 'dug nas des de snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te se gol gyi sgras bslang ba dang /_de gnyid kyis non pa'i mig dang rnam par shes pa mi gsal bas smras pa/_khyod su/_des smras pa/_bdag zla 'od do/_/rgyal 
[\[112a.5\]]pos smras pa/_tshur shog dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/des smras pa lha bdag shi zhing dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_gal te bdag dang lhan cig mjal bzhed na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung zhig dang /_gal te tshe 'di nyid la nyon 
[\[112a.6\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du mdzad na ni de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' lags so/_/gal te kun du sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus bgyis te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na ni der khyod bdag dang 
[\[112a.7\]]mjal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa gcig pa/_rgyal po u tra ya nas mtshan thog thag tu rab tu 'byung ba rjes su bsams nas nang par sngar langs te blon po rnams la smras 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]pa/_shes ldan dag btsun mo zla 'od ga la 'dug ltos shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha dus la bab bo/_/rgyal po u tra ya nas bsams pa/_gang gi phyir bdag la lha mos bskul nas bdag khyim pa khyim gyi nang na gnas shing sogs 'jog gi longs spyod dang 'dod pa la 
[\[112b.2\]]yongs su spyod pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bdag gis gzhon nu gtsug pud can rgyal srid la dbang bskur te bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te/_yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/_des 
[\[112b.3\]]blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis mngag pas bos te smras pa/_shes ldan gnyis bu gzhon nu gtsug pud can nga la ci 'dra ba de kho na bzhin du khyed gnyis la yang de 'dra ba yin gyis khyed gnyis kyis de gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing phan pa la nges par sbyar bar 
[\[112b.4\]]gyis shig_/nga ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de gnyis kyis thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do/_/rgyal pos gzhon nu gtsug pud can la smras pa/_bu khyod ji lta nga'i tshig mnyan pa dang bya bar sems pa de bzhin du/_khyod kyis 
[\[112b.5\]]blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka 'di gnyis kyi tshig mnyan pa dang bya bar soms shig_/nga ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo /_/des kyang thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po u tra ya nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs su dril bsgrag 
[\[112b.6\]]pa byed du bcug ste/_grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa dag dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la shes ldan dag nyon cig_/nga ni skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim 
[\[112b.7\]]nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gis ngas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa na gang la gnod pa cung zad ci byas pa de bzod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa rnams dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]tshogs rnams rgyal po la rjes su chags pa yin pas de dag gis thos nas thams cad mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po u tra ya nas gzhon nu gtsug pud can rgyal srid la bzhag nas rtsa lag gi skye bo rnams la bzod pa gsol te/_dge 
[\[113a.2\]]sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin/_bsod nams dag byas te mi bsnyen bkur ba cig dang /_rgyal po'i khab logs su phyogs te 'phags so/_/de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon 
[\[113a.3\]]po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskyal bzhin du grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas phyir byung ste/_skyed mos tshal shing 
[\[113a.4\]]ljon pa'i tshal sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_me tog dang 'bras bu dang /_chu rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa zhig tu yud tsam zhig bsdad nas grong khyer sgra 
[\[113a.5\]]sgrogs logs su rnam par bltas te rgyal po gtsug pud can la smras pa/_bu ngas chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug pas de'i phyir srog chags 'bum phrag 'di snyed nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur gyis/_khyod kyis kyang chos kyis rgyal srid byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/skye bo'i 
[\[113a.6\]]tshogs de la yang bag phab ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas khyed kyi rgyal por 'di bskos kyis phyir deng la bde bar sgrubs shig ces smras te song ngo /_/rgyal po gtsug pud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang 
[\[113a.7\]]yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchi mas dkrugs pa'i mig gis yud tsam yud tsam phyi bzhin rtog cing rtog cing grong khyer sgra sgrogs su phyir log go/_/de nas rgyal po u tra ya na mthar gyis grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas des skyed mos tshal du bsdad 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]de/_mi de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du song la rgyal po u tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes sbron cig_/mi de song ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po la lha rgyal po u tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do zhes sbran to/_/des thos nas 'phral kho 
[\[113b.2\]]na la langs te zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po de dpung chen po dang ldan pa yin na des ma sbran pa kho nar 'ongs pa khyed cag sus kyang ma shes so/_/des smras pa/_lha de la dpung ga la mchis te dpon g.yog gnyis pu zhig mchis so/_/rgyal po 
[\[113b.3\]]gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/_gang gi phyir bdag gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba bgyis na de bzhin du grong khyer du gzhug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bdag gis bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go snyam du rig nas/_lam 
[\[113b.4\]]mdzes pa dang grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas bsu'o/_/de nas gnya' ba sprad de glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu bcug ste/_spos sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i chus khrus byed du bcug nas rgyal po la 'os 
[\[113b.5\]]pa'i gos dag dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_byug pa sna tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan nas zan byin te lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas smras pa/_shed mthun dgyes pas rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang 
[\[113b.6\]]pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams spangs te 'dir ci la byon/_sa gzhan gyi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis yul 'khor gzhom par bgyis pa'am/_gzhon nu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba blon po skyon chags pas bslus pa 'ga' zhig gis brtul ba'am gcig tu ma gyur tam/_
[\[113b.7\]]des smras pa/_shed mthun dgyes pa de ltar ma gyur te/_bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos nas yid dga' zhing dga' ste/_ro stod 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_kye ma sangs rgyas/_kye ma chos/_kye ma dge 'dun/_kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid 'di ltar skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu dag gis rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_
[\[114a.2\]]rtsa lag gi tshogs rgya chen po dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba dang /_khyim rgya chen po dag spangs te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa smras nas rgyal 
[\[114a.3\]]po u tra ya na khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i gong na bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas 
[\[114a.4\]]gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin te/_de skyes dang bcas pas nga'i gan du 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di lta ste/_gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do zhes bka' stsal 
[\[114a.5\]]nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[114a.6\]]pa rgyal po u tra ya na 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di rab tu dbyung du gsol/_rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 
[\[114a.7\]]'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phyung zhing /_dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]lag pa lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum gyis 'brel pa dang /_dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod 
[\[114b.2\]]la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 
[\[114b.3\]]kyis mthong nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po u tra ya na rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas de bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs so zhes de lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par gyur to/_/de skad thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du 
[\[114b.4\]]ma dag 'dus par gyur cing /_khyim gyi nang na gnas pa'i bud med dag kyang skar khung dang /_skar khung dra ba can dang /_lan kan dag gi drung du 'khod de lta bar byed do/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po u tra ya na rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[114b.5\]]bsod snyoms la zhugs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskor cing mchis so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas dge slong u tra ya na ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong u tra ya na la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi dbang grong khyer stong dang 
[\[114b.6\]]ni/_/sgra sgrogs kyang ni spyad byas nas/_/bor ba'i bsod snyoms tshol byed pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/gser dang de bzhin dngul gyi snod/_/srang tshad brgya pa spyad byas nas/_/sa yi lhung bzed spyod byed pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/sA lu'i 'bras chan 
[\[114b.7\]]gtsang ma dag_/sha yis brlan pas spyad byas nas/_/zan dron khengs pa spyod byed pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/srin bal ras bal zar ma dang /_/ko tam ka shi'i gos spangs nas/_/phyag dar khrod dag srel byed pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]rlung med sgo gtan bsdams pa yi/_/khang pa brtsegs par khyod nyal nas/_/shing ljon drung du gnas gyur pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/'jam zhing ras bal 'dra ba yi/_/mal khri dag la khyod nyal nas/_/rtswa yi stan la nyal gyur pa/_/ji lta yongs 
[\[115a.2\]]su mi gdung ngam/_/btsun mo mtshungs pa yid 'ong ba/_/gus par nyal cing snyan smras pa/_/du ma khyod kyis rnam spangs pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/glang chen gnya' dang shing rta dang /_/rta yi bzhon pas khyod song nas/_/rkang pas sa la rgyu byed pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi 
[\[115a.3\]]gdung ngam/_/nor mang ldan pa'i mdzod dang ni/_/khang pa dag kyang rnam spangs te/_/ci yang med pa thob gyur pa/_/ji lta yongs su mi gdung ngam/_/u tra ya nas smras pa/_rgyal po gal te gdul dka' ba/_/gzhan gyi zas kyis 'tsho byed na/_/ma grub pas ni de 'dul te/_/
[\[115a.4\]]gnya' shing ba lang 'dul ba bzhin/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos smras pa/_/rgyal po khyod yid mi bde 'am/_/ci phyir dman pa bzhin du smra/_/rgyal srid phyed ni sbyin bya yis/_/khyod ni sngon bzhin longs spyod kyis/_/rgyal po khyod yid mi bde 'am/_/ci phyir dman pa bzhin 
[\[115a.5\]]du smra/_/yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa'i/_/longs spyod rab mchog sbyin par bya/_/u tra ya nas smras pa/_rgyal po gang zhig 'jig rten na/_/lus kyi chos reg bkren pa med/_/de ni nges par lha nyid dang /_/yang na mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/_/mi dbang gang zhig chos spangs 
[\[115a.6\]]zhing /_/'di la chos min dga' byed pa/_/rgyal po de bkren shes par bya/_/mun nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/khyod la chos ni bstan bya yis/_/rgyal po chen po bdag la nyon/_/chos thos 'og tu rgyal po ni/_/gang du 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/yon tan med pa'i 
[\[115a.7\]]lus la ni/_/gcig nyid yon tan chen po ste/_/ji lta ji ltar gzung byas pa/_/de lta de ltar rjes 'jug 'gyur/_/rgyal po bcu pa'i bcu po 'di/_/skyes bu'i cher ni brjod par bya/_/bu dang chung ma nor de la/_/rtsed mo dga' ba ci zhig yod/_/bu yis dga' ba ston byed de/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]chung mas khengs pa rjod par byed/_/chom rkun nor ni sgrub byed de/_/rgyal po dag ni bcings las grol/_/mthar byed pa las sman dag dang /_/nor dang nye dus skyob mi nus/_/rig sngags kun dang dpung dag dang /_/dpa' brtul gyis kyang skyob nus min/_/'di na mthu chen gnas 
[\[115b.2\]]mtho la/_/gnas pa'i lha tshe ring po yang /_/de yang tshe zad nyams 'gyur bas/_/'chi las de ring su zhig 'thar/_/mthu chen nor ldan grags 'bar ba/_/rgyal srid byas pa khyab 'jug dang /_/mun byed sgra ngan skya bseng bu/_/des kyang 'chi ba bzlog ma nus/_/rgyal po sdom 
[\[115b.3\]]brtson dka' thub dang /_/las dang brtson 'grus rtul ba dang /_/'khor tshogs rgya chen nor dag gis/_/'chi las ji ltar thar mi nus/_/bar snang rgya mtsho'i nang dang ni/_/ri yi sul du zhugs pa 'am/_/gang du gnas na 'chi bdag gis/_/mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa 
[\[115b.4\]]phyogs med/_/bar snang rgya mtsho nang dang ni/_/ri yi sul du zhugs pa 'am/_/gang du gnas na las rnams kyis/_/mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs med/_/rus pa thi ba'i mdog 'dra ba/_/bor zhing phyogs phyogs rnam 'thor ba/_/gang dang gang yin de dag ni/_/mthong na 'di 
[\[115b.5\]]la su zhig dga'/_/thod pa dung gi mdog 'dra ba/_/bor zhing ku ba lhung lta bu/_/gang dang gang yin de dag ni/_/mthong na 'di la su zhig dga'/_/rgyal po tsha na sgrib byed cing /_/grang na g.yog par byed pa yi/_/khyod kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba/_/gang yin de yang 'chi bas 
[\[115b.6\]]'joms/_/mi yis ji tsam zas zos shing /_/gyon nam yang na byin pa de/_/de yi rang gir shes bya ste/_/gzhan ni bor te 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mi yi rkun pos mi 'phrogs dang /_/gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i/_/gter ni sbyin pa'am yang na ni/_/legs byas gzhan 
[\[115b.7\]]gyis sba bar bya/_/stag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bsad 'dren ltar/_/na rga 'chi bas khyod myur 'dren/_/mdza' bshes blon tshogs kun 'dus pa/_/khyod kyi nad ni sel mi nus/_/de la spyad lhag nor 'bru dang /_/gser dngul gang dag yod pa la/_/bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas dag_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]bgo skal nyid du sems par byed/_/gal te pha shi bu lon chags/_/bu sdug de la me mi khyer/_/shi na 'chi bzhin mi ngu zhing /_/bdag gi pha'am rjer mi smra/_/phyug shes bdag gi pha zer zhing /_/skra bshig mchi ma'i bzhin gyis ngu /_/me yang mdun du 
[\[116a.2\]]khyer byed cing /_/kye ma 'di ni lhar 'gyur zer/_/gos kyis bkab bzhin khyer byed cing /_/me btang de nas sreg par byed/_/nye du ngu zhing gos gcig gis/_/de sregs spangs te longs spyod byed/_/de gcig skye zhing skye tshe gcig_/de bzhin gcig 'chi 'chi tshe gcig_/skye 
[\[116a.3\]]'dir gcig pus sdug bsngal myong /_/'khor bar 'gyur la grogs med do/_/de mthong 'di la dam pa rnams/_/rab 'byung khyim na 'dug mi byed/_/de dag chags pa kun bral nas/_/phyin chad mngal na 'jug mi 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dge slong 
[\[116a.4\]]u tra ya nas gong nas gong du spobs pas lan glan pas cang mi smra zhing spobs pa med par gyur te song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis re zhig ji srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de la blon 
[\[116a.5\]]po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha chos kyis rgyal srid bgyid du stsol la/_chos ma lags pas bgyid du ma stsal cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_lha yul gyi mi dag ni me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang 'dra ba'i slad du ste/_
[\[116a.6\]]lha 'di lta ste/_dper bgyi na me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /_'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag ni dus dang dus su legs par yongs su bskyangs pa na bar chad ma mchis pa'i sbyor bas dus ji lta ba bzhin du me tog dang /_'bras bu dag 'byin par bgyid do/_/lha de bzhin du yul gyi 
[\[116a.7\]]mi dag kyang dus dang dus su legs par yongs su bskyangs pa na bar chad ma mchis pa'i sbyor bas dus ji lta ba bzhin du dpya dang lo thang dag 'bul bar bgyid do/_/de de gnyis kyis bzlog pa na re zhig ji srid du chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos ma yin pas 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_de la de gnyis kyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang smras na srid pa 'phos pa dang ldan pas bzlog kyang mi sdod de de khros nas blon po gzhan dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i 
[\[116b.2\]]bka' lan gsum gyi bar du yang gcog pa de'i chad pa ji lta bu yin/_de na blon po skyon chags pa kha cig gis smras pa/_lha 'di la rma ci 'tshal te/_de'i chad pa ni dgum pa lags so/_/tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/_blon po skyon ni chags pa dang /_/'gul bar 
[\[116b.3\]]gyur pa'i so dang ni/_/zas la skyon ni chags pa dag_/phyung ba 'ba' zhig bde bar gyur/_/blon po blo dang ldan gyur cing /_/shes rab dang ni 'dul la mkhas/_/mdzod nas go 'phang gnas pa ni/_/gang gis mi gsod de gsod 'gyur/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis 
[\[116b.4\]]smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di gnyis ni nga'i yab kyis bskos pa yin pas nga 'di gnyis gsod par mi byed kyis/_'di ltar 'di gnyis kyis nga'i mig sngar 'dug par mi bya'o zhes de gnyis kyi sgo bzlog nas skyon chags pa gzhan gnyis shig blon por bskos pa dang /_de 
[\[116b.5\]]gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha til ma brdungs pa dang /_ma stsal ba dang /_ma bsros pa dang /_ma btsir ba dag gis til mar mi 'byin te/_mi'i dbang po skye bo dag kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyed gnyis kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni mchog tu brtson pa yin 
[\[116b.6\]]no/_/de gnyis kyis yul gyi mi dag la gnod pa bya bar brtsams so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa zhig zong thogs te grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas de mthong nas ngo shes te smras pa/_ji lta sgra sgrogs dag 
[\[116b.7\]]na gtsug pud can/_/'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan nad med dam/_/de la phas kyi sdo ba 'ga' med cing /_/rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gam/_/des smras pa/_lha de bzhin sgra sgrogs dag na gtsug pud can/_/'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bro ma 'tshal/_/de la phas kyi sdo ba ma mchis te/_/rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas mthar gyis dri bar brtsams pas/_de na blon po gang ni gtso bo yin/_/gang ni gtso bo ma yin/_gang gi dbang gis ni 
[\[117a.2\]]gtsug pud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod pa byed/_des smras pa/_lha blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis kyi sgo ni bzlog_/skyon chags pa gzhan gnyis shig ni blon por bskos te/_de gnyis kyi dbang gis gtsug pud can yul gyi mi dag la gnod pa bgyid do/_/
[\[117a.3\]]u tra ya nas smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod song la sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs legs par dbugs phyung shig dang /_yang der bzlog tu 'ong ste/_nga nyid kyis gtsug pud can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa de ltar gnod pa las bzlog par 
[\[117a.4\]]bya zhing phan pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o/_/tshong pa des zong bsgyur te zong rin khyer nas 'phags te mthar gyis sgra sgrogs su phyin nas des nye du rnams la gsang ste smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos zong thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu son nas kho bos der rgyal po bgres po mthong 
[\[117a.5\]]nas/_de'i zhal nas kwa'i nang rje khyod song la sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs legs par dbugs phyung shig dang /_yang der bzlog tu 'ong ste/_nga nyid kyis gtsug pud can ci nas kyang yul gyi mi rnams la gnod pa mi byed pa de ltar gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing phan 
[\[117a.6\]]pa la nges par sbyar bar bya'o zhes byung ngo /_/de dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod cing de dag gis kyang gzhan dag la brjod pas de ltar sgra de rna ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyi rnar son nas de gnyis kyis bsams pa/_gal te rgyal 
[\[117a.7\]]po rgan po 'ong bar gyur na des gdon mi za bar he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis yang blon po'i mchog tu sko zhing bdag cag gnyis la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/_de'i phyir gang gis de lam kar gsod du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas de gnyis kyis 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]rgyal po gtsug pud can la smras pa/_lha rgyal po bgres po byon par 'gyur ro zhes gda'o/_/des smras pa/_de rab tu byung bas de ci'i phyir 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha gang gis gdugs gcig rgyal srid bgyid du stsal ba de ni rgyal srid ma mchis 
[\[117b.2\]]pas dga' bar ga la 'gyur te/_de yang rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bar 'tshal lo/_/gtsug pud can gyis smras pa/_gal te de rgyal por gyur na nga nyid kyis gzhon nu byas te/_'di la 'gal ba ci yod/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma 
[\[117b.3\]]lags te gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul gyi mi dag gis thal mo stong dag gis phyag bgyis pas rgyal srid bgyid du stsal nas yang ji ltar gzhon nu'i gnas su gnas par mdzad yul 'khor yongs su btang ba ni mi sdo yi gzhon nu'i 
[\[117b.4\]]gnas su gnas pa ni mi rung ste/_'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi zhig glang po che'i gnya' bar mchis nas rta'i rgyab tu mchi ba dang /_rta'i rgyab tu mchis nas shing rtas mchi ba dang /_shing rtas mchis nas rkang pa gnyis kho nas mchi ba bzhin du/_rgyal srid bgyid du 
[\[117b.5\]]stsal nas yang gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de gnyis kyis bslus nas des smras pa/_'o na 'di la gang rigs/_'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha de 'gums su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/gal te 'gums su ma 
[\[117b.6\]]stsal gor ma bkum par blon po skyon chags pa dag dang bsdongs te lha nyid dgrongs par bgyid do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_de bzhin gyur cing nyams te yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug nas mchi mas brnangs pa'i snying gis snying rje bzhin zhum pa dang /_thogs 
[\[117b.7\]]pa'i yid dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan gnyis ji ltar yab dgrongs su rung /_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lhas/_pha 'am yang na spun dag gam/_/rang las skyes pa'i bu yang rung /_/gal te dgra khrod zhugs gyur na/_/sa phung 'phel ba nyid du bya/_/zhes bgyi 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ba ma gsan tam/_yang smras pa/_lhas gang la bu pho stong bdog cing /_thams cad gru gcig zhugs gyur pa/_/der ni dgra bo gcig tu byung /_/de yi don du de nub bya/_/zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam/_lhas gzhan dag nas/_khyim gyi phyir ni gcig 
[\[118a.2\]]gtang bya/_/grong phyir khyim ni gtang bar bya/_/ljongs phyir grong ni gtang bya ste/_/bdag nyid phyir ni sa gtang bya/_/zhes 'byung ba yang ma gsan tam/_lha 'di la dgongs par bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis te/_de ni dgum par bgyi lags pas 'gums su stsal bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[118a.3\]]gal te lha 'di la phyi shol mdzad nas lha la rjes su chags pa'i gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul gyi mi gang dag lags pa de dag 'khrugs par gyur na gor ma bkum par lha la gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa dag la bsten pas ni 
[\[118a.4\]]sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des de ltar gyis shig ces khas blangs so/_/de nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis dga' ba dang mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas mi gshed ma pa dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la rgyal po rgan po sod cig dang khyed cag 
[\[118a.5\]]la longs spyod dag gis bgo bsha' bya'o/_/rgyal po de la pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul mi thams cad rjes su chags pas de gsod par spro ba 'ga' yang med do/_/de gnyis kyis de dag la lan gsum gyi bar du yang dbyig dang /_gser dang grong sbyin pa la sogs pas 
[\[118a.6\]]spro bar byed na spro ba 'ga' yang ma byung nas/_de nas de gnyis khro bas kun nas dkris pas phyag sbal srung ba rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag deng la mi de dag bu dang /_chung ma dang rtsa lag dang mdza' bshes dang /_nye du'i tshogs dang bcas pa chings la chug shig_/
[\[118a.7\]]de dag gis thos nas skrag par gyur te smras pa/_lha nyag mi bzhes su gsol/_bdag cag ni phyag rjed bka' nyan pa dag lags kyis mchi'o/_/zhes de dag gis ral gri rnon po mchan du bcug ste 'phags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/_chos gos zin pa dang ldan pas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[118b.2\]]btsun pa bdag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u tra ya na song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos 
[\[118b.3\]]phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms brgyus 
[\[118b.4\]]nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log par/_ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas las kyi stobs kyis bdas te song ngo /_/las kyis ring du 'dren byed de/_/ring las las kyis 'dren par byed/_/
[\[118b.5\]]gang du las rnams smin 'gyur ba/_/der ni las kyis rab tu 'dren/_/de grong khyer sgra sgrogs ga la ba der song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na lam ka na ri brags shig yod pa der bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de de nas bsod snyoms brgyus te song ba dang /_mi gshed ma pa 
[\[118b.6\]]de dag dang phrad nas de dag gis de mthong ngo /_/des kyang de dag ngo shes nas de dag dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas des de dag la dri bar brtsams pa/_ji lta sgra sgrogs dag na gtsug pud can/_/'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs 
[\[118b.7\]]ldan nad med dam/_/de la phas kyi sdo ba 'ga' med cing /_/rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gam/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha de bzhin sgra sgrogs dag na gtsug pud can/_/'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan bro ma 'tshal/_/de la phas kyi sdo ba ma mchis te/_/
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid/_/mi mchog khyod kyi tshul dang mthun pa yi/_/'phags dngos mngon brtags gang lags khyod kyis mdzod/_/zhi ba de yi tshul mthun gang lags pa/_/de ni de ring nye bar gzigs par 'gyur/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[119a.2\]]u tra ya nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci deng der 'ong ba la mngon par mi dga' 'am/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mngon par mi dga'o/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na mi 'gros phyir ldog par bya'o/_/de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_skyes bu 
[\[119a.3\]]dpa' khyod slar ni gang du gshegs/_/sras ni khyod gson mngon pa mi dga' ste/_/bdag cag byur ngan rgyal pos bskos rnams kyis/_/'dir ni khyod dgrongs slad du mchid kyis 'tshal/_/tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag nga gsod pa'i mi 
[\[119a.4\]]gshed ma pa dag yin nam/_lha bdag cag khyod dgrongs pa'i gshed ma pa dag lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la u tra ya na song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[119a.5\]]'di yin pa lta ste/_'khor ba ni rnam pa thams cad du ngan pa snying po med pa 'jig pa'i chos can yin no snyam du rig nas/_de dag la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag nga don gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i don de ngas da dung ma thob kyis re zhig nga rang gi don rjes su sgrub kyi bar du yud tsam 
[\[119a.6\]]zhig sdod cig_/de dag gis phan tshun gros byas te smras pa/_lha de ltar mdzod cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 
[\[119a.7\]]'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod de/_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_de'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin no zhes gsungs 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pas des brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa 
[\[119b.2\]]thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu dag bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas 
[\[119b.3\]]mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /_dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam 
[\[119b.4\]]mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab 
[\[119b.5\]]kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba so so yang dag par rig 
[\[119b.6\]]pa na de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_dge slong u tra ya na ni/_/mdud pa sbyor ba zug rngu dang /_/de bzhin sgrib las thar gyur kyang /_/rgyal po'i chos las deng ma thar/_/ces smras nas mi gshed ma de dag la smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag ngas thob par bya ba gang yin pa 
[\[119b.7\]]de thob zin gyis da ni khyed cag don gang gi phyir 'ongs pa'i don de thob par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha gal te rgyal po gtsug phud can bdag cag la rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig smras zhes rmed na/_bdag cag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi/_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de la 'di skad ces/_rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas/_/bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed/_/nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'/_/khyod ni mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'di skad ces/_khyod kyis 
[\[120a.2\]]mtshams med pa gnyis byas te/_pha srog dang phral ba gang yin pa dang /_dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang phral ba gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par bya dgos kyis sdig pa sna tshogs las 
[\[120a.3\]]shogs shig dang /_de lta las bsrabs pa nyid dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas yang bsams pa/_sems can de sems can dmyal ba chen po las gzhol bar gyur na mi rung gis 
[\[120a.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o snyam nas/_des rdzu 'phrul gyi thabs gang dang gang yin brtsams na de'i las kyis non pas rdzu zhes bya ba tsam yang snang bar ma gyur na rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas mi gshed ma pa de dag las mi snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[120a.5\]]'jig rten pha rol btang ba gcig gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ste/_de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la bsgyel to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od 
[\[120a.6\]]zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og logs su 'dong /_kha cig ni steng logs su 'dong bas gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba 
[\[120a.7\]]yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus gzhom dang /_ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_chu bur rdol dang /_so thams thams dang /_kyi hud zer dang /_a cu zer dang /_ut+pal ltar gas 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa dang /_pad ma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste/_sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la/_sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do/_/des sems 
[\[120b.2\]]can de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du/_shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so/_/de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/_
[\[120b.3\]]de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa ma yin la/_gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/_'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du sems so/_/
[\[120b.4\]]de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/_sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do/_/gang dag steng logs su 
[\[120b.5\]]'dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang /_
[\[120b.6\]]'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang /_sdug 
[\[120b.7\]]bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/_brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba yang smras so/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas 
[\[121a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste/_de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur/_
[\[121a.3\]]sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/_dud 'gror skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi long bur nub par 'gyur/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/_mir skye ba lung ston par 
[\[121a.4\]]bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/_lhar skye ba lung ston 
[\[121a.5\]]par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur/_nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug 
[\[121a.6\]]tor du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis kyi mthil du nub bo de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_kha dog sna tshogs stong gis 
[\[121a.7\]]bkra ba yi/_/tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur te/_/de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa/_/nyi gdugs brdal bar gyur pa ci bzhin no/_/yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]gyur pa/_/rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis pa/_/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad/_/de slad brten pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas/_/thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po/_/nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la/_/the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang /_/dam pa 
[\[121b.2\]]dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol/_/tshwa chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi/_/sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston/_/brtan nas ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/_/skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[121b.3\]]bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar/_dge slong u tra ya na ni/_/mdud pa sbyor ba zug rngu dang /_/de bzhin sgrib 
[\[121b.4\]]las thar gyur kyang /_/rgyal po'i chos las deng ma thar/_/kun dga' bo grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po gtsug pud can sdig pa'i grogs pos bskor bas dge slong u tra ya na/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa srog dang bral bar byas te/_des pha dgra bcom pa srog 
[\[121b.5\]]dang bral bar byas pas nges par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing srog dang bral bar gyur tam/_kun dga' bo u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing srog dang bral bar gyur to/_/
[\[121b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug go/_/de nas gshed ma pa mi de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na'i lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang khar gsil khyer te grong khyer sgra sgrogs su phyin nas de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis la smras 
[\[121b.7\]]pa/_rgyal po rgan po bsad do/_/de gnyis kyis thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te rgyal po gtsug pud can ga la ba der dong nas smras pa/_lha dgyes pa skyed cig_/da ni lha'i rgyal srid la tsher ma ma mchis so/_/ji ltar gyur lha'i dgra gang lags pa de 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bkum mo/_/nga'i dgra gang yin/_lha rgyal po rgan po'o/_/de bsad pa ji ltar shes/_de gnyis kyis mi gshed ma pa dag bstan te smras pa/_lha mi 'di dag ni gshed ma pa lags te 'di dag gis de bkum mo/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de dag 
[\[122a.2\]]mthong nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgan po la dbang ji tsam yod/_lha de la dbang ga la mchis te lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang khar gsil 'di lags so/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de mthong nas brgyal te sa la sgyel nas chus btab ste dbugs phyir byung 
[\[122a.3\]]nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i tshe ci smras/_lha rgyal po rgan po srog dang bral kar 'di skad ces/_rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas/_/bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed/_/nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'/_/khyod ni mnar med 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
[\[122a.4\]]zhes mchi'o/_/gzhan yang 'di skad ces/_khyod kyis mtshams med pa'i las gnyis byas te/_pha srog dang phral ba gang yin pa dang /_dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang phral ba gang yin pa des khyod yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par 
[\[122a.5\]]gnas par bya dgos kyis sdig pa sdig pa las shogs shig dang /_de lta na las bsrabs pa nyid dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes mchi'o/_/de mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas 'dam bu sngon por brngas pa bzhin du rnyis par gyur nas/_
[\[122a.6\]]des blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis bos te smras pa/_shes ldan gnyis khyed gnyis kyis nga las de lta bu byed pa las ma bzlog go/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lhas bdag cag gnyis spyan lam du ma bzhag na ji ltar bzlog par bgyi/_des blon po skyon chags pa de 
[\[122a.7\]]gnyis mig lam du mi snang bar bzhag nas he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis phyir blon po'i mchog tu bskos pa dang /_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis gsang ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang /_skar rgyal gyi mchod rten gnyis la khung bu gnyis brkos nas der byi la'i phru gu 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]gnyis bzhag ste/_de gnyis kyis nyi ma re re zhing sha sri re re byin nas 'di skad ces rgyal dang skar rgyal gnyis bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis khyod gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te/_dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gsan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes pa'i bden 
[\[122b.2\]]pa dang bden pa'i tshig des sha sri long la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te/_rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig ces slob par byed do/_/gang gi tshe de gnyis legs par lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe na blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis u tra ya na'i btsun mo'i gan du song ste 
[\[122b.3\]]smras pa/_lha mo khyod kyi sras rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur na ci'i slad du khyod btang snyoms mdzad/_des smras pa/_khyod gnyis nyid kyis de las de lta bu byed du bcug na da kho mos ji ltar bya/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha mo ci gang du 
[\[122b.4\]]bum pa lhung ba der dpyang thag kyang lhung bar bgyi'am/_des smras pa/_de shes te re zhig de'i pha bsad pa ni kho mos gsang bar bya na/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa sus gsang bar 'gyur/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha mo dgra bcom pa bsad pa bdag cag gnyis kyis 
[\[122b.5\]]gsang bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na legs so zhes de de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_sras ci'i slad du khyod skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur/_des smras pa/_yum khyod kyang de skad ces ci'i 
[\[122b.6\]]phyir khyod skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par gyur ces gsung ngam/_gang gi slad du bdag blon po skyon chags pa gnyis kyis bslus pas mtshams med pa'i las gnyis bgyis te yab srog dang phral ba gang lags pa dang /_dge 
[\[122b.7\]]slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang phral ba gang lags pa des bdag yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par bgyi 'tshal na/_bdag ji ltar skya bo bseng bseng po rid pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rke ba dang /_lus ma thob par mi 'gyur 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]du rung /_des smras pa/_sras ci mi 'jigs pa stsol cig dang /_gang med pa de bka' mchid bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_yum gsol gyis ji ltar lags pa gsungs shig_/sras de ni khyod kyi yab ma lags te/_'di ltar bdag gis zla mtshan bkru ba'i slad du skyes 
[\[123a.2\]]pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa de las khyod 'khrungs so/_/des bsams pa/_de lta na pha bsad par ma gyur to snyam du rig nas smras pa/_yum gal te de lta na pha bsad pa ni ma mchis na dgra bcom pa bsad pa mchis pa de ji ltar mthar thug par bgyi/_des 
[\[123a.3\]]smras pa/_sras 'di la shes pa la mkhas pa dag smra bar bgyi ste/_de dag gis de mthar thug par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhes smras te song nas/_des blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis bos te smras pa/_kho mos de'i pha bsad pa ni bsal zin gyis da khyod gnyis kyis dgra bcom 
[\[123a.4\]]pa bsad pa sol cig_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_blon po gang dag shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad sdus shig_/de dag gis blon po gang dag shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad bsdus pa dang blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyang der 'dus par gyur 
[\[123a.5\]]to/_/de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ngas dgra bcom pa bsad pa gang yin pa de ji ltar mthar thug par bya/_de na rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i mi thams cad kyis ni mi mthun par smra bar brtsams te/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_lha des 
[\[123a.6\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis par sus mthong /_kha cig gis smras pa/_lha dgra bcom pa dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa dang 'dra ste nam mkha' la mchi'o/_/blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ci mchis/_des smras pa/_
