[\[123a.7\]]khyed gnyis kyang de skad ces 'di la mya ngan byar ci yod zer ram/_khyed gnyis nyid na re dgra bcom pa gsod du bcug go zhes mi zer ram/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis na dgra bcom pa dag bkum pa mchis re skan/_des smras pa/_ngas mngon sum kho 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]nar dgra bcom pa rgyal dang /_skar rgyal gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas te phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong bzhin du khyed gnyis kyis de skad 
[\[123b.2\]]ces/_dgra bcom pa dag med na dgra bcom pa bsad pa yod re skan/_zhes zer ram/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha ji ltar de gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bgyi ba chud gzan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te/_deng sang nyid du yang rang rang gi 
[\[123b.3\]]mchod rten na mchis pa lha'i mngon sum du bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na tshur shog dang ci yang dag pa'am/_yang dag pa ma yin pa ltar 'dong ngo /_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs thams cad du ji ltar rgyal dang /_skar rgyal 
[\[123b.4\]]gnyis byi la'i skye gnas su skyes te rang rang gi mchod rten na 'dug nas rgyal po ltar song ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra des khyab par gyur nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag ltad mo skyes nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/de nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis rgyal po dang 
[\[123b.5\]]bcas pa'i 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i mdun du smras pa/_rgyal dang skar rgyal gnyis nyon cig bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis khyed gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gzan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te rang rang gi mchod rten na 
[\[123b.6\]]'dug pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des sha sri 'di long la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig_/de skad smras pa dang /_de gnyis kyis rang rang gi khung nas byung ste sha sri blangs nas rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi khung 
[\[123b.7\]]du zhugs pa srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis mthong nas/_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha gzigs sam/_des smras pa mthong ngo /_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha de ltar na 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis te de ni skye bo'i bka' mchid 'ba' 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]zhig tu bas so/_/de nas rgyal po de la 'jig rten dgra bcom pa dag yod do snyam pa'i lta ba yod pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de na gang dag ma dad pa de dag la ni med par lta ba skyes par gyur to/_/gang dag bar mar gnas pa de dag ni yid gnyis 
[\[124a.2\]]za bar gyur to/_/gang dag dad pa de dag ni gnong zhing mi dga' ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis bsams pa/_gal te 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag med na bdag gis ci'i phyir 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang /_
[\[124a.3\]]dge slong ma ri ma 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms dbul snyam nas des dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyi bsod snyoms bcad nas dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyang grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po dang /_dge 
[\[124a.4\]]slong ma ri ma ni gdul ba la ltos pas de nyid na 'khod do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtsug pud can grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas phyir byung ba na tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po grong khyer sgra sgrogs su bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_des rgyal po mthong nas 'di mi dga' 
[\[124a.5\]]bar sems par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de mtha' gcig tu sdod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'di nga mthong nas mtha' gcig 
[\[124a.6\]]tu song ste sdod/_de'i phyi bzhin blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i thugs lam na lha ga shed du gzigs mo dang dge mtshan la gshegs pas mi dgyes par dgongs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam pa 
[\[124a.7\]]dang /_tshon gyi las bgyi ba dka' bas chos gos dag rdul gyis phog par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam du dgongs so/_/rgyal po cang mi smra bar song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrogs su bsod snyoms brgyus te byung ba na rgyal po gtsug pud can nang du 'jug 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po de bzhin du mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis de mtha' gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dis sngar nga mthong nas 
[\[124b.2\]]mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i rgyu ni de yin na da ltar yang mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i rgyu ci yin/_de'i phyi bzhin blon po skyon chags pa gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha 'di'i mchid nas kho bo pha gsod pa 'di'i rdul gyis mi reg par bya'o zhes mchi'o/_/
[\[124b.3\]]rgyal po de ni yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de skad thos nas khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te 'khor thams cad la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag las gang dang gang nga la dga' ba de dang des dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i steng du sa spar mo re res gtor cig_/skye bo'i tshogs 
[\[124b.4\]]thams cad kyis sa spar mo re re gtor to/_/rgyal po de dpung che ba yin pas re res sa spar mo re re tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i steng du gtor ba dang /_de'i steng du sa phung chen po rnam par gnas par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos kyang de'i dbus su lo ma ma 
[\[124b.5\]]yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul te 'dug go/_/de dag de las 'thor ba na ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag smod bzhin du mtha' 'khor zhing sdod pa na blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ba phyogs der phyin nas de gnyis 
[\[124b.6\]]kyis dris pa/_shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po 'thab krol can pha gsod pa des 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa sas bkab bo/_/de gnyis mchi mas brnangs te ngu ba'i bzhin gyis ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi dag dang 
[\[124b.7\]]lhan cig sa phyag par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po byung nas de gnyis kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te dris pa/_'phags pa 'di ci lags/_des smras pa/_las dag yin mod gzhan ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur//_//'dul 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa gtsug pud can skye bo phal po che dang bcas pas las 'di lta bu bgyis pa gang lags pa de'i rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur/_des smras pa/_deng nas nyi ma bdun na grong 
[\[125a.2\]]khyer sgra sgrogs sas non par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rim pa ji lta bur 'gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa gnyis re zhig nyi ma dang po la rlung mo che byung nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab 
[\[125a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi nyen kor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa 
[\[125a.4\]]de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing /_de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_'phags pa ci lags/_bdag cag gnyis kyang las de'i 
[\[125a.5\]]cha can lags sam/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnyis khyed gnyis ni las de'i cha can ma yin no/_/'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag cag gnyis kyis grong khyer 'di nas ji ltar 'byung bar bgyi/_des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnyis khyed gnyis kyis rang gi khyim nas chu klung 
[\[125a.6\]]gi bar du phug rkor chug la khyim drung du gru bzhag ste sdod la gang gi tshe rin po che'i char 'bab pa de'i tshe na rin po che dag gis gru 'gengs su chug la bros shig_/de gnyis kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te grong khyer sgra sgrogs su zhugs nas de gnyis rgyal po'i gan du 
[\[125a.7\]]song ste smras pa/_'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la cung zhig bgyis sam/_ci na dog sas bkab/_des smras pa/_shes ldan gnyis de gson nam/_lha gson no/_/ci zer/_lha de 'di skad ces deng nas gdugs bdun na grong khyer sgra sgrogs dog sas non par 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'gyur zhes mchi'o/_/rim pa ji ltar 'gyur/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha de 'di skad ces re zhig nyi ma dang po la rlung mo che byung nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab 
[\[125b.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi nyen kor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa 
[\[125b.3\]]de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha bram ze gang la slong mo stsal 
[\[125b.4\]]nas yang bcad na de legs pa ci zhig sems te/_lhas de 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms stsal nas bcad cing sas kyang g.yogs pas de 'di skad mchi ba las gzhan pa ches shis pa'i tshig smra bar ga la 'gyur/_rgyal po gtsug pud can gyis bsams pa/_de 
[\[125b.5\]]bden no snyam pa dang /_blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis bzhin bsgyur cing lag pa gnyis yongs su dril te dong ngo /_/de na he ru ka la bu sngo bsangs zhes bya ba khye'u zhig yod la/_b+hi ru ka la yang bu mo sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba bu mo zhig yod nas/_he ru kas 
[\[125b.6\]]khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la phul te smras pa/_'phags pa gal te 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na rab tu dbyung du gsol/_gal te ma mchis na 'di khyod nyid kyi zhabs 'bring ba lags so/_/b+hi ru kas kyang bu mo sngo bsangs can dge slong ma ri ma 
[\[125b.7\]]la phul te smras pa/_'phags ma gal te 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na rab tu dbyung du gsol/_gal te ma mchis na kau shAm+bI na khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi ba bdag gi chung po grogs shig mchis pa de la gtad du gsol/_des khas blangs so/_/de 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]nas dge slong ma ri ma bu mo sngo bsangs can khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer sgra sgrogs nas song nas/_des bu mo de kau shAm+bIr khyim bdag gdangs can la gtad nas phrin ji skad spring ba yang bzlas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po ni de nyid du 'dug go/_/
[\[126a.2\]]blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis khyim nas chu klung gi bar du phug rkor bcug ste khyim drung du gru bzhag nas bsdad do/_/ji tsam na nyi ma de la rlung mo che byung nas des grong khyer sgra sgrogs de rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag go/_/nyi 
[\[126a.3\]]ma gnyis pa la me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal po nga las nu la dgung bdun du dbyig gi char bab ces gda' bas lha la yang me tog gi char 'di bab pas ring po mi thogs par gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur 
[\[126a.4\]]ro/_/nyi ma gsum pa la gos kyi char bab pa dang /_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha la gos kyi char 'di bab pas ring po mi thogs par dngul gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma bzhi pa la dngul gyi char bab pa dang /_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis 
[\[126a.5\]]smras pa/_lha la dngul gyi char 'di bab pas ring po mi thogs par gser gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/nyi ma lnga pa la gser gyi char bab pa dang /_blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha la gser gyi char 'di bab pas ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab 
[\[126a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi nyen kor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrogs su zhugs shing de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char bab pa dang /_blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis rin po 
[\[126a.7\]]che dag gis gru 'gengs su bcug ste bros so/_/de na he ru kas phyogs gzhan zhig tu he ru ka'i rtsal zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rtsig tu bcug nas/_de'i ming he ru ka'i rtsal he ru ka'i rtsal ces bya bar gyur to/_/b+hi ru kas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu b+hi ru ka'i rtsal ces bya ba'i grong 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]khyer rtsig tu bcug nas de'i ming b+hi ru ka'i rtsal b+hi ru ka'i rtsal ces bya bar gyur to/_/nyi ma bdun pa la sa'i char 'bab par brtsams pa dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs su sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po byung nas rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag sgra mthon po dang /_sgra chen po de 
[\[126b.2\]]ci blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha sa'i char bab bo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka ga na 'dug tshol cig_/de dag gis btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na de gnyis bros par tshor nas/_de dag gis 
[\[126b.3\]]rgyal po la smras pa/_lha de gnyis bros te ma mchis so/_/de nas rgyal po gtsug pud can 'bros par brtsams pa dang /_mi ma yin pa dag gis sgo bcad do/_/khye'u sngo bsangs kyis smras pa/_'phags pa grong khyer du sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung ba 'di ci lags/_
[\[126b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos smras pa/_bu skar khung nas khar phor phyir phyung shig_/des skar khung nas khar phor phyir phyung ba dang sas phyed tsam gang bar gyur nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bsams pa/_da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin no snyam mo/_/
[\[126b.5\]]ji tsam na yang khar phor phyi rol du phyung ba dang byur bur gang bar gyur nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bsams pa/_da ni spyod yul med par gyur gyis 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de tshe dang ldan pa kA 
[\[126b.6\]]t+yA ya na chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag kyang mchi ste 'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/des dang du blangs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos sngo bsangs la smras pa/_bu chos gos kyi grwa 
[\[126b.7\]]nas zung shig dang 'dong ngo /_/des chos gos kyi grwa nas bzung ba dang des khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las song ngo /_/sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo yang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]kyang sas non par gyur to/_/de dag mthar gyis kha ra ba na zhes bya ba'i ri brags su phyin nas de dag de na g.yul gyi gzhi na 'khod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos khye'u sngo bsangs g.yul gyi gzhir bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_lha mo 
[\[127a.2\]]de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhi der 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas de na mi gang 'dug pa des khye'u de mthong nas de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_kye khye'u khyod kyi mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to/_/des smras pa/_kho bo'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur pa 
[\[127a.3\]]ma yin te/_'di ltar grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te phyogs ga ge mo zhig na 'dug pa de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to/_/de de'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_lha mo bdag grong du mchi ste slar 
[\[127a.4\]]mchi'i bar du re zhig lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po 'di gzung zhing khyod kyis bdag ma lags pa gzhan su la yang mi stsal bar gsol/_des blangs pa dang /_mi de yang ri brags su song nas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus te smras pa/_shes ldan dag grong 
[\[127a.5\]]khyer sgra sgrogs na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te g.yul gyi gzhi na 'dug pas de'i mthus g.yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas bdag gis de'i lag tu lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po byin te bdag gis de la bdag grong du mchi ste slar mchi'i bar du lde mig 
[\[127a.6\]]dang /_lde mig kyog po 'di gzung zhing khyod kyis bdag ma gtogs pa gzhan su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o zhes smras kyis/_de'i phyir grong mi rnams la gal te bdag gi bu gtso bor dbang bskur na kho bo bdag nyid srog dang 'bral bar gsol ba 'debs te/_de lta na lha mo 
[\[127a.7\]]bdag cag gi gnas nas gar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur bas khyed cag longs spyod dag gis mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing yams kyi nad thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis de'i bu gtso bor dbang bskur nas des kyang bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas so/_/de 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]nas de dag gis gnas de thams cad spos dang me tog gis mdzes par byas shing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan te/_gtor ma thogs nas lha mo de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha mo khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs par gsol/_des 
[\[127b.2\]]smras pa/_kho mo ni 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin pas 'di na kho mo'i gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos smras pa/_lha mo khyod kyis gang las lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po blangs pa soms shig_/des bsam pa la zhugs 
[\[127b.3\]]pa dang /_ji tsam na mi de dus la bab par mthong nas des gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho mo dam tshig gis gnas par bya ste/_gal te kho mo'i gnas gzhi ji lta bu byed du 'jug pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i gnas gzhi yang byed du 'jug 
[\[127b.4\]]na kho mo 'dug go/_/de dag gis khas blangs nas/_de dag gis lha mo de'i gnas ji lta bu byed du bcug pa de lta bur tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gnas kyang byed du bcug go/_/lha mo de'i gnas su mar me btsugs pa gang yin pa de des khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na 
[\[127b.5\]]chen po'i gnas su 'dzugs par byed do/_/de mar me khyer te 'gro ba rtsig drung na 'dug pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas des bsams pa/_lha mo 'di 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i gan du 'dong bas 'gro'o snyam pa dang /_des de'i sems shes nas khros te ri brags 'di na gnas 
[\[127b.6\]]pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di ni sdig pa'i sems kun du spyod pa yin te/_'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis skur ba 'debs par byed do snyam nas/_des ri brags der mi ngas phyung ste skye bo phal po che shi bar gyur nas skye bo shi ba'i ro phyir 
[\[127b.7\]]'byin pa na khri dang khri dag 'dom par gyur to/_/gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bkug ste/_dris pa/_'di ci las gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mo 'khrugs so/_/de dag gis de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]pa/_khyed cag 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyis skur pa 'debs par byed do/_/de dag gis yang smras pa/_lha mo bzod pa mdzod cig dang 'ga' yang bsnyen bkur ma lags pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_
[\[128a.2\]]dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/_gal te khyed cag kho mo la ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ltar 'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la yang byed na bzod par bya'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha mo ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyis bzod par mdzod cig_/des de dag la bzod par 
[\[128a.3\]]byas so/_/de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de nyid du dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de lha mo la smras nas 'phags pa dang /_lha mos smras pa/_
[\[128a.4\]]'phags pa bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so/_/des de la khar phor byin nas des de la khas phub ste mchod rten du byas nas dus ston byed du bcug nas/_khar phor gyi dus ston khar phor gyi dus ston zhes bya ba'i ming du 
[\[128a.5\]]gyur te/_deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i chos gos kyi grwa nas 'jus te de 'phyang zhing 'gro ba ba lang rdzi dang phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas/_de dag gis 'phyang ba pa 'phyang 
[\[128a.6\]]ba pa zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po phyung bas yul de'i mi rnams kyi ming 'phyang ba pa 'phyang ba pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i ri brags shig tu phyin nas der khye'u sngo bsangs shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/ri brags de na 
[\[128a.7\]]rgyal po bu med par dus la bab nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang blon po dang /_yul mi dag 'dus te smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_gang bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags pa'o/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]de ji ltar shes par bya/_kha cig gis smras pa/_rtog pa dag bsko bar bya'o/_/de dag gis rtog pa dag bskos nas de dag gis phan tshun btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis khye'u de shing ljon pa'i drung na gnyid log pa mthong nas/_de dag gis de'i mtshan ma gzung 
[\[128b.2\]]bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na shing ljon pa gzhan dag gi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol ba dang /_shar phyogs su 'bab pa dang /_shar phyogs su bab par gyur na shing ljon pa de'i grib mas khye'u de'i lus mi gtong bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gros bya bar 
[\[128b.3\]]brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag khye'u 'di bsod nams dang dbang che bar grags pa yin gyis 'di dbang bskur bar bya'o/_/de dag gis de sad par byas te smras pa/_khye'u rgyal srid long shig_/khye'us smras pa/_kho bo rgyal srid don du gnyer ba ma yin te/_kho bo ni 
[\[128b.4\]]'phags pa kA t+yA ya na chen po'i bsnyen bkur ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos thos nas ci khye'u 'di la rgyal srid du 'gyur ba'i las dag yod dam med snyam du bsams nas yod par mthong nas des smras pa/_bu rgyal srid long la 'di ltar khyod kyis chos kyis 
[\[128b.5\]]byed du chug shig_/des mnos te/_de dag gis de dbang bskur nas khye'u sngo bsangs kyis der rgyal srid byed du bcug pas sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po yul bog ka nar phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[128b.6\]]kA t+yA ya na chen po'i ma bog ka nar skyes pa des tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mthong nas smras pa/_bu khyod yun ring zhig lon nas mthong ngo /_/bu khyod yun ring zhig lon nas mthong ngo /_/de'i nu ma gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun 'dzag go/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen 
[\[128b.7\]]pos de la yum yum zhes bag phab pa dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po zan byin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas/_des stan de nyid la 'dug 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par byas so/_/des bden pa mthong 
[\[129a.2\]]nas btsun pas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang 
[\[129a.3\]]mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang 
[\[129a.4\]]pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_dka' ba byed pa'i ma la ni/_/bu pho bzang pos gang bya ba/_/de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis/_/sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur/_/ngan song dag nas 
[\[129a.5\]]legs phyung zhing /_/khyod kyis mtho ris thar pa la/_/rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste/_/khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mdzad/_/tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar/_/mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni/_/nye bar brten pa bzang ba lags/_/
[\[129a.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos bu mo bzang mo de bden pa dag la bzhag nas smras pa/_yum bltas lags kyis bdag mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu gal te de lta na bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so/_/des de la khar ba 
[\[129a.7\]]byin nas des mchod rten byas te/_der btsugs nas khar ba'i mchod rten khar ba'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te/_deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po yul dbus su 'gro 'dod nas yul sin 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]dur phyin pa dang /_de nas byang lam na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa des tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag la yang mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so/_/des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[129b.2\]]kyis yul dbus su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas 'di de la sbyin no snyam nas/_des lham sgrog gu can de de la byin pa dang /_des gnas gzhi byed du bcug ste der bzhag pa dang /_kha cig gis ni lham gyi dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so/_/kha cig 
[\[129b.3\]]gis lham gyi gzhi zhes bya bar shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen po mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so/_/'ongs pa legs so/_/ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[129b.4\]]pa dag cung zad bde bar yang brgyus/_cung zad sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus so/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_ji ltar bde bar brgyus/_ji ltar sdug bsngal bar brgyus/_des smras pa/_sems can gyi bya ba byas pa/_gang yin pa de dag ni bde bar brgyus pa 
[\[129b.5\]]yin no/_/rgyal po gtsug pud can dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bdag sas mnan pa gang yin pa dang /_blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis tshegs chen pos bros pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal bar brgyus pa yin no/_/
[\[129b.6\]]dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis smad de smras pa/_de ni pha gsod pa yin te/_des tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa bsad de/_'di ni de'i me tog tsam yin gyi 'bras bu ni gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams the 
[\[129b.7\]]tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas las ci bgyis na des phyug pa nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis nas mtshon gyis bkum par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong u tra ya na nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye 
[\[130a.2\]]bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas u tra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 
[\[130a.3\]]'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa 
[\[130a.4\]]brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag_/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas 
[\[130a.5\]]mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam du ri brags shig na rngon pa zhig 'dug ste/_ri brags de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa mtshe'u zhig yod pa 
[\[130a.6\]]der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang bya mang po dag drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /_nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do/_/de'i rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa yin 
[\[130a.7\]]no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/der bsod snyoms 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]brgyus nas bsams pa/_lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mod pa yin gyis/_ri brags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o snyam nas de ri brags nas byung ste/_'di ni zhi ba'o/_/'di ni zhi ba'o/_/zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas lhung 
[\[130b.2\]]bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas/_lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang /_chu tshags gnas ji lta ba 
[\[130b.3\]]bzhin du bzhag nas/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /_de'i nyin mo mi'i dris [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma zin to/_/de na rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te mtshe'u de 
[\[130b.4\]]ga la ba der song nas/_des rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi rngon spyad dang /_rnyi dang rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na/_gang gi phyir deng [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i 
[\[130b.5\]]rgyu gang yin snyam nas/_des mtshe'u de'i then kor byul bar brtsams pa dang mi'i rjes mthong nas/_de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsams pa/_rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu 
[\[130b.6\]]dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad pa ma byas na 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/_snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pha rol btang ba 
[\[130b.7\]]des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to/_/rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/_rngon pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smas pa dang /_nyams par gyur na mi rung gis/_'di la lag nas 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]drang ba sbyin no snyam nas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur 
[\[131a.2\]]du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du sgyel nas smras pa/_yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/_mar gshegs su gsol/_nyon mongs 'dam du bying ba bdag 
[\[131a.3\]]gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/_rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi mkha' las shod du babs so/_/de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te/_rma lhan gyis glan nas smras pa/_'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol/_gal te 
[\[131a.4\]]'dir gser gyi lhan pas glan par mdzad na de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/_bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas de'i phyir da ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 
[\[131a.5\]]bya'o snyam nas/_de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/_/rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas des spos kyi 
[\[131a.6\]]shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag bsgreng zhing dri dang /_phreng 
[\[131a.7\]]ba rgyu dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/_bdag yon gnas dam par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bar mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/_longs spyod che bar skye zhing 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge 
[\[131b.2\]]slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong u tra ya na yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi 
[\[131b.3\]]lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su gyur nas mda' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun cing dus la bab ste/_da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom pa thob kyang de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da 
[\[131b.4\]]ltar phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che bar skyes shing nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing /_'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs 
[\[131b.5\]]byung bar ma byas so/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/
[\[131b.6\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas 
[\[131b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rgyal po gtsug pud can dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na chen pos las ci bgyis na des dog sas non par gyur/_blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis kyis las ci zhig 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]bgyis na bros par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de 
[\[132a.2\]]dag nyid kyis las byas shing /_bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams 
[\[132a.3\]]la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams 
[\[132a.4\]]la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na khyim bdag zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[132a.5\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung ngo /_/yang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu mo zhig byung nas/_de gnyis bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/bu mo de dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dag slong ba 'ongs na/_bu mo de la 
[\[132a.6\]]slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam 
[\[132a.7\]]na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas bu mo des khyim phyags nas phyag dar rib ma'i steng nas bor ba de rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de'i mgo la phog go/_/bu mo des der phog pa mthong nas 'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes la/_stes 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]dbang gis de nyid kyi nyin mo de slong ba 'ongs nas ming pos de la dris pa/_deng khyod kyis ci byas na des na khyod slong ba 'ongs/_des smras pa/_bdag gis deng rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dar bor ro/_/des 'dzum phyung ba dang /_bu mo des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing des kyang 
[\[132b.2\]]gzhan dag la sbran nas/_'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi 'ong ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na de la slong ba 'ong ngo /_/zhes sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo /_/bdag nyid chen po rnams ni bsnyen bkur ma yin pas 'jigs pas rang sangs rgyas 
[\[132b.3\]]de ri brags de nas song ba dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi steng du dor bar brtsams nas de dag kyang dong ba dang /_pha ma dag gi steng du bor bar brtsams so/_/ri brags de na khyim bdag dge ba'i chos can gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis kyis smras pa/_shes 
[\[132b.4\]]ldan dag dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par bya'o/_/zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing spangs so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor ba de ni rgyal po gtsug pud can 'di yin no/_/ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye 
[\[132b.5\]]bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag yin te/_'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas dang /_drang srong dang /_pha ma dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sas non par gyur to/_/khyim bdag gnyis 
[\[132b.6\]]kyis bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /_b+hi ru ka gnyis yin te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to/_/bu mo'i ming po gang gis 'dzum phyung ba de ni dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po yin te/_des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin 
[\[132b.7\]]pas sas g.yogs te/_gal te dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen pos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na/_dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po yang sas non cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 
[\[133a.2\]]'dren ma rnams spangs te/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/kau shAm+bI na 
[\[133a.3\]]khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar pa'i drung na 'dug cing de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o/_/de dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas rgyal po shar pas sgra'i gdangs las 
[\[133a.4\]]de la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod par shes so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shar pa don gyi gnas na 'dug pas blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te rang nyid las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 
[\[133a.5\]]'gro ste/_'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag na ci'i phyir bdag nyid ngal bar byed/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te/_gal te 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum mchis na ci'i slad du bdag nyid ngal bar 
[\[133a.6\]]bgyid/_rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bos shig dang dri'o/_/de dag gis khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bos nas rgyal pos dris pa/_khyim bdag khyod la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod dam/_lha mchis 
[\[133a.7\]]te/_gal te bzhed na bzhes su gsol/_khyim bdag nga ni gser don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/_'di ltar ngas khyod la ci yod dam med ces dri bar zad do/_/lha mchis te lhas ji ltar mkhyen pa de zhu'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod dbyig gi gdangs 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]can yin pas ngas sgra'i gdangs shes so/_/khyim bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal pos gdangs las shes pas de'i ming khyim bdag gdangs can khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos de la smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod phyug por gyur pa yin na ci'i phyir khyod 
[\[133b.2\]]rang gis zhal ta byas te las kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug_/des smras pa/_lha gal te bdag gis rang gi zhal ta bgyis te las kyi mtha' bgyid du ma stsal na/_bdag gi longs spyod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_yangs par yang mi 'gyur la/_lhas kyang bdag dbyig gi 
[\[133b.3\]]gdangs can lags par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir glang po che dang rta dag gis mi 'gro_/lha bdag khyim khol lags pas glang po che dang rta dag gis mchi ba bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma lags so/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_
[\[133b.4\]]grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyis/_'di blon po kho nar gzhug go snyam du rig nas smras pa/_khyim bdag blon po gyis shig dang /_lhan cig tu rgyal srid byed du gzhug go/_/des smras pa/_lha de skad bka' stsal pa mi rigs te/_bdag ni khyim khol 
[\[133b.5\]]lags pas bdag zhing las kyi mtha' rjes su bsgrub par rigs kyi/_blon por mi rigs so/_/rgyal pos de lta de ltar nan gyis mnan na ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes te/_nan gyis mnan nas des kyang khas blangs so/_/de nas rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas 
[\[133b.6\]]khyim bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang /_rigs pas rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas/_des blon po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /_de dag phrag dog skyes te yid mi bde bar gyur nas 'dus te smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag 
[\[133b.7\]]cag 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can gyis zil gyis mnan par gyur na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la ci'i phyir bsgrub tu med/_'di ji srid du gtan du gting tshugs par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di la rgyal pos chad pas gcod du gzhug par bya'o/_/
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]kha cig gis smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal po'i gan du dong nas smras pa/_lha rgyal po su lags/_des smras pa/_khyed cag ga las the tshom za/_rgyal po nga yin mod gzhan su zhig yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha gdangs 
[\[134a.2\]]can rgyal po lags kyi khyod ni ma lags te/_gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci'i phyir de de ltar 'gyur te/_de ni chos gtso bor byed pa 
[\[134a.3\]]yin pas ji ltar de ltar byed par 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis lha'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgol ba dang /_phyir rgol ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[134a.4\]]du zhugs nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang du thams cad skye bo'i tshogs kyis gang bar des rgyal po'i bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang /_rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba snga na 'khod pa dag kyang de dang lhan cig phyir byung ste rgyal po'i tshogs med par 
[\[134a.5\]]'dug pa dang /_blon po de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha gzigs sam/_bdag cag gis gsol pa gang lags pa de ni 'di lags te/_gal te 'di 'tshal bar gyur na lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[134a.6\]]rgyal pos bsams pa/_re zhig 'di brtag par bya'o snyam nas/_des de rgyu ba dang gnas pa las brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na byang lam nas ded dpon gyis zong rta ded de kau shAm+bIr phyin nas rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/_gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos shig_/des 
[\[134a.7\]]gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos pa dang /_rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba/_'bum gyi phyed byin la 'di skad ces bdag gis 'bum tshang bar byin zin to/_/zhes byos shig_/des smras pa/_lha de mi rigs te/_gal te de ltar bgyis na slan cad 'dir chibs rta 'tshong ba 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]dang /_gzhan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur gyis 'di ltar lha'i dkor las 'bum phyed stsol cig dang bdag gis 'bum phyed stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na 'di ci 'gal/_des smras pa/_lha bdag gis tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal 
[\[134b.2\]]gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thog go/_/rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang de ma btub nas/_de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du 
[\[134b.3\]]bcag pa de'i chad pa ci yin/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha de'i chad pa ni dgum pa lags so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyim bdag gdangs can yongs su btang ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis mi gshed ma pa dag la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag lhas 
[\[134b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gdangs can sod cig ces byung ngo /_/rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag la gsang ste bsgo ba/_khyed kyis khyim bdag gdangs can gsad par mi bya bar 'di ltar bsdigs par bya'o/_/de dag gis de'i mgrin par ka ra bI ra'i phreng ba btags te grong khyer 
[\[134b.5\]]gyi dbus nas gsod sar khrid pa dang /_de'i nye du dag dong ste smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di la lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig_/des smras pa/_kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam/_ci gal te lhas kho bos nyes pa 
[\[134b.6\]]med pa gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/_kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/_/mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de gsod sar khrid de smras pa/_khyim bdag lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du 
[\[134b.7\]]ma gzhug shig_/des smras pa/_kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam ci/_gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa/_gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/_kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/_/mi 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gshed ma pa de dag gis de rgyal po'i gan du khrid de smras pa/_lha khyim bdag gdangs can 'di 'di skad mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag nga khyod gsod par 'dod pa ma yin te/_'di ltar brtag par 'dod do/_/des smras pa/_lhas bdag brtag pa'i dgongs 
[\[135a.2\]]pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsal na/_gal te bkyon na ji ltar bgyis par 'gyur/_'di ltar gal te lha bdag la dgyes na bdag sbyin pa dag stsol cing /_bsod nams dag bgyid par ci gnang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta na gnang gis ci dgar sbyin pa dag byin 
[\[135a.3\]]cig_/bsod nams dag gyis shig_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/_sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa mi bsko nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te 'dir sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang /_cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_gzhan 
[\[135a.4\]]dag 'ongs par gyur na kho bo la sbron cig_/ji tsam na lho lam nas drang srong lnga brgya tsam yul dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dong ba na dgon pa'i lam du phyin nas de dag dgon pa'i nang du son pa na chu zad nas de dag chu dang bral bas skom gyis gdungs nas dgon 
[\[135a.5\]]pa'i lam der phan tshun byul bar brtsams pa dang /_de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gis ha cang thag mi ring ba na gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs na shing ljon pa zhig mthong nas de na kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs 'di na shing ljon pa zhig snang gis tshur sheg 
[\[135a.6\]]dang /_'di na chu yod par 'gyur gyis ltar 'dong ngo /_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag dong ba dang ci tsam na chu med par mthong nas de dag gis gsol ba gdab par brtsams te/_shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di/_lha'am/_
[\[135a.7\]]klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_dri za'am/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig ces smras so/_/ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las lag pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]zhig gser gyi ril ba b+h+ring gar thogs te byung nas drang srong rnams kyis snyim pa bzed de chu btung bar brtsams nas/_ji tsam na myangs na chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/_bsil ba dang /_mngar ba dang /_yang ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_gsal ba dang /_dri nga ba med pa dang /_
[\[135b.2\]]'thung na mgul la mi gnod pa dang /_'thungs pa na lto mi na ba yin te/_de dag tshim par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dong ba dang /_de dag la blo skyes pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/_las gang 
[\[135b.3\]]gis 'dir skyes zhes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis/_tshur sheg phyir log la dri'o snyam nas de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/_shing ljon pa de la lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam nam mkha' lding ngam/_dri za 
[\[135b.4\]]'am mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba/_gnod pa dang nyam nga ba mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des bdag gang yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir 
[\[135b.5\]]skyes pa smros shig_/ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/_shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas kho bo su yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/_drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/_kye 
[\[135b.6\]]bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/_the tshom ma za bar smros shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang /_kho bo gang yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/_/yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan 
[\[135b.7\]]yod ces bya ba de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i khyim drung na kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing 'dug 'dug ste/_de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i slong mo ba dag lhags shing lhags shing kho bo la khyim bdag mgon 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi khyim gang yin zhes dris nas/_kho bos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis de nas lag pa gang ba dang /_snod gang ba dang /_'byor pa thob pa dang /_
[\[136a.2\]]rnyed pa thob cing 'dong ba de dag kho bos mthong ngo /_/mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed de/_kho bo las des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes shing /_shing ljon pa 'di la gnas te/_de'i phyir kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa shin tu lham me/_lhan ne/_
[\[136a.3\]]lhang nger gyur to/_/de dag gis shis pa brjod pas bstod de dong ngo /_/ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin nas bza' ba dang btung ba zad de/_de dag bkres pas gdungs shing skom pas gdungs nas kun du brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig 
[\[136a.4\]]na shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste/_sngar yang bdag cag gis shing ljon pa 'di lta bu kho nas chu grub kyis 'dir 'dong dang gal te na [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]'grub par 
[\[136a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/zhes de dag der dong ste gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_dri za'am/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa de bdag cag drang 
[\[136a.6\]]srong lnga brgya bkres pas gdungs pa dang skom pas gdungs pa rnams la zas dang skom byin cig ces smras so/_/ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/_shes ldan dag deng shig dang 'di nas ha cang mi ring ba na rdzing bu zhig yod pa de'i 'gram na shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i 
[\[136a.7\]]drung na 'bras chan gyis bre bo gang zhing 'dug pa de las zos shing 'thungs nas bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer cig_/de dag dong ba dang /_ji tsam na rdzing bu bya ngang pa dang /_kA raN+Da ba dang /_ngur pas mdzes par byas pa zhig 'dug pa de'i 'gram na shing ljon pa zhig 'dug pa de'i 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]drung na 'bras chan tshod ma sna tshogs dang bcas pas gang ba zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/_de dag gis der khrus byas te zos shing chu 'thungs nas ril ba chus bkang ste/_bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer nas shis pa brjod de dong ba dang /_de dag la blo skyes pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[136b.2\]]bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/_las gang gis 'dir skyes zhes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis tshur sheg phyir log la dri'o snyam nas/_de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/_shing 
[\[136b.3\]]ljon pa 'di la lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_dri za'am/_mi 'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la 
[\[136b.4\]]chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang /_zas kyis tshim par byas pa des bdag gang yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig_/ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/_shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas kho bo su 
[\[136b.5\]]yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/_drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/_kye bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/_the tshom ma za bar smros shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de 
[\[136b.6\]]lta na nyon cig dang kho bo gang yin pa dang /_las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/_/yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brags shig na bram 
[\[136b.7\]]ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod srabs nas des bsam pa/_mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyis de'i gan du song na de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa na/_des de mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag la zas kyi mgron gyis shig_/des de la smras pa/_bram ze tshur 
[\[137a.2\]]shog_/rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong la der zo shig_/de de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/_bram ze'i zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun la brims shig_/
[\[137a.3\]]khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang /_bram ze des kyang zho'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brims so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[137a.4\]]dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim pa dag zan sbyin par brtsams te/_des khyim pa gzhan dag la ni zas bsod pa byin/_bram ze de la ni ngan pa byin pa dang /_des de la smras pa/_khyim bdag rab tu byung ba rnams ni bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas re zhig 'di 
[\[137a.5\]]dag la ni bsod pa sbyin par rigs na/_bdag cag khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs par 'dra na ci'i phyir khyim pa gzhan dag la ni zas bsod pa sbyin la bdag la ni zas ngan pa sbyin/_des de la smras pa/_bram ze khyim pa 'di dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin 
[\[137a.6\]]te/_'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/_/des de la smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len na bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/_des de la smras pa sbyin no/_/des yan lag brgyad dang 
[\[137a.7\]]ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas des zos te 'phags pa dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/_bram ze yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang skom 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/des skom 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'thungs te song ba dang /_nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brags shig yod pa der bram ze'i khyim zhig tu gnas pa dang /_bram ze des de la smras pa/_bram ze zan zo zhig_/des smras pa/_kho bos zan mi za'o/_/des smras pa/_ci'i 
[\[137b.2\]]phyir/_des smras pa/_kho bo dge sbyong gau ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/_/des de la smras pa/_bram ze gal te re zhig za na de lta na legs/_gal te mi za na kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o/_/des dus ma yin par zos nas gso sbyong ral lo/_/ri 
[\[137b.3\]]brags na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dral ba de ni kho bo yin te/_kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs te/_thams cad ma dral na kho bo sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 
[\[137b.4\]]zhig na/_kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dus ma yin par zos te/_gso sbyong dral bas kho bo rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing /_de'i phyir kho bo la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis lha'i 
[\[137b.5\]]bu rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba gso sbyong ral zhes bya bar shes so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa/_drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di srid du 
[\[137b.6\]]brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur mi shes na/_lha'i bu gso sbyong ral 'dis bram zer gyur pa na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs shing /_de dral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyis/_bdag cag kyang gang 
[\[137b.7\]]du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa der 'dong ngo /_/de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis gros byas te/_mnyan yod du 'phags nas ji tsam na mthar gyis kau shAm+bIr phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag gdangs can gyi sbyin pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de dag 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]mthong nas/_de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la sbran pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/_sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs can dag mthong na kho bo la sbron cig ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do/_/des smras pa/_'jug 
[\[138a.2\]]tu chug shig_/de dag gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang /_khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag lho lam nas so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar 
[\[138a.3\]]ba mthong ba dang thos pa ci yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag re zhig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo mtshar gzhan dag lta zhog gi_/te por mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo mtshar gang yin pa dag smra bar byas nyon cig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag smros 
[\[138a.4\]]shig dang kho bo ngo mtshar de dag nyan to/_/de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te de dag zan byin nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang du 'deng /_de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[138a.5\]]khyim bdag mnyan yod du 'dong ngo /_/shes ldan dag de na ci yod/_khyim bdag de na lha'i bu gso sbyong ral gyis gang la brten te/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa'i khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod do/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na de 
[\[138a.6\]]kho bo'i yang ma mthong ba'i grogs yin gyis 'di nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gyis la dbyar 'das nas kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo /_/de dag de nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gnas te/_dbyar 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 
[\[138a.7\]]shar pa la smras pa/_lha bdag mnyan yod du bgyi ba cung zhig mchis na/_gal te lhas gnang na der mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyim bdag gal te de lta na song la khyod kyis don bsgrub pa byas nas myur du phyir shog shig_/de rgyal pos gnang nas drang srong lnga brgya po de 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'dir 'ongs te/_skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang des bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[138b.2\]]gis khyim bdag gdangs can ma tshor ba kho nar gnas su 'jug tu gzhug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis/_bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go snyam nas des de bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu bcug ste lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas zan byin no/_/de nas drang srong 
[\[138b.3\]]de dag lhags nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad de smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag ga las 'ongs/_'dir ci la 'ongs/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la gang byin pa de bdag 
[\[138b.4\]]cag la yang byin cig des smras pa/_shes ldan dag mi dran no/_/khyim bdag bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o/_/shes ldan dag legs so/_/de dag gis dran par byas nas des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci kho bo las len nam/_'on te bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[138b.5\]]len/_khyim bdag khyod kyis su las blangs/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das las so/_/khyim bdag gal te de lta na bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to/_/shes ldan dag legs kyis de ltar gyis shig ces des de dag khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[138b.6\]]ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim 
[\[138b.7\]]bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo /_/dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin drang srong lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di 
[\[139a.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len par 'tshal na/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba dang /_
[\[139a.3\]]dge bsnyen nyid du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 
[\[139a.4\]]'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag legs par 
[\[139a.5\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phyung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog_/tshangs 
[\[139a.6\]]par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /_snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/_skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /_lag pa lhung bzed dang /_bya ma bum gyis 'brel pa dang /_dge slong rdzogs par 
[\[139a.7\]]bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/_/yang smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/_/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing /_/mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/_/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]par gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gdams ngag byin nas de dag gis spro ba dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong 
[\[139b.2\]]ba dang gser du mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang /_'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /_
[\[139b.3\]]bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[139b.4\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod 
[\[139b.5\]]par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang /_tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid dang /_mtho ris kyi bka' mchid dang /_
[\[139b.6\]]'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 
[\[139b.7\]]'das kyis de sems rangs pa dang /_sems nyams bde ba dang /_sems dga' ba dang /_sems la sgrib pa med pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal ba dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/'di lta ste dper na gos dag pa nag nog med pa kha bsgyur du rung ba/_
[\[140a.2\]]tshon du bcug na tshon legs par 'jen par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_khyim bdag gdangs can gyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mngon par rtogs par gyur 
[\[140a.3\]]to/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing 
[\[140a.4\]]chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa 
[\[140a.5\]]bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan cad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[140a.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag khyod ming ci/_btsun pa bdag nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bgyi ba las rgyal po shar pas bdag gdangs las 'tshal bas de'i slad du bdag skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi 
[\[140a.7\]]bar 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bIr gshegs par gsol/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman gyi yo byad dag 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]gis bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/_/khyim bdag kau shAm+bI na gtsug lag khang yod dam/_btsun pa ma mchis so/_/khyim bdag dge slong dag ni gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas par sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs su 
[\[140b.2\]]gsol dang /_bdag gis ji ltar kau shAm+bI na gtsug lag khang mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang /_mchi ba dang /_gnas par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bas gnang 
[\[140b.3\]]ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/_de la mnyan yod na bya ba'am/_byed pa ci yod pa thams 
[\[140b.4\]]cad byas shing bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol 
[\[140b.5\]]cig dang bdag gis de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag dge slong gang gi gdul ba yin snyam du 
[\[140b.6\]]dgongs na dge slong skul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la bka' stsal pa/_skul byed khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms 
[\[140b.7\]]shig_/tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te/_mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]zhugs so/_/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag gdangs 
[\[141a.2\]]can dang 'grogs te/_kau shAm+bI ga la ba de logs su song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na kau shAm+bIr phyin to/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can kau shAm+bIr ma zhugs pa kho nar kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/_tshal nas tshal 
[\[141a.3\]]du dang gol bar song ste/_gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug pa'i sa phyogs kau shAm+bI nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing klag cor chung ba/_mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/_sha sbrang dang /_
[\[141a.4\]]sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces btsal na/_khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rang gi kun dga' ra ba kau shAm+bI nas ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing klag cor chung ba/_mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 
[\[141a.5\]]'ur sgra chung ba/_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_sa phyogs 'di bzang gis 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go snyam mo/_/de na 
[\[141a.6\]]khyim bdag gdangs can dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos/_skyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/_skar khung dang /_skar khung zlum po dang /_lan kan gyis brgyan pa rtsig tu bcug go/_/de nas gtsug 
[\[141a.7\]]lag khang byas shing zin nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i gshegs dgongs kyi tshad ci tsam/_khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]po dang 'dra'o/_/'phags pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/_khyim bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam du 'gro ba'i dgongs mal ni rgyang grags bcu'o/_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs dgongs sa dag shom du bcug nas/_
[\[141b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/_bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bIr gshegs su gsol/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gnas mal dang /_bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang /_sman 
[\[141b.3\]]gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/pho nyas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141b.4\]]bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141b.5\]]las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[141b.6\]]'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/_zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/_grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/_dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/_thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/_dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/_'dod chags dang 
[\[141b.7\]]bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/_mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]yongs su bskor ba/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis 
[\[142a.2\]]yongs su bskor ba/_dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_
[\[142a.3\]]mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_yul 'khor 
[\[142a.4\]]srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_thags zangs ris ltar 
[\[142a.5\]]lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_brgya byin ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/_spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/_chu 
[\[142a.6\]]gter ltar ting nge ba/_sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/_'od 'dom gang gis gzugs 
[\[142a.7\]]can brgyan pa/_nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]rlangs pa dang /_ming chen dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu dang /_'od srung dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /_gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/_kau shAm+bI ga la ba der rgyu zhing 
[\[142b.2\]]gshegs nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na kau shAm+bIr byon to/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/_'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang /_
[\[142b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar sbyar to/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te 
[\[142b.4\]]rang gi khyim du song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul 
[\[142b.5\]]byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod 
[\[142b.6\]]nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/_rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_skul byed rung ste/_skul byed bdun po 'di dag ni 
[\[142b.7\]]gang dag dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/_bdun gang zhe na/_skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i 
[\[143a.2\]]ra ba 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 
[\[143a.3\]]'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du 
[\[143a.4\]]gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_
[\[143a.5\]]bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug 
[\[143a.6\]]lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/_khri dang /_khri'u dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_la ba dang /_sngas dang /_gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_
[\[143a.7\]]nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gsum pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du gtan gyi rkyen ris rjes su mthun pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad 
[\[143b.2\]]pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_
[\[143b.3\]]phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba/_bzhi pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[143b.4\]]kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che
