[\[143b.5\]]ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan 
[\[143b.6\]]pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che 
[\[143b.7\]]ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas rlung langs pa'am/_yul ngan byung ba'am/_char pa bab pa'am/_lhags pa byung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa'am/_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]yul ngan byung ba'am/_char bab pa'am/_lhags pa byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun la 'bras chan dag gam/_skyo ma dag gam/_thug pa'i btung ba dag bskyal te/_'dis 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi rlan pa dang /_chos gos mi gsher ba dang /_longs 
[\[144a.2\]]spyad na bde ba la reg par 'gyur ro snyam pas 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon 
[\[144a.3\]]par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/_/skul byed rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las 
[\[144a.4\]]byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod 
[\[144a.5\]]nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_sa ra yu dang /_gnas can dang /_ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni chu'am/_chu'i bum pa'am/_
[\[144a.6\]]chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/_chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/_chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/skul byed de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang 
[\[144a.7\]]ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/de skad 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[144b.2\]]par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma lags pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[144b.3\]]stsal pa/_skul byed rung ste/_skul byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 
[\[144b.4\]]'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/_bdun gang zhe na/_skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[144b.5\]]pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs ga ge mo zhig na nye bar brten cing bzhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[144b.6\]]kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 
[\[144b.7\]]'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid du tshur gshegs par rtsol bar thos shing thos 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag 
[\[145a.2\]]tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/_/skul byed 
[\[145a.3\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 
[\[145a.4\]]byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba 
[\[145a.5\]]rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[145a.6\]]pa'i nyan thos de nyid grong tshigs de nyid du byon par thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po de dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas 
[\[145a.7\]]pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' 
[\[145b.2\]]ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_
[\[145b.3\]]bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[145b.4\]]pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab 
[\[145b.5\]]tu ston pa nyan cing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag 
[\[145b.6\]]tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/_/skul byed gzhan 
[\[145b.7\]]yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos thos nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dag len par byed pa 'di ni 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]skul byed rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/_gnas pa'am/_nyal ba'am/_mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang /_bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba rdzas las 
[\[146a.2\]]byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/_phan yon che ba/_snang ba che ba/_rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/_/skul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[146a.3\]]dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te 'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 
[\[146a.4\]]'gro'o/_/skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste gang gA dang /_ya mu na dang /_sa ra yu dang /_gnas can dang /_ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni chu'am/_chu'i bum pa'am/_chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/_chu'i bum 
[\[146a.5\]]pa stong phrag gam/_chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/_/zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_'di ltar chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/skul byed de bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di 
[\[146a.6\]]dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/_bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus te/_'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po 
[\[146a.7\]]chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/_/chu klung tha dad 'bab par gyur pa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dag_/mtsho mchog bkra shis gtsang ma ngogs bde ba/_/rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar/_/de bzhin bsod nams rgyun kyang rnam kun tu/_/sbyin bdag gos sbyin zas skom sbyin pa dang /_/mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab/_/chu klung chu 'bab rgya 
[\[146b.2\]]mtshor ji bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ni dad pa dang ldan la de'i 'khor ni ma dad nas des bsams pa/_
[\[146b.3\]]bdag gi 'khor 'di ma dad na bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa je brtag go snyam nas de cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag 
[\[146b.4\]]khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_rgan zhugs shig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[146b.5\]]gdangs can gyi'o/_/'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/_'on te phongs pa lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/_phongs pa ni ji lta bu/_'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags la/_gang na yo 
[\[146b.6\]]byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di phongs pa yin no/_/ji ltar gyur/_khyim bdag de ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin na de'i 'khor ma dad pas mkho ba mi stobs so/_/'di ltar khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa 
[\[146b.7\]]dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod na/_'on kyang de'i khyim de na dbang med de/_gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na de dge slong rnams la mkho ba stobs par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsams pa/_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na bdag shi na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/_khyed cag 
[\[147a.2\]]las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig_/de'i tshe na mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu ba'i phyir phyir byung ba dang /_des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du 
[\[147a.3\]]phyogs der gshegs pa dang /_des bcom ldan 'das la brtag par brtsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos gos kyi grwa rdol bar de la bstan pa dang /_des bsams pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di bzhes 
[\[147a.4\]]su gnang na bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_mgu byed gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na phul cig_/des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa byas 
[\[147a.5\]]nas gus pa bskyed de phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos kyi grwa glan te btsems pa dang /_kha dog mthun par gyur to/_/de dad pa skyes pas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran 
[\[147a.6\]]mor ma gyur cig_/dbul bar ma gyur cig ces smras nas bum pa chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo /_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul shing brims pa dang /_mgu byed kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ci lags/_gdangs can gyis smras pa/_mgu 
[\[147a.7\]]byed khyed cag las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig dang kho bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do/_/des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/_bdag sangs 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro ste/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yis khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig ces des sangs rgyas la sogs pa 
[\[147b.2\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 
[\[147b.3\]]mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'dug par brtsams pa dang /_yang rgan zhugs gzhan zhig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur 
[\[147b.4\]]pa 'di su'i lags/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/_/'phags pa ci gtsug lag khang lags sam/_'on te phongs pa lags/_bzhin [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/_phongs pa ni ji lta bu/_'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum 
[\[147b.5\]]tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags la/_gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di sngon ni phongs par gyur pa las da ni gtsug lag khang du gyur to/_/ji ltar gyur/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag gzhug ma 
[\[147b.6\]]mgu byed ces bya ba/_dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa de khyim bdag des 'dir las su bskos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/_da ltar de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[147b.7\]]slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pas des na 'di gtsug lag khang yin te phongs pa ma yin no/_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas dga' ste khyim du song nas des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po gtad nas 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]nang mi rnams la smras pa/_khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des gnas par gyis shig_/kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di bran mo las phyung ste khyim gyi bdag mor bcug go zhes 
[\[148a.2\]]bsgrags so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar pas gdangs las 'tshal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[148a.3\]]dag da ltar du ma zad de 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag gdangs can 'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo 
[\[148a.4\]]legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/_
[\[148a.5\]]chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/_nga'i yul na 
[\[148a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon cig_/ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis de'i phyir khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni 'khod par bya'o/_/gang dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni 
[\[148a.7\]]gzhan du 'dong bar bya zhing lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru 
[\[148b.2\]]lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung 
[\[148b.3\]]ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu 
[\[148b.4\]]gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/_/de dag der 'khod do/_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga brgya 
[\[148b.5\]]ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed la gsol 
[\[148b.6\]]lags na/_ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/_khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la kho bo cag kyang gzhan no/_/'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung 
[\[148b.7\]]ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/_/de dag kyang der 'khod do/_/khyim bdag gzungs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/_sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas/_spyan 'dren des nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do/_/spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'gro 
[\[149a.2\]]bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyan 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/_des je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o snyam nas de gzhan du song ba dang /_khyi des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gan du song ba dang /_der yang de ma mthong 
[\[149a.3\]]nas des skad phyung ngo /_/rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag spyan 'dren dus las yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyis tshur spyon bzhud do/_/de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag 'phags pa dang /_spyan 'dren 'ongs te 
[\[149a.4\]]khyi des de mthong nas skad dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /_spyan 'dren gyis bsams pa/_'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed sus spyan drangs/_de dag gis smras pa/_bzhin 
[\[149a.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyi 'dis so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag ma nongs kyis slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyis khyed cag gshegs su gsol/_dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs 
[\[149a.6\]]byed gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren gang yin pa de ni bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyi gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gdangs 
[\[149a.7\]]can yin te/_khyim bdag gdangs can 'di de'i tshe yang rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur la/_de ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub gcig 'ongs nas rgyal pos de la smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]khyod su yin/_des smras pa/_lha bdag stong thub lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig_/de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin no/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs 
[\[149b.2\]]can snying po lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+hA pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na des rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul tha 
[\[149b.3\]]dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig_/nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/_/nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de ngas yul med par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni nga rang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[149b.4\]]kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang mnyan yod du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/_nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/_/nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de ngas gsad par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi 
[\[149b.5\]]nor ni nga rang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/_/bar du yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /_yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing yul ma ga d+hA nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong 
[\[149b.6\]]ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/_yul ko sa la nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas thams cad du yul ma ga d+hA na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /_yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar 
[\[149b.7\]]du dong ste 'khod cing don mthun 'joms par byed pas don mthun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chad de/_rgyal po'i dpya dang lo thang mi 'du'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas ru gcig btang na de bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]so/_/de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang /_ru gsum pa btang na de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/_/ji tsam na yul ma ga d+hA nas don mthun yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te bsel ba tshol bar 
[\[150a.2\]]byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/_lha stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tsho na ci'i slad du don mthun gyi bsel mi bgyid/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de 'gro la rag gis thong shig_/blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje khyod rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 
[\[150a.3\]]'tsho la ci'i phyir rgyal po'i bka' bzhin mi byed/_des smras pa/_khyed kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas na de skad du spyo bar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_don mthun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gros 'di'i bsel gyis shig_/des smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o 
[\[150a.4\]]zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags so/_/chom rkun pa rnams kyis de don mthun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/_de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba/_chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re shing rta 
[\[150a.5\]]phyir zlog shig_/gnod pa thob par gyur ta re zhes zer ro/_/des smras pa/_dpa' bo la dpa' bo'i yongs su spang ba byin cig_/chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/_ci khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/_kho bo cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyis phyir log shig_/de nas phan 
[\[150a.6\]]tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go/_/de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang /_bzhi dang /_brgyad dang /_bcu drug dang /_sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_drug bcu rtsa bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar 
[\[150a.7\]]dag lhags nas des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go/_/de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/_ngas khyed kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad na khyed cag kyang srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam/_phyir log shig_/
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras pa/_nged kyi gcig kyang ma sod na ci'i phyir nged phyir ldog khyod kyang rung nged kyang rung ngo /_/des smras pa/_gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na gang dag ngas bsnun pa de dag gi go phud cig_/de dag gis go 'bud par brtsams pa dang /_
[\[150b.2\]]gang gis ji ltar go phud pa de de ltar dus la bab nas chom rkun pa de dag mi 'di ni gnod sbyin zhig go zhes byer te dong ngo /_/stong thub mtshams kyi bar na 'dug cing de don mthun yul ko sa la nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i bsel yang byed/_yul ma ga d+hA nas 'ong ba 
[\[150b.3\]]gang yin pa de'i bsel yang byed do/_/des bsams pa/_bdag gis ci'i phyir phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam nas des der khyim brtsigs te 'dug nas don mthun gnyi ga'i bsti gnas su'ang gyur/_de 'brog na gnas pa yin pas 'brog gnas 
[\[150b.4\]]'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_'brog gnas su don mthun dag lhags nas kha cig gis ni 'bras btsong bar brtsams so/_/kha cig gis ni phye btsong bar brtsams/_
[\[150b.5\]]kha cig gis ni be reg_/kha cig gis ni khur ba/_kha cig gis ni ril bu btsong bar brtsams so/_/chang 'tshong dag gis kyang chang btsong bar brtsams te/_de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus chags par gyur to/_/'brog gnas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 
[\[150b.6\]]la phrin yig lha bdag gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs kyis lhas 'dir zhal ta pa btang ba'i rigs so zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas de ni de nyid kyir gyur 
[\[150b.7\]]cig snyam nas des de la phrin yig ngas tshong 'dus de khyod la byin gyis der dpya dang lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig ces spring ngo /_/'brog gnas su tshong 'dus btsugs nas 'brog gnas 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/'brog gnas na 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsams pa/_shes ldan dag bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas bdag cag gis 'di la phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag go snyam mo/_/de na kha 
[\[151a.2\]]cig gis smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya'o/_/ci zhig bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_bdag cag las gang su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba'am/_bag ma len pa des de 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re yang bskon par bya'o/_/ma nyes kyis de 
[\[151a.3\]]ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gang bag ma gtong ba'am/_bag ma len pa des 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re bskon par byed do/_/ji tsam na mi dbul po zhig bag ma len du nye nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor 
[\[151a.4\]]dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re bskon pa'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyis/_'di ltar bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' mgur spyod du phul la/_des dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bya'o snyam du rig nas/_
[\[151a.5\]]de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_grong dpon bdag bag ma len du nye na bdag la khyod 'khor dang bcas pa bshos gsol zhing na bza' phrugs re gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyis/_'di ltar bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas 
[\[151a.6\]]dang po kho nar khyod la dga' mgur spyod du 'bul gyis/_khyod kyis dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o/_/'brog gnas kyis smras pa/_kye nang rje gang yang rung ba bag ma len pa'am/_bag ma gtong ba de thams cad kyis kho bo 'khor 
[\[151a.7\]]dang bcas pa zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re bskon mi dgos kyis khyod song la bag yangs su bag ma long shig_/grong dpon de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag 'di ltar [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]dang du bzhes shig_/bud med kyi yul ni dbang po rnams 'phrog cing don du 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gnyer bar 'gyur ba yin pas 'brog gnas kyis dang du blangs so/_/des kyang bag ma blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la phul nas des kyang dga' mgur spyad do/_/'brog gnas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis lhag par chags pas mi de la byams par bya bar 
[\[151b.2\]]brtsams so/_/gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/_kye nang rje khyod la 'brog gnas te por byams par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/_des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/_/gzhan zhig gis de la dris pa dang /_des kyang de la ji 
[\[151b.3\]]ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/_/gzhan zhig gis kyang de la dris pa dang /_des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa nas des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams te/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis de na dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel bar gyur 
[\[151b.4\]]to/_/'brog gnas kyis tshong 'dus der lha khang rtsig tu bcug nas de na gang yang rung bas bag ma blangs pa des bu mo de lha khang de bskor du bcug nas 'brog gnas kyi gan du gtong zhing 'brog gnas kyis de dang por dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/ji tsam dus 
[\[151b.5\]]gzhan zhig na gzhon nu ma chen mo zhig bag mar 'gror nye nas des bsams pa/_bdag la yang dang por 'brog gnas dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhing phyis khyim thab spyod par 'gyur na mi rung gis ci nas kyang 'brog gnas 'di gsad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs kyi rnam pa 
[\[151b.6\]]zhig bya'o snyam nas des ji tsam nas phyogs shig tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa de logs su kha bltas te sgren mor byung nas gcin rgyang byas pa dang /_skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas de dag mi dga' bar sems par gyur te smras pa/_
[\[151b.7\]]bu mo ngo tsha dang khrel med pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la mdun gyis phyogs te sgren mor byung nas gcin rgyang byed pa 'di su'i yin/_bu mo des de thos nas smras pa/_khyed cag kyang pho yin nam/_'o na nged ci yin/_khyed cag pho ma yin gyi 'brog gnas 'ba' zhig 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]pho yin pas des khyed kyi chung ma blangs so cog dang por dga' mgur spyad de/_khyed cag phyis de'i mi gtsang ba 'khru bar byed do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'dis bdag cag gnas su spyos na/_'di la bdag cag gis ji ltar 
[\[152a.2\]]bsgrub par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la gzhan bsgrub tu ci yod 'brog gnas gsad par bya'o/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de ji ltar gsad par bya ba dpyad par bya'o zhes de dag de ltar gros byed pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi rdzing bu 'bul ba nye 
[\[152a.3\]]bar gyur nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi rdzing bu 'bul ba nye bar gyur pas der de mgron du bos pa'i tshe gsad par bya'o/_/ji tsam na khyim bdag des rdzing bu 'bul ba'i tshe de mgron du bos pa dang /_des kyang dang du blangs 
[\[152a.4\]]so/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/_phyogs su bsgo ba/_nga'i yul du dge slong gang la la zhig 'ong bar gyur na/_de gal te nga'i mdzod dang /_khyim na bza' ba dang btung ba yod na zan sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te med na 
[\[152a.5\]]sus mthong ba rang gis byin cig dang phyis skyin pa nyis gyur tu sbyin no zhes btsigs yig tu yang bris te bzhag go/_/bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na 'brog gnas su phyin to/_/grong 
[\[152a.6\]]dpon 'brog gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na 'brog gnas su phyin ces thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po de bsod nams dag gis ngoms 
[\[152a.7\]]mi myong bas sbyin pa dag sbyin bsod nams dag byed na/_bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin/_bsod nams dag mi bya snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de gnyis kyis de la chos bstan nas/_des de gnyis bsod snyoms la bos te zan byin no/_/khyim bdag des 'brog gnas g.yar 'dren gyis bos pa dang /_des yon bshad pa ma mnyan pa kho nar rdzing bu 
[\[152b.2\]]'bul bar song ngo /_/'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang brda byas/_mtshon thogs nas der dong ste/_de dag gis 'brog gnas rdzing bur zhugs pa dang /_skra bkru'o zhes 'gyur byed tsha ba mgor blugs nas mig chu 'dzag par gyur te cung zad kyang mi 
[\[152b.3\]]mthong ba dang /_de nas de'i steng du 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar brtsams te/_de gsad par bshams pa na des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bos khyed la nyes pa ci byas/_
[\[152b.4\]]de dag gis smras pa/_khyed kyis kho bo cag gi bag ma dang por dga' mgur spyad cing phyis kho bo cag gis spyad do/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag nyid kyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'di phyung bas 'di la kho bos ci nyes/_ma gsad par thong shig_/de dag gis de de ltar shags 'debs bzhin du 
[\[152b.5\]]gsad par brtsams pa dang /_des srog dang 'bral kar gnad 'chad ka dang tshig 'grol kar sems bskyed de smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po lha dang mis mchod pa gnyis la bsod snyoms phul ba'i dge ba'i 
[\[152b.6\]]rtsa ba des bdag gang du 'di dag gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces btab bo/_/chos nyid kyis na mar 'bri ba'i dus kyi tshe na smon lam log pa btab pa de ni myur du 'grub pa yin pas des smon lam log pa btab ste/_shi zhing dus la bab nas gnod sbyin 
[\[152b.7\]]gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/de nas de gnas 'dod pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzod ldan bdag la gnas stsol cig_/des smras pa/_'brog gnas khyed kyi gnas 'brog gnas de nyid yin gyis song shig_/de 'brog gnas 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]su 'ongs nas mi ngas phyung ste skye bo mang po shi bar gyur nas khri dang khrir 'dom par byas so/_/'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bkug ste dris pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yams byung bar gyur pa 'di la rgyu 
[\[153a.2\]]ci yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis 'brog gnas bsad pa gang yin pa des smon lam log pa btab pas gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te des 'di lta bu'i yams phyung ngo /_/de dag gis shing rta dang shing rta bcas te 'bros par brtsams 
[\[153a.3\]]pa dang /_des kyang 'jigs pa dang 'jigs su rung ba chen por bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/_da gar 'dong deng khyed cag thams cad bza'o/_/de dag kun du skrag par gyur te smras pa/_
[\[153a.4\]]grong dpon bdag cag sdig pa byed pa rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/_gal te nga la nyi ma re re zhing mi stong stong 'bul na bzod do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_grong dpon gal te khyod la nyi ma re re zhing mi stong stong phul 
[\[153a.5\]]na ring po mi thogs par 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar 'gyur gyis dngan dus 'di thong la bdag cag phyag 'tshal ba rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag kho bo yun ring po nas smon pa/_kye ma 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar gyur cig snyam 
[\[153a.6\]]mod kyi/_'on kyang kho bo la nyi ma re re zhing mi lnga brgya lnga brgya phul cig dang bzod par bya'o/_/de dag gis yang de bzhin gsol nas des kyang mi nyis brgya lnga bcu dang brgya'i bar du phul cig ces smras so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_grong dpon de lta na yang bdag cag 
[\[153a.7\]]nyams par gyur gyis mang pos ci bya/_bdag cag gis khyod la nyi ma re re zhing ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas kyis bkang ba dang /_de khrid pa'i mi gcig dbul gyis bzod pa mdzod cig_/des smras pa/_de rung gis 'di ltar khyed kyis ngu ba dag gis dbul 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]bar mi bya bar bro dang /_glu dang /_sil snyan gyi sgras dbul bar bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang khas blangs so/_/de nas 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag gnod sbyin gyis bdag cag gnas skabs de 
[\[153b.2\]]ltar byas na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_res kyis res kyis dbul bar bya'o/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_gang la res bab par gyur pa de la brjod pa na 'khrug pa skye bar 'gyur gyis/_'di ltar khyim byang bris te rdza mar bcug la/_gang gi 
[\[153b.3\]]khyim byang byung ba de 'gro bar bya ste/_des kyang mi tshal za dag mi gtong bar bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am/_bu gtang bar bya'o/_/gang la brel ba byung ste ma 'dus pa de la bab na de'i khyim du khyim byang dpyangs te bzhag go/_/de'i tshe na 'brog gnas na khyim bdag 
[\[153b.4\]]cig 'dug pa de la bu med nas de yun ring po nas kye ma bdag la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon nas stes dbang gis de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/chung ma de btsa' ba'i dus kyi tshe khyim bdag de bya ba zhig la phyi rol du byung ba dang /_de'i nyin mo de la 
[\[153b.5\]]gnod sbyin la gtor ma sbyin pa'i khyim byang byung nas de'i res sbron par bskos pa'i mi dag gis de'i khyim byang sgor dpyangs te bzhag go/_/skabs der chung ma de btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung ngo /_/ji tsam na khyim bdag de phyir 'ongs pa dang /_des khyim du 'jug kar khyim 
[\[153b.6\]]byang de mthong nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/_khyim du zhugs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/chung mas de la smras pa/_rje'i sras dgyes pa skyed cig_/khyod kyi sras bltam mo/_/de lta na yang de cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug go/_/chung mas de la lan 
[\[153b.7\]]gsum gyi bar du de skad smras kyang de cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug nas yang chung mas smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod yun ring po nas kye ma bdag la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon pa gang lags pa de da btsas na ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/_mchog tu dgyes pa 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]skyed cig_/des smras pa/_bzang mo 'di ni skyes na kho bo ni ma skyes so/_/rje'i sras ci nongs/_bzang mo gnod sbyin la gtor ma dbul ba'i phyir khyim byang 'ongs so/_/rje'i sras gal te de lta na khyod kyi sras mchi bar bas mod/_skol cag yang 
[\[154a.2\]]mjal na khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bzang mo 'di ni khrag gi thigs pa yin pas 'di ji ltar gtang bar bya/_rje'i sras tshogs pas khrims su bgyi ba rnam par bzhag pa las bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am/_bu gtang bar bya'o zhes mi 'byung ngam/_'di 
[\[154a.3\]]khyod kyi sras lags pas bdag nyid dang mnyam pa'i sdug pa gzhan ma mchis kyis sras 'di thong shig_/des gal te khyod dga' na song shig ces dang du blangs so/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des mtshan mo'i mig lam chad pa dang /_mar me dang /_bdug spos 
[\[154a.4\]]dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/_'jig rten dge dul zhi ba dang /_/dbang thul rnams kyis mi stong bas/_/bu yi don du der 'dud kyis/_/bdag gi byis pa bskyab 
[\[154a.5\]]tu gsol/_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa srung ba gcig pu 
[\[154a.6\]]pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/_rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu 
[\[154a.7\]]bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]dag par 'das pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug 
[\[154b.2\]]pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig 
[\[154b.3\]]rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams par gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_
[\[154b.4\]]gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral 
[\[154b.5\]]ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni yongs su 
[\[154b.6\]]smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug go/_/smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 
[\[154b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog pa mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/_/bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khye'u de ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin pas de la phan gdags par bya 
[\[155a.2\]]zhing /_gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyang gdul bar bya'o snyam du rig nas ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas 'brog gnas su byon te gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas gnod 
[\[155a.3\]]sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du bar song bar gyur to/_/gnod sbyin bong bu bas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[155a.4\]]nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong dpon khyod kyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa gang yin pa de ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/grong dpon mir gyur pa yang bdag gi gnas su mtshan mo 
[\[155a.5\]]gnas par khas len tam/_grong dpon de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/grong dpon de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[155a.6\]]rgyas yin nam/_'on te ma yin pa da shes par bya'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba zil gyis mnan nas rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong phyir 
[\[155a.7\]]byung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo /_/dge sbyong zhugs shig_/bcom ldan 'das rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so/_/gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis lan 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gnyis su yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong phyir byung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo /_/dge sbyong zhugs shig_/bcom ldan 'das rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal nges 
[\[155b.2\]]par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so/_/gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong phyir byung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo /_/dge 
[\[155b.3\]]sbyong zhugs shig_/bcom ldan 'das rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so/_/gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong phyir byung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 
[\[155b.4\]]'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/grong dpon khyod kyis nga lan gsum gyi bar du gnas su spyan drangs pas da ni mi 'byung ngo /_/dge sbyong de'i phyir khyod la dri ba dris/_dri ba lan gdab pa des gal te kho bo'i sems rangs par byed na de lta na legs/_gal 
[\[155b.5\]]te sems rangs par mi byed na khyod kyi sems g.yengs pa'am/_snying [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]pa'am/_kha nas khrag tsha ba skyug pa'am/_lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste chu klung skal ldan shing rta'i pha rol gyi 'gram du 'phang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[155b.6\]]grong dpon ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i nang na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[155b.7\]]kyi sems g.yengs pa'am/_thugs [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]pa'am/_zhal nas khrag tsha ba bsgral ba'am/_phyag gnyis nas bzung ste chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i pha rol gyi 'gram du 'phen pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong gis grong dpon 'di ltar ci dang ci 'dod pa 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]zhus shig_/de nas 'brog gnas kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa//_//bar sdom la/_gang dang ji ltar du dang ni/_/gang zhig rgal dang ci yis rgal/_/'di na skyes bu'i nor mchog gang /_/ci zhig legs spyad bde spyod 'gyur/_/
[\[156a.2\]]ro rnams nang na mngar mchog ci/_/ji ltar 'tsho na 'tsho mchog bstan/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dad pa skyes bu'i nor mchog yin/_/chos la legs spyod bde spyod 'gyur/_/bden pa'i ro rnams mngar mchog yin/_/shes pas 'tsho na 'tsho 
[\[156a.3\]]mchog bstan/_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_ji ltar grags dang ldan par 'gyur/_/longs spyod ldan par ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar snyan pa thob 'gyur zhing /_/mdza' bshes ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_tshul khrims 
[\[156a.4\]]kyis ni grags ldan 'gyur/_/sbyin pas longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/_/bden pas snyan pa thob 'gyur te/_/snying rjes mdza' bshes rnyed par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_du zhig gis ni 'jig rten 'byung /_/du yis 'dris pa thob par 'gyur/_/du 
[\[156a.5\]]zhig gis ni 'jig rten bkur/_/du yis 'jig rten zil gnon 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_drug gis 'jig rten 'byung 'gyur te/_/drug gis 'dris pa thob par 'gyur/_/drug gis 'jig rten bkur 'gyur te/_/drug gis 'jig rten 
[\[156a.6\]]zil gnon 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_gdugs mtshan g.yel ba ma mchis pa/_/gang zhig 'ong ba 'di las rgal/_/dmigs med rten pa ma mchis pa/_/zab mor gang zhig 'byed mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam kun 
[\[156a.7\]]tshul khrims ldan pa dang /_/legs mnyam bzhag cing shes rab ldan/_/nang du sems shing dran ldan pa/_/shin tu rgal dka' 'di las rgal/_/'dod pa'i 'du shes chags bral zhing /_/gzugs kyi kun sbyor mthar gyur pa/_/de ni dmigs med rten 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]med pa'i/_/zab mor 'bying bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_ci yis 'od pa rgal bar 'gyur/_/ci zhig gis ni rgya mtsho rgal/_/ci yis sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur/_/ci zhig gis ni yongs dag 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[156b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dad pas 'od pa rgal bar 'gyur/_/bag yod pas ni rgya mtsho rgal/_/brtson pas sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur/_/shes rab kyis ni yongs dag 'gyur/_/bden dul gtong ba ma gtogs pa'i/_/chos gzhan 'ba' zhig yod 
[\[156b.3\]]dam zhes/_/dge sbyong bram ze so so la/_/gzhan dang gzhan du khyod dris shig_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_dge sbyong bram ze so so la/_/ci slad bzhin du bdag 'dri bgyid/_/'di ltar dpa' chen khyod kyis ni/_/chos 'di legs par rab tu bshad/_/
[\[156b.4\]]kye ma gnod sbyin bong bu pa/_/gang gis ded dpon bla na med/_/sangs rgyas bdag la bstan gyur pa/_/khyod la kho bo byas pa gzo/_/'di nas kho bo grong nas grong /_/khyim nas khyim du rdzogs sangs dang /_/chos kyi chos nyid bzang po la/_/'dud bzhin du ni spyad 
[\[156b.5\]]par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod kyis dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis zan byin pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bya ba las khyod kyis 
[\[156b.6\]]smon lam log pa btab pas gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_da ltar drag shul can/_lag pa khrag gis gos pa/_nyams pa dang rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa/_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa/_gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed de/_'di 
[\[156b.7\]]nas shi 'phos na khyod kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye ba ni cir 'gyur/_tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/_des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshur shog_/khyod nga'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]pa'i gzhi dag long la 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig_/btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag len cing deng slan cad 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[157a.2\]]tshogs la mi 'jigs pa stsol to/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs te/_des bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_kye ma ston pa bdag don du/_/sdum par yang dag gshegs 
[\[157a.3\]]gyur te/_/bdag gis de ring phyi ma yi/_/don ni rab tu shes par gyur/_/de nas khyim bdag des ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas kyis bkang ste khye'u de yang shing rtar bcug nas bro dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgras gnod sbyin gyi drung du 'phags pa dang /_bram ze dang /_
[\[157a.4\]]khyim bdag kha cig gis thos nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag bro dang /_glu dang /_rol mo'i sgra 'di ci yin/_kha cig gis smras pa/_khyed kyis mi shes sam/_'di ni khrag gi thigs pa de gnod sbyin gyi gan du khyer ba yin no/_/skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus 
[\[157a.5\]]te smras pa/_shes ldan dag khrag gi thigs pa 'dis gnod sbyin mi mgu bas gal te 'di ma bzlog na gdon mi za bar gnod sbyin 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /_bdag cag thams cad la gnod par byed par 'gyur gyis/_'di bzlog par bya'o zhes de dag gis de 
[\[157a.6\]]bzlog par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag tshogs kyis khrims su bya ba bcas pa las bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am/_bu gtang bar bya'i zhes 'byung bas 'di kho bo'i bu yin na ci'i phyir zlog par byed/_mi ldog par 'gro'o/_/de dag 
[\[157a.7\]]cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bro dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra de gsan to/_/gsan nas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la bka' stsal pa/_grong dpon bro dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra 'di ci yin/_btsun pa bdag dam pa ma lags pa'i chos sdig pa de 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]las slar log kyang skye bo dag gis da dung de bzhin du 'dzin par bgyid na ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grong dpon 'di ci yin/_des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_grong dpon 
[\[157b.2\]]deng zas dang /_skom long la mi yang ma len/_glang yang ma len cig_/des bsams pa/_'ongs kyang rung gis bdag gi zan tha ma 'di bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo snyam mo/_/khyim bdag des khye'u de shing rta nas phyung ste gnod sbyin la byin no/_/gnod 
[\[157b.3\]]sbyin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pha la stsal to/_/de nas phas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di ming cir gdags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/_byis pa gang 
[\[157b.4\]]tshe gnod sbyin gyi/_/lag nas nga yi lag tu thob/_/nga yi lag nas pha yi lag_/de yi phyir na lag brgyud yin/_/de'i ming lag brgyud ces bya bar btags so/_/khyim bdag des de khyer te 'brog gnas su song ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas smras 
[\[157b.5\]]pa/_shes ldan dag 'di 'di ltar gyur cing /_khrag gi thigs pa de khyer te 'ongs pa las na/_gor ma chag par 'dis gnod sbyin 'khrugs par byas so/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag gnod sbyin ga la 'khrugs te/_bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di la thugs 
[\[157b.6\]]brtse ba'i slad du de'i gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de btul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas/_des 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin gyis 
[\[157b.7\]]'tsher 'grib med par gyis shig_/de dag shin tu dga' ste smras pa/_khye'u 'di skyes ma thag tu gnod sbyin 'brog gnas btul bas khye'u 'di'i ming lag brgyud 'brog gnas zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming lag brgyud 'brog gnas zhes bya bar btags so/_/de 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]chen por gyur nas yi ge dang yig 'bru dag dang /_sgyu rtsal gzhan dag la yang shin tu mkhas par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe sngo bsangs can mgo bsgyur ran par gyur pa de'i tshe na de slong ba rgyal po dag dang /_nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang ded dpon dag 
[\[158a.2\]]dang /_shAkya dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po dag lhags par gyur nas/_khyim bdag gdangs can 'di snyam du mang po dag sngo bsangs can slong ste/_gang dag la ma byin pa de dag bdag gi dgra bor 'gyur ro snyam nas lag pa la 
[\[158a.3\]]'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/sngo bsangs can gyis de mthong nas smras pa/_yab khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu mo khyod slong ba rgyal po dag dang /_nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon 
[\[158a.4\]]dag dang /_ded dpon dag dang /_shAkya dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po dag lhags pas gang dag la khyod ma byin pa de dag nga'i dgrar 'gyur na/_kho bo ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /_
[\[158a.5\]]des smras pa/_yab gal te de lta na mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig dang /_deng nas gdugs bdun na ngan bu rang gis gnas btsal bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu mo de ltar gyis shig_/'on kyang re zhig lha la zhu bar bya'o zhes de bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song 
[\[158a.6\]]ste smras pa/_lha deng nas gdugs bdun na sngo bsangs can rang gis gnas tshol bar 'gyur gyis lhas gnang bar mdzod cig_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_des nga ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig la gnas tshol bar 'gyur snyam nas gnang ngo /_/des gnang nas blon po rnams 
[\[158a.7\]]la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag grong khyer mdzes par byed du chug la/_'di skad ces deng nas nyi ma bdun nas sngo bsangs can rang gis gnas tshol bar 'gyur ro zhes dril sgrogs shig_/blon po rnams kyis grong khyer de rdo ba dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo med par rnam 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]par bzhag nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab ste/_bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nye bar bzhag nas dar gyi chun po dpyangs te/_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgrengs nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/_lha'i skyed mos tshal ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar byas nas dril bsgrag 
[\[158b.2\]]pa byed du bcug ste/_'di skad ces kau shAm+bI na gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_yul tha dad pa dag nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig_/deng nas nyi ma bdun na sngo bsangs can rang gis gnas tshol bar 'gyur gyis/_de'i phyir khyed cag 
[\[158b.3\]]gis 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur pa na nyi ma bdun pa la sngo bsangs can rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te/_shing rta la zhon nas me tog phreng gi chun po thogs te phyir byung nas skye bo 
[\[158b.4\]]phal po che'i tshogs la brtag par brtsams pa dang /_bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa 'di snyam du/_'dis gor ma chag par bdag gi steng du me tog phreng gi chun po 'phen par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_sems bsdus te bag yod par rtog cing 'dug go/_/sngo bsangs can 
[\[158b.5\]]gyis kun du skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par bltas nas dris pa/_shes ldan dag glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon pa 'di dag gang gang yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'o/_/'di ni rgyal po gsal rgyal lo/_/'di ni rgyal po tshangs byin no/_/'di 
[\[158b.6\]]ni bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'o/_/de bzhin du nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang /_ded dpon dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_shAkya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po thams cad so sor dris nas/_de'i 'og tu smras pa/_shes ldan dag lag brgyud 
[\[158b.7\]]'brog gnas zhes bya ba gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin las thar bar byas pa de 'dir shog shig_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/_de ma 'ongs so/_/de phyogs gang na 'dug_/ga ge mo zhig na'o/_/des de'i phyogs su kha bltas te/_de bdag gi 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]khyim thab yin no zhes me tog phreng gi chun po 'phangs pa dang /_rgyal po dag dang /_nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang /_ded dpon dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_shAkya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po 'dus pa dag phyir phyogs te rang 
[\[159a.2\]]rang gi yul du dong ngo /_/khyim bdag gdangs can bag tsha zhing yid mi bde nas sngo bsangs can la smras pa/_bu mo gal te khyod kyis lag brgyud bdams pas kho bo la rgyal po dag gnod pa byed par gyur na mi rung gis myur du song shig_/des smras pa/_yab ma 
[\[159a.3\]]nongs kyis de bzhin bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de bzhon pa bzang po sbyar te rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'khor dang bcas te 'brog gnas su btang ngo /_/de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /_ma gzigs 
[\[159a.4\]]pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/_'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/_srung ba gcig pu pa/_nyag gcig dpa' ba/_gnyis pa med pa/_gnyis su mi gsung ba/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis 
[\[159a.5\]]bzhugs pa/_rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/_bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/_dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis/_spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/_bsdu ba'i dngos 
[\[159a.6\]]po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_yan lag lnga spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_rtag tu gnas pa drug 
[\[159a.7\]]gis gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/_brgya phrag bcur 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dbang sgyur ba la khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/_gang ni nyams par gyur/_gang ni 'phel bar gyur/_gang ni gnod par gyur/_gang ni nyam nga bar 
[\[159b.2\]]gyur/_gang ni mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang mi bde bar gyur/_gang ni ngan song la gzhol/_gang ni ngan song la 'bab/_gang ni ngan song la bab/_ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang 'bras bu la 
[\[159b.3\]]gzhag par bya/_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya/_'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/_gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/_
[\[159b.4\]]gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/_gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/_yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug go/_/smras pa/_chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/_/dus las 
[\[159b.5\]]'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/_/dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/_/rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la/_/rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar 
[\[159b.6\]]mdzad/_/kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi/_/bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/_/srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni/_/rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gal te lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis 
[\[159b.7\]]bden pa ma mthong bar sngo bsangs can mthong bar gyur na bden pa dag gi snod du mi 'gyur gyis/_de la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'brog gnas su 'gro'o snyam du rig nas/_ma ga d+hA dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na 'brog gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas su mtshan mo ba lang 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]gi lam du rtswa bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/ba lang rdzi dag dang /_phyugs rdzi dag dang /_rtswa thun dag dang /_shing thun dag dang /_lam gyis 'tsho ba dag dang /_lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag gis bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo ba lang gi lam 
[\[160a.2\]]na rtswa bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyi gan du dong ste smras pa/_khyim bdag gang gis khyod gnod sbyin las thar bar mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'brog gnas su byon nas mtshan mo ba 
[\[160a.3\]]lang gi lam na rtswa bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bsams pa/_gal te sang 'gro bar bya na/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan du gshegs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyis nga nyid 'gro'o snyam du 
[\[160a.4\]]rig nas/_myur ba myur bar 'phags pa dang ji tsam na sgo chod do/_/de'i skabs su sngo bsangs can yang sgo drung du phyin pa dang /_des kyang nang du ma chud de sgo drung du mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs so/_/nam nangs nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas myur ba myur ba kho nar shing rta 
[\[160a.5\]]la zhon te 'brog gnas nas phyir byung ba dang /_sngo bsangs can yang shing rta la zhon te/_nang du 'jug pa na lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/_shing rta zur cig_/sngo bsangs can gyis kyang smras pa/_khyod kyi shing rta zur cig_/des kyang ma bzur/_cig shos 
[\[160a.6\]]kyis kyang ma bzur nas/_sngo bsangs can gyis brtags te smras pa/_khyod lag brgyud 'brog gnas yin nam/_des smras pa/_kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/_/lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis kyang smras pa/_khyod kyang sngo bsangs can yin nam/_des kyang smras pa/_
[\[160a.7\]]bdag skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so/_/lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis smras pa/_kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gros shing rta zur cig_/khyod kyang re zhig khyim du song shig_/sngo bsangs can gyis smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa'i gan du song shig ces sngo bsangs 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]can gyi shing rta mtha' gcig tu bzur to/_/lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi so sor kun dga' bar bya bas/_bcom ldan 'das ji lta bde bar gzims sam zhes so sor kun dga' 
[\[160b.2\]]bar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag brgyud 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag brgyud 'jig rten na gang dag bde bar nyal bar byed pa de dag gi nang na nga yang 'ga' zhig yin no/_/btsun pa dog sa sra zhing ba lang gi rtsid pa'i gzhi can 
[\[160b.3\]]du ras srab mo'i gdan bshams shing dgun smad kyi dus kyi tshe tshes brgyad kyi bar la 'od ma 'gas pa'i bser ma dag ldang la/_khyod kyi na bza' ngur smrig 'di dag ni srab pas sku yongs su gdung bar bgyid kyang /_bcom ldan 'das de skad ces 'jig rten na gang dag bde bar nyal 
[\[160b.4\]]bar byed pa de dag gi nang na nga yang 'ga' zhig yin no zhes gsung ngam/_lag brgyud de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob shig_/lag brgyud 'di lta ste dper na 'di na khyim bdag gam/_khyim bdag gi bu phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs 
[\[160b.5\]]spyod che ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur la/_de'i don du khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig tu bcug cing khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]der khang pa brtsegs pa rtsig tu bcug la/_khang pa brtsegs pa der khri shur bus blas pa stan sbyar ma bting ba/_stan nang tshangs can bting ba/_stan khra bo bting ba/_
[\[160b.6\]]stan chen po bting ba/_stan bzang po bting ba/_sum tshan gyi gos kyi steng g.yogs bting ba/_steng nas bgo ba'i gos dang bcas pa gnyis su rgyab rten dmar po bzhag pa bshams shing til mar gyi mar me mtshan thub btsugs nas chung ma yid du 'ong ba zhig 
[\[160b.7\]]'di lta ste/_dga' mgur spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bzhag na lag brgyud 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi de'i mal bcas pa bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba yin snyam/_btsun pa bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_'jig rten na gang dag bde bar mchis nyal ba de dag 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gi nang na mi de 'ga' zhig lags snyam bgyid do/_/lag brgyud 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di ltar mi de lta bu'i bde ba dang /_de lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa de la 'dod pa las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang las skyes pa dang /_gti mug 
[\[161a.2\]]las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag skye zhing yongs su gdung ba de dag gis yongs su gdungs pa na mi de sdug bsngal bar nyal zhing bde bar mi nyal ba'i 'dod pa las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba de dag 
[\[161a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mkhyen cing rtsa ba nas bcad de ta la'i mgo bzhin du mi snang ba dang /_gzhi med pa dang /_phyis kyang mi skye ba'i chos nyid du mdzad pas de'i phyir nga de skad ces 'jig rten na gang dag bde bar nyal ba de dag gi nang na yang 'ga' zhig yin no 
[\[161a.4\]]zhes zer ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_bram ze mya ngan yongs 'das pa/_/gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos shing /_/phung po dag las rnam grol ba/_/rnam kun bde bar nyal ba yin/_/'di la 'dod pa kun bcad 
[\[161a.5\]]cing /_/snying gi rims nad bsal gyur pa/_/nyer zhi zhi ba thob pa yi/_/sems kyis bde bar nyal ba yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag brgyud 'brog gnas la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 
[\[161a.6\]]mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang /_tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid 
[\[161a.7\]]dang /_mtho ris kyi bka' mchid dang /_'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_nges par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]par mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems rangs pa dang /_sems nyam bde ba dang /_sems dga' ba dang /_sems la sgrib pa med pa dang /_yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal ba dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na sangs rgyas 
[\[161b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/_/'di lta ste dper na gos dag pa/_nag nog med pa kha 
[\[161b.3\]]sgyur du rung ba tshon du bcug na/_tshon legs par 'jen par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang lam mngon par rtogs 
[\[161b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rig pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tsom las rgal ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /_gzhan gyis mi 
[\[161b.5\]]bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/
[\[161b.6\]]btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan cad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad 
[\[161b.7\]]pas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag deng kho na 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]sngo bsangs can gyis btsal cing bdag gis deng kho na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag brgyud song shig_/khyod kyi bslab pa ni 'di yin no/_/sngo bsangs 
[\[162a.2\]]can yang ji ltar khas blangs pa bzhin zas dang /_gos kyis mkho ba stobs shig_/de ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid yin no/_/de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi khyim du song nas/_des sngo 
[\[162a.3\]]bsangs can la smras pa/_kho bo deng kho na khyod kyis btsal na/_kho bos kyang deng kho na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs shing phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyis/_de'i phyir gal te khyod 'dod na pha'i khyim du 
[\[162a.4\]]song shig_/gal te mi 'dod na 'di nyid du 'dug shig dang zas dang gos kyis mkho ba bstab par bya'o/_/des bsams pa/_gal te song bar gyur na skye bo dag lag brgyud kyis 'di bkra mi shis par rig nas ma blangs so zhes zer gyis/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sras yin 
[\[162a.5\]]pas 'di nyid la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dir 'dug go snyam nas/_de de nyid du 'dug go/_/lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis kyang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug ste/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas 'di ltar 
[\[162a.6\]]gnas brtan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas na 'brog gi nags mchog na bzhugs so zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar sbyar ba byas so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa/_de nas dus gzhan zhig na lag brgyud 'brog gnas 
[\[162a.7\]]nad kyis btab ste/_sdug bsngal zhing nad tshabs che bar gyur nas/_de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas nad de nyid kyis dus la bab bo/_/de dus la bab ma thag tu mi gdung ba'i lha ris su skyes so/_/de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/_bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[162b.2\]]bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskums pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskums pa tsam gyis mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[162b.3\]]kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyi lus sa la mi thogs shing thim par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na zhun mar ram/_'bru mar bye ma'am/_thal ba'i steng du blugs pa mi thogs shing thim par 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[162b.4\]]'das kyis lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas la bka' stsal pa/_lag brgyud re zhig lus rags par mngon par sprul la sa'i 'du shes bskyed de/_'dug pa'i mtshan ma yid la gyis shig_/de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis lus rags par mngon par 
[\[162b.5\]]sprul te sa'i 'du shes bskyed cing 'dug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas 
[\[162b.6\]]kyi kha dog gi mthus 'brog gi nags mchog thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu ji ltar khyod sngon mir gyur pa na chos gang 
[\[162b.7\]]dag bton cing lobs pa de dag da ltar lobs sam/_btsun pa bdag sngon mir gyur pa na chos gang dag bton cing lobs pa de dag da ltar te por lobs te/_btsun pa bdag sngon mir gyur pa na chos gang dag bton cing ma lobs pa de dag kyang da ltar lobs par gyur 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos ni bde bar gyur pas mngon par brjod par bgyid do/_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen 
[\[163a.2\]]ma rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs pa na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la chos gang dang gang ston par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de bdag cag gis mnyan nas de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya ste/_de ni bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de 
[\[163a.3\]]bzhin du/_btsun pa bdag kyang mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris na mi gdung ba'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mchis pa na/_lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas bdag cag la chos gang dang gang ston par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de dag bdag cag gis mnyan nas de 
[\[163a.4\]]lta de ltar bsgrub par bya ste/_de ni bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/lag brgyud khyod chos du dag gis ma ngoms shing phyir ma spangs pas lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes par gyur/_btsun 
[\[163a.5\]]pa bdag chos gsum gyis ma ngoms shing slar ma spangs pas lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes te/_gsum gang lags she na/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la lta bas ma ngoms shing slar ma spangs pas lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris 
[\[163a.6\]]su skyes so/_/btsun pa bdag chos mnyan pas ma ngoms shing slar ma spangs pas lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes so/_/btsun pa bdag dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyi bas ma ngoms shing slar ma spangs pas lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes 
[\[163a.7\]]so/_/de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_bdag ni bcom ldan blta ba dang /_/dam chos nyan dang dge 'dun la/_/bsnyen bkur bgyid pas lan 'ga' yang /_/ngoms shing phyir spong ma myong ngo /_/'phags pa'i 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]chos rnams yang dag blangs/_/ser sna 'dul la brtson gyur cing /_/chos gsum chog mi shes pa yis/_/lag brgyud mi gdung skyes par gyur/_/de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang 
[\[163b.2\]]rjes su yi rangs pa byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[163b.3\]]la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su mchi ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba/_
[\[163b.4\]]zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba/_skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su grol zhing /_thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa/_
[\[163b.5\]]mkhyen pa dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes pa gnod sbyin 'brog gnas las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci che/_nga 'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti 
[\[163b.6\]]mug dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dag las yongs su ma grol bas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i 
[\[163b.7\]]gzhi dag la bzhag ste de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na ded dpon dpa' chen zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]'gran pa zhig byung bar gyur te/_de dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa dang /_lam de srin po spu ral can gyis bsdigs shing bgags par gyur nas/_ded dpon dpa' chen don mthun gyi mdun du 'gro bar 
[\[164a.2\]]brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na srin po spu ral can de bram ze'i cha lugs su mngon par sprul nas lam gar 'dug ste/_ded dpon dpa' chen la smras pa/_ded dpon lam 'di srin po spu ral can gyis bsdigs shing bgags nas kho bo yang tshegs chen pos 'ongs kyis lam 
[\[164a.3\]]gzhan du song shig_/des smras pa/_bram ze snying las chung ngur gyis shig_/des kho bo la byar ci yod 'gro'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_srin po spu ral can de 'khrugs nas bzhin bsgyur te/_lag pa gnyis brkyang nas ral pa sa la blags te/_mig dmar 
[\[164a.4\]]po byas nas mig gnyis bgrad de smras pa/_ded dpon je kho bo la rgol la phyis song shig_/de nas ded dpon dpa' chen gyis shin tu 'jigs su rung ba de mthong nas gzhu rna drung du thug par bkang ste mda' dag 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /_de dag thams cad ral pa dag 
[\[164a.5\]]la thogs so/_/gzhu 'phangs pa dang /_de yang thogs so/_/de bzhin du shing dang bong ba la sogs pa dag 'phangs na de dag kyang ral pa dag la thogs so/_/de nas tsham tshom med par mthus brgal ba dang /_lus thams cad ral pa dag la thogs nas srin pos tshigs 
[\[164a.6\]]su bcad pa smras pa/_khyod kyis lag gnyis rkang gnyis dang /_/lnga pa mgo yang thogs gyur cing /_/lus kyang nga yi lus la thogs/_/phyi na ma thogs ci zhig yod/_/ded dpon gyis kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_nga yi lag gnyis rkang gnyis dang /_/
[\[164a.7\]]lnga pa mgo yang thogs gyur cing /_/lus kyang khyod kyi lus la thogs/_/phyi na ma thogs sems yod do/_/gsang ba ji srid kho bo yi/_/sems dang brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/_/de srid khyod dang 'gyed bya ste/_/brtan byos nga la mi gnod do/_/srin pos kyang tshigs 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]su bcad pa dag smras pa/_gang gis brtson 'grus 'di 'dra ba/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyi brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas/_/sdug bsngal kun las 'bros par nus/_/dpa' chen khyod dang 'dra ba yi/_/gang zag med par bdag gis shes/_/khyod kyi mthu 
[\[164b.2\]]yis tshong pa dag_/bde legs su ni 'dong la rag_/'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/_/ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyi mthu yis tshong pa dag_/zhi ba nyid du 'dong la rag_/de ltar de na ded dpon dpa' chen gyis srin po spu ral can la gang thos nas srin po spu ral can las dri ma can dang phral te 
[\[164b.3\]]brtul zhugs lnga po dag la bzhag pa de 'dra ba'i chos bstan pa byas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon dpa' chen gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na srin po spu ral can gang yin pa de ni gnod sbyin 'brog gnas yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di 
[\[164b.4\]]las dri ma can dang phral te brtul zhugs lnga la bzhag la/_da ltar yang ngas 'di las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[164b.5\]]'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis las ci bgyis na des skyes ma thag tu gnod sbyin gyi gtor mar stsal cing /_bcom ldan 'das de thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[164b.6\]]lag brgyud 'brog gnas nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag
