[\[185b.6\]]zhes de dag gis ded dpon sing ga la la smras pa/_ded dpon rgyal srid long shig_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni tshong pa'i tha snyad kyis 'tsho ba yin pas kho bo la rgyal srid kyis ci bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_ded dpon gzhan gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug mi nus kyis long shig_/
[\[185b.7\]]des smras pa/_dam tshig gis blang bar bya ste/_gal te khyed cag kho bo'i tshig bzhin byed na'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_byed kyis long shig_/ma nyes so/_/de dag gis grong khyer mdzes par byas nas ded dpon sing ga la bkur sti chen pos rgyal srid la 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dbang bskur to/_/rgyal po sing ga las yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i rig sngags smra ba dag bos te rig sngags rgya cher slob tu bcug go/_/de bzhin du yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i 'phong gi slob dpon dag kyang bos te rgya cher 'phong slob tu bcug 
[\[186a.2\]]nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig_/srin mo de dag zangs gling nas skrod du 'dong ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas rgyal po sing ga las dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[186a.3\]]bzhi pa glang po che ba'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs grur btsud de zangs gling du 'phags so/_/mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang /_srin mo de dag gi phongs pa'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rgyal mtshan g.yo 
[\[186a.4\]]bar brtsams nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_phu nu mo dag phongs pa'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rgyal mtshan g.yos pa las na 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi g.yul 'gyed par 'dod pa dag lhags gor ma chag gis blta'o zhes de dag rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dong ba dang /_
[\[186a.5\]]ji tsam na gru bo che ba du ma dag rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas srin mo de dag gis kyang g.yul bshams pa dang /_de nas rig sngags smra ba dag gis rig sngags dag gis phab nas 'phong gi slob dpon dag gis phal cher bsad do/_/lhag ma rnams 
[\[186a.6\]]kyis rgyal po sing ga la'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_lha bzod par gsol/_des smras pa/_dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/_gal te khyed cag gi grong khyer 'di phyung ste/_gzhan du 'dong zhing nga'i yul du gnod pa 'ga' yang mi byed na bzod do/_/de 
[\[186a.7\]]dag gis smras pa/_de ltar bgyi'o/_/ma nyes so/_/de dag gis grong khyer de dag phyung nas gzhan du dong ste 'khod do/_/rgyal po sing ga las kyang der grong khyer brtsigs nas rgyal po sing ga las gnas bcas pas sing ga la'i gling sing ga la'i gling zhes bya ba'i ming du 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon sing ga la gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo gang yin pa de ni dpe med ma 'di yin te/_de'i tshe yang dpe med 
[\[186b.2\]]ma 'dis 'di btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas la/_da ltar yang 'dis 'di tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas so/_/kun du rgyu ma dus dpe med ma khrid de kau shAm+bIr 'ongs nas skyed mos tshal zhig na 'dug go/_/skyed mos tshal 
[\[186b.3\]]srung ba'i mis rgyal po shar pa la sbran pa/_lha bud med gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig skyed mos tshal na mchis te/_de ni lha la 'os pa lags so/_/rgyal pos thos nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang des mthong ngo /_/bud med kyi yul ni dbang 
[\[186b.4\]]po rnams 'phrog pa yin pas mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur nas/_des kun du rgyu ma du la smras pa/_ma du 'di su'i bu mo yin/_lha bdag gi bu mo lags so/_/su la byin/_lha su yang ma stsal to/_/nga la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/_lha gsol lo/_/rgyal pos bag 
[\[186b.5\]]mar blangs te/_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bcug nas de la khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog gi so'i phyed kyang byin/_bsnyen bkur ma lnga brgya yang byin/_nyi ma re re zhing dri dang /_phreng ba rgyu'i rin kAr+ShA pa Na lnga brgya lnga brgya yang byin no/_/kun du rgyu ma du yang blon po'i mchog tu bcug go/_/
[\[186b.6\]]de'i tshe na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa la blon po'i mchog gsum yod de/_sbyor ba 'dzin dang /_gdangs can dang /_ma du'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'i gan du mi zhig 'ongs nas rgyal pos dris pa/_khyod su yin/_des smras pa/_lha bdag snyan 
[\[186b.7\]]smra lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag snyan smra la 'tsho ba byin cig_/de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin no/_/ji tsam na yang rgyal po'i gan du mi zhig 'ongs nas rgyal pos de la dris pa/_khyod su yin/_des smras pa/_lha bdag mi snyan 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]smra lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/_shes ldan dag mi snyan smra la 'tsho ba byin cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha gal te na lhas mi snyan pa gsan par 'gyur yang gda' bas 'di la 'tsho ba mi stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[187a.2\]]shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bya ba dag ni rgya ches byin cig_/de dag gis de la yang 'tsho ba byin no/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa btsun mo sngo bsangs can dang /_dpe med ma dang lhan cig 'dug pa na de na rgyal po sbrid pa byung ba dang /_sngo bsangs can 
[\[187a.3\]]gyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_dpe med mas lha la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas te smras pa/_lha sngo bsangs can lha'i 'tshal ma 'tshal zhing dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal ba la gzigs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_dpe med ma 'di la nyes pa 
[\[187a.4\]]med de/_sngo bsangs can dge bsnyen ma yin pas los kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal mod/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo gang gi tshe lha sngo bsangs can dang /_kho mo dang lhan cig dben pa na bzhugs pa de'i tshe 
[\[187a.5\]]na khyod kyis them skas nas khar phor rbab tu thong shig_/des jo mo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gang gi tshe de dag lhan cig 'dug pa de'i tshe na them skas nas khar phor rbab tu btang ba na/_sngo bsangs can gyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_dpe med mas 
[\[187a.6\]]lha la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas te smras pa/_lha sngo bsangs can lha'i 'tshal ma 'tshal zhing dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal ba la gzigs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_dpe med ma thong shig_/nyes rtsom ma byed cig_/'di la nyes pa med de/_sngo bsangs can dge bsnyen 
[\[187a.7\]]ma yin pas los kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal/_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/rgyal po shar pa nyi ma gcig ni sngo bsangs can gyi gan du zan za la/_nyi ma gnyis pa la ni dpe med ma'i gan du zan za'o/_/dpe med mas bya pa la bsgo ba/_gang gi nyin mo lha sngo 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]bsangs can gyi gan du bshos gsol ba'i res bab pa de'i nyin mo gong ma sreg gson po dbul bar bya'o/_/bya pas gang gi nyin mo rgyal po sngo bsangs can gyi gan du zan za ba de'i nyin mo rgyal po la gong ma sreg gson po phul ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_dpe med ma la 
[\[187b.2\]]gtod cig_/dpe med mas thos nas des smras pa/_lha bdag gi res ma lags te/_sngo bsangs can gyi res lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kwa'i bya pa song la sngo bsangs can la gtod cig_/des sngo bsangs can la phul te smras pa/_lha'i don du g.yos mdzod 
[\[187b.3\]]cig_/des smras pa/_ci kho mo bya pa mo'am/_kho mo srog gcod par mi byed kyis song shig_/des rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha sngo bsangs can gyi mchid nas/_ci kho mo bya pa mo'am/_kho mo srog gcod par mi byed kyis song zhig ces mchi'o/_/dpe med mas thos 
[\[187b.4\]]nas smras pa/_lha gal te de la dge sbyong gau ta ma'i slad du g.yos gyis shig ces bgyis na ni da tsam 'khor dang bcas te g.yos bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_de ltar 'gyur ba snyam zhes des mi de la smras pa/_kwa'i bya pa song la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 
[\[187b.5\]]'das kyi phyir g.yos gyis shig ces byos shig_/de 'phags pa dang /_dpe med mas lkog tu sod la phul cig ces bsgo nas/_des bsad de sngo bsangs can la phul nas smras pa/_lha'i zhal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir g.yos gyis shig ces byung ngo /_/sngo bsangs 
[\[187b.6\]]can 'khor dang bcas pas g.yos bya bar brtsams so/_/bya pas song ste rgyal po la smras pa/_lha sngo bsangs can 'khor dang bcas pas g.yos bgyi bar brtsams so/_/dpe med mas smras pa/_lhas gsan tam/_gal te srog gcod par mi bgyid na ni dge sbyong gau ta 
[\[187b.7\]]ma'i slad du yang mi bgyid la/_lha'i slad du yang mi bgyid pa'i rigs na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i slad du ni bgyid la/_lha'i slad du ni mi bgyid pa de ji lta bu zhig_/rgyal po khros par gyur nas gzhu bkang ste 'phags so/_/'jig rten ni mdza' bshes dang /_dgra bo dang tha 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]mal pa yin pas kha cig gis ni sngo bsangs can la smras pa/_lha shin tu khros nas gzhu bkang ste 'ong gis thabs soms shig_/des rang gi 'khor la smras pa/_nu mo dag khyed cag thams cad byams pa la snyoms par zhugs shig_/de dag thams cad 
[\[188a.2\]]byams pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rgyal pos gzhu rna drung du thug par bkang ste mda' 'phangs pa dang /_de lam phyed du ltung ngo /_/mda' gnyis pa 'phangs pa dang /_de phyir log ste rgyal po'i drung du ltung ngo /_/mda' gsum pa 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /_sngo bsangs 
[\[188a.3\]]can gyis smras pa/_lha ma 'phen cig_/khyod thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis par 'gyur ba ma mdzad cig_/rgyal po skrag ste smras pa/_khyod lha mo'am/_klu mo'am/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_dri za mo'am/_nam mkha' lding mo'am/_mi'am ci mo'am/_
[\[188a.4\]]lto 'phye chen mo'am su yin/_des smras pa/_lha bdag ni lha mo yang ma lags/_klu mo yang ma lags/_gnod sbyin mo yang ma lags/_dri za mo yang ma lags/_mi'am ci yang ma lags/_lto 'phye chen mo yang ma lags so/_/'o na khyod su yin/_lha 
[\[188a.5\]]bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma phyir mi 'ong ba ste/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so/_/bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gis kyang bden pa dag mthong ngo /_/rgyal po mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa/_khyod 
[\[188a.6\]]la dam pa ci zhig sbyin par bya ba smros shig_/des smras pa/_gal te lha bdag la mngon par dad na gang gi tshe lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe na bdag la sring mo'i 'du shes nye bar zhog shig_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya'o/_/rgyal po de 
[\[188a.7\]]dpe med ma dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa nyams su myong bar byed do/_/sngo bsangs can la chos kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dad pa skyed par byed cing /_de la lo tog sar pa dang /_'bras bu sar pa dang /_dus tshigs sar pa pa gang dag 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]'grub pa de dag kyang dang po kho nar sngo bsangs can la 'bul bar byed do/_/bud med kyi yul ni phrag dog gi rang bzhin can yin pas dpe med mas bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di bdag dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa nyams su myong bar 
[\[188b.2\]]byed la/_'di la lo tog sar pa dang /_'bras bu sar pa dang /_dus tshigs sar pa pa gang dag 'grub pa de dag ni dang po kho nar sngo bsangs can la 'bul bar byed pas gang gis sngo bsangs can 'di gsad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/_de gsad 
[\[188b.3\]]pa'i phyir klan ka tshol zhing de lhur len cing 'dug go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'i ri brags pa zhig log nas/_des der ru gcig btang na de bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste 'ongs so/_/de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa btang na de yang bcom zhing 
[\[188b.4\]]rab tu bcom ste 'ongs nas/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha'i dpung ni nyams shing ri brags pa'i dpung ni skyes te/_gal te lha rang nyid ma gshegs na de phebs dka' bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro/_/des kau shAm+bIr dril bsgrag pa 
[\[188b.5\]]byed du bcug ste/_nga'i yul na gang dag mtshon chas 'tsho ba ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis 'dong bar bya'o zhes bsgo ste de nas 'phags so/_/rgyal pos sbyor ba 'dzin la smras pa/_khyod sngo bsangs can la mkho ba stobs shing 'di nyid na 'dug shig_/des smras pa/_
[\[188b.6\]]lha de ltar mi rung ste/_bdag kyang lha nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o/_/rgyal pos gdangs can la smras pa/_khyod sngo bsangs can la mkho ba stobs shing 'di nyid na 'dug shig_/des kyang smras pa/_lha de ltar mi rung ste/_bdag kyang lha nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o/_/rgyal 
[\[188b.7\]]pos ma du bzhag ste smras pa/_khyod sngo bsangs can la mkho ba stobs shing 'di nyid na 'dug shig ces bsgo ste 'phags pa dang /_des kyang phyi bzhin skyel bzhin du lha de ltar mi rung ste/_bdag kyang lha nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o zhes lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]rgyal pos ma gnang nas des khas blangs so/_/ma du dpe med ma'i gan du song ba dang /_des dris pa/_yab lhas 'dir su bzhag_/bdag bzhag go/_/des bsams pa/_ma nyes kyis grogs 'dis khon gyi sha glan par nus so snyam du rig nas smras pa/_
[\[189a.2\]]yab sngo bsangs can bdag gi cir 'ong mkhyen tam/_bu mo 'tshal te chen ma'o/_/yab bud med kyi yul la chos gang shin tu gnod pa mkhyen tam/_bu mo 'tshal te/_phrag dog dang ser sna'o/_/yab gal te de lta na sngo bsangs can khum shig_/bu mo ci bdag la mgo 
[\[189a.3\]]gnyis mchis sam/_rgyal pos lan gsum gyi bar du sngo bsangs can la mkho ba stobs shig ces bka' stsal gyi/_khyod kyi ming yang ma smos so/_/des smras pa/_yab khyod 'di ltar glen nam/_bu mo'i don du pha la cung zad 'tshol ba su yod de/_rgyu med par yang 
[\[189a.4\]]de la byams par byed do/_/de'i phyir gal te je de gsod na de lta na legs/_gal te mi gsod na kho mos khyod sngon gyi gnas nyid du gzhag par bya'o/_/de skrag ste bsams pa/_rgyal po de bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin pas de ltar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_smras pa/_bu 
[\[189a.5\]]mo gyi na de bzhin du gsad par mi nus te/_'di ltar thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/_/des smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de bzhin gyis shig_/des sngo bsangs can la smras pa/_lha mo ci bgyi bka' stsol cig_/des smras pa/_ma du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/_'di ltar bu mo 'di 
[\[189a.6\]]dag mtshan mo me mar la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog pas der gro ba dang /_'bru mar dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang shing bal dgos so/_/des smras pa/_lha mo ma nongs kyis sbyor du stsal to zhes des mang po sbyor du bcug ste nang du bskyas nas sgo khang du phung por bcer te bzhag 
[\[189a.7\]]go/_/sngo bsangs can gyis smras pa ma du chog gis thong shig ma dus smras pa/_lha mo 'jug stsal te slan chad yang dang yang du 'jug tu mi stsal bar bgyi'o zhes de'i 'jug tu bcug nas gro ba'i khur phyi mar me bcug ste 'jug tu bcug pa dang /_me 'bar ba des sgo khang la 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]mched nas kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me gsod du brgyugs pa dang /_ma dus ral gri shubs nas phyung ste/_khyed cag ci'i phyir rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par 'dod/_sdod cig ces skye bo'i tshogs phyir bzlog par brtsams so/_/'khrul 
[\[189b.2\]]'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis smras pa/_kho bos sgo khang me mched pa 'di 'khrul 'khor gyis gnas gzhan du spo bar bya'o/_/ma dus de yang de bzhin du phyir bzlog go/_/sngo bsangs can rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gyen du 'phags te smras pa/_nu mo dag bdag 
[\[189b.3\]]cag gis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas bdag cag gis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[189b.4\]]'das kyis kyang /_bar snang rgya mtsho'i nang dang ni/_/ri yi sul du zhugs gyur tam/_/gang du gnas na las rnams kyis/_/mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs med/_/ces gsungs pas bdag cag la las de gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad pa smras 
[\[189b.5\]]pa/_bdag gis rtsig ngos skar khung nas/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mthong 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni bstan pa la/_/bden pa dag ni kun shes byas/_/de dag phye ma leb bzhin du gyen du mchong zhing mchong zhing mer lhung bar gyur to/_/de na sngo bsangs can la sogs 
[\[189b.6\]]pa bud med lnga brgya ni tshig go/_/sgur mchog ni chu'i stor khung nas bros so/_/ma dus bud med lnga brgya po de dag gi ro dur khrod du bor nas rgyal po'i pho brang nang dang phyi rol dang bcas pa'i byi dor byas te/_kau shAm+bI na gnas pa dang /_yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i 
[\[189b.7\]]tshogs du ba dag bzlog go/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/_lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/_kau shAm+bIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_dge slong rab tu mang po dag kau shAm+bIr bsod snyoms la rgyu bas/_bad sa'i rgyal po 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]shar pa ljongs su song ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam mes tshig ces thos so/_/thos nas kyang kau shAm+bIr bsod snyoms brgyus nas/_zas kyi bya ba byas te/_phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar 
[\[190a.2\]]longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/_rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[190a.3\]]dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs 'tshal lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te kau shAm+bIr bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po kau shAm+bIr bsod 
[\[190a.4\]]snyoms la rgyu ba dag gis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa ljongs su mchis pa'i mchis 'brang gi 'khor sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam zhugs kyis dral ces thos so/_/dge slong dag gang gis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa ljongs su song ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor sngo bsangs 
[\[190a.5\]]can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam mes bsregs pa'i mi gti mug can des bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed do/_/dge slong dag 'di ltar mi gti mug can des bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed mod kyi/_bud med de dag ni 'bras bu med par dus la bab pa ma yin 
[\[190a.6\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas rdzus te skye zhing /_der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba phyir mi 'ong ba yang 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can de lta bu'i bud med dag btsun mo'i 
[\[190a.7\]]'khor de na yod pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug srabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba lan gcig 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bud 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa lan bdun lha 
[\[190b.2\]]dang mi rnams su mtshams sbyar nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag rang gi srog gi phyir yang bslab pa dag las 'da' bar mi byed pa de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang 
[\[190b.3\]]btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag nga la sems dad pas dus byas shing lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag tshur sheg 
[\[190b.4\]]sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po dag gi ro ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig bud med lnga brgya po de 
[\[190b.5\]]dag gi ro ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bud med lnga brgya'i ro 'di dag ni gang la bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa chags pa dang /_zhen pa dang /_'chums pa dang /_mdud pa bor ba dang /_brgyal ba dang /_lhag par 
[\[190b.6\]]chags pa dang /_lhag par chags shing 'dug pa dag yin na/_da ni 'di dag la rkang pa dag gis reg par yang su zhig byed/_tshigs su bcad pa yang bka' stsal pa/_'jig rten snying po med brel la/_/skal ldan su zhig lta bar byed/_/byis pa nyon mongs 
[\[190b.7\]]bcings gyur cing /_/mun pa yongs su bskor ba dag_/dam pa min la dam par lta/_/mthong ba rnams la ci yang med/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_ka ba tshig pa gang yin pa la yang sems rab tu sdang bar mi bya na/_rnam 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/kau shAm+bI na gnas pa dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag 'dus te gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po la gnod pa 'di lta bu byung 
[\[191a.2\]]na de bdag cag las gang gis rgyal po la brjod par bya/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_mi snyan smra gang yin pa de rjod du gzhug gis de bod do/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis de bos te smras pa/_lha la mi snyan pa 'di [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]
[\[191a.3\]]bzhin du gsol cig_/des smras pa/_de'i tshe khyed cag na re ci'i phyir mi snyan smra la 'tsho ba sbyin par bya zhes zer na/_da de'i dus 'di yin gyis khyed cag nyid kyis gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_de'i don nyid du khyod la 'tsho ba byin pa yin na gzhan su zhig gsol bar byed/_
[\[191a.4\]]khyod kyis gsol cig_/des smras pa/_dam tshig gis gsol bar bya ste/_kho bo ci zer ba de bzhin gyis shig dang gsol bar bya'o/_/smros shig dang /_de bzhin bya'o/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]'di ltar gsol bar bya ste/_kho bo la glang po che lnga brgya dang /_bal glang mo lnga 
[\[191a.5\]]brgya dang /_rta lnga brgya dang /_rgod ma lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /_gser 'bum dang /_ras la kau shAm+bI'i gnas dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog gi so dang /_ji ltar ma dus gro ba dang /_'bru mar dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_shing bal 
[\[191a.6\]]bskyas shing gro ba'i khur phyi ma'i nang du me bcug pa dang /_ji ltar sgo khang la me mched pa dang /_ji ltar kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me gsod du brgyugs pa na ma dus ral gri shubs nas phyung ste/_phyir bzlog pa dang /_ji ltar 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon 
[\[191a.7\]]gyis sgo khang la me mched pa 'khrul 'khor gyis gnas gzhan du spo'o zhes zer ba na ma dus de bzhin du phyir bzlog pa dang /_ji ltar sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya phye ma leb bzhin du gyen du mchong zhing mchong zhing mer lhung ba dag ri mor bris te byin cig_/de dag 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]gis smras pa/_de ltar bya'o zhes de dag gis de la glang po che lnga brgya dang /_bal glang mo lnga brgya dang /_rta lnga brgya dang /_rgod ma lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /_gser 'bum dang /_ras la kau shAm+bI'i gnas dang /_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog gi 
[\[191b.2\]]so dang /_ji ltar ma dus gro ba dang /_'bru mar dang /_snag tsha dang /_smyu gu dang /_shing bal bskyas shing gro ba'i khur phyi ma'i nang du me bcug pa dang /_ji ltar sgo khang la me mched pa dang /_ji ltar kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me gsod du brgyugs pa na ma dus ral 
[\[191b.3\]]gri shubs nas phyung ste phyir bzlog pa dang /_ji ltar 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis sgo khang la me mched pa 'khrul 'khor gyis gnas gzhan du spo'o zhes zer ba na ma dus de bzhin du phyir bzlog pa dang /_ji ltar sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya phye ma leb 
[\[191b.4\]]bzhin du gyen du mchong zhing mchong zhing mer lhung ba dag ri mor bris te byin no/_/de nas mi snyan smras blon po rnams la yi ge spring ste/_rgyal po la gnod pa 'di lta bu byung ba kho bos thabs 'dis brjod par byas/_khyed kyis grogs gyis shig ces byas so/_/des de dag la 
[\[191b.5\]]yi ge spring nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te phyogs gzhan zhig tu song nas der bsdad de/_rgyal po shar pa la phrin yig 'di skad ces lha bdag ni yul ga ge mo zhig gi rgyal po ste/_bdag gi bu 'chi bdag gis phrogs nas de'i phyir bdag de dang lhan cig g.yul 
[\[191b.6\]]sprod par byed de/_gal te re zhig g.yul sprad pas de pham par nus na de lta na legs/_gal te ma nus na glang po che lnga brgya dang /_bal glang mo lnga brgya dang /_rta lnga brgya dang /_rgod ma lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /_gser 'bum phul nas 
[\[191b.7\]]bu blangs te 'ong ngo zhes bris te bskur ro/_/rgyal po shar pa'i ri brags pa de dpung dang ldan pas ma phebs nas/_des blon po rnams la smras pa shes ldan dag rgyal po de 'di ltar blun pa la ltos/_'chi bdag gis bu phrogs pa phyir 'khrug par nus pa 'ga' yang yod re skan/_
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]de ni mjal gyis de la phrin yig 'di skad ces kho bo'i ri brags pa zhig log pa ma phebs kyis je kho bo'i grogs gyis shig dang /_kho bos kyang phyis khyod kyi grogs bya'o zhes bris te skur cig_/blon po rnams kyis de la phrin yig de skad ces bris te bskur ba 
[\[192a.2\]]dang /_des phrin yig bklags nas bklags ma thag tu ri brags der 'ongs nas de ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa dang /_ri brags pa dag gis thos nas bsams pa/_bdag cag rgyal po dag gis phyogs bcu dag nas bskor bar chad de/_rgyal po gnyis pa 'di 
[\[192a.3\]]yang nye bar 'ongs kyis yul ni rnam pa thams cad du phyir 'thob par yang rung gi_/srog ni phyir 'thob par mi rung gis phyir 'byung ngo snyam nas/_de dag ral gri mgul nas phog ste phyir byung nas/_rgyal po shar pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa dang /_rgyal po shar 
[\[192a.4\]]pas de dag lo thang dang /_dpya 'jal du bcug go/_/de nas mi snyan smra rgyal po'i yo lang gis rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/_lha bdag gi bu 'chi bdag gis phrogs te lhas bdag gi grogs gyis shig dang /_bdag de dang lhan cig g.yul sprod par byed 
[\[192a.5\]]do/_/gal te re zhig g.yul sprad pas de pham par nus na de lta na legs/_gal te ma nus na de la glang po che lnga brgya dang /_bal glang mo lnga brgya dang /_rta lnga brgya dang /_rgod ma lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /_gser 'bum phul te 
[\[192a.6\]]blang bar bya'o/_/rgyal po shar pas smras pa/_shed mthun khyod glen pa zhig ste/_'chi bdag las phyir len par nus pa 'ga' yang yod re skan/_des smras pa/_lha mi nus sam/_mi nus so/_/gal te de lta na ri mo 'di ltos shig_/des ri mo brkyang ste/_rgyal pos 
[\[192a.7\]]ri mo brtags nas gnad du bsnun pa dang 'dra bar gdung bzhin du smras pa/_kye ji skad sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya mes tshig ces zer ram/_des cod pan dang /_thor tshugs phog ste tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_bdag ni rgyal po ma lags rgyal srid min/_/
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]lha khyod zhabs 'bring zhabs kyis 'tsho ba ste/_/mi snyan don 'di khyod la gsol slad du/_/bdag 'dir khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis/_/rgyal po shin tu brtags nas 'di ni grong khyer kau shAm+bI'o/_/'di ni rgyal po'i pho brang ngo /_/'di ni khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog gi so'o/_/'di 
[\[192b.2\]]ni ma du'o/_/'di ni gro ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas sreg pa'o/_/'di dag ni sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya phye ma leb bzhin du gyen du mchong zhing mchong zhing mer lhung ba dag go zhes rnam par dpyod par byed do/_/rnam par dpyad nas smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje ji skad 
[\[192b.3\]]sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya mes tshig ces zer ram/_lha bdag de skad mi mchi'o/_/'di ltar lha nyid de skad gsung ngo /_/kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis nga la thabs kyis gsol bar zad kyi gzhan du na ngas khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de/_sa la bsgyel bar 
[\[192b.4\]]'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_rgyal po brgyal te sa la sgyel to/_/de nas chus gdab pas dbugs phyir byung nas smras pa/_shes ldan dag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig_/kau shAm+bIr 'dong ngo /_/blon po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po go 
[\[192b.5\]]bskon nas rgyal po kau shAm+bIr 'phags te mthar gyis kau shAm+bIr phyin pa dang /_des pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi nang na ches rgyus mkhas pa thams cad smras so/_/de nas blon po'i mchog sbyor ba 'dzin la bsgo ba/_sbyor ba 'dzin song la ma du rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug 
[\[192b.6\]]la sregs shig_/dpe med ma yang rte'u ma dul ba'i rkang pa la thogs la 'or cig_/sbyor ba 'dzin gyis ma du rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so/_/de nas bsams pa/_dpe med ma ni gal te rgyal pos bsams nas dpe med ma 'on cig ces zer na bdag 
[\[192b.7\]]gis ji ltar byas/_re zhig sdod cig snyam nas des dpe med ma sa khang du bcug ste bzhag go/_/rgyal po nyi ma bdun pa la mya ngan sangs nas de mya ngan sangs pas smras pa/_sbyor ba 'dzin dpe med ma ga re/_des lha bdag gis rte'u ma thul ba'i rkang pa la btags te 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bor ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ma nyes so/_/ma dus ni sngo bsangs can bsad la/_khyod kyis kyang dpe med ma bsad kyis da nga rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/_/sbyor ba 'dzin gyis smras pa/_lha de nyid kyi slad du bdag gis dpe med ma sa khang du stsal te bzhag 
[\[193a.2\]]go/_/gal te gson na blta'o/_/des de sa khang nas phyung ba dang /_gnas skabs de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /_lus ma rnyis par 'dug go/_/rgyal pos mthong nas bsams pa/_ji ltar 'di gnas skabs de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs can ma yin pa 
[\[193a.3\]]dang /_lus ma rnyis par 'dug la/_na yang mi na/_zas kyang mi za ba las na gor ma chag par skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do snyam du rig nas smras pa/_dpe med ma khyod kyis 'khrul pa byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha sdig pa ci zhig_/bdag de ltar mi 
[\[193a.4\]]bgyid do/_/ci mngon/_lha khyod bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad dam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_de ni mjal te/_khyod de'i tshe na ni dge sbyong gau ta ma zhes zer la/_da ni bcom ldan 'das zhes zer mod/_'di ltar nga ro dang 'dra ba khyod kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la mi 
[\[193a.5\]]zhu'i/_sngo bsangs can gyi don du bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bad 
[\[193a.6\]]sa'i rgyal po shar pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgyas las ci bgyis na/_des zhugs kyis dral cing /_sgur mchog ni chab kyi stor khung nas bros par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen 
[\[193a.7\]]po de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_rgyal 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]po chen po las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i 
[\[193b.2\]]phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA 
[\[193b.3\]]Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_phyi dgra dang /_nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing 
[\[193b.4\]]gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba dang /_bas 
[\[193b.5\]]mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de skyed mos tshal zhig na spyil bu na gnas so/_/rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun 
[\[193b.6\]]mo'i 'khor lnga brgya skyed mos tshal der byung nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor de dag rtsed mo'i rdzing du khrus byas nas grang bas sbrebs nas/_de na btsun mo dam pas bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo shin tu grang bas sbrebs kyis song la/_spyil bu 'di la me thong shig_/des 
[\[193b.7\]]sgron me sbar te song ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas des btsun mo'i mchog la smras pa/_lha mo 'di na rab tu byung ba zhig mchis so/_/des smras pa rab tu byung ba 'dug kyang rung /_gzhan 'dug kyang rung gis me thong shig_/des ma btang bar bros pa dang /_de nas 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]btsun mo'i mchog de 'khrugs nas de rang gis me btang ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas de phyir byung ngo /_/btsun mo'i 'khor gzhan dag gis kyang lha mo khyod kyis zhugs btang ba legs pa bgyis te bdag cag thams cad zhugs 'de'o zhes rjes su yi rangs 
[\[194a.2\]]pa byas so/_/rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/_btsun mo'i 'khor nyon mongs pa 'di dag ha cang smas pa dang /_nyams par gyur na mi rung gis 'di dag la lag nas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas/_des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam 
[\[194a.3\]]mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'beb pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas btsun mo'i 'khor de dag shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa 
[\[194a.4\]]bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa'i drung du 'gyel nas smras pa/_yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol/_mar gshegs su gsol/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag cag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol/_rang sangs rgyas de btsun mo'i 
[\[194a.5\]]'khor de dag la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so/_/de dag gis de la mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces bdag cag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod par byas pa gang yin 
[\[194a.6\]]pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /_thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/
[\[194a.7\]]rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo dam pa gang yin pa de ni sngo bsangs can 'di yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bud med gzhan bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag ni bud med bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu po 'di dag yin no/_/de'i tshe 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]de'i dus na bu mo mngag gzhug ma gang yin pa de ni sgur mchog 'di yin no/_/de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi spyil bu bsregs shing rjes su yi rangs pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo mang po dag tu sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su bsregs nas 
[\[194b.2\]]da ltar bden pa mthong gi bar du yang mes tshig par gyur to/_/sgur mchog me gtong du ma btubs pas ni da ltar chu'i stor khung nas bros par gyur to/_/de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da ltar nga'i drung du bden pa mthong 
[\[194b.3\]]bar byas shing /_de dag gis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las 
[\[194b.4\]]gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams 
[\[194b.5\]]la brtsal bar bya ste/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po shar pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rangs pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[194b.6\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sgur mchog gis las 
[\[194b.7\]]ci bgyis na des na sgur bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sgur mchog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_
[\[195a.2\]]rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_de ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na 
[\[195a.3\]]lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_phyi 
[\[195a.4\]]dgra dang /_nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_mu ge dang nad dang bral ba/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /_ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/_chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go/_/ji tsam dus 
[\[195a.5\]]gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas/_rgyal po tshangs byin gyis bA rA Na sIr dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste/_'di skad ces gang la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod pa des ni gnas par bya'o/_/gang la med pa des ni gzhan du 
[\[195a.6\]]'gro bar bya zhing lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir yang 'ong bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos 
[\[195a.7\]]kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste 
[\[195b.2\]]phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang 
[\[195b.3\]]bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/_/de dag 
[\[195b.4\]]de nyid du 'khod do/_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na bA rA Na sIr phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus 
[\[195b.5\]]sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag khyed cag la gsol lags na ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/_khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la kho bo cag kyang gzhan no/_/'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/_kwa'i 
[\[195b.6\]]nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba stong po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/_des smras pa/_jo bo mchis so/_/des rab tu byung ba gzhan lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/_'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/_/de 
[\[195b.7\]]dag kyang der 'khod do/_/des sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/_des sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dang spyan 'dren yang bskos so/_/der nyi ma re re zhing rang sangs rgyas stong stong zan za'o/_/de na rang sangs rgyas gcig na bar gyur nas de de'i nyin mo ma 'ongs pa dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]gzungs byed la bu mos smras pa/_yab deng rab tu byung ba gcig ma mchis so/_/des smras pa/_bu mo ji lta bu zhig_/des rgyab btud de smras pa/_yab 'di lta bu zhig go/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi bu mo gang 
[\[196a.2\]]yin pa de ni sgur mchog 'di yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas la tho btsams pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sgur por gyur to/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sgur 
[\[196a.3\]]mchog gis las ci bgyis na des na thos pa 'dzin par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sgur mchog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[196a.4\]]dag byas shing bsags pas de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la 
[\[196a.5\]]mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang 
[\[196a.6\]]tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi sbyin gnas rang sangs rgyas stong po de dag nyid kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa de rlung nad can yin pas de lag pa 'dar bas zan za ba na 
[\[196a.7\]]lhung bzed 'gul nas gzungs byed kyi bu mo des rang gi lag pa las gdu bu rgyan can phud de rang sangs rgyas de la phul te smras pa/_'phags pa 'di'i steng du lhung bzed bzhag tu gsol/_des de'i steng du lhung bzed bzhag pa dang /_mi g.yo ba nyid du 'dug nas/_des de'i 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa ji ltar lhung bzed 'di mi g.yo bar 'dug pa de bzhin du bdag gi rgyud la chos gang dag zhugs pa de dag kyang mi g.yo ba nyid du gyur cig ces btab bo/_/las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di da ltar thos pa 'dzin par gyur to/_/yang 
[\[196b.2\]]dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sgur mchog gis las ci bgyis na des bran mor gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sgur mchog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen 
[\[196b.3\]]yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i 
[\[196b.4\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin 
[\[196b.5\]]par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag de nyid na 'di dbang phyug gi dregs pas rgyags pas 'khor gyi mi rnams la bran gyi tshig gis kun 
[\[196b.6\]]du spyad pas las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar bran mor gyur to/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dpe med mas las ci bgyis na des gdugs bdun du zan ma mchis par sa khang du stsal cing 
[\[196b.7\]]nyon mongs pa can ma lags pa dang /_lus ma rnyis par phyung bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dpe med ma nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]byas shing bsags pas de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_
[\[197a.2\]]me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za 
[\[197a.3\]]ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na rgyal rigs kyi bu mo zhig dang /_bram ze'i bu mo phan tshun bshes pa gnyis shig 'khod do/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang 
[\[197a.4\]]sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam du na rang sangs rgyas shig sa phyogs zhi ba zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par 
[\[197a.5\]]khas blangs nas phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo des de'i nyin mo de la bsod snyoms byin to/_/de bzhin du nyi ma gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_nyin gcig 
[\[197a.6\]]mi chad par yang de la bsod snyoms sbyin par brtsams so/_/rgyal rigs kyi bu mo de dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i bu mo des mgron du bos nas de'i khyim du song ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas de yang bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing rgyal rigs kyi bu mo de'i khyim du zhugs pa na de med nas/_
[\[197a.7\]]mthar gyis bram ze'i bu mo de'i khyim du zhugs pa dang /_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo des mthong nas des bram ze'i bu mo de la smras pa/_bu mo 'phags pa 'di la bsod snyoms phul cig_/des smras pa/_ji srid du lha dang /_bram ze dang /_snying du sdug cing 'brel ba'i rtsa 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]lag dag la ma phul gyi bar du dge sbyong mgo reg 'di la ga la sbyin/_des smras pa/_nu mo gal te de lta na kho mo re zhig 'di la bsod snyoms 'bul du 'gros phul nas phyir 'ong ngo /_/des smras pa/_che zhe gal te de lta na 'dug cig dang /_bdag gis 'di la bsod snyoms 
[\[197b.2\]]dbul lo/_/des de la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam log pa btab ste/_bdag gis dge sbyong mgo reg 'di la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa 'di dag la 'jig rten 'dir yang rnam par smin par ma gyur la/_'jig rten pha rol du yang rnam par smin par ma gyur cig ces 
[\[197b.3\]]btab bo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mo gang yin pa de ni dpe med ma 'di yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam log pa 'di skad ces bdag gis dge sbyong mgo reg 'di la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa 'di 'jig rten 'dir yang 
[\[197b.4\]]rnam par smin par ma gyur la/_'jig rten pha rol du yang rnam par smin par ma gyur cig ces btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di nyi ma bdun du zan med par sa khang du bcug cing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang lus ma rnyis par phyung ngo /_/dus gzhan zhig na mgu byed 
[\[197b.5\]]rgas par gyur nas des 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag khyim bdag gdangs can gyi chung ma'i mchog gi mngal du skye zhing sngo bsangs can gyi chu zheng ci 
[\[197b.6\]]'dra ba de lta bur bdag kyang gyur te/_bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa bdag gi khyim thab tu gyur cig ces btab bo/_/de shi zhing dus la bab nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyi chung ma'i mchog gi mngal du skyes so/_/gang gi nyin mo skyes pa de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim de dpal dag gis snang bar 
[\[197b.7\]]gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad dam/_dgu 'das te btsas pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig byung ngo /_/byung ma thag tu yang des pha'i khyim rgya cher dpal dag gis snang bar gyur to/_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du rnams kyis smras pa/_gang gi phyir bu mo 'di gang gi nyin mo ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim de dpal dag gis snang bar gyur la/_
[\[198a.2\]]btsas pa na yang 'dis pha'i khyim rgya cher dpal dag gis snang bar gyur pa de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dpal ldan du gdags so zhes de'i ming dpal ldan zhes bya bar btags so/_/gang gi tshe de smra shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na dge slong gang dag khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag 
[\[198a.3\]]gi gan du song ste/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas snyun gsol bar byed do/_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de de'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge 
[\[198a.4\]]slong gnas brtan gnas brtan che ge mo dag gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang ldan nam/_bde'am/_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_des smras pa/_sring mo bcom ldan 'das 
[\[198a.5\]]dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan che ge mo dag gnod pa chung /_nyam nga ba nyung /_bskyod pa yang /_'tsho ba stobs dang ldan/_bde/_kha na ma tho ba med/_bde ba la reg par gnas so/_/de smras pa'i tshig thos nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyi nang mi dag mchog tu ngo mtshar 
[\[198a.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos a rog gya zhes byas te song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can gyi bu mo byis pa zhig 
[\[198a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la snyun gsol zhing /_khyim bdag gdangs can gyi nang mi dag gis de thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo de mi shes 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]sam/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal to/_/kun dga' bo de ni mgu byed yin te/_smon lam gyi dbang gis khyim bdag gdangs can gyi chung ma'i mchog gi mngal du skyes te da ltar bu mo dpal ldan zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe dpal ldan chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe na de slong ba rgyal 
[\[198b.2\]]po dag dang /_nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang /_ded dpon dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_shAkya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po dag 'ong bar brtsams so/_/khyim bdag gdangs can 'di snyam du dpal ldan slong ba mang po dag 'ong ste/_gang dag la ma byin pa de dag 
[\[198b.3\]]bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/dpal ldan gyis de mthong nas smras pa/_yab khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu mo khyod slong ba 
[\[198b.4\]]rgyal po dag dang /_nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang /_ded dpon dag dang /_kau d+ya dag dang /_shAkya dag dang /_lits+tsha bI dag dang /_gzhan yang mang po dag 'ong ste/_gang dag la ma byin pa de dag bdag gi dgrar 'gyur na/_ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad 
[\[198b.5\]]de sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /_des smras pa/_yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/bdag gis khyim thab 'tshal lags so/_/bu mo gang /_yab bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'o/_/bu mo gal te de lta na je [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bya'o/_/yab [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji lta bu lags/_
[\[198b.6\]]bu mo kho bos bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa 'di nyid du spyan drang gis/_gang gi tshe des bshos gsol ba de'i tshe na khyod steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na 'dug pas pho long 'phang bar bya'o/_/yab ma nongs kyis de bzhin bgyi'o/_/des bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa khyim gzhan du mgron du 
[\[198b.7\]]bos te zan zos pa dang /_dpal ldan steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]gzhi na 'dug pas pho long 'phangs so/_/rgyal pos steng du brtag par brtsams pa dang /_rgyal pos de mthong nas smras pa/_gdangs can khyod na re sngo bsangs can dus la bab ces zer na 'di na 'dug pa 'di ma yin 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]nam/_lha 'di ni sngo bsangs can ma lags so/_/'o na 'di ci ming /_lha 'di ni sngo bsangs can gyi nu mo dpal ldan zhes bgyi'o/_/ci 'ga' zhig la byin nam/_lha su la yang ma stsal to/_/gal te de lta na nga la ci'i phyir mi sbyin/_lha gsol lo/_/khyim 
[\[199a.2\]]bdag gdangs can gyis byin nas bad sa'i rgyal po shar pas dpal gyi 'byor pas bag mar blangs te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bcug go/_/dus gzhan zhig na des rgyal po la smras pa/_lha bdag dge slong mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod 'dod mod kyi/_
[\[199a.3\]]dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'jug go/_/lha de lta na bdag rnam pa thams cad du btson rar stsal du bas mod/_gal te dge slong mthong bar mi gnang na/_deng slan cad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/_phyag kyang mi 'tshal lo/_/des zan gcad pa la zhugs pa dang /_rgyal pos 
[\[199a.4\]]khyim bdag gdangs can la smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod so sor mi rtog gam/_lha ci lags/_dpal ldan zan gcad pa la zhugs so/_/lha ci'i slad du dge slong mthong bar 'dod na dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'jug go/_/lha 'o na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_khyim 
[\[199a.5\]]bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis bdag nyid kyi ming gis ra bar dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs te/_bar du sgo thod la bshos gsol cig_/khyim bdag gdangs can gyi khyim rgyal po dang 'dab chags su 'dug pas des ra ba'i bar du sgo gtod nas sa'i byi dor byed du bcug go/_/de nas 
[\[199a.6\]]de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston 
[\[199a.7\]]par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 
[\[199b.2\]]'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_
[\[199b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu 
[\[199b.4\]]ra bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni zhugs so/_/
[\[199b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad de/_lnga gang zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed pa dang /_
[\[199b.6\]]lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la rtog par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/_/don 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' 
[\[199b.7\]]bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jug pa na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug nas de'i phyir ldog par brtsams pa dang /_rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa shA ri'i 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bu gshegs su gsol/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag bzhi po dag gi tshig ni mi gcag pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_dge slong dgra bcom 
[\[200a.2\]]pa zag pa zad pa'i tshig dang /_dge skos kyi tshig dang /_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i tshig yin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dran pa nye bar zhog shig dang 'jug par bya'o zhes de zhugs nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/de 
[\[200a.3\]]nas btsun mo dpal ldan gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar 'khod par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byed/_stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag nas bca' ba 
[\[200a.4\]]dang /_bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sogs pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[200a.5\]]phyir tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu btsun mo dpal ldan la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/_yang dag par gzengs stod par byed/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 
[\[200a.6\]]byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed na des bden pa dag ma mthong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/_ci 'di la 
[\[200a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yod dam/_'on te med snyam na/_yod par mthong ngo /_/su la rag las snyam na/_bdag nyid la rag las par mthong nas/_de de la chos ston cing rnam par dpyod pa na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas dge slong rnams stan las langs te dong ngo /_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang mod kyi/_'di nyid rkyen du mdzad nas gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/_/snyam nas/_de gdul ba la ltos pas de nyid du 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun mo 
[\[200b.2\]]dpal ldan gyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_gang thos nas btsun mo dpal ldan gyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon 
[\[200b.3\]]sum du byas pa de ltar chos bstan pa byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brten nas 'phags pas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos 
[\[200b.4\]]kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i 
[\[200b.5\]]ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/'khor ba ni mthar bgyis/_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas 
[\[200b.6\]]bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[200b.7\]]chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsun mo dpal ldan bden pa dag la bzhag 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]ste song nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par 
[\[201a.2\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/bdun po dag gi tshig ni mi gcag pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_dge slong dgra bcom pa zag 
[\[201a.3\]]pa zad pa'i tshig dang /_dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi tshig dang /_dge skos kyi tshig dang /_mkhan po'i tshig dang /_slob dpon gyi tshig dang /_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i tshig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab 
[\[201a.4\]]pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[201a.5\]]snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang nam ma nangs/_skya rengs ma shar/_rin po che dag gam/_rin po cher smos pa dag ma bsdus par rgyal po rgyal 
[\[201a.6\]]rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i sgo gtan nam/_sgo gtan gyi nyen kor las 'da' na de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/nam ma nangs zhes bya ba ni nam nangs par ma gyur pa'o/_/
[\[201a.7\]]skya rengs zhes bya ba ni skya rengs gsum po/_skya rengs dang po dang /_skya rengs bar ma dang /_skya rengs tha ma'o/_/de la skya rengs dang po ni sngon por snang ba'o/_/skya rengs bar ma ni ser por snang ba'o/_/skya rengs tha ma ni dmar por snang ba ste/_'dir ni skya rengs tha ma yin 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]par dgongs so/_/ma shar ces bya ba ni ma byung ba'o/_/rin po che dag ces bya ba la/_rin po che dag ces bya ba ni nor bu dag dang /_mu tig dag dang /_bai DUr+ya dag dang /_man shel dkar po dag dang /_byi ru dag dang /_gser dag dang /_dngul dag dang /_rdo'i snying po dag 
[\[201b.2\]]dang /_spug dag dang /_dmar po dag dang /_g.yas su 'khyil ba dag go/_/rin po cher smos pa dag ces bya ba la/_rin po cher smos pa dag ces bya ba ni g.yul ngor spyad pa'i mtshon cha thams cad dang /_rol mor spyad pa'i cha spyad thams cad do/_/ma bsdus pa zhes 
[\[201b.3\]]bya ba ni ma brtul bar ro/_/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_bud med rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin la/_rgyal rigs dang /_bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_
[\[201b.4\]]dmangs rigs rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur na de yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba yin no/_/sgo gtan nam zhes bya ba ni sgo gtan rnam pa gsum ste/_grong khyer gyi sgo gtan dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[201b.5\]]gyi sgo gtan no/_/sgo gtan gyi nyen kor las zhes bya ba ni de'i drung las so/_/'da' na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o/_/de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i rkyen bzhag ste'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[201b.6\]]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs 
[\[201b.7\]]so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis nam ma nangs pa la nam ma nangs par 'du shes pas grong khyer gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam ma nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas grong khyer gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]nam nangs pa la nam ma nangs par 'du shes pas grong khyer gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas grong khyer gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nam ma nangs pa la nam nangs par 'du 
[\[202a.2\]]shes pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam ma nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa la nam ma nangs par 'du shes pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan las 
[\[202a.3\]]'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis nam ma nangs pa la nam ma nangs par 'du shes pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[202a.4\]]nam ma nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa la nam ma nangs par 'du shes pas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nam nangs pa la yid gnyis za bas btsun 
[\[202a.5\]]mo'i 'khor gyi sgo gtan las 'da' na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dag gis bos pa dang /_bar chad brgyad po rgyal po dang chom rkun dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_gdug pa dang /_me dang chu dang klu dag nye bar gnas pa 
[\[202a.6\]]la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/rgyal po'i pho brang du nub mo 'gro ba'i ltung byed de/_brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[202a.7\]]na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe drug sde dag gus par 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]byas te/_chos nyan par mi byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed cing dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe 
[\[202b.2\]]dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag cag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa da gdod thos sam ci na gang gi phyir 
[\[202b.3\]]de skad zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci kho bo cag la las de tsam 'ba' zhig tu zad dam/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa la yang rnam par brtag dgos so/_/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa la yang rnam 
[\[202b.4\]]par brtag dgos so/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse 
[\[202b.5\]]gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed cing /_dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag cag gis da gzod shes so 
[\[202b.6\]]zhes zer nas smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do 
[\[202b.7\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan 
[\[203a.2\]]par mi byed cing /_dge slong rnams la yang 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag cag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer ba bden nam btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[203a.3\]]ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[203a.4\]]de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang zla ba phyed phyed 
[\[203a.5\]]cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer la/_de la gal te dge slong rnams kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'di sngon gso sbyong gi las 
[\[203a.6\]]gnyis sam/_gsum gyi tshe 'dug par shes shing lan mang du lta ci smos na/_tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas mi 'grol bas de ltung ba gang byung ba de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug gi steng du khyod zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe gus par byas te chos nyan par mi 
[\[203a.7\]]byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed pas tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ma rnyed de/_rnyed pa ma yin zhing nyes pa rnyed de/_
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]legs pa rnyed pa ma yin no zhes 'gyod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de la 'gyod par bya ba ni de yin te ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing zhes bya ba ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa zhes bya ba 
[\[203b.2\]]la so sor thar pa zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab 
[\[203b.3\]]pa'i chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag go/_/mdo gdon pa zhes bya ba la/_mdo gdon pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o/_/'don pa'i tshe zhes bya ba ni rab tu ston pa'i tshe'o/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di 
[\[203b.4\]]ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag gis da gdod shes so zhes zer la zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos 'di yang ngo /_/de la gal te dge slong rnams kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams kyis kyang 
[\[203b.5\]]ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'di zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa 'di'o/_/sngon gso sbyong gi las gnyis sam/_gsum gyi tshe 'dug par shes shing zhes bya ba ni 'dis so sor thar pa lan gnyis sam/_gsum thos par shes shing ngo /_/lan mang du lta ci smos na zhes bya ba ni 
[\[203b.6\]]lan mang du 'dug par shes pa lta ci smos na'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa de mi shes pas mi 'grol bas zhes bya ba ni de des ltung ba las mi 'grol bas de ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'o/_/de la ltung ba gang byung ba zhes bya ba ni ltung byed do/_/de chos bzhin du byed du gzhug ces bya 
[\[203b.7\]]ba ni 'chags su gzhug pa'o/_/steng du khyod zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa 'don pa'i tshe gus par byas te chos nyan par mi byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed pas tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ma rnyed de/_rnyed pa ma yin zhing nyes pa rnyed de/_legs pa rnyed pa ma yin no zhes 'gyod par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni 'gyod du gzhug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[204a.2\]]pa de la 'gyod par bya ba ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'gyod par bya'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan 
[\[204a.3\]]yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun lhag 
[\[204a.4\]]ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun po dag gdon pa 'don pa'i 
[\[204a.5\]]tshe gus par byas te/_chos nyan par mi byed/_bla mar byas te mi byed/_ru shing ltar byas te mi byed/_yid la byas te mi byed/_sems rtse gcig tu mi byed/_rna blags te mi byed/_sems thams cad kyis bsams te chos nyan par mi byed cing /_'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[204a.6\]]dag 'di ltar chos 'di yang mdo'i nang du gtogs/_mdo'i nang du 'dus par bdag gis da gdod shes so/_/zhes zer na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/lam gol bar rgas par gyur cing yang dag pa kho nar mi shes na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_
[\[204a.7\]]sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bslab pa'i gzhi'i dngos po la khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed de/_brgyad bcu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po bdun bcu rtsa dgu pa/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na gcer bu pa'i nyan thos chos zhes bya ba ba so mkhan zhig 'dug pa de gcer bu pa dag la shin tu mngon par dad do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na dge slong bsod snyoms 
[\[204b.2\]]pa zhig gis chos bstan pas btul nas/_des kyang de las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs so/_/yang bsod snyoms pa des de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa dang /_de mngon par dad par gyur nas smras 
[\[204b.3\]]pa/_'phags pa bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi cung zad cig yang dag par bklags te 'jug par bgyi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ci zhig byed/_'phags pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rang gi bzos bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/ma nyes kyis de bzhin gyis 
[\[204b.4\]]shig_/bsod snyoms pas gtsug lag khang du song ste/_dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis gcer bu pa'i nyan thos chos zhes bya ba ba so mkhan de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas de dge slong gi dge 'dun la rang gi bzos bsnyen 
[\[204b.5\]]bkur byed kyis su ci 'dod pa des de byed du chug shig_/ji tsam na dge slong zhig la khab ral med nas de de'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo la khab ral med kyis de gyis shig_/'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bag bgyi/_gang bzang ba'o/_/'phags pa ba so las bgyis 
[\[204b.6\]]pa bzang ngo /_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ba so las byas pa gyis shig_/des de'i khab ral ba so las byas pa byas te byin no/_/dge slong des de dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /_dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /_gzhan gyis kyang byed du bcug_/gzhan gyis kyang 
[\[204b.7\]]byed du bcug pas de'i ba so zad par gyur to/_/dge slong gzhan zhig kyang 'ongs te smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo'i khab ral gyis shig_/'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_gang bzang ba'o/_/'phags pa ba so las bgyis pa bzang na ba so de ni bas so/_/gal te bzhed na 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]rus pa las bgyis pa bgyi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma nyes kyis gyis shig_/des de'i khab ral rus pa las byas pa byas te byin no/_/dge slong des de dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /_dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /_gzhan gyis kyang 
[\[205a.2\]]byed du bcug_/gzhan gyis kyang byed du bcug pas de'i rus pa yang zad par gyur to/_/dge slong gzhan zhig kyang 'ongs te smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo'i khab ral gyis shig_/'phags pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/_gang bzang ba'o/_/'phags pa ba so las bgyis pa bzang 
[\[205a.3\]]na ba so de ni bas so/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de lta na rus pa las byas pa gyis shig_/'phags pa rus pa yang bas so/_/gal te bzhed na rwa las bgyis pa bgyi'o/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma nyes kyis gyis shig_/des de'i khab ral rwa las byas pa byas te byin no/_/dge 
[\[205a.4\]]slong des de dge slong rnams la bstan pa dang /_dge slong gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug cing /_gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug_/gzhan gyis kyang de lta bu byed du bcug pas de'i rwa yang zad par gyur to/_/de rang gi zan dang /_rang gi yo byad dag gis dge slong rnams 
[\[205a.5\]]kyi las byed pa ni dbul por gyur to/_/gcer bu pa dag chos 'di gang gi tshe kho bo cag la mngon par dad par gyur pa de'i tshe na 'di thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur na/_'di da ltar shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas zan yang slong bar byed do zhes 'phya ba la zhugs 
[\[205a.6\]]pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[205a.7\]]rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed ba so las byas pa dang /_rus pa las byas pa dang /_rwa las byas pa'i khab ral byed du 'jug 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso 
[\[205b.2\]]sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod pa mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 
[\[205b.3\]]'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang ba so'am/_rus pa'am/_rwa'i khab ral byed du 'jug na bcag 
[\[205b.4\]]nas ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/ba so'am zhes bya ba ni ba so nyid do/_/rus pa'am zhes bya ba yang rus pa nyid do/_/rwa'i zhes bya ba yang rwa nyid kyi'o/_/khab ral zhes bya ba ni khab ral gnyis te/_sbub bu can dang /_chang pa lta bu'o/_/don 
[\[205b.5\]]'di ni gnyi ga yin par dgongs so/_/byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni rang gis sam gzhan no/_/bcag nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcag nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[205b.6\]]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[205b.7\]]so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad ba so'am/_rus pa'am/_rwa'i khab ral byed dam/_byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyis dngos po de bcag gam/_zhes dri bar 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de yang bshags pa ma yin pas yang bshags par bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/khab 
[\[206a.2\]]ral 'chos pa'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas mnyan yod du lam gyis 
[\[206a.3\]]dub pa'i ngal bsos te/_rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas de sgo khang du 'dug go/_/de khri dma' ba zhig rnyed nas des de nyid kyi mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/sos ka'i tsha ba'i dus la bab pas sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa tsha bas gdungs pas 
[\[206a.4\]]bsil ba 'dod pa zhig phyogs der bskyil te nyal ba dang /_ji tsam na dge slong de lam gyis dub pas yur bar brtsams nas de'i lus yud tsam yud tsam zhing mchog pas khri yang sgra tseg tseg zer ro/_/sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa des bsams pa/_'di bdag la 'tshe'o
