[\[206a.5\]]snyam nas/_des gdengs ka byas te 'dug go/_/ji tsam na yang de lus mchog cing khri sgra tseg tseg zer nas des de'i 'phral bar bzung ste/_spyod lam de nyid kyis shi zhing dus la bab nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris bzang po rnams kyi nang du skyes so/_/de'i gan du lha'i bu 
[\[206a.6\]]mo dag lhags pa dang /_des se gol gyi sgras de dag phyir bzlog nas de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gan du song ste smras pa/_lha 'di ni lha'i bu skyes nas ring po ma lags pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bdag cag de'i drung du mchis pa dang /_des se gol gyi sgras bdag cag 
[\[206a.7\]]slar bzlog go/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_lha mo dag de ni sngon dge slong yin gyis de'i mdun du me long zung shig dang /_dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis de'i mdun du me long bzung ba dang /_des bdag nyid dpung rgyan dang /_rna cha gdub kor dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_rgyan sna 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]tshogs kyis brgyan par mthong nas dran pa rnyed do/_/de nas des de dag 'dod par brtsams pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_bzod ldan bdag cag de bzhin du bsnyen bkur mi byed de/_gang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal ba de la bdag cag bsnyen bkur byed do/_/des 
[\[206b.2\]]bsams pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la phyag byas nas da ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa'i longs spyod can la phyag bya snyam du rig nas smras pa/_sring mo dag gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs 
[\[206b.3\]]'ga' yod dam/_bzod ldan yod de/_gang na lha'i drang srong dag tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing 'khod pa de dag gi nang du gang tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed pa de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag mi 'tshal te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de de dag gi 
[\[206b.4\]]nang du zhugs pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji ltar de lha'i drang srong gi nang du zhugs te tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa thos nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de'i gan du song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo /_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 
[\[206b.5\]]gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 
[\[206b.6\]]'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/_do shal dang /_se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste/_kha dog shin tu 'das pas 
[\[206b.7\]]mtshan mo la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_rmongs pa zhes bgyi'i tshal de ni/_/lha mo'i tshogs kyis 
[\[207a.2\]]kun bsgrags shing /_/sha za mo bzhin yongs bskor na/_/ji ltar 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/drang po zhes bya'i lam de nas/_/'jigs med phyogs zhes bya ba der/_/sgra med ces bya'i shing rta ni/_/chos kyi rtog pas bskyod 
[\[207a.3\]]gyur pa/_/de yi dmigs pa ngo tsha shes/_/dran pa de yi 'khor yin te/_/kha lo sgyur ba shes rab yin/_/sna 'dren yang dag lta zhes bya/_/skyes pa'am bud med gang la'ang rung /_/bzhon pa 'di 'dra yod gyur cing /_/de 'dra'i bzhon pa zhon gyur na/_/de ni 'jigs med 
[\[207a.4\]]phyogs su 'gro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi 
[\[207a.5\]]rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/_/des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas 
[\[207a.6\]]kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis 
[\[207a.7\]]te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go/_/
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/yang smras pa/_khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/_/ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i/_/mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/_/shin tu 
[\[207b.2\]]rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/_/de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig 'thob cing /_/go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/_/'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/_/skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/_/srid pa stong du 
[\[207b.3\]]mthong ba rab dkon na/_/thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/_/de nas gdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/_/dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/_/lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song /_/de nas 
[\[207b.4\]]sngon dge slong lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /_zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang /_dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /_nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te/_cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs 
[\[207b.5\]]pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/ji tsam na mtshan mo nam nangs nas khang skyong gis sgo phye ste phyags ma thogs nas sgo khang phyag par brtsams pa dang /_de skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa mthong nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa longs shig_/ci khyod kyang sngar 
[\[207b.6\]]bsam gtan byed pa yin nam/_de tshig mi smra nas/_des de'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste bsgul bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na dus la bab par mthong ngo /_/des 'di ci zhig gis dus la bab ces brtag par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na khri 'og na sbrul dug 
[\[207b.7\]]myur du khyab par byed pa 'dug pa mthong nas de sngangs te/_dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong sgo khang du nyal ba gang yin pa de sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas bzung ste dus la bab bo/_/dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bskyal te 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]bsregs nas phyir lhags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de thams cad dge slong dag khri dma' ba la mal 'cha' zhing de'i mdun du 
[\[208a.2\]]rkang pa gnyis 'khrus pa las gyur pa yin no/_/snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal 
[\[208a.3\]]bca' bar mi bya zhing khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong gzhan dag la mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag la gnod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dag la mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag gis mgo logs 
[\[208a.4\]]dang rkang pa logs su rkang pa gnyis bkru bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/drug sde dag gis dge slong khri dma' ba la nyal ba sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te dus la bab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya'o/_/zhes 
[\[208a.5\]]bkag pa thos nas de dag gis khri rkang pa khru bcu gnyis pa bcas te ya gad mthon po btsugs pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag bya ra byed dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_su zhig bya ra byed/_khyed kyis dge slong sbrul dug myur du 
[\[208a.6\]]khyab par byed pas zin te dus la bab pa ma mthong ngam ci/_khyed drug sde dag kyang sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas bzung ste dus la bab cing /_kho bo cag shi ba'i yo byad dag 'ged par 'dod dam/_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong rnams kyis bzlog pa na 
[\[208a.7\]]de dang /_de skad zer zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed dge slong rnams kyis bzlog 
[\[208b.2\]]pa na de dang de skad zer ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de 
[\[208b.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin 
[\[208b.4\]]no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u byed du 'jug na rtsa ba bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung 
[\[208b.5\]]byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshad las shin tu 'das pa yin pas de'i pus mo gnyis ko sko la reg pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[208b.6\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_dge slong rnams la de dang 
[\[208b.7\]]mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am/_khri'u byed du 'jug na rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas 
[\[209a.2\]]ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid kyi'o/_/khri'u zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do/_/byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam/_gzhan 
[\[209a.3\]]no/_/rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa bzhag ste'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/de'i sor brgyad gang dag yin pa de la ni tshad dang 
[\[209a.4\]]ldan pa'i khru gang ngo /_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o/_/bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan 
[\[209a.5\]]song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de 
[\[209a.6\]]la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi khri'am/_khri'u rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad las lhag pa byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags 
[\[209a.7\]]par byed pa des khyod kyi dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de yang ma bshags pa yin pas yang bshags par bya'o las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/khri rkang 'chos pa'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/nye dga' gsar bu yin pas de'i khri thob 
[\[209b.2\]]bo cog ches rgan pas phrogs shing gnas mal sko ba'i dus la yang bab nas des bsams pa/_gang gis bdag gi khri mi phrogs pa'i thabs de lta bu ci yod snyam pa dang /_des bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing bal dag kyang blangs nas de la blo skyes pa/_shing bal gyis bdal te 
[\[209b.3\]]bzhag go snyam nas des khri'i steng du shing bal bdal te bzhag go/_/ji tsam na dge slong ches rgan pa zhig 'ongs nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di su'i/_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_kho bo'i shing bal lo/_/de nas dge slong zhig 'dug pa des smras pa/_nye dga' ji 
[\[209b.4\]]skad zer ba de bzhin te/_shing bal ni nye dga'i yin no/_/'di ltar khri ni dge 'dun gyi yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_nye dga' khros nas des shing bal khyer te khri de'i steng du shing bal cung zad cung zad bdal te bzhag go/_/dge slong des so sor ma brtags pa nyid 
[\[209b.5\]]du der nyal nas mtshan mo nam nangs te langs pa dang gos thams cad shing bal gyis skya bor gyur nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_ci khyod g.yul gyi gzhir nyal lam/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi 
[\[209b.6\]]khri'am/_khri'u la shing bal bdal te 'jog par byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 
[\[209b.7\]]'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod dge 'dun gyi khri la shing bal bdal te 'jog pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul 
[\[210a.2\]]dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no/_/zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 
[\[210a.3\]]'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u la shing bal 'dal lam/_'dal 
[\[210a.4\]]du 'jug na bsdus nas ltung byed do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/khri'am zhes bya ba ni khri nyid do/_/khri'u la zhes bya 
[\[210a.5\]]ba yang khri'u nyid la'o/_/shing bal zhes bya ba ni lnga po shal ma li'i dang /_a ka'i dang /_ka sha'i dang /_bu ka'i dang /_e ra ka'i shing bal dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/bdal lam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so/_/bdal du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan 
[\[210a.6\]]no/_/bsdus nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bsdus nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par 
[\[210a.7\]]byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge 'dun gyi 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]khri'am khri'u la shing bal 'dal lam 'dal du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyis dngos po de bsdus sam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de 
[\[210b.2\]]yang bshags pa ma yin pas yang bshags par bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/shing bal gyis gos par byas pa'i ltung byed de/_brgyad bcu rtsa drug pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//
[\[210b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug nas dge 
[\[210b.4\]]slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal na/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag par byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[210b.5\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed 
[\[210b.6\]]par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis gding ba byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal na/_khyed cag tshad las ha cang lhag par byed du 'jug pa 
[\[210b.7\]]bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par 
[\[211a.2\]]gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis gding ba byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug 
[\[211a.3\]]shig_/de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do/_/zheng du mtho phyed dang do'o/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' 
[\[211a.4\]]ba mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshad las ha cang lhag pas de'i gding ba des mi chog nas des gnas mal srung ba'i phyir rkang pa'i mtha' logs su lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la gson zhing gzhes pa rnams 
[\[211a.5\]]kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang /_dud 'gro rgyu ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgyu ba dang /_lha rgyu ba dang /_ljongs rgyu ba dang /_chu klung rgyu ba dang /_ri rgyu ba dang /_dur khrod rgyu ba dang /_gtsug 
[\[211a.6\]]lag khang rgyur gshegs pas don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa'i mtha' 
[\[211a.7\]]logs na lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di su'i mal/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i'o/_/'o na ci'i phyir rkang pa'i mtha' logs su lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag_/btsun 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig_/de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do/_zheng du mtho phyed dang do'o/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do zhes 
[\[211b.2\]]'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshad las ha cang lhag pas de'i gding ba des mi 'tshal nas des gnas mal srung ba'i slad du sug pa'i mtha' logs su lo ma'i chun po dag bzhag go/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na 
[\[211b.3\]]srid du mtho gang gis srings shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /_bslab pa la gus pa dang /_bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /_de'i shas che ba dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[211b.4\]]bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis gding ba byed du 'jug na tshad 
[\[211b.5\]]bzhin du byed du chug shig_/de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do/_zheng du mtho phyed dang do'o/_/srid du mtho gang gis srings shig_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 
[\[211b.6\]]'di pas so/_/gding ba zhes bya ba ni steng rim du gding ba'o/_/byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no/_/tshad bzhin du byed du 'jug ces bya ba ni gding ba'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o/_/de la gding ba'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar 
[\[211b.7\]]gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho do/_zheng du mtho phyed dang do zhes bya ba la srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/de'i mtho'i mtho do gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsum mo/_/zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro/_/mtho phyed dang 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]do zhes bya ba la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho phyed dang do gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru do dang sor drug go/_/srid du mtho gang gis srings shig ces bya ba ni mi chog na srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis bsring ba ste/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[212a.2\]]pa'i mtho gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru phyed dang do ste/_des na gding ba'i srid kyi tshad ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru phyed dang lnga'o/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o/_/bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de spangs pa'i bcad nas ltung byed 
[\[212a.3\]]kyi ltung ba bshags par bya'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing 
[\[212a.4\]]so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad gding ba'i srid du khru phyed dang lnga/_zheng du khru do dang sor drug las lhag pa byed du 'jug na thams cad 
[\[212a.5\]]du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyi dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de yang ma bshags pa yin pas yang bshags par bya'o/_/las dang 
[\[212a.6\]]po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/gding ba las gyur pa'i ltung byed de brgyad bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[212a.7\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag ci'i phyir tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung 
[\[212b.2\]]ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[212b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal na/_khyed cag tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_
[\[212b.4\]]chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes 
[\[212b.5\]]pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan 
[\[212b.6\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis g.yan pa dgab pa byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig_/de la g.yan pa dgab pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi/_zheng du mtho do'o/_/
[\[212b.7\]]de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/g.yan pa dgab pa zhes bya ba ni na ba'i gos so/_/byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no/_/tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni g.yan 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]pa dgab pa'i tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o/_/de la g.yan pa dgab pa'i tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho bzhi/_zheng du mtho do'o zhes bya ba la/_srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston 
[\[213a.2\]]pa'o/_/de'i mtho'i mtho bzhi gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru drug go/_/zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro/_/mtho do'o zhes bya ba la/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho do gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsum mo/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong 
[\[213a.3\]]ma'o/_/bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod 
[\[213a.4\]]par byed ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad g.yan pa dgab pa 
[\[213a.5\]]srid du khru drug_/zheng du khru gsum las lhag pa byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyi dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de 
[\[213a.6\]]yang bshags pa ma yin pas yang bshags par bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/g.yan pa dgab pa las gyur pa'i ltung byed de/_brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs 
[\[213a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag ha cang tshad las lhag pa byed du 'jug nas dge 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal na/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha cang tshad las lhag pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[213b.2\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed 
[\[213b.3\]]par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la rmas pa/_dge slong dag ngas dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du gzhug go zhes bka' stsal na khyed tshad las ha cang lhag pa byed du 'jug pa 
[\[213b.4\]]bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa che ba dang /_chog mi shes pa dang /_gso dka' ba dang /_dgang dka' ba rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_gso 
[\[213b.5\]]sla ba dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_phri ba dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_mdzes pa dang /_drod rig pa nyid kyi bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul 
[\[213b.6\]]ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong gis dbyar gyi gos ras chen byed du 'jug na tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig_/
[\[213b.7\]]de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho drug_/zheng du mtho phyed dang gsum mo/_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na bcad nas ltung byed do/_/dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so/_/dbyar gyi gos ras chen 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]zhes bya ba ni char pa skyob pa'i gos so/_/byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no/_/tshad bzhin du byed du chug shig ces bya ba ni dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad gang yin pa de bzhin du'o/_/de la dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi tshad ni 'di yin te/_
[\[214a.2\]]srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i mtho drug_/zheng du mtho phyed dang gsum mo zhes bya ba la srid du zhes bya ba ni chur ro/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/de'i mtho'i mtho drug gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru dgu'o/_/zheng du zhes bya ba ni rgyar ro/_/
[\[214a.3\]]mtho phyed dang gsum mo zhes bya ba la/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho phyed dang gsum gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gsum dang sor [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad do//_/de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de las gong ma'o/_/bcad nas ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni dngos po de bcad 
[\[214a.4\]]nas ltung byed kyi ltung ba bshags par bya ba'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba 
[\[214a.5\]]de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na/_dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dbyar gyi gos ras chen srid du khru dgu dang /_zheng du khru gsum dang sor 
[\[214a.6\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las lhag pa byed du 'jug na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/gang gi mdun du 'chags par byed pa des khyod kyis dngos po de bcad dam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par 'chags pa dang du len par byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/ltung ba de yang ma bshags pa 
[\[214a.7\]]yin pas yang bshags par bya'o/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dbyar gyi ras chen las gyur pa'i ltung byed de/_brgyad bcu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bzo mkhan gyi gan du song ste/_yud tsam zhig gtam 'dre bas 'dug nas smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos 
[\[214b.2\]]'tshem nus sam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos kyis ci bya/_des smras pa/_bkren pa khyod la 'dir ci 'god/_gal te gla 'dod na tshems shig_/des bsams pa/_'di zer ba ma nyes te/_bdag la 'dir 
[\[214b.3\]]ci 'god/_bdag la gla dgos kyis btsem mo snyam du rig nas smras pa/_'phags pa btsem mo/_/des de la ras dang gla byin pa dang /_des de btsems so/_/nye dga' de las cung zhig gyon te lhag ma phrag pas khyer te 'phags pa dang /_de dge slong zhig gis mthong nas des 
[\[214b.4\]]smras pa/_gnas brtan gtur bu gzigs shig dang /_ngal sor gzhug go/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'di gtur bu ma yin no/_/'o na ci lags/_bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos so/_/gnas brtan khyod bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos gyon du rung 
[\[214b.5\]]ngam/_dgra bo dag gi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan na rung ngo /_/gnas brtan la yang dgra bo dag yod dam/_je dang por khyod kho bo'i dgra bo'i thu bo yin te/_des na kho bo bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos gyon pa mi bzod do/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag 
[\[214b.6\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos 'chang bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 
[\[214b.7\]]'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos byed du 'jug pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang 
[\[215a.2\]]mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba 
[\[215a.3\]]la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos byed du 'jug na 
[\[215a.4\]]ltung byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos 
[\[215a.5\]]rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]lhag pa byed du bcug nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos byed du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la 
[\[215a.6\]]nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad na/_ci'i phyir dge slong dag de bas lhag pa byed du 'jug ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[215a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la/_'di ni rjes su bcas pa yin te/_nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gos byed du 'jug gam/_bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag pa byed du 'jug na ltung byed do/_/de la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu/_zheng du mtho drug ste/_de la 'di ni bde 
[\[215b.2\]]bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad do/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o/_/de'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi zhes bya ba ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos 
[\[215b.3\]]kyi tshad gang yin pa de'i'o/_/chos gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /_sha na'i gos dang /_zar ma'i gos dang /_ko tam pa'i gos dang /_du gu la'i gos dang /_ras bal gyi gos dang /_nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o/_/byed du 'jug 
[\[215b.4\]]gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis sam gzhan no/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag pa byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni de'i gong ma'o/_/ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang /_log par ltung 
[\[215b.5\]]ba dag tu sreg par byed/_'tshod par byed/_ltung bar byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste/_des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so/_/de la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi 
[\[215b.6\]]tshad ni 'di yin te/_srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu/_zheng du mtho drug ste/_de la 'di ni bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad do zhes bya ba la/_bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'o/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[215b.7\]]pa'i mtho drug gang yin pa de la ni tshad dang ldan pa'i khru dgu'o/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos sam/_bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag pa'i chos gos byed du 'jug 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed de dgu bcu pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//ltung 
[\[216a.2\]]byed 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po brgyad bcu pa/_sdom la/_grong dang khyim gzhan nyid dang ni/_/bslab pa rnams dang dgon pa ni/_/sangs rgyas phan pa gsung ba yis/_/so sor bshags par bya bar gsungs/_/
[\[216a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/rdo 'jog na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung 
[\[216a.4\]]ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas 
[\[216a.5\]]pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mig ut+pa la 'dra ba/_ut+pa la'i dri dang ldan pa/_ut+pa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher 
[\[216a.6\]]byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed do/_/nye du dag gis smras pa/_gang gi phyir bu mo 'di mig ut+pa la dang 'dra ba/_ut+pa la'i dri dang ldan pa/_ut+pa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra ba de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya bar gdags 
[\[216a.7\]]so zhes de'i ming ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya bar btags so/_/de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen mor gyur to/_/de'i pha la bu med nas des bsams pa/_bdag gis bu mo 'di su la yang rigs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin/_nor gyi phyir yang mi sbyin/_gzugs kyi phyir yang mi 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]sbyin gyi/_'di ltar gang bdag gi khyim na 'dug pa'i mag par 'dug pa de la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o snyam mo/_/rdo 'jog na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' 
[\[216b.2\]]mgur spyod par byed do/_/rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas/_de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de yang rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags 
[\[216b.3\]]nas des bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis dus la bab nas/_de phan tshun 'khyam pa na stes dbang gis khyim bdag de'i khyim du phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag des smras pa/_bu khyod su'i/_khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o/_/bu 
[\[216b.4\]]khyod kyi pha ga re/_dus la bab bo/_/bu khyod kyi ma ga re/_de yang dus la bab bo/_/bu gal te de lta na kho bos khyod la bu mo sbyin gyis/_khyod kho bo'i khyim na 'dug pa'i mag pa gyis shig_/yab ma nongs te bdag kyang pha ma gnyis dang bral nas phan tshun 'khyam zhing yi chad 
[\[216b.5\]]par gyur na/_khyod de skad gsung ba ma nongs kyis de bzhin bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag des de la ut+pa la'i mdog byin nas nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam gyi sbyor bas bag mar btang nas khye'u des kyang khyim der 'dug par brtsams so/_/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na 
[\[216b.6\]]ut+pa la'i mdog gi pha dus la bab nas de'i ma ci dga' mgur gnas pa dang /_rgyu ba'i sbyor bas zas dang gos bzang po dag gis rtas pas nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par brtsams pa dang /_des bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'dir skyes pa gzhan bkug na bdag 
[\[216b.7\]]gi mag pa 'dis shes par 'gyur gyis/_bdag 'di nyid dang lhan cig rtse bar bya ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa nyams su myang bar bya'o snyam nas des de la mtshan ma bstan to/_/bud med kyi yul ni dbang po dag 'phrog cing don du gnyer 'dod par 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]'gyur ba yin pas des de la brtags par gyur to/_/yang des de la mtshan ma bstan pa dang /_de de dang lhan cig sten par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na ut+pa la'i mdog la sems can zhugs par gyur cing /_de btsa' ba'i dus la bab nas des bu mo mngag gzhug 
[\[217a.2\]]ma la smras pa/_bu mo song la yum bos shig_/de song ba dang ji tsam na de mag pa dang lhan cig dben pa na 'dug pa mthong nas des yud tsam zhig rtog cing der bsdad pa dang /_ji tsam na de phyir byung nas des smras pa/_ut+pa la'i mdog khyod la 'bod kyis bzhud do/_/
[\[217a.3\]]de der song ba dang /_ji tsam na bu mo zhig btsas nas ut+pa la'i mdog gis bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo khyod ci thogs/_des smras pa/_khyod kyi yum dang khyim thab nad med par gyur cig_/des smras pa/_des ci nyes/_des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa 
[\[217a.4\]]dang /_des smras pa bu mo khyod kho mo'i ma dang khyim thab la skur pa 'debs sam/_des smras pa/_jo mo khyod thugs mi ches na/_bdag gis khyod kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o zhes de de gnyis kyi skabs btsal ba de lhur len cing 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na de gnyis 
[\[217a.5\]]dben par 'dug par gyur nas des myur ba myur bar song ste/_ut+pa la'i mdog la smras pa/_tshur spyon da gzigs shig_/de yang myur ba myur bar song ste bltas pa dang /_de gnyis sten par mthong nas/_ut+pa la'i mdog gis bsams pa/_skal chad ma 'dis rdo 'jog 
[\[217a.6\]]na skyes pa gzhan ma mthong ngam ci na/_gang gi phyir mag pa dang lhan cig sten par byed/_skal chad pa 'dis kyang rdo 'jog na bud med gzhan ma mthong ngam ci na/_gang gi phyir sgyug mo dang lhan cig sten par byed snyam du rig nas mi bzod pa skyes nas des khyim thab la skal chad pa khyod da 
[\[217a.7\]]phyin chad 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig ces bu mo de pha'i gan du 'phangs pa dang /_de pha'i lus las 'dril nas sgo'i them par lhung ste klad pa zhom mo/_/ut+pa la'i mdog mgo g.yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /_ji tsam na don mthun bcom brlag tu 'phags pa mthong 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]nas/_de de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang /_ded dpon gyis mthong nas/_de de'i gzugs dang lang tsho mdzes pa la chags nas/_des smras pa/_sru khyod su'i/_ded dpon kho mo gang kho mo la zas dang gos sbyin pa de'i'o/_/ded dpon des de chung mar byas nas don mthun 
[\[217b.2\]]mthar gyis bcom brlag tu phyin pa dang /_des de nyid du bzhag go/_/de de nas ded dpon des zong bsgyur nas zong gi rin khyer te phyir rdo 'jog tu 'ongs pa dang /_de na tshong pa de dag phan tshun khyim gzhan du mgron du bos te ston mo byed pa na/_ded dpon des 'ga' yang zan ma byin nas 
[\[217b.3\]]tshong pa dag gis smras pa/_ded dpon khyod kyis 'ga' yang g.yar drangs te 'tshal ma ma stsal to/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag ni khyim mi mo dag bdog pas des na ston mo byed mod/_kho bo la ni gang bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' yang med pas kho bos ji ltar zan sbyin/_de dag gis 
[\[217b.4\]]smras pa/_gal te de lta na ci'i slad du bu mo mi tshol/_des smras pa/_kho bo'i chung ma dang 'dra ba'i bu mo 'ga' zhig yod na de bag mar blang ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_je khyod kyi btsun mo ci 'dra bltas gsungs shig_/des ut+pa la'i mdog gi gzugs dang /_lang tsho mdzes 
[\[217b.5\]]pa brjod pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_ded dpon de ni bud med rin po che zhig ste/_'on kyang de lta bu gzhan 'ga' mchis kyang gnas btsal lo zhes de dag gis btsal bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na ut+pa la'i mdog nyid kyi bu mo de de 'dra bar mthong nas de dag gis bu mo 
[\[217b.6\]]slong ngo zhes de bslangs pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_su'i phyir/_ded dpon che ge mo zhig yod pa de'i phyir ro/_/shes ldan dag bdag cag gis ni sbyin la rag na/_'di ltar khyed la skyon yod de khyed kyis bag ma blangs nas bor te 'dong ngo /_/mi dor ro/_/gal te de lta na sbyin 
[\[217b.7\]]no de dag gis de bslangs nas ded dpon gyis bag mar blangs so/_/de nas tshong pa de dag gis zong bsgyur te zong rin khyer nas yang bcom brlag tu 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na mthar gyis bcom brlag dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brags shig yod pa der phyin to/_/ded dpon des zong de dang 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bu mo de ri brags der bzhag nas nyung shas shig dang bcom brlag tu song ba dang /_ut+pa la'i mdog gis byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad de smras pa/_ded dpon bde bar byon tam/_des smras pa/_bzang mo ga la bde bar 'ongs/_kho bo bcom 
[\[218a.2\]]mo/_/rje'i sras khyod gson por byon pa dgyes mod/_nor lta slad kyis kyang mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de dus cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo bcom pa'i rdzas tshol du 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_ma nongs kyis bzhud cig_/de song ma thag kho nar de'i shed 
[\[218a.3\]]mthun 'ongs te/_ut+pa la'i mdog la dris pa/_ded dpon gar song des smras pa bcom pa'i rdzas tshol du song ngo /_/de gang du sus bcom/_bdag kyang mi shes te de na re kho bo bcom gyis/_bcom pa'i rdzas tshol du 'gro'o zhes zer ro/_/des smras pa/_de da ltar ji ltar phun 
[\[218a.4\]]sum tshogs shing 'ongs pa de ltar sngon lan 'ga' yang phun sum tshogs shing ma 'ongs pas des khyod brid do/_/shed mthun gtam byos shig_/gtam gzhan ci zhig bya/_des rdo 'jog nas sa 'dzin ma 'di lta bu zhig khrid de 'ongs pas khyod de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khru bar yang mi rung 
[\[218a.5\]]ngo /_/shed mthun de bden nam/_bden no/_/des sdod cig ces byas te cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/ji tsam na ded dpon de 'ongs nas des brnyas thabs sngon du btang ste smras pa/_rje'i sras khyod kyis bcom pa'i rdzas btsal tam/_bzang mo btsal to/_/rje'i sras khyod kyis 
[\[218a.6\]]kho mo brid de/_khyod gang du sus kyang ma bcom gyi/_kho mos ji ltar khyod kyis rdo 'jog nas sa 'dzin ma zhig khrid de 'ongs zhes thos kyis de 'di nyid du khrid de spyon cig_/gang gi gnas gnyis su 'god par 'gyur ba de'i longs spyod dag ni srabs pa nyid dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_
[\[218a.7\]]yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro/_/bzang mo gal te de lta yin du zin kyang khyod kyis gang gi khyim na chung ma gnyis yod pa des lan 'ga' yang skyo ma grang mo mi 'thungs shing thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ma thos sam/_
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]rje'i sras de zhi bar gyur cig_/de ltar mi 'gyur gyis de khrid de spyon cig_/gal te nu mo tsam zhig na nu mo'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bgyi'o/_/gal te bu mo tsam zhig na bu mo'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo gal te de lta na 
[\[218b.2\]]ma nyes kyis khrid de 'ong ngo zhes des de khrid de 'ongs pa dang /_des de mthong nas rjes su chags pa skyes so/_/dus gzhan zhig na ut+pa la'i mdog gis bu mo de'i skra bya bar brtsams pa dang /_mgo la sgros yod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dris pa bu mo 'di ci 
[\[218b.3\]]nyes/_des smras pa/_bdag gis kyang ma 'tshal te/_bdag gi phyi mo'i mchid nas khyod kyi ma pha la khros pas khyod 'phangs pas sgo'i them par ltung ste/_der sgros 'di byung ngo zhes mchi'o/_/khyod kyi phyi mo ci ming /_che ge mo zhig go/_/khyod kyi ma ci ming /_ut+pa 
[\[218b.4\]]la'i mdog go/_/des bsams pa bdag der ni ma dang chen chung ngu gyur la/_'dir ni bu mo dang chen chung ngu gyur gyis rnam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de mgo g.yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /_ji tsam na don mthun yul yangs pa can du 'phags pa mthong 
[\[218b.5\]]nas/_de yang de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang de tshong pa dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cing yangs pa can du song ngo /_/yangs pa can na gnas pa'i tshogs can ma dag gis smras pa/_bcom brlag pa'i tshong pa 'di dag bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang /_dga' 
[\[218b.6\]]ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa nyams su myong bar mi byed do/_/de na tshogs can ma gcig gis smras pa/_de dag gis sa 'dzin ma 'di lta bu zhig khrid de 'ongs pas bdag cag de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khru bar yang mi rung bas ci'i phyir de dag bdag cag dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /_dga' 
[\[218b.7\]]ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa nyams su myong bar byed/_tshogs can ma de dag 'dus te ut+pa la'i mdog gi gan du dong nas smras pa/_sa 'dzin ma khyod kho mo cag gi 'tsho bar byed na ci'i phyir kho mo cag gi nang du mi 'jug_/des mgo g.yogs pa bshus te smras pa/_bdag deng 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]phyin chad khyed cag gi nang du 'jug go zhes de de dag gi nang du zhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshogs can ma de dag chang gral du tshogs shing gtam zer ba na smras pa/_bdag cag las gang gis tshong pa gang nor ji tsam dang bral bar byas/_de na gcig gis 
[\[219a.2\]]smras pa/_kho mos ni tshong pa che ge mo zhig nor 'di tsam dang bral bar byas so/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_kho mo cag gis ni tshong pa che ge mo dag nor 'di tsam dang bral bar byas so/_/yang gzhan dag gis smras pa/_kho mo cag gis kyang tshong pa che ge mo dag nor 'di tsam dang bral bar 
[\[219a.3\]]byas so/_/yangs pa can na spos 'tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa zhig 'dug pa de tshogs can ma 'gas kyang rjes su 'jug par ma byas nas tshogs can ma de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag las gang gis spos 'tshong gi khye'u che ge mo zhig rjes su 'jug par byed nus pa'i bud med de ni 
[\[219a.4\]]bud med kyi yon tan dang ldan par bdag cag smra'o/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis smras pa/_ci de skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yin nam/_'on te ma yin de dag gis smras pa/_de skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yin no/_/gal te kho mos de rjes su 'jug par byas na khyed 
[\[219a.5\]]kyi kho mo thu mo'i gnas su gzhag gam/_gzhag go/_/gal te khyod kyis de rjes su 'jug par ma nus na khyod ji ltar bya/_kho mos khyed la kAR+ShA pa Na drug bcu gzhal lo/_/ma nyes kyis de ltar gyis shig_/ut+pa la'i mdog gi khyim bdag spos 'tshong gi khye'u de'i drung du glas 
[\[219a.6\]]blangs pas des bu mo mngag gzhugs ma slob tu bcug ste/_bu mo khyod kyis spos 'tshong gi khye'u che ge mo zhig las nyi ma re re zhing spos nyo bar bya'o/_/gal te su'i gan du khyer zhes zer na/_ut+pa la'i mdog gi gan du rigs kyi bu zhig 'ongs pa de'i gan du khyer ro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[219a.7\]]bu mo mngag gzhug ma de spos 'tshong gi khye'u de las nyi ma re re zhing spos nyo bar byed do/_/des de la smras pa/_bu mo khyod nyi ma re re zhing su'i gan du spos khyer bar byed/_des smras pa/_ut+pa la'i mdog gi gan du rigs kyi bu zhig 'ongs pa de'i gan du khyer ro/_/yang ut+pa la'i 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]mdog gis bu mo mngag gzhug ma de la smras pa/_bu mo spos 'tshong gi khye'u de las sman bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dag nyo bar bya'o/_/gal te su'i gan du khyer zhes zer na rigs kyi bu de na bas de'i sman gyi phyir khyer ro zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te dbyig su'i yin zhes 
[\[219b.2\]]zer na/_ut+pa la'i mdog gi yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bu mo mngag gzhug ma des kAR+ShA pa Na dag khyer te spos 'tshong gi khye'u de'i gan du song nas smras pa/_sman bska ba dang /_kha ba dang /_tsha ba dag byin cig_/des smras pa/_su'i gan du khyer/_des smras pa/_rigs 
[\[219b.3\]]kyi bu de na bas na de'i sman gyi phyir khyer ro/_/des smras pa/_dbyig su'i yin/_des smras pa/_ut+pa la'i mdog gi'o/_/des bsams pa/_de ni na cung chen mo zhig ste/_rang gi sman gyis bsnyen bkur byed do/_/snyam nas de de la rjes su chags pa skyes nas/_des bu mo 
[\[219b.4\]]de la smras pa/_bu mo ut+pa la'i mdog la spos 'tshong gi khye'u de khyod lta bar 'dod do zhes gyis shig_/bu mo des ut+pa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo song la 'di skad ces/_da dung rigs kyi bu de ma sos so zhes gyis shig_/de song ste de la de skad brjod 
[\[219b.5\]]pa dang /_de yang dang yang du bu mo de la nyi ma gang la 'ong bar bya zhes 'dri'o/_/des ut+pa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /_des bsams pa/_de lhag par chags par gyur gyis thabs kyi rnam pa legs pa zhig bya'o snyam nas de rtsa mi zhig byas te/_khri'i steng du bzhag nas dur 
[\[219b.6\]]khrod du khyer te bsregs nas de'i 'og tu skra bshig cing ngu ba'i bzhin gyis spos 'tshong gi khye'u de'i tshong khang dang ha cang thag mi ring ba nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u des de mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyis skyes pa rnam pa brgyad kyis 'ching bar byed de/_
[\[219b.7\]]gar dang /_glu dang /_rol mo dang /_gad mo dang /_ngu ba dang /_lta ba dang /_reg pa dang /_rma 'byed pas so zhes gsungs pas spos 'tshong gi khye'u de de la shin tu chags par gyur nas bu mo de la yang smras pa/_bu mo da 'ong ngo /_/des ut+pa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]des smras pa/_bu mo song la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu de der dus la bab ste/_da dung mya ngan ma sangs pas mthong bar ga la 'gyur zhes byos shig_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis ji lta ji ltar bskyangs pa de lta de ltar spos 'tshong gi khye'u de chags pa dang bcas pas mthong 
[\[220a.2\]]'dod par gyur nas/_ut+pa la'i mdog gis de la sdum par ma byon par skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu spyon cig ces phrin spring ba dang /_spos 'tshong gi khye'u de bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang gos dang /_phreng ba rgyu mang po thogs te skyed mos tshal der 'ongs nas/_des ut+pa la'i 
[\[220a.3\]]mdog dang lhan cig re zhig zos shing 'thungs pa dang /_ji tsam na de ra ro zhing chang gi dbang gis bdag nyid mi dran par gyur nas ut+pa la'i mdog gis bsams pa/_da ni 'di skye bo mang pos tshor bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de'i mgo la phreng ba btags te gnya' ba bsgril nas 
[\[220a.4\]]khyim du khrid pa dang /_tshogs can ma de dag gis de mthong nas de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/_sa 'dzin ma 'dis spos 'tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa rjes su 'jug par byas pa legs so zhes de dag gis de thu mo'i gnas su bzhag go/_/de de dang lhan cig rtse 
[\[220a.5\]]bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/yangs pa can na sgo ba gnyis yod de/_shar gyi dang /_nub kyi'o/_/de gnyis phan tshun bshes par gyur nas de na gcig gis 
[\[220a.6\]]smras pa/_shed mthun gang gis bdag cag gnyis shi zhing dus la bab kyang bshes pa'i rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod/_cig shos kyis smras pa/_shed mthun bdag cag gnyis kyi bu mo phan tshun sha glag bya ste/_gal te kho bo la 
[\[220a.7\]]bu yod la khyod la bu mo yod na khyod kyi bu mo kho bo'i bu la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te khyod la bu yod la/_kho bo la bu mo yod na kho bos bu mo khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya ste/_des na bdag cag gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na yang bshes pa'i rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/ma 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]nyes kyis de ltar bya'o/_/ut+pa la'i mdog zla ba dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas des bsams pa/_bud med gang la bu chung ngu yod pa de skyes pa dag gis 'di yongs su spang ngo /_/zhes yongs su spong bar rig nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu 
[\[220b.2\]]mo khye'u 'di dang mar me khyer la lam po cher song ste der gnas gcig tu khye'u zhog ste/_mar me tshugs la 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du mtha' gcig tu sdod cig_/des de khyer te shar gyi sgo ba dang ha cang thag mi ring ba'i gnas shig tu bzhag ste/_mar me btsugs nas mtha' 
[\[220b.3\]]gcig tu bsdad pa dang /_shar gyi sgo ba des mar me mthong nas the tshom za zhing der song ba dang /_ji tsam na khye'u de mthong nas des de blangs te chung ma'i gan du song nas smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyi bu 'di re/_de rab tu dga' bas blangs so/_/de nas mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang kun dga' 
[\[220b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba byas so/_/khyim tshes kyi skye bo dag gis phan tshun smras pa/_shes ldan dag shar gyi sgo ba 'di'i khyim na ci zhig gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba byung /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di'i bu byung ngo /_/kha cig gis smras pa/_'di'i chung ma mi sbrum na 'di'i bu ga las 
[\[220b.5\]]byung /_kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bud med kha cig gi mngal na gnas pa mi mngon pa yang yod do/_/nub kyi sgo bas thos nas des bsams pa/_de'i bu byung bas gal te bdag la bu mo yod par gyur na de bdag gi mag par 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la gos dang rgyan dag 
[\[220b.6\]]bskur ro/_/de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur nas ji tsam na de dga' 'dun gyi nang du zhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang ut+pa la'i mdog la sems can zhugs par gyur nas de zla ba dgu 'das te btsas pa las bu mo zhig byung nas des yang bsams pa/_bud med gang la 
[\[220b.7\]]bu mo chung ngu yod pa de skyes pa dag gis 'di yongs su spang ngo zhes yongs su spong bar rig nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo bu mo 'di dang mar me khyer la lam po cher song ste/_der gnas gcig tu bu mo zhog ste/_mar me tshugs la 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]bar du mtha' gcig na sdod cig_/des de khyer te nub kyi sgo ba dang ha cang thag mi ring ba'i gnas shig tu bzhag ste/_mar me btsugs nas mtha' gcig tu bsdad pa dang /_nub kyi sgo ba des mar me mthong nas the tshom za zhing der song ba dang /_ji tsam na bu mo de mthong 
[\[221a.2\]]nas des de blangs te chung ma'i gan du song nas smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyi bu mo 'dir/_de rab tu dga' bas blangs so/_/de nas mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /_kun dga' bar 'gyur bar byas so/_/khyim tshes kyi skye bo dag gis phan tshun smras pa/_shes ldan dag nub kyi sgo 
[\[221a.3\]]ba 'di'i khyim na ci zhig gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba byung /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di'i bu mo byung ngo /_/kha cig gis smras pa/_'di'i chung ma mi sbrum na 'di'i bu mo ga las byung /_kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag bud med kha cig gi mngal na gnas pa mi 
[\[221a.4\]]mngon pa yang yod do/_/shar gyi sgo bas thos nas des bsams pa/_de'i bu mo byung bas de bdag gi mna' mar 'gyur ro snyam nas des de la gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro/_/de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur nas ji tsam na de yang dga' 'dun ma'i nang du zhugs so/_/
[\[221a.5\]]ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dga' 'dun lnga brgya skyed mos tshal du 'phags pa dang de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_bdag cag gyi na de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du dong ste cir rung /_'jud mthun ma 'ga' zhig bkri'o/_/de ltar bya'o/_/gang bkri/_sa 'dzin ma'o/_/ma nyes 
[\[221a.6\]]te 'di ltar khrims su bya ba bca' ste/_bdag cag las gang de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed pa de la dga' 'dun dag gis kAR+ShA pa Na drug bcu dbab bo/_/de dag gis sa 'dzin ma ut+pa la'i mdog kAR+ShA pa Na lnga brgyas glas te skyed mos tshal du khrid nas dga' 'dun de 
[\[221a.7\]]dag thams cad kyis res kyis de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do/_/shar gyi sgo ba'i bu de dga' mgur spyod par mi 'dod nas ut+pa la'i mdog gis de la smras pa/_rje'i sras dga' mgur spyod cig_/gzhan du na 'di dag gis khyod la kAR+ShA pa Na drug bcu phab par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]des chad pas 'jigs pas dga' mgur spyad pa dang /_de ut+pa la'i mdog la rjes su chags pa skyes nas des de gcig pus chung ma khud par byas so/_/lits+tsha bI dag khros nas shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des tshogs kyis spyad par bya ba'i bud med de gcig pus chung ma khud par byas 
[\[221b.2\]]kyis de gsod du 'dong ngo zhes zer ro/_/'jig rten ni mdza' bshes dang dgra bo dang tha mal pa yin pas gzhan zhig shar gyi sgo ba de'i gan du song ste ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_shar gyi sgo ba de skrag nas lits+tsha bI rnams kyi gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/_
[\[221b.3\]]bu'i slong mo stsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_kwa'i nang rje de ci nyes/_des de dag la rgyas par brjod pa dang /_de nas kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shar gyi sgo ba 'di bdag cag la yun ring po nas phan pa byed byed pa yin gyis/_gal te 'di'i bu tshogs can 
[\[221b.4\]]ma 'dod na sbyin no/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_ma nyes kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag gis de la ut+pa la'i mdog byin no/_/shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des tshogs las thob pas bag tsha ba med par ut+pa la'i mdog chung mar blangs so/_/de nas de'i phas nub kyi sgo ba la smras pa/_shed mthun 
[\[221b.5\]]khye'u la bu mo bag mar thong shig_/des smras pa/_shed mthun khyod kyi bus chung ma blangs zin na bag ma gzhan gyis ci bya/_des smras pa/_shed mthun sngar 'thams zin gyis da byin cig dang /_gal te kho bo la 'byor pa yod par gyur na kho bo'i bu'i chung ma'i 'khor rnam par 
[\[221b.6\]]'jog par byed do/_/nub kyi sgo bas sngar 'thams pa'i phyir shar gyi sgo ba'i bu la bu mo byin no/_/shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des kyang nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_yud tsam gyi sbyor bas de bag mar blangs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po shar gyi sgo ba de'i khyim du 
[\[221b.7\]]'gro bas des bu mo de la smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyi chen ma gang yin pa de ni khyod kyi ma'o/_/khyod kyi khyim thab gang yin pa 'di ni khyod kyi ming po yin gyis/_ma la rab tu sdang ba'i sems ma skyed cig_/sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig_/ut+pa la'i 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]mdog de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu byung nas bu mo des khye'u de sgo khang gi phyi rol du rtser gzhug par brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na bram ze zhig lam de nas 'gro ba des mthong nas des tshigs su bcad 
[\[222a.2\]]pa smras pa/_mi rnams nang na mchog gi rab kyi mchog_/mtshungs med rgyal ba skyob pa'i nyan thos ma/_/me tog man dA ra ka rab 'dra ba/_/sring mo khye'u 'di khyod kyi ci zhig yin/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_bram ze 'di ni bdag gi ming po dang /_/ming 
[\[222a.3\]]po'i bu dang bu dang skud po yin/_/'di yi pha de bdag gi pha yin te/_/ming por gyur nas da ltar khyo 'di yin/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis thos nas des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo 'di gnyis ci zer/_des smras pa/_'di gnyis mad pa mchi'o/_/
[\[222a.4\]]sho be mi mchi'o/_/'di la ci bden/_khyod kyi bu bdag gis shar sgor bor ba gang lags pa de ni da ltar khyod kyi khyim thab 'di lags so/_/khyod kyi bu mo bdag gis nub sgor bor ba gang lags pa de ni da ltar khyod kyi chun ma 'di lags so/_/ut+pa la'i 
[\[222a.5\]]mdog gis bsams pa/_sngon ni bdag ma dang chen chung du gyur nas yang bu mo dang chen chung du gyur/_da yang bdag bu mo dang chen chung du gyur cing bu khyim thab tu gyur gyis/_rnam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_de mgo g.yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /_ji 
[\[222a.6\]]tsam na don mthun rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags pa mthong nas de de dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/der yang 'jud mthun ma'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed do/_/ji tsam na dga' 'dun lnga brgya skyed mos tshal du 'phags nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[222a.7\]]bdag cag gyi na de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du dong ste ci rung /_'jud mthun ma 'ga' zhig bkri'o/_/de ltar bya'o/_/gang bkri/_sa 'dzin ma'o/_/ma nyes so zhes de dag gis sa 'dzin ma ut+pa la'i mdog kAR+ShA pa Na lnga brgyas glas te skyed mos tshal du khrid do/_/de dag zos 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]shing 'thungs nas de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ut+pa la'i mdog gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dag dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na 'chag cing 'dug go/_/de na dga' 'dun 
[\[222b.2\]]gcig gis smras pa/_'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba 'di lta bu las grol ba yin gyi bdag cag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba yin no/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis smras pa/_bdag gis yangs pa can du spos 'tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa rjes su 'jug par 
[\[222b.3\]]byas so/_/dga' 'dun des smras pa/_smras pa de'i don ci 'di yang rjes su 'jug par byed 'dod dam/_des smras pa/_ci 'di skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yin nam/_'di skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yin no/_/kho mos gal te 'di rjes su 'jug par bya na khyed la 
[\[222b.4\]]ci dbab/_kAR+ShA pa Na lnga brgya'o/_/gal te khyod kyis 'di rjes su 'jug par ma nus na khyod la ci dbab/_khyod gcig pu'i chung ma khud pa'o/_/ma nyes kyis de ltar gyis shig_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis khas blangs nas de tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[222b.5\]]nas bud med kyi g.yo dag dang /_bud med kyi gya gyu dag dang /_bud med kyi ya yo dag dang /_bud med kyi sgyu gang dag yin pa de dag nye bar bstan par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dbang po dag phab ste 'dug go/_/des bsams pa/_bud med kyi yul 
[\[222b.6\]]gyi reg pa ni dug yin pas bdag gis 'khyud na 'di bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_
[\[222b.7\]]rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor spyil bu la/_/chu bas yongs su dkris gyur cing /_/mi gtsang rul ba dri nga ba/_/gzhan la sten cing bdag gir byed/_/btsog pas gang ba'i rkyal pa khyod/_/gsong ldong phol mig ngal skyen ldan/_/rgyun lam dgu nas rtag tu ni/_/mi 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gtsang rab tu 'dzag pa yin/_/ji ltar kho bos khyod shes ltar/_/skye bos khyod ni shes gyur na/_/dbyar dus phyi sa'i gnas bzhin du/_/thag ring rnam par spong bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis/_/mun pas bsgribs pas mi shes pa/_/de phyir 
[\[223a.2\]]rdzab la glang rgan bzhin/_/de dag khyod la chags par byed/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/_skal ba chen po de lta lags/_/'phags pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor spyil bu la/_/chu bas yongs su dkris gyur cing /_/
[\[223a.3\]]mi gtsang rus pa dri nga ba/_/gzhan la sten cing bdag gir bgyid/_/btsog pas bltam pa'i rkyal pa bdag_/gsong ldong phol mig ngal skyen ldan/_/rgyun lam dgu nas rtag tu ni/_/mi gtsang rab tu 'dzag pa lags/_/ji ltar 'phags pas bdag mkhyen ltar/_/skye bos 
[\[223a.4\]]bdag ni 'tshal gyur na/_/dbyar dus slang sa'i gnas bzhin du/_/thag ring rnam par spong bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir byis pa gti mug gi/_/mun pas bsgribs pas ma 'tshal ba/_/de phyir rdzab la glang rgan bzhin/_/de dag bdag la chags par bgyid/_/skal ba chen po 
[\[223a.5\]]mar gshegs te/_/'phags pa chos ni bstan du gsol/_/shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la/_/bdag gis khyod kyi nyan thos bgyi/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs nas des de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams 
[\[223a.6\]]dang /_rang bzhin khong du chud nas/_'di ltar ut+pa la'i mdog gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par 
[\[223a.7\]]so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa byas so/_/des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa la brten nas 'phags pas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/_byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_/
[\[223b.2\]]rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/_/ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/_/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nas ni rkang pa phyung /_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag_/thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig 
[\[223b.3\]]tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni thob ste/_'phags pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_/'phags pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/_'phags pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[223b.4\]]chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/_bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid du 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu mo ut+pa la'i mdog gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[223b.5\]]chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod 
[\[223b.6\]]do/_/des smras pa/_sring mo song la khyim thab dag la gsol cig_/de de dag gi gan du song ste smras pa/_rje'i sras dag bdag rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang /_de dag gis smras pa/_sa 'dzin ma ci'i phyir kho bo cag la co 'dri bar byed/_des smras pa/_mad par rab 
[\[223b.7\]]tu 'byung ste co 'dri bar mi bgyid do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gal te de lta na rab tu byung shig_/de de dag gis gnang nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ba dang /_des de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa ut+pa la'i mdog 'di legs par gsungs pa'i 
[\[224a.2\]]chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma nyes kyis rab tu 'byung ba legs so zhes bka' stsal nas/_rang nyid kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la phrin yig bri bar brtsams so/_/
[\[224a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das phrin yig mdzad pa na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'ongs te gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jud mthun ma 'di ci'i slad du 'dir mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de skad ma zer cig_/khyod kyi chos kyi sring mo 'di legs 
[\[224a.4\]]par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'dod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du phrin yig mdzad/_rgyal po chen po mnyan yod du skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'di la bsel ba 
[\[224a.5\]]stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po ma nyes so/_/rgyal pos de'i bsel ba bskos so/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gis phrin yig mnos te mnyan yod du song ba dang /_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te/_gdams ngag byin nas de 
[\[224a.6\]]gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /_ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang /_rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 
[\[224a.7\]]zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu mo dag gang gi phyir skra bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/bya ba byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/_bong ba dang gser du 
[\[224b.2\]]mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab 
[\[224b.3\]]kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul 
[\[224b.4\]]che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/_dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog 'di mchog yin no/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ut+pa la'i mdog gis las ci zhig bgyis na des mig 
[\[224b.5\]]ut+pa la 'dra ba/_ut+pa la'i dri dang ldan pa/_ut+pa la'i ze'u 'bru'i mdog 'dra bar gyur/_las ci zhig bgyis na des skyes pa dag gis phongs pa ma mchis par gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra 
[\[224b.6\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/_las ci zhig bgyis na de nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ut+pa la'i mdog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_
[\[224b.7\]]'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas ut+pa la'i mdog nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag 
[\[225a.2\]]la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa 
[\[225a.3\]]las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ngo /_/de'i chung ma gos dang zas bzang bas nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par gyur nas de dang ha cang thag 
[\[225a.4\]]mi ring ba na 'jud mthun ma'i khyim zhig 'dug pa der skyes pa gzhan dag 'jug cing gzhan dag 'byung ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_bud med 'di ni bsod nams byas pa yin pas 'di skyes pa dag gis phongs pa med pa yin na/_bdag kyang gang gis skyes pa dag gis 
[\[225a.5\]]phongs pa med par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod snyam nas de de ltar sems pa na/_der gcer bu pa'i nyan thos ma zhig 'ongs nas des de la smras pa/_phu nu mo gang gis gang sems pa dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod/_des 
[\[225a.6\]]smras pa/_phu nu mo kho mo'i ming po rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen po zhig yod pa de la zan byin la smon lam thob shig dang /_khyod gang sems pa dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_phu nu mo gal te de lta na song la 
[\[225a.7\]]bdag nyid chen po de kho mo'i khyim du zan la bos shig_/des de zan la bos so/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma des kyang zan sbyar cing /_ut+pa la dag gis lag pa sta gon byas so/_/gcer bu pa dag ni dus su yang zan za la/_dus ma yin par yang za bas de yun ring zhig 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]thogs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/_bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 
[\[225b.2\]]shig ljongs rgyu ba na ri brags der phyin nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma des lus mdzes pa/_sems mdzes pa de mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ni brtul zhugs grub pa/_
[\[225b.3\]]bdag nyid chen po de yin gyis zan sbyin no snyam nas/_des de zas bsod pas tshim par byas shing de la ut+pa la dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis chos mi ston pas rang sangs rgyas de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/_de la snying brtse 
[\[225b.4\]]ba'i phyir ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bebs pa dang /_glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin 
[\[225b.5\]]pas khyim bdag gi chung ma des gus par bsgrim pa dang bcas pas de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag skyes pa dag gis phongs pa 
[\[225b.6\]]med par 'gyur zhing 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni ut+pa la'i mdog 
[\[225b.7\]]'di yin te/_'dis rang sangs rgyas la zan byin te ut+pa la dag gis mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni da ltar mig ut+pa la 'dra ba/_ut+pa la'i dri dang ldan pa/_ut+pa la'i ze'u 'bru'i mdog 'dra bar gyur to/_/bdag gis yon gnas 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag skyes pa dag gis phongs pa med par 'gyur zhing /_'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta 
[\[226a.2\]]bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa des ni skyes pa dag gis phongs pa med par gyur cing /_nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /_'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas ches 
[\[226a.3\]]khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so/_/nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te/_gang du smon lam btab ce na/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa 
[\[226a.4\]]chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha 
[\[226a.5\]]dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong ma gang gis de rab tu phyung ba'i dge slong ma de de bzhin 
[\[226a.6\]]gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas/_de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon 
[\[226a.7\]]lam 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/_bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
