[\[226b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa 
[\[226b.3\]]la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /_ji ltar mkhan mo 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan 
[\[226b.4\]]pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_shAkya'i seng ge_/shAkya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[226b.5\]]pas nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa ut+pa la'i mdog gis las ci zhig bgyis na des tshol bar gyur/_
[\[226b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ut+pa la'i mdog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/_gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa/_ut+pa la'i mdog nyid kyis las 
[\[226b.7\]]byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/_
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/
[\[227a.2\]]'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na 'di bud med smyan byed pa zhig tu gyur nas de na 'dis bu lta bu mang po dag ma lta bu dag dang lhan cig bsdus shing /_ming po lta bu mang po dag kyang sring mo lta bu dag dang lhan cig bsdus pas las de'i rnam par 
[\[227a.3\]]smin pas da ltar tshol bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/_las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/_las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 
[\[227a.4\]]'dren ma yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/ut+pa la'i mdog gi kun du spyod pa ni bsod snyoms 
[\[227a.5\]]brgyus nas bsod snyoms kyi phud dang por dge 'dun la 'bul zhing phyis gzhan du brgyus te bdag nyid za bar byed de/_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de bsod snyoms la zhugs nas des bsod snyoms kyi phud dge 'dun la phul nas/_de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi don du brgyus pa dang /_
[\[227a.6\]]dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa zhig bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na de spyod yul la mi mkhas pas ci yang ma rnyed pa de ut+pa la'i mdog gis mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa ci yang ma brnyes sam/_'phags ma ci yang ma rnyed do/_/des bdag nyid kyi bsod snyoms de bsod 
[\[227a.7\]]snyoms pa de la phul nas de'i zan chad par gyur to/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de mthong nas des bsams pa/_sring mo 'di ni dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gang zag la yang mngon par dad pa 'dra na/_'di bgam par bya'o snyam nas phyi de nyin par ut+pa 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la'i mdog bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_des bsod snyoms kyi phud dge 'dun la phul nas bdag nyid kyi don du gnyis pa bsgrubs pa dang /_nye dga' yang 'ongs nas smras pa/_'phags ma rnyed pa cung zad yod dam/_des smras pa/_'phags pa mchis na gsol na 
[\[227b.2\]]bzhed dam/_lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/'phags pa gal te de lta na lhung bzed bzed du gsol/_des lhung bzed bzed pa dang /_des bsod snyoms de de'i lhung bzed du phul lo/_/ut+pa la'i mdog nyi ma gnyis su zan chad pas nyam chung ba'i 
[\[227b.3\]]sbyor bas brgyal te sa la sgyel ba dang /_ma dad pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/_shes ldan dag ut+pa la'i mdog 'di 'dod chags dang bral lo zhes grag na/_shAkya gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba 'di mthong nas 'dod chags kyis brgyal te sa la sgyel bar gyur pa de ji lta 
[\[227b.4\]]zhes smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[227b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa/_nye dga' khyod dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa lam po che na 'dug pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong du 'gro ba 
[\[227b.6\]]las bca' ba dang bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' zhing za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni 
[\[227b.7\]]rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa lam po che na 'dug pa bsod snyoms 
[\[228a.2\]]kyi phyir grong du 'gro ba las bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' 'am za na dge slong des phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song ste/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 
[\[228a.3\]]'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_chos 'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni shAkya'i bu nye dga' 'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o/_/nye du ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni phyi mo dang /_
[\[228a.4\]]mes po dang /_phrugs las brten pa'i bdun pa tshun cad ni nye du yin la de phan cad ni nye du ma yin no/_/lam po che na 'dug pa zhes bya ba ni srang du song ba'o/_/bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong du 'gro ba zhes bya ba la/_grong zhes bya ba ni gang na lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum 
[\[228a.5\]]mdo dag yod pa'o/_/las zhes bya ba ni gan nas so/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag gis lag tu'o/_/blangs te zhes bya ba ni byin len stobs su bcug ste'o/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul 
[\[228a.6\]]du mid na'o/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song ste zhes bya ba ni grong gi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du song ste'o/_/dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa la'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa bdag la smad pa'i 
[\[228a.7\]]gnas zhes bya ba ni smad par bya ba'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o/_/byung gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba byung gis so/_/chos de zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa de'o/_/so sor 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]'chags so zhes bya ba ni mthol lo zhes so/_/so sor bshags par bya ste zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ste'o/_/chos 'di ni so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos 'di ni mthol bar bya ba ste/_des na so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji 
[\[228b.2\]]ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa lam po che na 'dug pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong du 'gro ba las nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' 'am za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/nye du ma yin 
[\[228b.3\]]pa la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' 'am za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du lam po che na 'dug pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong du 'gro ba las nye du ma yin par 'du shes pas bca' ba dang 
[\[228b.4\]]bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nye du la yid gnyis za bas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba rang gi lag gis blangs te 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang /_
[\[228b.5\]]tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/dge slong ma las zas len pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste dang po rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po brgyad bcu rtsa gcig pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[228b.6\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing /_pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa byung ngo /_/
[\[228b.7\]]drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang /_chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_la la nas thob/_la la nas ma thob nas de dag bkres pas nyen nas bcu gnyis sde dag gi gan du dong ba dang /_de dag gis 'phags 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa dag bzhugs su gsol zhes stan dag bshams so/_/de dag 'khod pa dang bcu gnyis sde dag gis rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'khod nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'tsho'am/_sring mo dag 'di na ji ltar 'tsho/_kho bo cag bkres pas nyen to/_/
[\[229a.2\]]'phags pa dag gal te de lta na sang spyon cig dang zhal tshus gsol lo/_/sring mo dag sang khyed kyis sbyin na gnangs sus sbyin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag nyid kyis gsol lo/_/sring mo dag de ltas 'tsho bar mi nus kyis/_'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi 
[\[229a.3\]]dge 'dun gang du spyan drangs pa der khyed cag gis zhal ta gyis la kho bo cag la yang dang yang du byin cig dang /_de lta na kho bo cag 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_'phags pa dag de ltar bgyir rung ngam/_/sring mo dag legs par rung ngo /_/shin 
[\[229a.4\]]tu rung ngo /_/sus bkag_/gang du bkag_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag gal te rung na ma nongs kyis de bzhin bgyi'o/_/de dag gis a rog gya zhes byas te dong ngo /_/ji tsam na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du 
[\[229a.5\]]gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun ni zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu lngas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms 
[\[229a.6\]]mngon par bsgrub par mdzad de/_lnga gang zhe na/_nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa la lta bar bzhed pa dang /_gnas mal la rtogs par bzhed pa dang /_'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' 
[\[229a.7\]]bar bzhed pa'o/_/don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar bzhed pas rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par sgrub par mdzad do/_/khyim bdag de nang mi dang bcas pas dge slong gi dge 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'dun la brim par brtsams pa dang /_sbom dga' mo rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste/_smras pa/_khyim bdag 'di ni 'phags pa dga' bo ste/_shAkya las rab tu byung ba/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin gyis 'di la 
[\[229b.2\]]yang gsol cig_/'di ni 'phags pa nye dga'o/_/'di ni 'gro mgyogs so/_/'di ni nab so'o/_/'di ni 'dun pa ste/_'di dag kyang shAkya las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin gyis 'di dag la yang 
[\[229b.3\]]yang gsol cig_/'di ni 'phags pa 'char ka ste/_bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu rab tu byung ba/_sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/_chos sgrogs pa/_rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can yin gyis 'di la yang yang gsol cig_/khyim bdag des de bzhin du de dag la 
[\[229b.4\]]yang dang yang du byin no/_/de bzhin du sbom dga' mos 'brim mkhan dag la yang smras nas/_de dag gis kyang de bzhin du de dag la yang dang yang du byin no/_/de na dge slong kha cig la ni 'bras can chad/_kha cig la ni tshod ma chad/_kha cig la ni bca' ba chad/_
[\[229b.5\]]kha cig la ni bza' ba chad/_kha cig gis ni zas cung zad thob nas zan chad par gyur/_kha cig gis ni zan ma thob par zan chad par gyur to/_/de na dge slong gang dag 'ching ba mtha' dag yod pa de dag gis khyim bdag de la tho btsams pa/_khyim bdag gal te 
[\[229b.6\]]khyod la 'byor pa med na ci'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren par byed/_des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis zhal zas mang po sta gon bgyis na sbom dga' mo bgres pa'i mtha' logs su mchis pas bgres pa'i mtha' logs 
[\[229b.7\]]su 'ba' zhig tu yang dang yang du stobs su stsal bas de la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[230a.2\]]khyed kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa 
[\[230a.3\]]mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin 
[\[230a.4\](]na[,]no[)]/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge slong rab tu mang po khyim rnams su mgron du bos nas zan za ba'i tshe de na gal te dge slong ma zhig 'di la ni bca' ba byin cig_/'di la ni 'bras chan byin cig_/'di la ni sran tshod byin cig_/_
[\[230a.5\]]'di la ni yang byin cig ces sgo zhing 'dug na dge slong ma de la dge slong de rnams kyis 'di skad ces sring mo khyod dge slong zan za ba'i bar du re zhig sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/gal te dge slong gcig gis kyang dge slong ma de la de skad smra ma spobs na dge slong de dag thams cad 
[\[230a.6\]]kyis phyi rol kun dga'i ra bar dong ste/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya ba'o/_/dge 
[\[230a.7\]]slong rab tu mang po zhes bya ba ni gnyis las lhag pa ni rab tu mang po'o/_/khyim rnams su zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su'o/_/mgron du bos nas zhes bya ba ni zan gyi phyir ro/_/zan za ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang /_bza' ba lnga dag go/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]de la gal te dge slong ma zhig ces bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge slong ma de la zhes bya ba ni sbom dga' mo'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la'o/_/dge slong de rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams 
[\[230b.2\]]kyis so/_/'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces bsgo bar bya ba'o/_/sring mo khyod dge slong rnams zan za ba'i bar du re zhig sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni sring mo khyod dge slong rnams zan za ba'i bar du re zhig yud tsam zhig kha rog par sdod cig ces brjod par bya 
[\[230b.3\]]ba'o/_/gal te dge slong gcig gis kyang dge slong ma de la de skad smra ma spobs na zhes bya ba ni gal te dge slong gcig gis kyang dge slong ma de la de skad ma smras na'o/_/dge slong de dag thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis so/_/phyi 
[\[230b.4\]]rol kun dga' ra bar dong ste zhes bya ba ni grong gi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du dong ste'o/_/dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag la smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni smad par bya ba'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni 
[\[230b.5\]]mthol bar bya ba'o/_/byung gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba byung gis so/_/chos de zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa de'o/_/so sor 'chags so zhes bya ba ni mthol lo zhes bya ba'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ste zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ste'o/_/chos 'di yang so 
[\[230b.6\]]sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos 'di yang mthol bar bya ste/_des na so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong rnams khang tog na zan za zhing gzhan dag bar khang na zan za ba'i tshe de na gal te dge slong ma zhig sgo 
[\[230b.7\]]zhing 'dug na dge slong de dag gis dge slong ma de la bsgo bar bya'o/_/ma bsgo bar za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag bar khang na za ba de dag gis dge slong ma de la bsgo'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]'og khang na zan za zhing gzhan dag sgo khang na zan za ba'i tshe de na gal te dge slong ma zhig bsgo zhing 'dug na dge slong de dag gis dge slong ma de la bsgo bar bya'o/_/ma bsgo bar za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag sgo khang na za ba de dag gis 
[\[231a.2\]]dge slong ma de la bsgo'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par zos na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/dge slong kha cig zos te phyir 'byung zhing gzhan dag nang du 'jug na de na gang dag nang du 'jug pa de dag gis dge slong ma de la bsgo'am zhes dri bar bya'o/_/ma dris par za na nyes byas 
[\[231a.3\]]su 'gyur ro/_/de'i ngor mgron du bos pa dang /_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la ltung ba med do/_/byug ris ston pa dang /_ma byin pa la sbyin du 'jug pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrug pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen 
[\[231a.4\]]pa la ltung ba med do/_/gral rims su ma phebs par 'brim du 'jug pa ma bzlog par za ba'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste gnyis pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na 
[\[231a.5\]]bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe dmag dpon seng ges bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe des cha gcig bzung nas 'di ltar khyu mchog rlabs po che'i tshig smras shing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags te/_deng phyin cad gcer bu pa 
[\[231a.6\]]dag dang /_gcer bu ma dag dang /_gcer bu pa'i nyan thos dag dang /_gcer bu pa'i nyan thos ma dag gi sgo ni bcad/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dag dang /_dge slong ma dag dang /_dge bsnyen dag dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag gi sgo ni phye'o zhes 
[\[231a.7\]]bsgrags shing zhing las kyi mtha' dag kyang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin no zhes yongs su btang ngo /_/de dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang med de/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod srabs shing yongs su zad de/_yongs su mthar thug par gyur to/_/de'i skabs su tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis ljongs 
[\[231b.2\]]rgyu zhing 'dong ba na yangs pa can du phyin nas dmag dpon seng ges de gnyis khyim gzhan du zan la mgron du bos nas de de gnyis kyi zan sbyar ba'i phyir bdag nyid srang du song ba dang gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas/_de dag shes ldan dag gang gi tshe dmag dpon seng ge bdag cag la 
[\[231b.3\]]mngon par dad pa de'i tshe na 'di'i thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur na/_da ltar shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag la mngon par dad pas 'di la bcar yang med bzar yang med de bdag nyid khyim gyi las byed do zhes smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[231b.4\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyis dmag dpon seng ge dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa la bslab pa'i sdom pa byin cig_/'di ltar sbyin par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas/_gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig 
[\[231b.5\]]gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dmag dpon seng ge ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa 
[\[231b.6\]]can te/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas longs spyod srabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug na/_
[\[231b.7\]]gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsol to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa der dge slong gis khyim du 'gro bar 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]mi bya/_stan la longs spyad par mi bya/_bsod snyoms bza' bar mi bya/_chos bstan par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pa byin pa der dge slong gis khyim du 'gro bar mi bya/_stan la longs spyad par mi bya/_bsod snyoms 
[\[232a.2\]]bza' bar mi bya/_chos bstan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis sngar mgron du bos pa yang de'i khyim du ma dong ngo /_/de nas dmag dpon seng ges kha zas sta gon byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu 
[\[232a.3\]]chen po gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa gnyis gdugs tshod g.yar dgongs 'tshal na da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de gnyis kyis 
[\[232a.4\]]smras pa/_khyim bdag khyod la dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pa byin gyis mi 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa gnyis bdag gis khyed gnyis sngar spyan drangs kyis gshegs su gsol/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyim bdag 'o na bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o 
[\[232a.5\]]zhes de gnyis kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngar mgron du bos pa gang yin pa des bza' bar bya ste 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/de gnyis dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim du 'phags pa dang /_drug 
[\[232a.6\]]sde dag gis de gnyis mthong nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyod gnyis gar bzhud/_dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim du'o/_/de la dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pa ma byin nam/_gang la byin pa de la byin gyis kho bo cag gnyis sngar mgron du bos so/_/gal te de lta 
[\[232a.7\]]na kho bo cag ches sngar mgron du bos te/_gang gi tshe dmag dpon seng ges bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na/_des cha gcig bzung nas/_'di ltar khyu mchog rlabs po che'i tshig smras shing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]te/_deng phyin cad gcer bu pa dag dang /_gcer bu ma dag dang /_gcer bu pa'i nyan thos dag dang /_gcer bu ma'i nyan thos ma dag gi sgo ni bcad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dag dang /_dge slong ma dag dang /_dge bsnyen dag dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag gi 
[\[232b.2\]]sgo ni phye'o zhes bsgrags pas de'i phyir kho bo cag ches sngar mgron du bos so/_/de gnyis cang mi smra bar dong ba dang de dag kyang de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba na dmag dpon seng ges dge slong rab tu mang po dag 'ong ba mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed 
[\[232b.3\]]de khyim mi la dgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang dge slong rnams la brims so/_/de dag gis zos te dong ba dang de'i bu dag gis zas bslang bar brtsams pa na des smras pa/_bu dag khyim mi la dgos pa gang yin pa de dag kyang dge slong rnams la brims kyis gzhan sgrub kyi bar 
[\[232b.4\]]du re zhig sdod cig_/de dag gis ngu bar brtsams pa thos nas dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag slob pa dag gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dag tu sngar mgron du ma bos par dong ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang /_bza' ba blangs 
[\[232b.5\]]nas 'cha' bar byed/_za bar byed ces smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /_skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 
[\[232b.6\]]'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed slob pa dag 
[\[232b.7\]]gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de dag tu sngar mgron du ma bos par dong ste/_rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang /_bza' ba blangs nas 'cha' zhing za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' 
[\[233a.2\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_slob pa dag 
[\[233a.3\]]gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams par gyur la/_yang dge slong gang slob pa dag gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de lta bu dag tu sngar mgron du ma bos par song ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang /_bza' ba blangs nas 
[\[233a.4\]]'cha' 'am za na dge slong des phyi rol kun dga'i ra bar song ste/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste/_chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya 
[\[233a.5\]]ba'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad pa de'i tshe na dge slong 'ga' yang dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim du mi 'gro'o/_/de nas dmag dpon seng ge'i chung mas dmag dpon seng ge la 'di skad ces 
[\[233a.6\]]smras so/_/rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig_/dge 'dun gyis skol cag la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal nas/_dge slong 'ga' yang mi mchi bas don gyis na dge 'dun gyis tshul shing gis skol gyi dge slong rnams kyi bshos shin tu bkag kyang gdan gyi longs spyod dang /_chos 
[\[233a.7\]]ston pa la nongs pa ci mchis zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim du 'gro bar bya/_stan la longs spyad par bya/_chos bstan 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]par bya zhing bsod snyoms blang bar ni mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed stong pa kho nas dang por de'i khyim du 'jug cing 'byung nas/_dmag dpon seng ge'i chung mas de mthong ba dang /_sngon ni 'phags pa 'di dag lhung bzed stong pa kho nas dang por bdag gi khyim du zhugs nas lhung 
[\[233b.2\]]bzed gang ba dang lag pa gang ba dag gis 'byung na/_da ni lhung bzed stong pa dang lag pa stong pa dag gis 'byung ngo zhes ngu bar brtsams pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag 
[\[233b.3\]]gis lhung bzed stong pa kho nas dang por de'i khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis bsod snyoms brgyus nas lhung bzed gang bas de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /_de'i bu byis pa khye'u dag bca' ba dag slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[233b.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis ril por sbyin par brtsams pa dang /_byis pa khye'u dag gis blangs nas 'cha' zhing phyir byung ba gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas/_dris pa khye'u dag khyed cag gis bca' ba ga las rnyed/_'phags pa dag 
[\[233b.5\]]gis byin no/_/ma nyes so bum pas bum pa 'gengs te/_khyed kyang de dag la sbyin la/_de dag kyang khyed la sbyin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis 
[\[233b.6\]]bca' ba ril por mi sbyin par dum bur byas te sbyin par bya'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dmag dpon seng ge'i chung mas dge slong 'ongs pa rnams la ga gon dang la phug la sogs pa 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dag dang /_ldam ldum la sogs pa tshod ma dag phul ba dang /_dge 
[\[233b.7\]]slong dag mi len nas des smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di dag gis bdag cag gi mdzod dang /_bang ba dag bas par 'gyur ram ci bzhes shig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]de lta bas na dge slong dag gis ga gon dang la phug la sogs pa 'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dag dang /_ldam ldum la sogs pa tshod ma khyim nas 'byung ba blang bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag dpong sa'i khang pa na gtam 'dre zhing 'khod pa de dag gis 
[\[234a.2\]]dge slong de dag dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim nas byung ba mthong nas de na gang dag ma dad pa de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe dmag dpon seng ge dge sbyong gau ta ma la mngon par dad par gyur pa de tshun chad nas de'i longs spyod dag srabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_
[\[234a.3\]]yongs su gtugs par gyur to/_/dad pa can dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa de'i longs spyod dag srabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par ga la 'gyur/_'di ltar dmag dpon seng ges ni bcom ldan 
[\[234a.4\]]'das kyi spyan snga nas bden pa dag mthong nas de'i zhing las kyi mtha' dag kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa yin no zhes rgyun bcad pas des na de'i longs spyod dag srabs pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par gyur to/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag gis gros byas 
[\[234a.5\]]nas/_dmag dpon seng ge'i zhing pa dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed ci'i phyir dmag dpon seng ge'i zhing las kyi mtha' dag mi byed/_gla ma thob bam ci/_de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gla ma thob pa ma yin te/_dmag dpon gyis bdag cag bkag na ji ltar 
[\[234a.6\]]bya/_khyed cag la tshogs kyis bsgos/_deng la dmag dpon gyi zhing las kyi mtha' dag gyis shig_/de dag gis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag gi tshig gis dmag dpon seng ge'i zhing las kyi mtha' dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_lhas dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab nas 
[\[234a.7\]]lo tog gi 'byor pa chen po skyes par gyur to/_/dmag dpon seng ge yang longs spyod dag gis mtho bar gyur nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_/mtha' 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dmag dpon seng ges 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sngon bdag gi longs spyod dag srabs pa dang /_yongs su bas pa dang /_yongs su gtugs par gyur nas dge 'dun don bzhed pa/_phan pa bzhed pa bdag la bslab 
[\[234b.2\]]pa'i sdom pa stsal na/_da ni yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI'i tshogs kyis bdag gi longs spyod bsgrubs nas longs spyod dag 'phel bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa mdzad na legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234b.3\]]kyis dmag dpon seng ge la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas dmag dpon seng ges bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de 
[\[234b.4\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dmag dpon seng ge dang gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par bya'o 'di ltar gzhig par bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis 
[\[234b.5\]]dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na dmag dpon seng ges phyag byas te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su tsog tsog por 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du 
[\[234b.6\]]gsol/_bdag dmag dpon seng ge dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_bdag gis 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci 
[\[234b.7\]]yang ma mchis te/_bdag gis de ltar phul zhing de ltar yongs su btang bas longs spyod srabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug nas dge 'dun don bzhed pa/_phan pa bzhed pas bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba las bdag dmag dpon seng ge yang 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]longs spyod 'phel nas/_bdag dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba/_bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig par gsol na/_thugs brtse ba can dge 'dun btsun pa rnams kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa stsal du 
[\[235a.2\]]gsol/_de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so/_/de nas dmag dpon seng ge thos pa'i nyen kor nas bkar te mthong ba'i nyen kor du bzhag nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dmag dpon 
[\[235a.3\]]seng ge de ni dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can te/_des sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_yid du 'thad pa'i dge slong rnams la ma phul ba'am/_yongs su ma btang ba ci yang ma mchis te/_des de ltar phul zhing yongs su btang bas 
[\[235a.4\]]longs spyod srabs shing yongs su bas te yongs su mthar thug nas de la dge 'dun don bzhed pa/_phan pa bzhed pas bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba las dmag dpon seng ge de yang longs spyod 'phel te/_dmag dpon seng ge bslab pa'i sdom pa stsal ba dge 'dun las sdom pa gzhig 
[\[235a.5\]]par gsol na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dmag dpon seng ge la bslab pa'i sdom pa gzhig pa mdzad do/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyis gang la bslab pa'i sdom pa bshig pa der 
[\[235a.6\]]dge slong rnams kyis 'gro bar bya/_stan la longs spyad par bya/_bsod snyoms blang bar bya/_chos bstan par bya'o/_/slob pa dag gi zhes bya ba la/_slob pa dag ces bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa dag dang /_lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dag dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dag go/_/khyim gang 
[\[235a.7\]]dag ces bya ba ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi khyim dag go/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams par gyur la zhes bya ba ni gsol ba'i las kyis so/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sde'am/_gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/slob pa dag gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de lta bu dag tu zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa lta bu dag tu'o/_/sngar mgron du ma bos par zhes bya ba ni sngar ma bstabs par ro/_/song ste zhes bya ba ni 
[\[235b.2\]]song nas so/_/rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/blangs na zhes bya ba ni byin len stobs su bcug nas so/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/dge slong des 
[\[235b.3\]]zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song ste zhes bya ba ni grong gi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du song ste'o/_/dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams la'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba 
[\[235b.4\]]ni smad par bya ba'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o/_/byung gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba byung gis so/_/chos de zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa de'o/_/so sor 'chags so zhes 
[\[235b.5\]]bya ba ni mthol lo zhes so/_/so sor bshags par bya ste zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ste'o/_/chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos 'di yang mthol bar bya ba ste/_des na so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe 
[\[235b.6\]]na/_dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad slob pa dag gis khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyi bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de lta bu dag tu sngar mgron du ma bos par song ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs nas 'cha' 'am za na thams cad du so sor bshags par bya bar 
[\[235b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/sngar mgron du bos pa la ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang /_smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /_tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/bslab pa dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste gsum pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//sangs 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na ser skya'i gnas kyi nags su dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bdun nam brgyad na dgag dbye 'byung bar 'gyur ba na spyod yul gyi grong du zhag 'di snyed na dgag 
[\[236a.2\]]dbye 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes brjod par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams dong ste brjod do/_/de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya dag de gnyis kyi dgag dbye [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 
[\[236a.3\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do/_/mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang 
[\[236a.4\]]dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad 
[\[236a.5\]]nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[236a.6\]]dang bcas pas sang 'di nyid du bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /_sang dge slong 'gas kyang bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi bgyi ste/_bdag cag bsod snyoms 'tshal te mchi zhing /_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi sug pa 
[\[236a.7\]]nas tshim zhing stobs par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de dag gis ser skya'i gnas su dong ste/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas de nas nang par sngar langs te 
[\[236b.2\]]bca' ba dang bza' ba dag gis shing rta dag bkang nas shAkya mo rnams la smras pa/_khyed cag je shing rta dag zhon la dengs shig dang kho bo cag kyang phyi bzhin 'ong ngo /_/de nas de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te shing rta dag la zhon nas 'phags so/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi 
[\[236b.3\]]nyen kor thibs po yin pas de dag lam kar chom rkun pa dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag shAkya mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di dag 'dong gis tshur sheg gzhom mo/_/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'dong du 
[\[236b.4\]]zad mod khyed cag la 'di dag bcom pas ci bya/_shAkya gdug pa pha rol gnon pa dag gnon pa byed par 'gyur gyis thong shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_dmag dpon zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong /_gzhom mo zhes de dag gis de'i tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dag bcom 
[\[236b.5\]]nas/_gos dang rgyan thams cad phrogs te dong ngo /_/shAkya mo de dag kyang 'jigs shing skrag nas sgren mor tshang tshing dang nags ma dag gi nang du yib ste 'khod do/_/shing rta ded pa dag kyang skrag nas byer ro/_/glang dag kyang chu dag bcad nas ci dgar yan cing 'khod do/_/
[\[236b.6\]]shing rta dag kyang shing rta'i mda' dang bral te 'dug go/_/drug sde dag gis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/_dga' bo nye dga' shAkya bag med pa dag yun ring du thogs pas bdag cag gis zan gcad par bya'am ci/_bsod snyoms la 'dong ngo /_/de ltar bya'o zhes 
[\[236b.7\]]de dag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te 'phags pa dang /_ji tsam na lam ka na shing rta bca' ba dang /_bza' bas gang ba shing rta'i mda' dang bral ba dag 'dug pa dang /_glang dag chu dag bcad de ci dgar yan cing 'khod pa dag mthong nas de dag gis phan tshun rnam par 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bltas nas bod par brtsams pa/_shes ldan dag 'di na su 'khod/_de dag gis skad phyung ba dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa khyed cag su yin/_'phags pa dag bdag cag shAkya mo dag go tshur sheg kho bo cag la brims shig_/'phags pa dag bdag cag 
[\[237a.2\]]chom rkun pa dag gis bcom ste sgren mor mchis so/_/kho bo cag gdugs tshod yol gyis tshur sheg khyed cag gi yan lag dang nying lag dag las kho bo cag gis sngon ma mthong ba gang yod tshur sheg de dag lo ma dag gis g.yogs te byung nas brim par brtsams pa dang /_drug 
[\[237a.3\]]sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ltos shig shAkya mo 'di dag gi mig ci 'dra/_sna ci 'dra mchu ci 'dra nu ma ci 'dra lag pa ci 'dra rked pa ci 'dra/_rkang pa ci 'dra ltos shig_/de dag de ltar gtses pa na ngo tsha nas tshang tshing dang nags ma de dag nyid kyi nang du yib ste 'khod 
[\[237a.4\]]do/_/bsel ba dag gis shAkya rnams la shAkya mo rnams bcom mo zhes sbran pa dang /_de nas shAkya dag mda' gzhu lag na thogs shing mtshon gzas pa dag gis lam kar dong ste/_lam bgags nas de dag gis chom rkun pa de dag bzung ngo /_/de na kha cig gis smras pa/_
[\[237a.5\]]'di dag la btang snyoms byar ci yod gsad do kha cig gis smras pa/_re zhig der khrid la shAkya mo rnams la dris te/_gang la yan lag gang gis nyes pa byas pa de'i de gcad par bya'o/_/de dag gis de dag khrid nas shAkya mo rnams kyi gan du dong ste smras pa/_tshur sheg chom 
[\[237a.6\]]rkun pa 'di dag las gang gis khyed cag la yan lag gang gis nyes pa byas pa smros shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di ni nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa yin te/_'dis de dag bzlog na de dag ma btub pas 'di ni thong shig_/de dag 
[\[237a.7\]]gis de btang ngo de srog de'u chad pa las phyir thob nas des de dag gi rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed cag dad pa skyes te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol du 'gro ba yin na 'di dag bsad pas khyed la ci bya/_
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]nyes pa byed pa 'di dag kyang btang bar gsol/_de dag gis de dag las bcom pa'i rdzas dag phyir bkug ste btang ngo /_/de nas shAkya de dag gis shAkya mo de dag gos bskon cing rgyan thogs su bcug nas shing rta dag kyang chu dag btags te shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[237b.2\]]spyan sngar dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /_shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brim par brtsams so/_/shAkya mo rnams drug sde dag la zas mi sbyin nas 
[\[237b.3\]]shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/_ci'i phyir 'phags pa dag la zhal zas mi gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di dag gis zos zin to/_/gang du gsol/_de nyid du'o sus brims/_kho mo cag gis so/_/khyed cag sgren mo dag gis ji ltar brims/_de'i phyir 'di dag gis 
[\[237b.4\]]kho mo cag tho btsams te ji ltar kho mo cag lo ma dag gis g.yogs te tshang tshing dang nags ma dag gi nang nas byung ste brim par brtsams pa dang /_'di dag gis tho btsams te 'di ltar brjod par bya ba mang du yod do/_/de ni mjal gyis 'di dag ni gnas ngan len kun du spyod 
[\[237b.5\]]pa yin gyis 'di dag la zas mi sbyin no/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/de nas de dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag kye ma khyed kyis lam 'di 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bka' stsal na bdag cag bag bgyid cing 
[\[237b.6\]]mchi'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong nags nyul ba bsko bar bya ste/_dge slong nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi 
[\[237b.7\]]bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang gti mug gis 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas 'gro ba dang /_nags byul ba dang ma byul ba mi shes pa'o/_/nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni ma bskos pa yang 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bsko bar bya la/_bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya ste/_lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang /_zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /_gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang /_nags byul ba dang ma byul ba shes pa'o/_/'di ltar bsko 
[\[238a.2\]]bar bya ste/_gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa na je dang por spro bar bya ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro'am/_
[\[238a.3\]]gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/_/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod 
[\[238a.4\]]na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar bsko ste/_dge slong nags nyul ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul lo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 
[\[238a.5\]]'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na/_de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos te ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi nags nyul na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang dag 
[\[238a.6\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos lags so/_/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di 
[\[238a.7\]]dge 'dun gyi nags nyul te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/ngas dge slong nags nyul ba'i kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong nags nyul bas dpag tshad phyed nas bzung ste kho ra khor yug tu nags byul bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'das kyis dge slong nags nyul bas dpag tshad phyed nas bzung ste kho ra khor yug tu nags byul bar bya'o/_/zhes bka' stsal nas de lam gyis dub cing gcig pu 'jigs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de gal te 'dod na khye'u sus sbyin par bya 
[\[238b.2\]]zhing grogs kyang sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te nags 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na des dud brda gtul bar bya'o/_/ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya'o/_/'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam kar gzhag par bya'o/_/gal te nags 'jigs pa med pa nyid yin na ba dan dkar po bsgreng 
[\[238b.3\]]bar bya'o/_/dge slong nags nyul bas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong nags sngar ma byul bar kun dga'i ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs 
[\[238b.4\]]te 'cha' zhing za zhes smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /_gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba 
[\[238b.5\]]mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa/_dge slong dag khyed sngar nags ma byul 
[\[238b.6\]]bar kun dga'i ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' zhing za ba bden nam/_btsun pa mad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/_rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa/_rung ba ma yin pa/_tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu 
[\[238b.7\]]byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dgon pa gang dag dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs 
[\[239a.2\]]pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags par gyur la/_yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dgon pa gang dag dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa tha dad 
[\[239a.3\]]pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa de lta bu dag tu sngar ma byul bar kun dga'i ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' 'am za na dge slong des phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song ste/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas mi 
[\[239a.4\]]rigs pa so sor bshags par bya ba byung gis/_chos de so sor 'chags so zhes so sor bshags par bya ste chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya ba'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o/_/gnas mal dgon pa gang dag ces 
[\[239a.5\]]bya ba la dgon pa zhes bya ba ni rdul phra rab drug la rdul phra mo gcig go rdul phra mo drug la chu rdul gcig go/_/chu rdul drug la lcags rdul gcig go/_/lcags rdul drug la ri bong gi rdul gcig go/_/ri bong gi rdul drug la lug rdul gcig go/_/lug rdul drug la 
[\[239a.6\]]glang rdul gcig go/_/glang rdul drug la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go/_/nyi zer gyi rdul drug la sro ma gcig go/_/sro ma drug la shig gcig go/_/shig drug la nas gcig go/_/nas drug la sor gcig go/_/sor bzhi drug la khru gang ngo /_/khru phyed dang bzhi la 
[\[239a.7\]]mi'i srid do/_/khru bzhi la gzhu'o/_/gzhu lnga brgya la rgyang grags gcig ste/_grong nas rgyang grags gcig ni dgon pa ste/_de na gtsug lag khang gang yod pa de ni gnas mal dgon pa yin no/_/dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dang g.yon can 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang /_stag dang gung gis 'jigs par grags pa'o/_/'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags par gyur la zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rlung 
[\[239b.2\]]dang nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags par gyur la'o/_/yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dgon pa gang dag dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa 
[\[239b.3\]]dang bcas par grags pa/_'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa de lta bu dag tu zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa lta bu dag tu'o/_/sngar ma byul bar zhes bya ba ni nags nyul bas sngar ma byul bar ro/_/kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag 
[\[239b.4\]]khang gi phyi rol du'o/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'o/_/blangs te zhes bya ba ni byin len stobs su bcug ste'o/_/'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o/_/dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so/_/phyi rol kun dga' ra bar 
[\[239b.5\]]song ste zhes bya ba ni grong gi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du song ste'o/_/dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams la'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba ni smad par bya ba'o/_/mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'o/_/so sor 
[\[239b.6\]]bshags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o/_/byung gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba byung gis so/_/chos de zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa de'o/_/so sor 'chags so zhes bya ba ni mthol lo zhes pa'o/_/so sor bshags par bya ste zhes bya ba ni mthol 
[\[239b.7\]]bar bya ste'o/_/chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos 'di yang mthol bar bya ba ste des na so sor bshags par bya ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_dge slong gis nags ma byul ba la ma byul bar 'du shes pas kun dga' ra 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' 'am za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/nags ma byul ba la yid gnyis za bas kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' 'am za na so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[240a.2\]]dge slong gis nags byul ba la ma byul bar 'du shes pas kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro/_/nags byul ba la yid gnyis za bas kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang bza' ba blangs te 'cha' 'am za na nyes byas 
[\[240a.3\]]su 'gyur ro/_/nags nyul ba shi 'am bros na ltung ba med do/_/las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /_sems 'khrugs pa dang tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do/_/nags brtag pa las gyur pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste bzhi pa rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]/_/so sor bshags par bya 
[\[240a.4\]]ba rnams rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_spyi sdom la/_sham thabs zlum dang chos gos zlum/_/mgo mi g.yog dang mi mchod dang /_/mig mi bsgyur dang ma bsgo dang /_/legs blang legs bza' tsug tsug dang /_/
[\[240a.5\]]'bru nas tha dad lag mi bldag_/'phya dang lhung bzed 'dug pa dang /_/mgo g.yogs do ker glang chen zhon/_/khar ba dang ni 'greng ba dang /_/shing la 'dzeg par mi bya ba/_/bslab pa brgya po bsdus pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 
[\[240a.6\]]nags na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga pa dag skyon med pa la 'jug pas dge slong nyid la bkod pa de'i tshe na de dag sngon goms pa'i sbyor bas sham thabs khyim pa bzhin du gyon par byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas 
[\[240a.7\]]smras pa/_'phags pa dag ji ltar khyed sham thabs gsol ba 'di ltar nor can dag dang tshong dpon dag dang /_ded dpon dag 'tshal bar bgyid do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]khyim pa dag zer ba bden gyis ngas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos dag sham thabs ji ltar gyon par gyur pa bsam mo snyam du dgongs pa dang /_lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di lta ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris 
[\[240b.2\]]kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid la yang 'di lta ste/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams lta bur mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[240b.3\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong lnga pa dag gis sham thabs zlum por bgo bar brtsams so/_/de bzhin du nye lnga dag 
[\[240b.4\]]dang mngon par mtho ba lnga bcu dang /_bzang sde'i tshogs drug bcu dang /_gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis brgyud pas dge slong dag gis rab tu phyung ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis kyang sham thabs zlum por bgo bar brtsams so/_/gang gi tshe drug sde dag rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe na de dag gis sham 
[\[240b.5\]]thabs ha cang rtsengs par bgo bar brtsams pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang nal gyi bu dag sham thabs 'di ltar 'chol bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis sham thabs 
[\[240b.6\]]ha cang rtsengs par ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs 
[\[240b.7\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]sham thabs ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_drug sde dag gis ha cang 'jol bar bgo bar brtsams pa dang /_
[\[241a.2\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis mthong nas smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag tag ka'i yul na gnas pa'i bud med dag dang rigs kyi mna' ma dag sham thabs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis/_sham thabs ha cang 
[\[241a.3\]]'jol bar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas 
[\[241a.4\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[241a.5\]]bya ste/_sham thabs ha cang 'jol ba ma yin par bgo bar bya'o/_/drug sde dag sham thabs gyon pa na mdun 'phyang bar byed nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang chang gis ra ro ba dag dang /_'byung 
[\[241a.6\]]po dang sha zas brlams pa dag sham thabs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis sham thabs 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por 
[\[241a.7\]]khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sham thabs glang po che'i sna ltar ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag sham thabs gyon pa na glo dag tu lteb par byed nas/_
[\[241b.2\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag gar mkhan dag tshogs kyi nang du sham thabs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis sham thabs 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di 
[\[241b.3\]]la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[241b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sham thabs ta la'i lo ma ltar bltab pa ma yin par bgo bar 
[\[241b.5\]]bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag sham thabs gyon pa na glor bltab ste phur ma ltar 'jog par byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag nor can dag dang tshong dpon dag dang ded dpon dag dang /_bud med dag sham thabs 
[\[241b.6\]]'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis sham thabs 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba 
[\[241b.7\]]dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sham thabs 'bru'i phur ma ltar ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag sham thabs gyon pa na lte ba'i 'og tu sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar byed nas/_bram 
[\[242a.2\]]ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag rgyan po bgyid pa dag sham thabs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis sham thabs 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/
[\[242a.3\]]'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod par zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[242a.4\]]khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sham thabs sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo 
[\[242a.5\]]ni sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya/_sham thabs ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa dang /_glang po che'i sna ltar ma yin pa dang /_ta la'i lo ma ltar bltab pa ma yin pa dang /_'bru'i phur ma ltar ma yin pa dang /_sbrul 
[\[242a.6\]]mgo'i gdengs ka ltar ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya/_sham thabs ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa dang /_glang po che'i sna ltar ma yin pa 
[\[242a.7\]]dang /_ta la'i lo ma ltar bltab pa ma yin pa dang /_'bru'i phur ma ltar ma yin pa dang /_sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong dag chos gos gyon pa na ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis chos gos zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_drug sde dag chos gos ha cang rtsengs par gyon par byed nas/_bram ze 
[\[242b.2\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag stod g.yogs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis chos gos 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[242b.3\]]'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[242b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_chos gos ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[242b.5\]]'das kyis chos gos ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_drug sde dag ha cang 'jol bar gyon par byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag ta ga ka'i yul na gnas pa'i mi dag dang /_rigs 
[\[242b.6\]]kyi mna' ma dag stod g.yogs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis chos gos 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi 
[\[242b.7\]]shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_chos gos ha cang 'jol ba ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa dang rkang pa rkyong bar byed cing khyim gzhan du 'dong nas bram ze dang /_
[\[243a.2\]]khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_chang gis ra ro ba dag dang 'byung po dang sha zas brlams pa dag lag pa dang rkang pa 'di ltar rkyong bar bgyid cing mchi bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig 
[\[243a.3\]]de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[243a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste shin tu bsdams shing khyim 
[\[243a.5\]]gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag chos gos bsdus shing phrag pa la gzar te khyim gzhan du 'gro bar byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag gyad 'gyed sar mchi ba dag stod g.yogs 'di ltar 'tshal bas 
[\[243a.6\]]'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis chos gos 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya 
[\[243a.7\]]cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_legs par bgos shing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag byung rgyal smra bas sgra 'byin cing khyim gzhan du 'dong nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag 
[\[243b.2\]]dang /_chang gis ra ro ba dag dang /_'byung po dang /_sha zas brlams pa dag 'di ltar byung rgyal smra bas sgra 'byin cing mchi bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis/_'di ltar sgra 'byin cing ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos 
[\[243b.3\]]pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[243b.4\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_sgra bskyung zhing tshig nyung ngus khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug 
[\[243b.5\]]sde dag mig yengs shing khyim gzhan du 'gro ba na de dag glang po che 'khrul pa dang lhan cig 'dom pa dang /_rta 'khrul pa dang /_shing rta 'khrul pa dang /_rkang tang 'khrul pa dang 'dom zhing de dag gis brngos shing phul ba na mi gtsang ba dang /_rdzab kyi khung dang /_phyag dar gyi 
[\[243b.6\]]khrod du sgyel nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag skar ma la rtog pa dag dang /_mig btsums pa dag bzhin ci'i phyir gzigs/_sa la gzigs na ci nongs/_'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis/_'di ltar 
[\[243b.7\]]yengs shing ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[244a.2\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_mig g.yeng bar mi bya zhing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mig rgyang ring por lta zhing khyim gzhan du 'dong ba na/_de dag spyod lam nyams shing lam shor ba la sogs par gyur nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad 
[\[244a.3\]]pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag skar ma la rtog pa dag dang /_bya ra ba dag 'di ltar lta bar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar gzigs shing ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags 
[\[244a.4\]]pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim 
[\[244a.5\]]pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gnya' shing gang tsam du blta zhing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni/_chos 
[\[244a.6\]]gos zlum por bgo bar bslab par bya/_chos gos ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin pa dang /_ha cang 'jol ba ma yin par bgo bar bslab par bya'o/_/shin tu bsdams pa dang /_legs par bgos pa dang /_sgra bskyung ba dang /_mig g.yeng bar mi bya ba dang /_gnya' shing gang 
[\[244a.7\]]tsam du blta zhing khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mgo g.yogs shing khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag rigs kyi mna' ma dag dang /_mig na ba dag dang /_sbrang rtsi'i sbrang 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]bus 'jigs pa dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma g.yogs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba 
[\[244b.2\]]dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na 
[\[244b.3\]]nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mgo mi g.yog par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag sham thabs brdzes te khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed 
[\[244b.4\]]de/_'phags pa dag bshang ba dang gci ba bgyid pa'i mi dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma brdze shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag 
[\[244b.5\]]nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de 
[\[244b.6\]]lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi brdze bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag chos gos phrag pa la gzar te khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par 
[\[244b.7\]]byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gzar cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no 
[\[245a.2\]]snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi gzar bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa gnya' gong du bsnol te khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze 
[\[245a.3\]]dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar gnya' gong du ma bsnol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos 
[\[245a.4\]]pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[245a.5\]]kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gnya' gong du mi bsnol bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa ltag 
[\[245a.6\]]par bsnol te khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag g.yog dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ltag par ma bsnol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[245a.7\]]'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_ltag par mi bsnol bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i 
[\[245b.2\]]mdo ni mgo mi g.yog pa dang /_mi brdze ba dang /_mi gzar ba dang /_gnya' gong du mi bsnol ba dang /_ltag par mi bsnol bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rib ma la mchong zhing khyim gzhan du 'dong nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can 
[\[245b.3\]]dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag 'jigs pas skrag cing 'bros pa dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma mchong shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je 
[\[245b.4\]]dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' 
[\[245b.5\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi mchong bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag gom pa ha cang chen po dag gis khyim gzhan du 'dong nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod 
[\[245b.6\]]par byed de/_'phags pa dag chang gis ra ro ba dag dang /_'byung po dang /_sha zas brlams pa dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos 
[\[245b.7\]]pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi brkyang bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag tsog pus khyim gzhan du 'dong nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[246a.2\]]dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag 'gros nyams pa dag dang /_rkang bam can dag dang /_byis pa khye'u dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma mdzad cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/
[\[246a.3\]]'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag 
[\[246a.4\]]zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_tsog pus ma yin par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rkang pa'i brang ba dag gis khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas bram ze 
[\[246a.5\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u smig ma bzhin du rtse ba dag dang /_rkang mthil smas pa dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la 
[\[246a.6\]]dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[246a.7\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_brang bas ma yin par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]gnyis dkur brten te khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag nor can dag dang /_tshong dpon dag dang ded dpon dag 'di ltar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud 
[\[246b.2\]]cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[246b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dkur mi brten par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar 
[\[246b.4\]]bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni mi mchong ba dang /_mi brkyang ba dang /_tsog pus ma yin pa dang /_brang bas ma yin pa dang /_dkur mi brten par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lus bsgyur zhing khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_
[\[246b.5\]]khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag gzugs 'tshong ma dag dang /_glang po che dag dang /_bal glang mo dag 'di ltar mchi bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag de la dgos pa yod do/_/
[\[246b.6\]]'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa 
[\[246b.7\]]dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lus mi bsgyur bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa dkyog cing khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram ze 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar mchi bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa 
[\[247a.2\]]yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[247a.3\]]khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lag pa mi dkyog par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mgo sgyur zhing khyim gzhan du 'dong bar byed nas/_bram 
[\[247a.4\]]ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag glang po che dag dang /_srog chags rtsangs pa dag 'di ltar mchi bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhud cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags 
[\[247a.5\]]pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden
