[\[247a.6\]]no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mgo mi bsgyur bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag phrag pa sprad cing khyim gzhan du 'dong ba na/_ji tsam na mi zhig spos dang me tog 
[\[247a.7\]]gis brgyan te/_'jig rten la bu tsam du sems shing 'gro nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bkren pa 'di 'jig rten la bu tsam du sems shing 'gro na/_ci 'di'i snying lam na drug sde dag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang dri dang me tog thogs ma myong snyam pa 'dras 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]tshur sheg 'di mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes de na de dag gcig dang gcig phrag pa sprad cing gzhan dang gzhan yang phrag pa sprad de/_de phul ba dang sa la 'gyel nas des smras pa/_bdag gis khyed cag la nongs pa ci bgyis/_bkren pa khyod kyi snying lam na drug sde dag 
[\[247b.2\]]gis sngon lan 'ga' yang spos dang me tog thogs ma myong snyam pas khyod de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim 
[\[247b.3\]]bdag de gnas su smod par byed do snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_phrag pa mi sprad par khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag lag pa sbrel cing khyim gzhan du 'dong ba na/_ji tsam 
[\[247b.4\]]na mi zhig spos dang me tog gis brgyan te/_'jig rten la bu tsam du sems shing 'gro nas/_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bkren pa 'di 'jig rten la bu tsam du sems shing 'gro na/_ci 'di'i snying lam na drug sde dag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang dri dang me tog thogs 
[\[247b.5\]]ma myong snyam pa 'dras/_tshur sheg 'di mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes de na de dag gcig dang gcig lag pa sbrel cing gzhan dang gzhan yang lag pa sbrel te phul ba dang sa la 'gyel nas/_des smras pa/_bdag gis khyed cag la nongs pa ci bgyis/_bkren pa khyod kyi 
[\[247b.6\]]snying lam na drug sde dag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang spos dang me tog thogs ma myong snyam pas khyod de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/_/des smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[247b.7\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim bdag de gnas su smod par byed do snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lag pa mi sbrel bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]mdo ni lus mi bsgyur ba dang /_lag pa mi dkyog pa dang /_mgo mi bsgyur ba dang /_phrag pa mi sprad pa dang /_lag pa mi sbrel bar khyim gzhan du 'gro bar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[248a.2\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na bram ze gtsang sbra 'dod pa zhig 'dug pa des sgo khang du mal bshams nas/_de na bu mo zhig bsil yab thogs te sbrang ma skyob cing 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' de'i khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas des smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[248a.3\]]bram ze'i gan du song la nye dga' sgo na sdod do zhes gyis shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag 'di na sbrang ma skyob cing mchis pas mi mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu mo gal te de lta na kho bos re zhig bsrung gis khyod song la smros shig_/de song ba dang nye dga' rkang pa dang bcas par 
[\[248a.4\]]'dzegs te/_mal de'i steng du 'dug go/_/bram ze de phyir byung ba dang nye dga' rkang pa dang bcas pa'i mal gyi steng du 'dzegs te 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_'jig rten gyi gtsang sbra ni tha dad pa yin na/_ci'i phyir khyod 'dir rkang pa dang bcas par 'dzegs te 'dug 
[\[248a.5\]]des smras pa/_bram ze dge slong gis mal la longs spyad pa gang yin pa ni khyod kyi khyim bdun pa tshun chad la phan btags pa yin no/_/de smod par byed phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar byed pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[248a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bram ze de gnas su smod do snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_ma bsgo bar khyim gzhan du stan la mi 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char 
[\[248a.7\]]kas gtum mo btul ba de'i tshe na des drang srong gi stan bshams nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas longs spyad cing spyad cing 'gro'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na des gtum mo la smras pa/_sring mo khyod bltas kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa myur du slar spyon 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]cig_/sdod skyo ba skyed par ma mdzad cig_/des smras pa/_sring mo ma nyes kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/des de bltas te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la bcom 
[\[248b.2\]]ldan 'das nyi ma bdun pa la ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces sgo shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[248b.3\]]mnyan nas/_dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das nyi ma bdun pa la ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis/_khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams 
[\[248b.4\]]pa/_sangs rgyas ljongs rgyur gshegs pa la phan yon [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid dang thabs cig 'gro'o snyam nas de ma 'phags so/_/de'i tshe na gtum mo'i khyim na khye'u btsas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig yod nas/_des bu mo de la smras pa/_bu mo khye'u 'di drang srong 
[\[248b.5\]]gi gdan la snyol cig dang yun ring du 'tsho zhing tshe ring du skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/des de gos dkar po bskon te bsnyal ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas des bsams pa/_je gtum mo'i khyim du stan la longs spyod du 'gro zhing phyis bsod snyoms 
[\[248b.6\]]brgyus te 'gro'o snyam nas de der song ngo /_/dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas/_de stan de nyid la gya tshom du 'dug pa dang /_nang mi brtad pa dang bcas pas 'phags pa khye'u khye'u zhes smras pa dang /_de myur ba myur bar langs nas ji tsam nas de 
[\[248b.7\]]dag gis dus la bab par mthong nas/_de dag ngu bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_sring mo dag 'di la ci ngu /_'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid 'di lta bu yin no/_/'on kyang kho bo la brten te bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bar 'gyur bas 'di la kho bos mdud par bya ba yin no/_/'khor ba na sems can rnams nye du la byams pa ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa yin pas de dag de bzhin du ngu zhing mi sdod pa thos nas dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[249a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_stan la ma brtags par khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par byung nas lo bcu gnyis 
[\[249a.3\]]lon zhing /_rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo drug lon nas ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i tshe na nyi ma gcig ni yab kyi gan du gdugs tshod gsol/_nyi ma gnyis pa la ni rang gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol ba na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas btsun mo grags 'dzin bshos 
[\[249a.4\]]'brim pa la rkang pas rkang pa la phul ba dang /_de stobs dang ldan pas ma 'gyel nas/_des btsun mo sa 'tsho ma la smras pa sa 'tsho ma/_'phags pa 'char kas bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar tho btsams so/_/ci byas des ji ltar gyur pa brjod 
[\[249a.5\]]pa dang /_des smras pa/_de ci nas kyang phyin cad de ltar byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/_/ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la btsun mo grags 'dzin gyis khri'u ma brgyus pa zhig ras kyis g.yogs nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/_bu mo song la re zhig rgyal po'i 
[\[249a.6\]]pho brang gi sgor sdod la/_gang gi tshe 'phags pa 'char ka 'ong ba de'i tshe na khyod kyis 'di skad ces bram ze bram ze zhes brjod par bya'o/_/gal te bram zes ci bya zhes zer na de la btsun mo'i 'khor du 'bod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/bu mo de byung ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 
[\[249a.7\]]yang 'ongs nas/_der bram ze bram ze zhes bod par brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo bram zes ci bya/_'phags pa btsun mo'i 'khor du 'bod do/_/des bsams pa/_der gor ma chag par sbyin par byed kyis 'gro'o snyam nas de myur bar myur bar song ba dang /_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]btsun mo grags 'dzin gyis bu mo la smras pa/_bu mo kho mos khyod la bram ze bos shig ces bsgo na khyod kyis ci'i phyir dge sbyong mgo reg bos des cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/_gal te kho bo khyod kyi khyim thab kyi gan du rab tu byung zhes te kho bo'i 
[\[249b.2\]]bram ze yang nyams snyam mam ci/_gal te bram ze na ni oM b+hur b+hu ba swA zhes zer la/_'on te rab tu byung na ni/_/sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya/_/rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/zhes zer ro/_/des 
[\[249b.3\]]smras pa/_khyod bram ze yang rung /_dge sbyong yang rung ste/_kho mos ni bcom ldan 'das dka' ba spyod pa na/_gal te bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su gshegs na de'i phyir bdag gis bram ze la 'di dang 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes gsol ba byas so/_/des smras pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[249b.4\]]'das kyis srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral bar mdzad na khyod ni lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral bar ma mdzad do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bud med kyi yul ni dbral dka' ba lags pas ji ltar bgyi/_des smras pa/_de ni mjal gyis/_je slong mo pa dag 
[\[249b.5\]]la ji zhig sbyin pa de blta'o/_/'phags pa zho'i kham phor 'di dang phye'i kham phor 'di 'greng ste long la khri'u 'di la bzhugs shig_/ci khri'u 'di yang kho bo la sbyin nam/_'phags pa khri'u ni mi gsol lo/_/des bsams pa/_gal te khri'u mi ster na khri'u 'di bcag par bya'o 
[\[249b.6\]]snyam du rig nas/_de khri'u de nyid la lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang /_sgyel nas zho'i kham phor dang phye'i kham phor de de'i mgor bo ba dang /_de dag gis rta gad kyis btab ste/_lag pa dang rkang pa dag nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing du 
[\[249b.7\]]'phangs so/_/de langs te gos dag 'tshir ba dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di ci nyes/_des smras pa/_kho bos ku re cung zhig byas na nyes dmigs 'di lta bu 'di byung ngo /_/de dag smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed/_kha zer bar 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]byed pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_de dag gnas su smod do snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[250a.2\]]bya ste/_lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi dbab par khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du rkang pa bsnol te 'dug par byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag 
[\[250a.3\]]dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar mchis pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis/_'di ltar ma bzhugs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba 
[\[250a.4\]]dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan 
[\[250a.5\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_rkang pa mi bsnol bar khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du brla bsnol te 'dug par byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par 
[\[250a.6\]]byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar mchis pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhugs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang 
[\[250a.7\]]lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_brla mi bsnol bar khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag long bu'i steng du long bu bzhag ste khyim gzhan du 'dug 
[\[250b.2\]]par byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar mchis par bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhugs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan 
[\[250b.3\]]dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[250b.4\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_long bu'i steng du long bu mi gzhag par khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rkang pa bkug 
[\[250b.5\]]ste khyim gzhan du 'dug par byed nas/_dge bsnyen ma dag lhags te phyag 'tshal ba na de dag a rog gya mi zer nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du a rog gya mi gsung /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis kho bo cag gi rkang pa la phyag ma byas so/_/de dag de dag 
[\[250b.6\]]gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba na rkub tsos 'jal bar byed cing /_dga' bo nye dga' 'di dag gi rkub tsos che khyad la ltos zhes smras pa dang /_de dag ngo tsha nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[250b.7\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_rkang pa mi dgug par khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rkang pa gdangs te khyim gzhan du 'dug par byed nas/_dge bsnyen ma dag lhags 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]te phyag 'tshal ba na de dag a rog gya lhag ma dang bcas par zer nas/_de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du a rog gya lhag ma dang bcas par gsungs/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyed cag gis kho bo cag gi rkang pa la phyag ma byas so/_/de dag de dag 
[\[251a.2\]]gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba na rkub tsos 'jal bar byed cing dga' bo nye dga' 'di dag gi rkub tsos che khyad la ltos zhes smras pa dang /_de dag ngo tsha nas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[251a.3\]]pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_rkang pa mi gdang bar khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mdoms snang bar stan la 'khod cing sgren mor snang nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can 
[\[251a.4\]]dag smod par byed de 'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_chang gis ra ro ba dag dang /_'byung po dang /_sha zas brlams pa dag 'di ltar mchis pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma bzhugs shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa 
[\[251a.5\]]yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[251a.6\]]dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mdoms mi snang bar khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni ma bsgo 
[\[251a.7\]]bar khyim gzhan du stan la mi 'dug par bslab par bya/_stan la ma brtags pa dang /_lus thams cad kyi ljid kyis mi dbab pa dang /_rkang pa mi bsnol ba dang /_brla mi bsnol ba dang /_long bu'i steng du long bu mi gzhag pa dang /_rkang pa mi dgug pa dang /_rkang pa mi gdang 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ba dang /_mdoms mi snang bar khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig 
[\[251b.2\]]gis bris pa der dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te bshos gsol ba na/_rgyal bu rtogs ldan ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin la/_'khor ni ma dad pas 'brim mkhan rnams kyis la du dag gis dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed dag gcog par byed nas/_drug sde dag gis gros 
[\[251b.3\]]byas pa/_'di dag mi dga' bar bya'o zhes de dag 'bras chan dang /_tshod ma 'brim pa na drug sde dag gis lhung bzed phyir bkyed pa dang /_de dag sa la bo nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris 
[\[251b.4\]]pa'i sa gzhi khyed kyis ma rung bar byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag khyed cag sa gzhi ma rung ba na mi dga' bar byed na/_dge slong gang dag gi lhung bzed dag chag pa de dag ji ltar byed ces zer ba thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[251b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_legs par zas blang bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_
[\[251b.6\]]de dag dang por 'bras chan ji tsam gyis lhung bzed gang ba de tsam len par byed pa na/_bsod snyoms 'bul ba dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag skyu rum gang du stsal/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di nyid du lugs shig_/de dag gis der blugs pa dang /_de steng du lud de sa 
[\[251b.7\]]la bo nas de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa'i sa gzhi khyed kyis ma rung bar byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag re zhig rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyis 'di la lhag par chags 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]par byas nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba ni ma shes kyi/_khyed cag ni 'di la lhag par chags par byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[252a.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mu dang kha da chad du ma yin par zas blang bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khyim du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/_de dag dang por 
[\[252a.3\]]tshod ma ji tsam gyis lhung bzed gang ba de tsam len par byed pa na bsod snyoms 'bul ba dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'bras chan gang du stsal de dag gis smras pa/_'di nyid du lugs shig_/de dag gis der blugs pa dang /_de'i steng du lud de bo nas de dag gis smras 
[\[252a.4\]]pa/_'phags pa dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa'i sa gzhi khyed kyis ma rung bar byas so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bkren pa dag re zhig rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyis 'di la lhag par chags par byas nas gang du skye bar 
[\[252a.5\]]'gyur ba ni ma shes kyi/_khyed cag ni 'di la lhag par chags par byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[252a.6\]]nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_tshod ma dang mnyam pa ma yin par zas blang bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag zan za ba na tshod ma mi len par phyis thag ring du song ba dang 'bod par byed nas/_'brim mkhan dag brel bar 
[\[252a.7\]]gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mthar chags su zas blang bar bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_des zhal zas bsod pa sta gon byas nas/_des dang por zan brim par brtsams pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis mang du blang bar 
[\[252b.2\]]brtsams pa na des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag gis zhal zas bsod pa dag sta gon bgyis kyis mang du ma bzhes shig_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' khyim bdag bkren pa 'di rnam pa 'dis zan yang 'gog par byed kyis mang du blang ngo zhes de dag gis mang 
[\[252b.3\]]du blangs so/_/ji tsam na rgan pa'i mtha' logs su bca' ba bsod pa dag 'brim pa drug sde dag gis mthong nas/_de dag gi 'og na dge slong rgan zhugs shig 'dug pa de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su rnam par lta ba'i tshe drug sde dag gis de'i lhung bzed zan gyi chang bus bkang ngo /_/khyim 
[\[252b.4\]]bdag des bca' ba brims pa na rgan zhugs de la bca' ba byin pa dang /_de lhung bzed kyi gzhir lhung nas/_des khyim bdag gi gdong du lta bar brtsams pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa ci'i slad du khyod kyis zan mang po dag blangs/_khyim bdag bdag gis ma blangs so/_/'o na 
[\[252b.5\]]'di dag ga las mchis/_ma shes so/_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag rgyal po nga las nu la nyi ma bdun du dbyig gi char bab ces grags pas rgan zhugs 'di la yang de dang 'dra bar zan gyi chang bu'i char bab po/_/de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[252b.6\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lhung bzed la blta zhing zas blang bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa 
[\[252b.7\]]na ji srid du bsod snyoms mi sbyin pa de srid du lhung bzed bzed de sdod nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag ci'i slad du bca' ba dang bza' ba ma mchis par lhung bzed bzed de gzhes par mdzad/_'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]kyis 'di ltar ma mdzad cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod 
[\[253a.2\]]pa la zhugs pa thos nas/_skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[253a.3\]]bya ste/_bca' ba dang bza' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed mi bzed par bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_khyim bdag de la 'bras chan mang /_tshod ma ni 
[\[253a.4\]]nyung nas/_drug sde dag gis 'bras chan gyis tshod ma bkab pa dang /_khyim bdag des 'bras chan mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag skyu rum ma mchis sam ci/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag 'dir ltos shig_/des tshod ma gzhan yang byin no/_/dge slong rnams 
[\[253a.5\]]gtsug lag khang du dong ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim bdag des 'bras chan bzang po byas na 'di ltar tshod ma nyung ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis ni tshod ma mang du thob bo/_/ji ltar de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[253a.6\]]smras pa/_khyed cag de ltar byar rung ngam/_rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de/_kho bo cag gis ni de ltar byas so/_/zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis 
[\[253a.7\]]'bras chan gyis tshod ma mi dgab par bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_khyim bdag de la tshod ma ni mang /_'bras chan ni nyung nas/_drug sde dag 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]gis tshod mas 'bras chan bkab pa dang /_khyim bdag des tshod ma mthong nas smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'bras chan ma mchis sam ci/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag 'dir ltos shig_/des 'bras chan gzhan yang byin no/_/dge slong rnams gtsug lag khang du dong ste 
[\[253b.2\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyim bdag des tshod ma bzang po byas na 'di ltar 'bras chan nyung ngo /_/drug sde dag gis smras pa/_kho bo cag gis ni 'bras chan mang du thob bo/_/ji ltar de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed cag de 
[\[253b.3\]]ltar byar rung ngam/_rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de/_kho bo cag gis ni de ltar byas so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis tshod mas 'bras chan mi dgab par 
[\[253b.4\]]bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na des 'bras chan dang tshod ma thob nas/_yang tshod ma dang 'bras chan thob pa dang /_de bdag gis 'bras can gyis tshod ma bkab cing /_tshod mas 'bras can bkab par ma gyur tam snyam du 
[\[253b.5\]]'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di la ni nyes pa med de/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_yang 
[\[253b.6\]]'dod pa'i phyir 'bras chan gyis tshod ma mi dgab/_tshod mas 'bras chan mi dgab par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag bca' ba dang bza' ba'i steng du lhung bzed 'dzin par byed nas/_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag gtsang sbra ni tha dad 
[\[253b.7\]]pa lags na/_ci'i slad du bca' ba dang bza' ba'i steng du lhung bzed 'dzin par mdzad/_'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma mdzad cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa dag dgos 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim 
[\[254a.2\]]pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_bca' ba dang bza' ba'i steng du lhung bzed mi gzung bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni legs par zas blang 
[\[254a.3\]]bar bslab par bya/_mu dang kha da chad du ma yin pa dang /_tshod ma dang mnyam par ma yin pa dang /_mthar chags su dang lhung bzed la blta ba dang /_bca' ba dang bza' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed mi bzed pa dang /_yang 'dod pa'i phyir 'bras chan gyis tshod ma mi dgab tshod 
[\[254a.4\]]mas 'bras chan mi dgab pa dang /_bca' ba dang bza' ba'i steng du lhung bzed mi gzung bar bslab par bya'o//_//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_bam po brgyad bcu rtsa gsum pa ste tha ma/_drug sde dag rnam par 'gyur ba dag gis zas za bar byed nas/_bram ze 
[\[254a.5\]]dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_gzugs 'tshong ma dag 'di ltar 'tshal bar bgyid pas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos 
[\[254a.6\]]pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[254a.7\]]'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_legs par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]kham ha cang chung ngur za bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_rigs kyi mna' ma dag dang /_gzugs 'tshong ma dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di 
[\[254b.2\]]ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge 
[\[254b.3\]]slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_kham ha cang chung ba 
[\[254b.4\]]ma yin par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na kham ha cang chen por za bar byed nas/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag mu lto ba dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma 
[\[254b.5\]]lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs 
[\[254b.6\]]pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[254b.7\]]bya ste/_kham ha cang chen po ma yin par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na kham ran pa ma yin par za na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_mu lto ba dag 'di 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/
[\[255a.2\]]de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par 
[\[255a.3\]]bya ste/_kham ran par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_ji tsam na drug sde dag gi 'og na dge slong rgan zhugs shig 'dug pa de kha gdangs te 
[\[255a.4\]]rgan pa'i mtha' logs su lta bar byed pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]de'i khar bong ba bcug ste/_je 'di zo shig ces smras pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[255a.5\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_kham ma gzas par kha mi gdang bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag kha kham gyis bkang ste smra bar byed pa na skad nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[255a.6\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni legs par zas bza' bar bslab par bya/_kham ha cang chung ba ma yin pa dang /_kham ha 
[\[255a.7\]]cang chen po ma yin pa dang /_kham ran pa dang /_kham ma gzas par kha mi gdang ba dang /_kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra bar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas des tshod ma te por mngar ba dag sta gon byas pa dang /_drug sde dag gis khas sgra phyung ste smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' tshod ma dag te por skyur ro/_/khyim bdag 
[\[255b.2\]]des thos nas de skyengs te cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_tsug tsug mi bya bar 
[\[255b.3\]]zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas des tshod ma te por skyur ba dag sta gon byas pa dang /_drug sde dag gis khas sgra phyung ste smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 
[\[255b.4\]]tshod ma te por mngar ro/_/khyim bdag des thos nas de skyengs te cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar 
[\[255b.5\]]gdon par bya ste/_balcag balcag mi bya bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_khyim bdag de la snod spyad med pas des 'bras chan btsos 
[\[255b.6\]]te sgrom du blugs pa dang /_de tsha nas drug sde dag gis khas sgra phyung ste smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 'bras chan 'di te por grang gis kha'i dbugs kyis bsros te bza'o/_/khyim bdag des thos nas de skyengs te cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[255b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_hu hu mi bya bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/_des 'bras chan btsos te re lder bdal ba dang de grangs par gyur nas/_drug sde dag gis khas sgra phyung ste smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' 'bras chan 'di te por 
[\[256a.2\]]tsha bas kha'i dbugs kyis bsgrang ste bza'o/_/khyim bdag des thos nas de skyengs te cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul 
[\[256a.3\]]ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_phu phu mi bya bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na lce phyung ste lta zhing mchu gnyis la ldag par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir lce phyung ste lta/_
[\[256a.4\]]de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ma bzas par mid na mi rung bas de blta'o/_/de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba 
[\[256a.5\]]la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lce phyung ste zas mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni tsug tsug mi bya ba dang /_balcag balcag mi bya ba dang /_hu hu mi bya ba dang /_phu phu mi bya ba dang /_lce phyung ste zas mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug 
[\[256a.6\]]sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na 'bras chan 'bru re re nas thu zhing za nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_dwa dag dang /_rgyan po pa dag dang /_nal gyi bu dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun 
[\[256a.7\]]pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_
[\[256b.2\]]'bru nas tha dad du mi bya bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na dga' bo nye dga' tshod ma 'di dag ha cang kha'o/_/ha cang skyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[256b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'phyas mi gdags par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na mkhur ba nas mkhur bar kham spo zhing za bar byed nas/_
[\[256b.4\]]bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_mu lto ba dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa 
[\[256b.5\]]dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang /_bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa 
[\[256b.6\]]dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mkhur ba mi spo bar zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na rkan sgra gtog par byed nas bram ze 
[\[256b.7\]]dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_mu lto ba dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[257a.2\]]khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_rkan mi gtogs par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na kham blangs nas phyed khar 'dzud 
[\[257a.3\]]cing phyed lhung bzed du lhung bar byed nas bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /_gzugs 'tshong ma dag 'di ltar 'tshal bas 'di ni tshul dang mthun pa ma lags kyis 'di ltar ma gsol cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[257a.4\]]shes ldan dag 'di la dgos pa yod do/_/'phags pa dag dgos pa gang lags/_je dang por khyed cag nyid mi shes pa dang bral ba dang bslabs par gyur pa'o/_/de dag rgya cher smod pa la zhugs pa thos nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[257a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_khyim pa dag zer ba bden no snyam nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_kham 'phror mi bcad par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni 'bru 
[\[257a.6\]]nas tha dad du mi bya ba dang /_'phyas mi gdags pa dang /_mkhur ba mi spo ba dang /_rkan mi gtog pa dang /_kham 'phror mi bcad par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na lag pa ldag par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[257a.7\]]ldan pa dag ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag snying po gang yin pa de 'di la chags so/_/de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lag pa mi bldag par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na lhung bzed byog par byed nas dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa 
[\[257b.2\]]'di lta bu byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag snying po gang yin pa dag 'di la chags so/_/de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 
[\[257b.3\]]'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lhung bzed mi byog par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na lag pa sprug par byed pas dge slong rnams la lag pa'i chus phog nas de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[257b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lag pa mi sprug par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na de dag 
[\[257b.5\]]gi 'og na dge slong snam sbyar dmar ser can zhig 'dug nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bkren pa 'di'i snying lam na yu bu cag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang snam sbyar 'di lta bu gyon ma myong snyam gyis 'di mi dga' bar bya'o zhes de dag gis lhung bzed bskyoms 
[\[257b.6\]]pa dang /_dge slong de'i snam sbyar lhung bzed kyi chus ma rung bar gyur nas/_de smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[257b.7\]]'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lhung bzed mi bskyams par zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de gcer bu pa dag la mngon par dad do/_/de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur nas des dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas der phye dag brims pa dang /_drug sde dag gis de dag sbrus te mchod rten 'dra ba rnam par bzhag go/_/la phug gi phyed tshal dag brims pa dang /_de yang de nyid la btsugs te srog shing 'dra bar rnam par bzhag go/_/khur 
[\[258a.2\]]ba dag brims pa dang /_de yang la phug de nyid kyi steng du gdugs 'dra bar rnam par bzhag go/_/de nas smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' mchod rten 'di ni ngan 'gro rdzogs par byed pa rdzogs byed kyi yin no zhes zer ro/_/yang bcom ste za zhing smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' ngan 'gro rdzogs 
[\[258a.3\]]par byed pa rdzogs byed kyi mchod rten rdib bo zhes zer ro/_/khyim bdag des thos nas des smras pa/_'phags pa dag bdag ni sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de dang bral lags na khyed cag da rung yang zhe sdang dang ma bral lo/_/de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[258a.4\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mchod rten 'dra ba bcom ste zas mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni 
[\[258a.5\]]lag pa mi bldag pa dang /_lhung bzed mi byog pa dang /_lag pa mi sprug pa dang /_lhung bzed mi bskyams pa dang /_mchod rten 'dra ba bcom ste zas mi bza' bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na de dag gi drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong mang du za ba dang /_
[\[258a.6\]]drug sde dag 'phyas 'dogs shing dga' bo nye dga' rgan zhugs 'di mang po 'di snyed za ba la ltos shig zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab 
[\[258a.7\]]pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zas za ba na lag pa zas dang 'phags pas chu snod la 'dzin par byed nas/_ma dad pa dag shAkya'i bu'i 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]dge sbyong dag ni lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la 'dzin pas gtsang sbra med pa yin no zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[258b.2\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi gzung bar bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag khyim gzhan du zan za ba na de dag gi 'og na dge slong snam sbyar dmar ser can zhig 'dug nas drug sde dag gis smras pa/_dga' bo nye dga' bkren pa 'di'i 
[\[258b.3\]]snying lam na yu bu cag gis sngon lan 'ga' yang snam sbyar 'di lta bu gyon ma myong snyam gyis 'di mi dga' bar bya'o zhes de dag gis zas dang 'bags pa'i chus gtor ba dang /_dge slong de'i snam sbyar zas dang 'bags pa'i chus ma rung bar gyur nas/_de smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs 
[\[258b.4\]]de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chus mi gtor bar bslab 
[\[258b.5\]]par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri 'jigs rung gi nags [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa der dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te bshos gsol pa na/_drug sde dag 
[\[258b.6\]]gis lhung bzed kyi chu de nyid du pho ba dang /_'brim mkhan dag 'phags pa dag rgyal bu rtogs ldan gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa'i sa gzhi khyed kyis ma rung bar byas so/_/zhes smod par byed pa dang /_drug sde dag gis smras pa/_rgyal bu rtogs ldan 
[\[258b.7\]]gyis re zhig 'di la chags par byas nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba ni ma shes kyi/_khyed cag ni 'di la chags par byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_chu zas dang 'bags pa khyim gzhan du mi dbo bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis khyim rtsig tu bcug nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te bshos gsol ba na/_dge slong rnams chu 
[\[259a.2\]]zas dang 'bags pa khyim gyi phyi rol du 'bo bar byed nas khyim bdag des smras pa/_'phags pa dag 'di nyid du pho zhig dang bdag gi khyim gyis spyad par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[259a.3\]]pa/_gal te khyim pa na re pho zhig ces zer na dbo bar bya'o/_/gzhan du na dbo bar mi bya'o/_/de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par chu zas dang 'bags pa khyim gzhan du mi dbo bar bslab 
[\[259a.4\]]par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta bar bslab par bya/_lag pa zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi gzung bar bslab par bya/_drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chus mi gtor 
[\[259a.5\]]bar bslab par bya/_khyim pa 'dug pa la ma dris par chu zas dang 'bags pa khyim gzhan du mi dbo bar bslab par bya'o/_/mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i bu na bar gyur nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]kho bo'i bu na bas sman ston cig_/sman pa de dad pa 
[\[259a.6\]]can zhig yin pa des smras pa/_bram ze 'phags pa rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi chus khrus gyis shig_/de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /_drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag 
[\[259a.7\]]cing 'dug nas/_bram ze des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gi bu bro 'tshal te/_de la 'phags pa dag gi lhung bzed kyi chab cig 'tshal na stsal du gsol/_des smras pa/_bram ze 'di nyid du re zhig sdod cig dang lhung bzed kyi chu khyer te 'ong ngo /_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]des gtsug lag khang du song ste lhung bzed du phye nyung shas shig dang /_'bras chan nyung shas shig dang /_khur ba nyung shas shig dang /_sha nyung shas shig dang /_rus pa nyung shas shig blugs te chus blugs nas phyir byung ste/_smras pa/_bram ze long zhig bram ze des mthong nas smras 
[\[259b.2\]]pa/_'phags pa khyed kyi lhung bzed kyi chab 'di lta bu'am/_bram ze 'di lta bu'o/_/'phags pa bdag gi bu gum pa ni legs kyi/_'di lta bu'i mi gtsang bas bkru ba ni mi rung ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[259b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi dor bar bslab par bya'o/_/'di ltar gang lhung bzed kyi chu slong ba de la lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus te/_gtsug 
[\[259b.4\]]lag gi tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bzlas brjod byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi chu sbyin par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong dag 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed 'jog 
[\[259b.5\]]par byed nas/_de btsas zos pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung 
[\[259b.6\]]bzed mi gzhag par bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed gad khar 'jog par byed nas de 'dril te chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la 
[\[259b.7\]]bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gad kha ma yin par lhung bzed gzhag par bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed g.yang sar 'jog par byed nas de 'dril te chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_g.yang sa ma yin par lhung bzed gzhag par bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed dkan gzar por 'jog par byed nas de 'dril 
[\[260a.2\]]te chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dkan gzar po ma yin par lhung bzed gzhag par bslab 
[\[260a.3\]]par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong zhig 'greng ste lhung bzed 'khru nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'greng ste lhung bzed ma 'khru zhig_/des smras pa 
[\[260a.4\]]cir 'gyur shor te chag par 'gyur mod/_gzhan ci zhig tu 'gyur/_de dag gis bzlog pa na de ma btub nas/_lhung bzed de shor te chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na 
[\[260a.5\]]nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'greng ste lhung bzed mi bkru bar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed gad kar 'khru bar byed nas de shor te 'dril nas chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[260a.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gad ka ma yin par lhung bzed bkru bar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed g.yang sar 'khru bar byed nas 
[\[260a.7\]]de shor te 'dril nas chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_g.yang sa ma yin par 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]lhung bzed bkru bar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag lhung bzed dkan gzar por 'khru bar byed nas de shor te 'dril nas chag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams 
[\[260b.2\]]kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_dkan gzar po ma yin par lhung bzed bkru bar bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong dag 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu chu bar byed nas de shor te chus khyer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[260b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu mi bcu bar bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa 
[\[260b.4\]]bsdu ba'i mdo ni lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi dor bar bslab par bya/_'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi gzhag par bslab par bya/_gad ka ma yin pa dang /_g.yang sa ma yin pa dang /_dkan gzar po ma yin par lhung bzed gzhag par bslab par 
[\[260b.5\]]bya/_'greng ste lhung bzed mi bkru bar bslab par bya/_gad ka ma yin pa dang /_g.yang sa ma yin pa dang /_dkan gzar po ma yin par lhung bzed bkru bar bslab par bya/_'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu mi bcu bar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[260b.6\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/drug sde dag mi na bar 'dug pa la 'greng ste chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis 
[\[260b.7\]]dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa 'dug pa rnams la 'greng ste chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar 'dug pa la 'greng ste chos mi bshad par bslab par 
[\[261a.2\]]bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar nyal ba la 'dug ste chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad 
[\[261a.3\]]nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa nyal ba rnams la 'dug ste chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[261a.4\]]stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar nyal ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang 
[\[261a.5\]]khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa 
[\[261a.6\]]stan mthon po la 'dug pa rnams la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams 
[\[261a.7\]]kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa mdun du 'gro ba rnams la phyi 
[\[261b.2\]]nas 'gro zhing chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di 
[\[261b.3\]]ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 
[\[261b.4\]]'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa lam nas 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing 
[\[261b.5\]]chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_
[\[261b.6\]]mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni mi na bar 'dug pa la 'greng ste chos mi bshad par bslab par bya/_mi na bar nyal ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par bslab par bya/_mi na bar stan mthon po la 
[\[261b.7\]]'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad par bslab par bya/_mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya/_mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar mgo 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]g.yogs pa la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med 
[\[262a.2\]]pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa mgo g.yogs pa rnams la chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[262a.3\]]de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar mgo g.yogs pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar rje sa med pa la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa

[\[262a.5\]]dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar

[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar gzar ba la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar gnya' gong 
[\[262b.2\]]du bsnol ba la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med

[\[262b.5\]]khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_

[\[262b.7\]]kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar ltag par bsnol ba la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni mi na bar mgo g.yogs pa dang /_brdzes pa dang /_gzar ba dang /_gnya' gong du bsnol ba dang /_ltag par bsnol 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ba la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na ba skra do ker can la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma

[\[263a.7\]]bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_

[\[263b.4\]]la chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i

[\[265b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar lag na gdugs thogs pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams la chos 'chad par

[\[265b.7\]]lag na ral gri thogs pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar lag na dgra cha thogs pa rnams la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa lag na dgra cha thogs pa rnams la chos 'chad par byed dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra 
[\[266a.2\]]bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar lag na dgra cha thogs pa la chos mi bshad 
[\[266a.3\]]par bslab par bya'o/_/drug sde dag mi na bar go cha gyon pa rnams la chos 'chad par byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag_/'phags pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis pha rol du phyin pa drug 
[\[266a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes na/_khyed cag rje sa med pa dang /_gus pa med pa go cha gyon pa rnams la chos 'chad dam zhes smod par byed nas/_de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[266a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i mdo ni mi na bar lag na khar ba thogs pa dang /_lag na gdugs 
[\[266a.6\]]thogs pa dang /_lag na mtshon thogs pa dang /_lag na ral gri thogs pa dang /_lag na dgra cha thogs pa dang /_go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad par bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/
[\[266a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' 'greng bzhin du bshang gci byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag smod par byed de/_'phags pa dag ston pa'i nyan thos ni ngo tsha dang ldan pa lags na/_nyan thos ngo tsha dang khrel med pa 'di 'greng bzhin du bshang gci bgyid pa ga la gda' zhes zer 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar 'greng ste bshang gci mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs 
[\[266b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' btso blag mkhan gyi gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gos 'di khrus te byin cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis sngon ni bdag cag 
[\[266b.3\]]bsrung ba byas par gyur na/_deng sang mi byed pas ci'i phyir khyod kyi gos bkrus te sbyin/_des sdod cig ces byas te song nas des bsams pa/_bkren pa de mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas/_des bkru sman zos te mi gtsang bas gyo mo bkang nas btso blag mkhan de'i bkru bshal sar 
[\[266b.4\]]blugs so/_/de nas btso blag mkhan de nang par sngar langs te gos dag bkru bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na mi gtsang ba'i dri bro nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ched du bsams te phyogs der song nas des smras pa/_
[\[266b.5\]]bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bkru bshal sa 'dir gcig gis mi gtsang ba blugs te las bgyir ma mchis pas da ji ltar btso chab sbyar bar bgyi ma 'tshal to/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa khyod de ltar 
[\[266b.6\]]mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar chu'i nang 
[\[266b.7\]]du bshang gci mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/thams cad chus gang ste go skabs med pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bshang gci ji lta ba bzhin du chu'i nang du mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya ba yang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ldum pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ldum chung zhig byin cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis sngon ni bdag cag bsrung ba byas 
[\[267a.2\]]par gyur na deng sang mi byed pas ci'i phyir khyod la ldum sbyin/_des sdod cig ces byas te song nas des bsams pa/_bkren pa de mi dga' bar bya'o snyam nas/_des bkru sman zos te mi gtsang bas gyo mo bkang nas phyags ma thogs te ldum zhing gi steng thams cad du mi gtsang bas 
[\[267a.3\]]gtor nas ldum thams cad ma rung bar byas so/_/mi gtsang ba'i dris der wa dag 'dus nas de dag gis kyang ldum thams cad ma rung bar byas so/_/de nas ldum pa de ldum btsong ba'i phyir nang par sngar langs te ldum rar song ba dang /_ji tsam na ldum thams cad mi gtsang bas 
[\[267a.4\]]gtor cing was kyang zos te zong du mi rung bar mthong nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]ched du bsams te phyogs der song nas des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_
[\[267a.5\]]'phags pa ldum zhing 'dir gcig gis mi gtsang bas gtor te zong du mi rung bas da ji ltar 'tsho ba sbyar ba bgyi ma 'tshal to/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_bkren pa khyod de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o/_/de smod pa la zhugs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 
[\[267a.6\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_mi na bar rtswa sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su bshang gci mi bya bar bslab par bya'o/_/thams 
[\[267a.7\]]cad sngos gang ste go skabs med pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bshang gci ji lta ba bzhin du rtswa sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya ba yang de bzhin no/_/bslab pa bsdu ba'i 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]mdo ni mi na bar 'greng ste bshang gci mi bya bar bslab par bya/_mi na bar chu'i nang du bshang gci dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya/_mi na bar rtswa sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su bshang gci dang /_
[\[267b.2\]]mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_skyugs pa dang /_rlugs pa mi dor bar bslab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la 
[\[267b.3\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' la dge skos kyi bsod snyoms nod pa'i res bab nas des bsams pa/_gang gis dge skos 'di zan gcad par bya ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod snyam nas de 'di snyam du 
[\[267b.4\]]sems te/_bdag la 'ga' zhig mnyan yod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal thag ji srid yod ces 'dri na bdag gis de la ji skad brjod par byas/_rnam pa thams cad du gom pa dag gis sa gzhi gzhal bar bya'o snyam nas/_de gom pa dag gis sa gzhi 'jal zhing dal bus 
[\[267b.5\]]'ong ba na dge skos kyis bsams pa/_de yun ring du thogs pas bdag zan chad na mi rung gis blta'o snyam nas/_de shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzegs te blta bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dal bu dal bus 'ong ba mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ji 
[\[267b.6\]]ltar 'ong ba'i stangs las na 'dis bdag zan gcod par byed do snyam du rig nas de shing ljon pa de las babs te 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' yang 'ongs pa dang /_de tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa khyod 'gros de lta bur 'ong ba las na don gyis na 
[\[267b.7\]]khyod kyis ched du bsams te kho bo zan gcod du bcug go/_/khyod kyis kho bo ji ltar mthong /_kho bos shing ljon pa la 'dzegs te bltas so/_/khyod shing ljon pa la 'dzeg tu rung ngam/_rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de/_kho bos ni 'dzegs so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis shing la mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis shing la mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong 
[\[268a.2\]]dag tshon rtsi'i las byed par 'dod pas gzar thag gang du gdags pa mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shing la mi gang tsam du 'dzeg par bya ste/_de lta bas na dge slong gis shing la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[268a.3\]]'das kyis dge slong gis shing la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong zhig don mthun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'phags pa dang /_don mthun dgon pa'i lam du mtshan mo btab pa na der stag gi 'jigs pa byung nas/_don mthun dag ni 
[\[268a.4\]]shing ljon pa la mthor 'dzegs te 'khod do/_/dge slong de shing ljon pa la mi gang tsam du 'dzegs te 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na stag 'ongs nas don mthun rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags pa stag mchis kyis myur du mthor 'dzegs shig_/des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shing 
[\[268a.5\]]la mi gang tsam las mthor 'dzegs par ma gnang bas ji ltar mthor 'dzeg snyam nas de de nyid du 'dug pa dang /_stag gis mchongs pa byas te bsad pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na nga'i nyan 
[\[268a.6\]]thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/_gnod pa byung ba ma gtogs par shing la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o/_/bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams rdzogs so//_//sdom la/_mngon sum dran pa ma myos pa/_/de bzhin gang mang ngo 
[\[268a.7\]]bo nyid/_/rtswa rnams bkram pa lta bu dang /_/khas blangs par yang bya ba'o/_/mngon sum du 'dul bar 'os pa la mngon sum du 'dul ba sbyin no/_/dran pas 'dul bar 'os pa la dran pas 'dul ba sbyin no/_/ma myos pas 'dul bar 'os pa la ma myos pas 'dul ba sbyin no/_/gang tshul shing mang po sbyin 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]par 'os pa la tshul shing mang po sbyin no/_/de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa la de'i ngo bo nyid btsal ba sbyin no/_/rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa la rtswa bkram pa lta bu sbyin no/_/gang khas blang bar 'os pa la khas blang bar bya'o/_/rtsod pa byung bar gyur pa rnams rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos 
[\[268b.2\]]bdun po 'di dag gis chos dang /_'dul ba dang /_ston pa'i bstan pa bzhin du dul bar bya/_zhi bar bya/_rnam par zhi bar bya'o/_/rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//bzod pa dka' thub dam pa bzod pa yi/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung /_/
[\[268b.3\]]rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang /_/gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no/_/mig ldan 'gro ba yod pa yi/_/nyam nga ba dag ji bzhin du/_/mkhas pa 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir/_/sdig pa dag ni yongs su spong /_/skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya/_/so sor thar pa'ang bsdam 
[\[268b.4\]]par bya/_/zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya/_/bas mtha'i gnas su gnas par bya/_/lhag pa'i sems la yang dag sbyor/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/ji ltar bung ba me tog las/_/kha dog dri la mi gnod par/_/khu ba bzhibs nas 'phur ba ltar/_/de bzhin thub pa grong du rgyu/_/bdag 
[\[268b.5\]]gi rigs dang mi rigs la/_/brtag par bya ste gzhan rnams kyi/_/mi mthun pa dang gzhan dag gi/_/byas dang ma byas rnams la min/_/lhag pa'i sems la bag byas te/_/thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab/_/nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i/_/skyob pa mya ngan med pa yin/_/sbyin pas bsod 
[\[268b.6\]]nams rab tu 'phel/_/legs bsdams dgra sogs mi 'byung ngo /_/dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong /_/nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'/_/sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya/_/rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin/_/lus kyi 
[\[268b.7\]]sdom pa legs pa ste/_/ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin/_/yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste/_/thams cad du ni sdom pa legs/_/kun du bsdams pa'i dge slong ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu 'grol/_/ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid kyis rab bsdams te/_/lus kyis mi 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dge ba dag mi byed cing /_/las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs na/_/drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob/_/'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srung dang /_/
[\[269a.2\]]shAkya thub pa gau tam lha yi lha/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bla na med/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa mchog_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun po dag_/grags ldan rnams kyis so sor thar/_/'di ni rab tu rgyas par bstan/_/'di la sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[269a.3\]]dang gang /_/sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams kyang gus/_/'di la gus dang bcas gyur pas/_/'dus ma byas pa thob par gyis/_/brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen 
[\[269a.4\]]bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/_/chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/_/'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa 
[\[269a.5\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis/_'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu 
[\[269a.6\]]chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab/_'di la sho lo ka ni nyi khri lnga stong yod/_bam po ni brgyad bcu rtsa gsum byas so//_//mang ga laM//_//
